story:
Yes, that's right!

3D Printing is an amazing technology but remains difficult and expensive for the average person to use - we now aim to change this.

The AXIS 3D Printer is one of the most affordable 3D Printers ever made and perfect for anyone keen to dive into the futuristic world of desktop 3D Printing, without having to break the bank!

Our printer is based on open-source technology with tried and tested industry standard components designed to work right, first time.

The £99 price was achieved by creating a design that merged together the motion system and frame of the printer whilst keeping the part count to a minimum. This way we can offer high quality components but for a far lower price.

It's worth mentioning that our margins are low, so we need your support to order large enough quantities to make the AXIS 3D Printer a success - but we will deliver and our pledge goal is very realistic for doing so!

The AXIS 3D printer has a spec sheet to rival many of its higher priced counterparts and at £99 you're paying less than 1 pence per CM ³ of build space!

Thousands of hours of development and testing has gone in to make sure that the AXIS 3D printer functions as intended, again and again.

Furthermore a finalised design with components already selected are ready to order as soon as the campaign ends.

 
 

Use the AXIS 3D Printer to print virtually any plastic object from toys and models to more practical items ranging from bike grips to shower heads! Explore the full range of possibilities on the popular model sharing site myminifactory.com.

Or take things further with the free and easy to use design software TinkerCAD to print your own unique objects!

 

The AXIS 3D Printer is shipped as an easy to assemble kit with a very high quality online build manual with high-res images and easy to follow steps that break down the entire assembly process into easy to understand stages. Plus you also have the ability to comment under each and every step in case you get stuck.

The Assembly process should be half the fun, and give you an in-depth look at how your 3D Printer goes together and works, knowledge that will come in handy later for upgrades and maintenance.

A massive online community, easy maintenance, affordable off the shelf parts and entirely hackable are just some of the things that open-source technology provides.

The AXIS 3D Printer runs on the latest version of the very popular Marlin Firmware and works with the vast majority of industry standard software.

The AXIS 3D Printer is also compatible with a number of other very standard 3d printer hardware, ranging from hotends, nozzles, sensors, build-plates, and much more!

Also, the custom parts designed by us will have all of their manufacturing blueprints available for free download from our website after the campaign ends.

 
  • Advanced automatic bed-levelling comes as standard on the AXIS 3D Printer, meaning a perfect first layer each and every time.
  • The 300x200x200mm (12x8x8inch) build volume gives you plenty of space to bring your ideas to life, that's less than 1 pence for every CM³ of build space!
  • A steel and aluminium construction means a very solid and vibration free machine that will just keep on performing even after thousands of hours of printing!
 
  • The 24V power supply provides the AXIS 3D Printer with super quick heat-up times and smooth motion.
  • A steel drive gear grips firmly onto the filament that results in extreme precision over the flow of plastic through the hotend.
  • The all metal hotend can get to temperatures of up to 270 degrees Celsius, perfect for printing the vast majority of materials.

Our unique motion system merges the frame, print platform and gantry to work together to create perfectly rigid and parallel motion. The folded metal edges reinforce the parts themselves whilst also providing a curved surface for linear guides to latch onto.

The linear guides themselves are made from HDPE (High Density Polyethylene), an incredibly rigid material with an extremely low co-efficient of friction resulting in incredibly smooth motion.

Furthermore the kit also includes PTFE grease for the contact between the linear guides and the metal frame to really achieve the smoothest possible motion.

 

The brains of the AXIS 3D Printer is the all in one MKS GEN_L control board running the latest version of the open-source Marlin firmware.

The stock drivers are the strong and reliable A4988 chips that control the motion of 4 full sized NEMA 17 stepper motors. We're also including a spare A4988 stepper driver too.

The power supply is an external 24V 4A brick suitable for both 110V and 230V mains outlets.

Upgrade electronics include an LCD display with click wheel control, a beefy external MOSFET for controlling the heated bed and the silent TMC2208 stepper drivers.

The Octoprint upgrades includes a Raspberry Pi camera and we're recommending to use it with the powerful Raspberry Pi 3B+ (sold separately).

Expand the standard capabilities of the AXIS 3D Printer by adding the following plug and play upgrades. You can mix and match any combination of upgrades or add them all for the ultimate experience!

 
 
 

The Power Pack is our most recommended upgrade that will give you the most rounded experience of the AXIS 3D Printer.

 

Control the AXIS 3D Printer without a PC connection; pre-heat the hotends and tweak settings like temperature and print speed - mid-print!

The included set of 5 hard wearing steel nozzles (0.2, 0.3, 0.4, 0.6, 0.8mm) can be used for better resistance to more abrasive materials like carbon fibre, woodfil and glow-in-the-dark filaments.

Also included are two roles of PLA filament (250G each), a silicone cover for your hotend to keep it clean and provide better targetted air flow and a pack of 5 spare brass nozzles on top of the already included 0.4mm nozzle.

What's included:

  • LCD Screen
  • SD Card
  • PLA Sample Roll (x2)
  • Silicone Hotend Cover
  • Brass Nozzles - 0.2, 0.3, 0.4, 0.6, 0.8mm
  • Steel Nozzles - 0.2, 0.3, 0.4, 0.6, 0.8mm
 

Another recommended upgrade is the FlexPlate, a flexible spring steel sheet with our custom print surface that makes prints, both small and large, easy and hassle free to remove from the platform.

It fixes onto the platform with the help of 9 super strength high-temp resistant magnets.

What's included:

  • Flexplate
  • Print Surface
  • Magnet Pack (x9)
 

The heated bed helps your print's first layer adhere better to the platform and is an absolute must if you intend on printing high temp materials like ABS.

Our heated bed is a high quality aluminium platform with an integrated copper heater trace. It reaches temperatures of up to 110 degrees Celsius and is controlled through a beefy external MOSFET.

The platform is powered by a dedicated independent 24V power supply.

What included:

  • Aluminium Heated Platform (Pre-Wired with Thermistor)
  • Large External MOSFET
  • Dedicated Independent 24V Power Supply
 

The stock X/Y axis A4988 motor drivers on the control board are upgraded with the powerful and silent TMC2208 drivers.

With these upgrades the printing noise is reduced by up to 50%, this upgrade is a must if you expect to be running your printer in a quiet environment.

What's included:

  • Three TMC2208 Stepper Drivers (2 for x/y Axis + 1 Spare)
 

Double the fun and the capability of your AXIS 3D Printer with this easy to use dual extrusion upgrade.

Two materials are printed via a Y shaped Splitter. When a material is done printing the extruder pulls it back out of the hotend and through the Splitter. Then the other extruder pushes the second material in through the other side of the Splitter to be printed with.

The Capabilities of Dual Extrusion

With the Dual Extruder upgrade you are able to print together materials with different properties and create dynamic parts like this hinge:

Dual extrusion can also be used to create geometries that would otherwise be impossible to print, but with the aid of a dissolvable support material like PVA we can do this:

What's Included:

  • Extruder Kit
  • NEMA 17 Stepper Motor
  • Spool Holder
  • Stepper Driver (A4988)
  • PTFE Tubing (x2)
  • Splitter Kit
  • High Tolerance PTFE Tubing
  • Cables and Fasteners
 

Make wires a thing of the past and control your AXIS 3D Printer via Wi-Fi. Effortlessly start, stop and monitor prints when away from home or whilst your printer sits in a different room.

The interface is the open-source Octoprint which is controlled via most web browser like Chrome, Safari, Firefox etc.

The system itself runs on the powerful Raspberry Pi 3B+ (not included in the upgrade but available from webstore - you may already own one or be able to source one locally).

What's Included:

  • Pi Cam
  • Pi Cam Case
  • Pi Cam Ribbon Cable
  • USB Wi-Fi Adapter
  • Micro SD Card
  • USB Power Converter
  • Fasteners

Before printing, a model needs to be processed by a "slicing software", where a 3D model (.stl file) is converted into a .gcode file that the printer can read.

The Makertech Edition of CURA, is an open-source slicing software with settings tuned to work seamlessly with the AXIS 3D printer. It is available for both Windows and MAC.

Download here.

Randomized testing of the metal parts allows us to make sure that the parts coming off of our assembly lines are with in specification.

All of the electronics under go rigorous testing also and are marked with a QC sticker after inspection before being packaged, ensuring that you receive the AXIS 3D Printer as we intended.

In the slim case you do receive a faulty part or one that was damaged in transit or one that was even missing we'll send out a replacement for you right away for up to an entire year after your purchase!

**Conversions from Pounds (£) to US Dollars ($) and Euros (€) are an approximation and may vary when placing the final order.**

 
 

After successfully fulfilling two 3D Printer Kickstarter's in the past two years we're quite confident of meeting our deadlines and getting your AXIS 3D Printer to you on time!

 

The AXIS 3D Printer is designed and developed by Makertech 3D, a UK based 3D Printer manufacturer. We currently have two successful Kickstarter funded 3D Printers and are hoping to add a third with the extremely affordable and accessible AXIS 3D Printer.

Check out our previous projects here:

 
 
  • "Last year, I backed up the original Proforge. Today I now backed Proforge 2S reward (all upgrades)." - Timothy
 
  • "Another happy recipient. Eyebrows raised by the missus, but I've survived. Everything looks very professional, though I think we were expecting that ;)" - Chris
 
  • "Adeel (Makertech 3D Founder/CEO) is very professional and thorough, the campaign had detailed updates and the end result was a kit that was fun to build, with detailed instructions." - Alex
  • Adalinda Dragon by Loubie
  • Easter Island Moai by Marcfelis
  • OK Hand by Mikacu
  • Sydney Opera House by Miniworld
  • Kickstarter Test by Autodesk
  • Vortex Keep by Kijai
  • T800 by Machina
  • Cute Hug Me Ghost by gCreate
  • Groot Bust Sculpture by Doodle Monkey

 

 

Risks and challenges

As with any crowdfunding project there comes an element of risk, however this would now be our third time launching a project and we've learnt so much along the way and over come many obstacles that we're more than confident that we can not only deliver on time but to a high standard also.

The AXIS 3D printer was born out of the idea of an affordable £99 desktop 3D printer kit that could be both fun, useful and informative. This price point presents a number of challenges however we have a lot of faith in our team, suppliers and distributors to make this project a success and deliver the best possible AXIS 3D printer.

story:
Pikanote is a note taking platform for students.

We realized that students still use Microsoft Word to take notes in class. They go on Facebook or Google+ to share them. And they also use their school platform to get the news (lessons, homework, absent teachers…).

Why so many complications while everything can be gathered on only one platform?

We have been working on Pikanote for several months to offer you the chance to facilitate your organization and simplify your life at school.

Wow! And how does it work?

You can write some text or some notes, can make links, graphs and formulas. If you want to, you can even become an artist thanks to easy drawing tools.

Because organization is the key, Pikanote provides a friendly manner to classify your notes. For this, it’s as easy as 1 subject = 1 note!
And for each subject, which better way to organize than the real life? In a timeline!


Record your teacher during the class. You're not sure about a part? Don't worry, you just have to click on the text and you'll hear what the professor was saying at this exact moment!

New school, new lessons, it’s time to build a new network of students, teachers and coach who’ll help you!

With that network, access easily the lessons you missed, or improve the one you have with other’s help.

Share your notes, get some tips, tricks, advice and likes.

Even if you drop your laptop into the Niagara Falls, it’s not a big deal: all your documents and notes are saved in real time in the cloud.
You can now put aside stress and focus on what matters: success at exams!


Currently, our Geek’s Tiger Team is working on a fabulous V1 of the online platform. 

We already finished an Alpha Version, actually being tested by 50 people.

Once this Alpha period is finished, the next steps will be:

Milestone June July August Sept Oct Nov
Funding
Beta version
First version
Desktop version
Mobile App (iOS, Android)


The funds you invest in Pikanote are going to launch the first version.

This first version will be completely worldwide (translated in many languages) and perfectly functional. 

But more precisely, why do we need funds while we already have a Beta version almost ready?

In fact in an app of this size, the development is just a part, but there is a lot of other costs to consider. Among these, here are the big three:

As we expect to have more than 100k users after 3 months, we need big resources. 
This hosting will serve on one hand to host your data and on the other hand to provide all the resources needed to store them and make the tools work efficiently.

Since we are going to host a lot of information, we need to protect it well.  This is why we are going to conduct a lot of tests, and to hire a specialist full-time to make sure that your data is safe.

As many of you know, there is not always internet everywhere.
So, we need to develop an offline version that lets you use Pikanote even if you are in the middle of the Pacific!


Because your help matters a lot to us, we’d like to thank you with gifts up to your participation and linked with Pikanote.

After a long brainstorming, we finally decided that the best way to do that is to offer you some space on the cloud. 

Space that you can use for other media (your cat videos, your holidays pictures, your favorites songs etc.). The storage for your notes and documents is free and unlimited.

And as you are special to us, we make a special offer: the space you get now, you’ll enjoy it for life!

In concrete terms, the different packages are:



Here is our Pika T-shirt!


Time to play! Help us to launch Pikanote and we’ll reward you.

You just have to distribute your link (one per person) to a maximum of people (contacts, companies, friends...)

Each person who contribute on our project after have clicked on your link will be recorded on your profile.

And this way you can win the following gifts:



How does the referral contest work

Or more info on the Facebook event


If you contribute up to 1000€ in our project, the name of your company will appear in the top of our IndieGogo page and on the credit page of our website.

It will offer you the chance to be seen by thousands of people and to take part of a fast growing company with international ambitions.

For the biggest investments, we could consider various partnerships. Let us know.

You can send us your logo or contact us for any question or request by email at info@pikanote.com.


Jeremy and Philemon have known each other since 5 years and created their own web development company about 2 years ago. It works very well but they want to create something bigger!

After months and months of brainstorming, they realized that students still use Microsoft Word to take notes in class. They share them (more or less) and work in groups on Facebook or Google+. And they also use their school platform to get the news (lessons, homework, absent teachers…).

There wasn’t an universal platform to organize all your life at school and share it with your network… now there is with Pikanote!

So, they recruited Raymond, Web Developer (a collaborator of their previous company) and Jordan, Community Manager. They are now a young team of 4 working hard to start up the Pikanote adventure and raise enough funds to develop the project worldwide.

From left to right, Philémon, Jéremy, Raymond and Jordan.


How can I invest on IndieGogo?

To help us and invest in our project, it’s very easy.

IndieGogo use PayPal which is the safest way to pay on internet. You just have to click on the “Invest now” pink button.

If you have a PayPal account, click on “I already have an account”. If you don’t, fill the area bellow.
If you don’t want to create a PayPal account, just fill all the areas and uncheck the box “Save this information with a PayPal account”.

Enjoy your gifts!

Can I help without a credit card?

Yes you can! Paypal allows users to make a wire transfer from your bank account.

To do so, subscribe to a paypal account (click on the pink button contribute now).

Once it's done, Paypal should give you an account number. Make a classic bank transfer on this account. You'll have to wait a few days that the payment is received and when it's done, go back on Indiegogo and you can help from your Paypal account.

I really like the project but I’m too poor to invest.

It’s not a big deal, don’t worry. As our platform focus on students, we’re aware that most of them don’t have a lot of money. However, you still can help us by sharing the project to your entire network, and even ask them to help us.
To do that, just click on the share button for Facebook, Twitter or Email.

Check also our Referral contest (update page), you can win gifts (MacBook, iPad, GoPro…) just sharing the link of our page. All the people who’ll contribute will be recognized on your profile, and you’ll get rewarded for that!

I’m neither a teacher neither a student, is there perks for me?

As you might understood, all the retributions above (cf. right column) are for everyone. Indeed, you can use that space like a classic computing service (like DropBox or Google Drive) expected the fact that it’s much cheaper because of the special offer!

Where is going the money I give to?

The PayPal account of Pikanote is directly connected to our Belgium based company “Dedeur & Degroodt”, VAT: BE 0533.715.774.
The money collected is going to be used only to develop the offline platform and the afferent costs like hosting and security.

What will happen if I help you and you don’t reach the goal?

If we don’t reach the goal, you’ll get your perks and gifts anyway.

When could I use Pikanote?

We are going to launch a Beta version before the end of July, but it will be accessible for only 5000 people. The final V1 is going to be launched at the end of August. So, don’t worry, it will be available for the school start!

How much will cost Pikanote?

The platform, the desktop version and the app will be free for everyone, and forever!
The only thing that we could sell is data space used for other things that the notes and lessons (For example, if you want to upload movies, pictures or music). And even for that space, the price will be very low because it won’t be our main source of income …

How can I be sure of the safety of my notes?

All your notes are going to be hosted on two different servers and, if you get the offline version, are going to be saved on your computer or mobile.
And even if Pikanote disappears, you still can export your notes as a Word document or a PDF, so there is absolutely no risk, unless a meteor falls on our server and your laptop be eaten by a tyrannosaur.

story:
What is Zentyal Server?

All-in-one server • easy to deploy & manage • covering all features needed in a small to medium-sized business environment.

1) Domain, Directory & File Server
Samba Services

2) Mail & Groupware Server
Comes with SMTP and POP3/IMAP mail server, CalDAV, CardDAV, webmail.

3) Gateway & Infrastructure
Guarantees reliable and secure Internet access and helps to manage all basic network infrastructure services.

What is our plan with macOS?

➤ At this moment Zentyal runs on top of Ubuntu Linux
➤ Mac Admins seek a Server running natively on macOS.
➤ Bring a native Zentyal macServer to macOS.
➤ Same features and Server GUI
 
 

Affordable for Mac Admins and SMB Customers

25 User-License = $199
75 User-License = $499
300 User License = $999
Unlimited User-License =$2,999
 

Full licenses - no hidden fees

➤ Perk licenses are full licenses not just NFR licenses
➤ Channel Partners (resellers) who back the campaign: 
      ➤ You are allowed to resell licenses from your perks
➤ No incremental user or device Client Access Licenses (CALs) on top


Goal of crowdfunding campaign

• Develop a new core of Zentyal for macOS
• Port most important modules to macOS
    ➤ Directory Services, users, groups & computers (Samba)
    ➤ File-Server Services, SMB 3/2/1  (Samba)
    ➤ Mail with SMTP, IMAP, POP3 (Postfix and Dovecot)
    ➤ Webmail, CalDAV (calendar), CardDAV (addressbook)
    ➤ Core infrastructure DNS, DHCP, NTP
 

What perks are we offering?

We have defined four different levels of backers:

  1. BASIC for people who want to bring their grain of sand to the project
  2. STARTER for people who want to get familiar with Zentyal's features and experience
  3. CERTIFIED for people who want to get a deep insight into Zentyal and be prepared for the release of the macServer
  4. BELIEVER for people who want to be fully involved, become a part of the project and help us with their ideas and inputs

➤ Training & certifications granted for Zentyal Server valid for Zentyal macServer too.

➤ All licenses received as perks will be fully valid commercial licenses and they will be exchangeable for the equivalent Zentyal macServer licenses upon release.

➤ All perks will be delivered at the end of the crowdfunding campaign, whether the goal has been reached or not.
 

Roadmap

If the campaign is successful we will execute the following roadmap:

  • End of June 2019: closing of the crowdfunding
  • July 2019: kick-off webinar for BELIEVERs
  • September 2019: first alpha released for BELIEVERs
  • November 2019: beta released for BELIEVERs and CERTIFIEDs
  • Christmas 2019: macServer released
     

Risks and challenges

We have performed a thoughtful analysis of the risks ahead before launching this campaign and we have not found technical blockers. Main components (samba, apache, dovecot, postfix, etc.) are already released for macOS. Biggest work package is re-coding Zentyal core and adapting it to the macOS architecture.
 

Want to learn more about Zentyal Server?

➤ Access official documentation.
➤ View tutorials on Zentyal's Youtube channel.
 

 

 

Who will be our main point of contact?

"Since Apple dismantled their macOS Server, the world-wide Apple platform with more than 100 million Macs is server-orphaned. Currently there are 60,000 Mac channel partners, but not a single all-in-one server solution. This is a pain that Zentyal can solve".

  Sam W. Klambour, Zentyal Evangelist for macSERVER

Sam W. Klambour, a longstanding MacIT Manager/Mac Admin & former account manager with Apple, is the person behind the Zentyal macServer idea. He has over two decades of experience on Mac systems and he had been searching for a maOS Server substitute long and hard when he finally came across Zentyal.

"Zentyal is really a perfect fit for Mac Administrators from many points of view: it is an all-in-one solution with an intuitive easy-to-use graphical user interface, made with the idea that the system administrator can manage almost everything just by using the GUI. It simply needs to be native on macOS."

story:
Hi, we're Swiftpoint!  We've been developing award-winning products that push the boundaries of ergonomic mouse design and function for over a decade. This is our third crowdfunded project, and thanks to our incredible supporters, we've previously raised nearly a million dollars in pledges - bringing our products to life.     

We’ve gone back to the drawing board on our ergonomic pen grip mouse (Swiftpoint GT), improved everything that people loved, and added more innovative features. We're starting production and are super excited to announce Generation 3 of our pen grip mouse, called ProPoint™

Unbelievable value!

We want to launch the product with a huge splash and reward our early supporters. So to get it into as many hands as possible to spread the word, we’ve put together an amazing special!

 

Double up, and save even more…

 

Ultimate Travel Mouse 

If you’re sitting on a sofa with your laptop, in a cafe, on a plane, or in a train or bus - this is where ProPoint™ shines - you can use it right on your laptop palmrest.  

When you need to walk to a meeting or your next class, just close your laptop and attach your Propoint™ to the magnetic parking spot on the lid.

You can connect via Bluetooth, or with the USB receiver (which also charges the mouse). 

Whether it's relieving current strain or pain, or prevention before it becomes an issue, your health is important...

Take Command of your Presentations

Finally! A mouse for your iPad

Precision and Gestures for Designers & Power Users 

ProPoint™ not only gives you the full functionality of a three-button mouse and scrollwheel but, with our unique gyroscope technology, it opens up a new world of tilt gestures for panning, zooming and rotation.

Unlike other mice that use the scrollwheel for middle mouse clicks, ProPoint™ has a dedicated 3rd mouse button that’s easy to click.

You can assign separate functions to all three buttons when the device is tilted, so there’s actually 6 button actions right at your fingertips. Assign shortcuts to the tilt gestures, like app switching, and the actions you use the most. 

  • In office programs like Word and Excel, use tilt gestures to effortlessly flick up / down, or even left / right. 
  • In design programs like Photoshop and Illustrator, flick to the area you need to work on - without even pressing a button. 
  • In 3d modeling programs, use tilt-gestures to effortlessly rotate, zoom and pan.

Propoint™ is the ultimate tool for designers and power users, in the office or on the go.

 

Tech Specs

We kept all the things people loved about Swiftpoint GT ...

We improved everything, and packed in even more innovative features ...

Our Story 

We’ve been developing revolutionary products for almost 15 years and have a unique design ethic that starts with a clean slate, followed by an analysis of every minute detail of how we interact with our devices to complete daily computing tasks. 

We put our designs and concepts through countless cycles of user testing and refinement - this gives us a deep understanding of ergonomics, efficiency, and intuitiveness, to create truly unique and innovative products.  

We're not only an ideas company, our team has decades of experience in manufacturing, production, sales, and logistics, and we've shipped tens of thousands of products to every country in the world.

Everything we do is about making innovative and robust tools made to the highest build quality that we’re proud to put our name on. Devices that make peoples lives easier and more enjoyable.

Last year we launched ‘The Z’ - a gaming mouse that was voted gaming innovation of the year by CES.

 

Before that, we launched our ergonomically designed pen-grip mouse the ‘Swiftpoint GT’, which went on to become computer peripheral of the year.

Now we’re launching ProPoint™ which is our next generation Swiftpoint GT device.

 

This Project is International Shipping (and Customs) Friendly

 

We have fulfillment warehouses worldwide, meaning rewards bound for the US, EU, Canada, Australia, and NZ will ship from within their region with no additional customs charges. For other regions, packages will be declared at a value that would typically come under customs thresholds. Please check with your local authority if you are unsure.

In design programs like Photoshop and Illustrator, flick to the area you need to work on - without even pressing a button. 
In 3d modeling programs, use tilt-gestures to effortlessly rotate, zoom and pan.
Propoint™ is the ultimate tool for designers and power users, in the office or on the go.  Tech SpecsWe kept all the things people loved about Swiftpoint GT ...We improved everything, and packed in even more innovative features ...Our Story We’ve been developing revolutionary products for almost 15 years and have a unique design ethic that starts with a clean slate, followed by an analysis of every minute detail of how we interact with our devices to complete daily computing tasks. We put our designs and concepts through countless cycles of user testing and refinement - this gives us a deep understanding of ergonomics, efficiency, and intuitiveness, to create truly unique and innovative products.  We're not only an ideas company, our team has decades of experience in manufacturing, production, sales, and logistics, and we've shipped tens of thousands of products to every country in the world.Everything we do is about making innovative and robust tools made to the highest build quality that we’re proud to put our name on. Devices that make peoples lives easier and more enjoyable.Last year we launched ‘The Z’ - a gaming mouse that was voted gaming innovation of the year by CES.
 
 
Before that, we launched our ergonomically designed pen-grip mouse the ‘Swiftpoint GT’, which went on to become computer peripheral of the year.
Now we’re launching ProPoint™ which is our next generation Swiftpoint GT device.
 
This Project is International Shipping (and Customs) Friendly
 
We have fulfillment warehouses worldwide, meaning rewards bound for the US, EU, Canada, Australia, and NZ will ship from within their region with no additional customs charges. For other regions, packages will be declared at a value that would typically come under customs thresholds. Please check with your local authority if you are unsure.

story:
With the fl!P, you can learn languages, historical dates, anatomy, and much more, from anywhere and without any social media or other distractions. It brings together the power of flashcards and proven learning strategies without the bulkiness and hassle of keeping huge folders organized.

 



 

 

 

The fl!P leverages two of the most powerful learning techniques: retrieval practice, and spacing

 

Retrieval Practice, also called ‘Testing Effect’ is any activity that incites you to generate an answer to a question. It can take many forms: quizzes, multiple choice tests or simply flashcards. It has consistently been proven to help learners improve retention and recall (and subsequently exam performance).

The spacing effect is the phenomenon whereby learning is more efficient when studying is spread out over time, as opposed to studying the same amount of content in a single session.

Spaced repetition, the technique implemented in the fl!P's learning algorithms, is a methodology that combines these two effects with truly impressive results.

 

 

 

 

 

 

A fully charged fl!P will last up to 10 days of use time (and weeks in standby-mode... but that's not the point, is it?). Phone and tablet apps drain your device's battery. The fl!P's e-paper technology requires very little energy, so you can learn anywhere, anytime.

In late 2016, Emmanuel and his wife had an idea for a fun learning device for children. Emmanuel started putting together some electronic components and e-paper screens, and he and his wife quickly imagined digitising flashcards and transferring them to the device.

The rest of the story involves a lot of soldering, 3D-printing, and let's face it, quite a deal of good old scotch tape.

Check out all generations of prototypes below...

 

What type of cards will be available?

You will be able to import any card you are already learning and more:

  • Sync with Anki and other flashcard suppliers
  • Explore and choose from our library of 500,000+ flashcards
  • Create and upload your own flashcards

How do I add cards to the fl!P?

You'll have a companion app on your phone and the web and you will be able to pick and upload the sets you want to study on the fl!P via Bluetooth and Wifi.

The app will also help you track and schedule your progress, create additional study sets, etc.

What is the benefit of using the fl!P instead of a regular flashcard app?

Apps may generally be more versatile, but they drain your battery, tire your eyes and push you distractions (notifications and ads) that just kill your learning effort.

That is why we decided to build a device that's, pocket-size, uses e-reader paper and has a 10-day battery life. We believe the fl!P is the perfect learning companion.

How does the spaced repetition algorithm work?

The fl!P uses its built-in spaced repetition algorithms to maximise your learning efficiency. 

Flip up if you knew the answer, flip down if you need more practice, and let the fl!P find the optimal time to bring the card up again.

Does the fl!P work with images?

Yes, the fl!P supports flashcards with low-res images

What can I learn on the fl!P?

With millions of cards available online, the fl!P allows unlimited learning in foreign languages, hard sciences (math, physics, chemistry, biology etc), humanities, test prep, and any other topic. What you can learn is now limitless.

Do you ship internationally?

We are shipping worldwide!

Help Out By Sharing the fl!P With Your Friends!

story:
Thank you for taking interest and visiting my Indiegogo page for Vidicle! 

This project is dedicated to all the insomniacs and daydreamers who have their minds in the kitchen trying to cook up the next "lightbulb", "automobile", or "Facebook"! 

This one goes out to all you THINKERS and INNOVATORS out there. 

As for most budding entrepreneurs, this idea struck me late one night. I couldn't get it out of my head so I regurgitated everything my imagination conjured up for it in a notebook I keep on my nightstand. 

Several months later, after ridiculous amounts of doubt, second thoughts, tweaking, and rebuilding...here I am with my brainchild in tow. 

Vidicle will hopefully be one of those FREE mobile apps that everyone can't stop talking about or using. I truly see it as something that will inevitably revolutionize commerce and the way we look at local small businesses. I visualize that one day it will be a household name used casually in conversation like "Tweet me a message!" or "Nevermind! I'll Google it!" 

Because of Vidicle, our friends, families, and neighbors might be able to turn whatever dreams and hobbies they may have into profitable careers.

I'm ecstatic that this dream of mine is actually beginning to take shape. I already have a reputable team of software developers ready to hit the ground running and put this mobile app together. The only thing I need now is the funding to code the app, obtain space to host it on servers, and release it on the Apple and Android markets.

Because of this, I am giving this project until February 5th to hit it's goal and start off 2013 with a victorious "BANG!" With your support, Vidicle will be available for download by late Spring. I will have a hands-on involvement with my software team to understand all possible outcomes so that we can prepare for them and take all preventative measures throughout the entire process of Vidicle's creation!

Thank you again for your interest and your support on this exciting endeavor. It means more than you know.

story:
What is Note & Mark?

Note & Mark is a bookmark with page markers (sticky notes) integrated, designed for easy reading. By using the page markers, you can flag your favourite pages or quickly write down something. When the book is closed, the page marker sticking out makes the bookmark easy to be found. The size of the page marker is one of the standards on the market, so it can be replaced by yourself easily. 

 

Find more photos here.

Dimensions

 

About page markers

The page markers (sticky notes) are very common used, and you can find the suitable ones for Note & Mark easily in the office supply store or on internet. It is important to get the size correct, which is 50 mm X 13 mm (2 inch X 0.5 inch), so the page makers can match the plate perfectly. For example 3M Post-it Page Markers. 

 

What they say?

Note & Mark has been featured on many design websites and magzines, here are the highlights.

-Sometimes you come across such a simple idea and think, “Why didn’t I think of that?”

-I don’t know about you, but I’m constantly fumbling for a highlighter (which ruins books) and sticky notes (I can’t ever find them) to mark a place in a book that I want to go back to and this solves the problem.

- This is something every student should have.

- A clever creation, it enters the ever-growing category, "why wasn't it designed sooner?"

- A must-have in every student and businessperson's office supply arsenal


- This is pure awesomeness

Note & Mark is also featured by:

In 2013 Milan Design Week, Note & Mark has been invited to participate in the international exhibition ‘Intorno al Libro’ (‘Around the Book’) at the Poldi Pezzoli Museum.

 

What We Have Done?

We have spend over 6 months to develop this product, hundreds of prototypes had been made and tested. 

We already built a solid connection with some reliable manufactures in south China. The manufacturing issues were already solved.

Now we need just need funds to kick-off tooling. That's why your support is so critical for us.

 

What You Get?

By contributing in the campaign, you are pre-ordering your Note & Mark at only 30%-50% of the estimated retail price. And you get your Note & Mark before it come to the shop!

Here is the detail of each perk. (Shipping fee is not included, please add shipping fee accordingly)

 

Ready-to-Hang packaging is free for orders over 50 pieces. We assume you will sell them in a shop, so we are prepared for you. but you might need to put each piece into the transparent bag (OPP bag) by yourself.

 

What is the schedule?

 

We are targeting at a tight schedule in order to bring them to you as soon as possible.

 

Who we are?

We are Simple Form Design, a design studio based in Helsinki, Finland, founded by Chao Huang. Check our website for more imformation.

 

Q&A

1. What kind of packaging will I receive?

- It is important to ensure the product is not starched or damaged. For ordering less than 50 pieces, we will use a bubble envelop for shipping. For the orders more than 50 pieces, Every piece will be packed inside a ready-to-hang transparent bag (OPP bag) to make you ready to sell in your retail store or on-line store, then we will use a rigid cardboard box to pack them together.

2. What if the number of pieces I want to order is not listed in the perk options?

- It is easy, you just need to culculate the total price according to the preice per piece indicated in each perk, then add the shipping fee. done! For example, if I want to order 7 pieces, it belongs to 5-10 pcs catagrey, so the price per piece is 4$, the whole price will be 28$, adding 4$ shipping fee if you live in U.S. the total price for 7 pieces will be 32$. Then please indicate you want to order 7 piece.

3. Is the package I ordered trackable during delivery?

- For orders under 50 pieces, it is not traceable, because we use priority letters mail service, which is much cheaper than parcels. If you want to make your package traceable via internet, please add another 10$ so I could arrange a traceable service for you. For orders above 50 pieces, it is parcel service so it is able to be traced.

story:
BladeMaster has two versions, BladeMaster PRO & BladeMaster TE, to meet our users who have different preferences.

BladeMaster PRO (Wireless/Cherry MX)

Enthusiast Keyboard Users’ Extreme Pursuit 

  • Superior typing experience with Cherry MX RGB Switches, made in Germany. (Options: Silent Red, Speed Silver, Brown, Red, Black and Blue)
  • World’s Fastest Wireless Gaming: With BladeMaster PRO, you can game effortlessly on the 2.4GHz wireless mode with a superior response time - 1ms/1000Hz report rate.   
  • Hot Switching between 3 connection modes: Bluetooth 4.0/2.4GHz Wireless/USB.
  • Retail price US market: $150, EU market:€150

---

BladeMaster TE (Wired/Gateron)

Best Choice to Start Your Gaming Keyboard Journey

  • Perfect for entry-level, casual gamers and upcoming enthusiasts to start their stint with gaming keyboards.  
  • Gateron switches used to access enjoyable typing experience. (Options: Red, Blue, Brown and Black)
  • Retail price US market: $89, EU market:€89

---

9 Layouts (US/UK/IT/DE/FR/SP/JP/KR/ND) 

BladeMaster provide 9 Layouts for backers. And these layouts are shown as below:

For BladeMaster PRO:

 

For BladeMaster TE:

BladeMaster was designed to be the ultimate gaming keyboard that’s widely acknowledged by the community, so during the past 14-month R&D process, thousands of gamers and keyboard enthusiasts have been involved by our forum-based team for suggestions and inspirations.

Finally we’ve met all expectations by incorporating the latest and greatest tech innovations within the BladeMaster PRO. Thus we are confident that BladeMaster could be the best gaming keyboard you’ve ever seen.  

---

Top Tier Components

All BladeMaster keyboards are manufactured in world-class factories that produce high-end models for big brands like SteelSeries and CoolerMaster. You will find that everything used for the BladeMaster is chosen from the best!

A Programmable Touch-Typing Knob for Gaming, Programming, Office Work and Anything You Want from a Keyboard !!

 

Genius-Knob is an innovative idea that solves real problem! People are used to controlling the keyboard with left hands and control the mouse with right hands, but the keyboard is not easy to fully control by a single hand.

Some of the right-hand keys and complicated functions such as macro and batch script processing can be assigned to the knob now to avoid losing control of the mouse by using right hands.   

How? When you are rotating the knob forward/backward or making single-click/double-click, you are actually acting four different input commands. In this way, one knob is equal to four custom functions. When putting it into practice, you will be amazed how great it is!

---

Everything is under control with the Genius-Knob

There are two ways you can use knob in any games:

  • 1. The 4 default commands of knob are PageUp, PageDown, Home & End. By entering "Key Settings", you can assign any operations to the knob. Taking the example of PUBG, you can get superior functions by assigning this way: Energy Drink - PageUp, Bandage - PageDown, First Aid Kit - Home, Painkiller - End.
  • 2. By using our software(DREVO POWER CONSOLE), you can relate this knob to any keys or operations commonly used in a game by default. E.g. Forward - M, Backward - K, Single-click - 6, Double-click - =.

With this knob, in most cases you will have no need to look down on your keyboard anymore to activate game skills, so that you can always hold a step forward than others at tense gaming session.

---

Your nice assistant for office software & programming work

By means of Macro and Batch script, you can assign four of your most repeated and complicated operations to the knob, then your one simple touch will solve the problem.

---

Easier multi-media control

Adjusting your audio, lighting modes, and activating other frequent functions are a breeze.

The advanced Radi Lighting System is another main feature that we are proud of. The 360° lateral middle embedded light bands are elegantly synchronized with the backlit keys. Additionally, they are combined with true 16.8 million colors, 9 lighting modes, per-key customizable as well as two-lighting overlay compatibility, making it the best RGB lighting experience you can ask for in a gaming keyboard.

 

One of the core design principles behind the BladeMaster is “more possibilities and more convenience”. It is not logical to think that everyone will be gaming on the BladeMaster all the time. So when it comes to office work and even some professional programming work, BladeMaster is still a powerful choice!  

Fully compatible with Mac & Windows

  • All the special functions (e.g. multimedia control, brightness control, mission control, lanchpad...) are supported on Mac & Windows. 
  • Except the special functions, BladeMaster support all major Oses (Windows, OS, iOs, Android, Linux, Unix).

 ---

A dream keyboard for Programming

FlashLink Tech - Self-developed Superb 2.4GHz Wireless Tech

To ensure true wireless gaming, the DREVO team has implemented a self-developed connecting tech called "FlashLink" in BladeMaster PRO. 

  • It allows you to game effortlessly under the 2.4GHz wireless mode with a superior response time - 1ms/1000Hz report rate. Besides that, other report rates are also available depending on your personal preference: 2ms/500Hz, 4ms/250Hz, 8ms/125Hz. 
  • Frequency hopping tech skips extra useless signal frequencies and exterior influences.
  • 1 on 1 connection and transmission encryption will keep your data safe. 
  • Optimized techs are integrated to maintain a stable connection and reduce latency while keeping the power consumption lower.

DPC - Optimized Cloud Software

BladeMaster is designed with a full-fledged and patented software called DREVO Power Console(DPC), which can take care of all your custom needs easily!

  • Radi RGB - Customizable per-key backlight & 360° lateral middle embedded light bands are integrated. Any device adopting Radi RGB lighting system can be synchronized simultaneously.
  • Multimedia - Can be used to open the software commonly such as Chrome, E-mail, Calculator etc.
  • Macro - Assign any commands to any keys including the knob (FN key is excepted)
  • Cloud Sync - Import & export settings via software anywhere 
  • User Statistics - Understand your daily typing habits clearly!
  • Batch Script - Assign the batch file to any key for higher efficiency work
  • Profile management - Import and export your settings anytime you want; Settings can be saved in your DPC account or on-board memory(3 at most). 

​

It can also give you the much-needed edge over your competitors during gaming contests. Besides, battery status and special key lighting combo sets are also available for games like CS:GO, Overwatch, MOBA, etc. Everything is at your disposal through the software. When you are playing popular games, the software can even automatically recognize your game and assign certain command settings accordingly to the smart knob for your advanced operation.

Note: DPC for Mac users will launch in the second half of 2018. Linux Software Ver. is also within our plan.

 

On-Board Memory

If you don’t want to download the software every time you use a new PC, no problem! To bring you more convenience, the on-board memory helps you retain custom settings you’d like to use. The built-in storage enables you to keep three different settings and you can activate and switch them by simply pressing the keys: FN+F1/F2/F3

With on-board memory inside your keyboard, many offline activities are of more fun to you! Take the keyboard that knows you by saving your custom settings is a super cool thing no matter where you are: Lan Party, Internet cafe, PC bang or attending an eSports contest.

Design Concept: Elegant and Powerful

Every successful product in the market is there for a reason. If you are curious about the inspiration for the exterior design of the BladeMaster, it is a culmination of our designers consolidated work which includes elements from various fields like electronics, arms, biology, fashion and automobile. To sum it up, the BladeMaster’s appearance is a harmony of several things that you see around you but it’s nothing like you’ve ever seen before.

The design concepts that we concluded from the elements are: humility, dynamic, sharp, lightsaber, and shield. You will notice the intricate details in the appearance is a concrete explanation of the abstract design concept.

Practical Designs for More Possibilities

 

Various Switch Options

Cherry MX RGB for BladeMaster PRO 

Ultimate mechanical key switches Cherry MX RGB switches are used for BladeMaster PRO. There are many optimized experiences that you can’t enjoy with others. E.g. World exclusive CHERRY Gold Crosspoint technology. Precision "Made in Germany" with low bounce time. Guaranteed over 50 million keystrokes per switch with no loss of quality. With all our efforts, now Silent Red, Blue, Red, Brown, Black and Speed Silver switches available.

Kind notice: Cherry MX Speed RGB Sliver is 40% faster than the CHERRY MX Standard switch

---

Gateron RGB for BladeMaster TE 

Gateron switches are well known and loved by the keyboard enthusiast community as well. Gateron manufactures quality switches and trusted by many so it’s a nice choice for cost performance.

Best Choice by Comparison  

We know sometimes it’s hard for our customers to convince themselves to try a new brand, so we give you some counterparts you may be familiar with for comparison in order to make a wise decision. We are glad to prove BladeMaster is at the top level from any parameter.

What’s in the Package?  

We give you everything commonly used for a gaming keyboard. The beautifully designed package features resistance to shock & environmental protection.

Technical Specs

BladeMaster is Ready for Production 

 

It had been a clear goal set by our DREVO team at the very beginning of the whole campaign: each supporter will be ensured of timely delivery of BladeMaster. For this goal, we’ve negotiated with numerous factories and suppliers globally already to ensure every process will be carried out as planned. Also, we've arranged some EVT samples for professional reviewers to gather feedback from them, so that we will more sure each final version BladeMaster will be of top quality!

Rewards

 About Royal Edition

 

Full-metal BladeMaster keyboard was actually our initial idea, which unfortunately could not come true as mass production for TE and PRO versions because of the high cost, limited production capacity, and the problems regarding blocking wireless signals. 

All Drevo team members, however, never give up our goals, and we are committed to implementing the full-metal version. We redesigned the side frame and the structure of lower cover, and also developed a completely new mould. The entire casing is machined by CNC, which made BladeMaster a unique masterpiece. In the current market, there is other full-metal keyboard like BladeMaster featuring so many curved surfaces and chamfers. Most other full-metal keyboards in current market were designed in a rectilinear way without curved surfaces and chamfers, which can significantly lower the cost. 

The $999 full-metal PERK includes not only the keyboard, but also a set of PBT Dye Sublimated rainbow keycaps, a replaceable all-metal knob, and an exclusive service - engraving on the side of the casing. More importantly, your names will appear randomly on the loading page of Drevo’s driver software to express our sincere gratitude and appreciation. $999 is definitely not only a price but also a sense of achievability and longstanding value. Thank you again for supporting our project all along.

We Are the Dream Team Listening to You 

  • About DREVO 

DREVO was founded in 2016, headquartered in Beijing with branches in the US and Europe. Taking pride in our competitive R&D capability and rich experiences in manufacturing, DREVO has successfully gained several rounds of venture investments and achieved great sales performance from the keyboards launched in the US and Europe market.

Compared to other brands, DREVO has the biggest advantage, which is to reach the end-users and understand their true demands. We are the dream team, where each member performs his or her duty to the maximum capability. Any feedback from customers is responded instantly by DREVO customer service team. DREVO marketing team plays an active role in gathering users’ feedbacks and new requests. On the early stages of each product, DREVO R&D team sets regular plans to digest the sorted questions and suggestions from the community to ensure that the upgraded products or new models are exactly same with customers’ expectations.

From this year, DREVO is going to enter new markets in East Asian countries (including China & South Korea), Canada and Australia. It’s our goal to make DREVO a brand that surprises the global community constantly like Huawei, Mi, and Anker.

  • Why crowdfunding?

During the past two years, we’ve been sparing no efforts to figure out what kind of keyboard can be thought of as the ultimate one for gaming. The whole R&D process is tough as we have to be ultra-innovative and comprehensive at each task. However, thanks to the countless message exchanges with thousands of hardware enthusiasts and hardcore gamers from different countries, we’ve successfully upgraded our designs over and over again.

Therefore, to meet the requests from our early supporters, we’ve decided to keep making everything of BladeMaster clear continually, so that launching a crowdfunding project is a good way that we can keep frequent and direct engagements with our supporters. Plus, as a new brand keen on innovative peripherals, it’s really a great chance to use the platform of Indiegogo to turn more highly related target audience into our real users.

Special Thanks 

BladeMaster is not a just keyboard from DREVO, as it’s more of a contribution from the community. For those of you who’ve helped us a lot during the process, your names will be shown on the loading page of our cloud software. If you are reading this page now, please have a check right here:  

Daniel D'Angelo (aka JKaos), Jakub Zaxer Kilinski, Dave Richardson, Brandon Eich, Marc Delrue, Thantap Panmerost , Olivar Cavalcante, Jimmy Raheriarisoa, Mark Lee, Power Gear, depletedvespene, RobOSX, Findecanor, Techno Trousers, Combatical, Sai Krishan Kumar, Brandon Beisel

Media Coverage of DREVO

BladeMaster is voted as the Ultimate Gaming Keyboard by gamers themselves -  the most designing ideas are from thousands of gamers and keyboard enthusiasts during our 14-monthlong R&D process, so you’ll find all the latest and most wanted techs have been integrated in BladeMaster keyboard. 

Nothing can be more appropriate for us to express our greatest thanks to our lovely supporters by bringing out the best gaming keyboard - it’s your greatest support that makes this greatest gaming keyboard come true!

Contact us:

Facebook:

@drevo.net / @drevo.france / @drevo.de / @drevo.it / @DrevoJapan / @DrevoeEspanol 

Twitter : @DREVO_US

Instagram : @drevo_keyboard 

Email: indiegogo@drevo.net
story_txt:
BladeMaster has two versions, BladeMaster PRO & BladeMaster TE, to meet our users who have different preferences.BladeMaster PRO (Wireless/Cherry MX)Enthusiast Keyboard Users’ Extreme Pursuit 
Superior typing experience with Cherry MX RGB Switches, made in Germany. (Options: Silent Red, Speed Silver, Brown, Red, Black and Blue)

World’s Fastest Wireless Gaming: With BladeMaster PRO, you can game effortlessly on the 2.4GHz wireless mode with a superior response time - 1ms/1000Hz report rate.   
Hot Switching between 3 connection modes: Bluetooth 4.0/2.4GHz Wireless/USB.
Retail price US market: $150, EU market:€150
---BladeMaster TE (Wired/Gateron)Best Choice to Start Your Gaming Keyboard Journey
Perfect for entry-level, casual gamers and upcoming enthusiasts to start their stint with gaming keyboards.  

Gateron switches used to access enjoyable typing experience. (Options: Red, Blue, Brown and Black)
Retail price US market: $89, EU market:€89
---9 Layouts (US/UK/IT/DE/FR/SP/JP/KR/ND) BladeMaster provide 9 Layouts for backers. And these layouts are shown as below:For BladeMaster PRO: For BladeMaster TE:BladeMaster was designed to be the ultimate gaming keyboard that’s widely acknowledged by the community, so during the past 14-month R&D process, thousands of gamers and keyboard enthusiasts have been involved by our forum-based team for suggestions and inspirations.Finally we’ve met all expectations by incorporating the latest and greatest tech innovations within the BladeMaster PRO. Thus we are confident that BladeMaster could be the best gaming keyboard you’ve ever seen.  ---Top Tier ComponentsAll BladeMaster keyboards are manufactured in world-class factories that produce high-end models for big brands like SteelSeries and CoolerMaster. You will find that everything used for the BladeMaster is chosen from the best!A Programmable Touch-Typing Knob for Gaming, Programming, Office Work and Anything You Want from a Keyboard !! Genius-Knob is an innovative idea that solves real problem! People are used to controlling the keyboard with left hands and control the mouse with right hands, but the keyboard is not easy to fully control by a single hand.Some of the right-hand keys and complicated functions such as macro and batch script processing can be assigned to the knob now to avoid losing control of the mouse by using right hands.   How? When you are rotating the knob forward/backward or making single-click/double-click, you are actually acting four different input commands. In this way, one knob is equal to four custom functions. When putting it into practice, you will be amazed how great it is!---Everything is under control with the Genius-KnobThere are two ways you can use knob in any games:
1. The 4 default commands of knob are PageUp, PageDown, Home & End. By entering "Key Settings", you can assign any operations to the knob. Taking the example of PUBG, you can get superior functions by assigning this way: Energy Drink - PageUp, Bandage - PageDown, First Aid Kit - Home, Painkiller - End.
2. By using our software(DREVO POWER CONSOLE), you can relate this knob to any keys or operations commonly used in a game by default. E.g. Forward - M, Backward - K, Single-click - 6, Double-click - =.
With this knob, in most cases you will have no need to look down on your keyboard anymore to activate game skills, so that you can always hold a step forward than others at tense gaming session.---Your nice assistant for office software & programming workBy means of Macro and Batch script, you can assign four of your most repeated and complicated operations to the knob, then your one simple touch will solve the problem.---Easier multi-media controlAdjusting your audio, lighting modes, and activating other frequent functions are a breeze.The advanced Radi Lighting System is another main feature that we are proud of. The 360° lateral middle embedded light bands are elegantly synchronized with the backlit keys. Additionally, they are combined with true 16.8 million colors, 9 lighting modes, per-key customizable as well as two-lighting overlay compatibility, making it the best RGB lighting experience you can ask for in a gaming keyboard. One of the core design principles behind the BladeMaster is “more possibilities and more convenience”. It is not logical to think that everyone will be gaming on the BladeMaster all the time. So when it comes to office work and even some professional programming work, BladeMaster is still a powerful choice!  Fully compatible with Mac & Windows

All the special functions (e.g. multimedia control, brightness control, mission control, lanchpad...) are supported on Mac & Windows. 
Except the special functions, BladeMaster support all major Oses (Windows, OS, iOs, Android, Linux, Unix).
 ---A dream keyboard for ProgrammingFlashLink Tech - Self-developed Superb 2.4GHz Wireless TechTo ensure true wireless gaming, the DREVO team has implemented a self-developed connecting tech called "FlashLink" in BladeMaster PRO. 
It allows you to game effortlessly under the 2.4GHz wireless mode with a superior response time - 1ms/1000Hz report rate. Besides that, other report rates are also available depending on your personal preference: 2ms/500Hz, 4ms/250Hz, 8ms/125Hz. 

Frequency hopping tech skips extra useless signal frequencies and exterior influences.

1 on 1 connection and transmission encryption will keep your data safe. 

Optimized techs are integrated to maintain a stable connection and reduce latency while keeping the power consumption lower.
DPC - Optimized Cloud SoftwareBladeMaster is designed with a full-fledged and patented software called DREVO Power Console(DPC), which can take care of all your custom needs easily!

Radi RGB - Customizable per-key backlight & 360° lateral middle embedded light bands are integrated. Any device adopting Radi RGB lighting system can be synchronized simultaneously.

Multimedia - Can be used to open the software commonly such as Chrome, E-mail, Calculator etc.

Macro - Assign any commands to any keys including the knob (FN key is excepted)

Cloud Sync - Import & export settings via software anywhere 

User Statistics - Understand your daily typing habits clearly!

Batch Script - Assign the batch file to any key for higher efficiency work

Profile management - Import and export your settings anytime you want; Settings can be saved in your DPC account or on-board memory(3 at most). 
​It can also give you the much-needed edge over your competitors during gaming contests. Besides, battery status and special key lighting combo sets are also available for games like CS:GO, Overwatch, MOBA, etc. Everything is at your disposal through the software. When you are playing popular games, the software can even automatically recognize your game and assign certain command settings accordingly to the smart knob for your advanced operation.Note: DPC for Mac users will launch in the second half of 2018. Linux Software Ver. is also within our plan. On-Board MemoryIf you don’t want to download the software every time you use a new PC, no problem! To bring you more convenience, the on-board memory helps you retain custom settings you’d like to use. The built-in storage enables you to keep three different settings and you can activate and switch them by simply pressing the keys: FN+F1/F2/F3With on-board memory inside your keyboard, many offline activities are of more fun to you! Take the keyboard that knows you by saving your custom settings is a super cool thing no matter where you are: Lan Party, Internet cafe, PC bang or attending an eSports contest.Design Concept: Elegant and PowerfulEvery successful product in the market is there for a reason. If you are curious about the inspiration for the exterior design of the BladeMaster, it is a culmination of our designers consolidated work which includes elements from various fields like electronics, arms, biology, fashion and automobile. To sum it up, the BladeMaster’s appearance is a harmony of several things that you see around you but it’s nothing like you’ve ever seen before.The design concepts that we concluded from the elements are: humility, dynamic, sharp, lightsaber, and shield. You will notice the intricate details in the appearance is a concrete explanation of the abstract design concept.Practical Designs for More Possibilities Various Switch OptionsCherry MX RGB for BladeMaster PRO Ultimate mechanical key switches Cherry MX RGB switches are used for BladeMaster PRO. There are many optimized experiences that you can’t enjoy with others. E.g. World exclusive CHERRY Gold Crosspoint technology. Precision "Made in Germany" with low bounce time. Guaranteed over 50 million keystrokes per switch with no loss of quality. With all our efforts, now Silent Red, Blue, Red, Brown, Black and Speed Silver switches available.Kind notice: Cherry MX Speed RGB Sliver is 40% faster than the CHERRY MX Standard switch---Gateron RGB for BladeMaster TE Gateron switches are well known and loved by the keyboard enthusiast community as well. Gateron manufactures quality switches and trusted by many so it’s a nice choice for cost performance.Best Choice by Comparison  We know sometimes it’s hard for our customers to convince themselves to try a new brand, so we give you some counterparts you may be familiar with for comparison in order to make a wise decision. We are glad to prove BladeMaster is at the top level from any parameter.What’s in the Package?  We give you everything commonly used for a gaming keyboard. The beautifully designed package features resistance to shock & environmental protection.Technical SpecsBladeMaster is Ready for Production  It had been a clear goal set by our DREVO team at the very beginning of the whole campaign: each supporter will be ensured of timely delivery of BladeMaster. For this goal, we’ve negotiated with numerous factories and suppliers globally already to ensure every process will be carried out as planned. Also, we've arranged some EVT samples for professional reviewers to gather feedback from them, so that we will more sure each final version BladeMaster will be of top quality!Rewards About Royal Edition Full-metal BladeMaster keyboard was actually our initial idea, which unfortunately could not come true as mass production for TE and PRO versions because of the high cost, limited production capacity, and the problems regarding blocking wireless signals. All Drevo team members, however, never give up our goals, and we are committed to implementing the full-metal version. We redesigned the side frame and the structure of lower cover, and also developed a completely new mould. The entire casing is machined by CNC, which made BladeMaster a unique masterpiece. In the current market, there is other full-metal keyboard like BladeMaster featuring so many curved surfaces and chamfers. Most other full-metal keyboards in current market were designed in a rectilinear way without curved surfaces and chamfers, which can significantly lower the cost. The $999 full-metal PERK includes not only the keyboard, but also a set of PBT Dye Sublimated rainbow keycaps, a replaceable all-metal knob, and an exclusive service - engraving on the side of the casing. More importantly, your names will appear randomly on the loading page of Drevo’s driver software to express our sincere gratitude and appreciation. $999 is definitely not only a price but also a sense of achievability and longstanding value. Thank you again for supporting our project all along.We Are the Dream Team Listening to You 
About DREVO DREVO was founded in 2016, headquartered in Beijing with branches in the US and Europe. Taking pride in our competitive R&D capability and rich experiences in manufacturing, DREVO has successfully gained several rounds of venture investments and achieved great sales performance from the keyboards launched in the US and Europe market.Compared to other brands, DREVO has the biggest advantage, which is to reach the end-users and understand their true demands. We are the dream team, where each member performs his or her duty to the maximum capability. Any feedback from customers is responded instantly by DREVO customer service team. DREVO marketing team plays an active role in gathering users’ feedbacks and new requests. On the early stages of each product, DREVO R&D team sets regular plans to digest the sorted questions and suggestions from the community to ensure that the upgraded products or new models are exactly same with customers’ expectations.From this year, DREVO is going to enter new markets in East Asian countries (including China & South Korea), Canada and Australia. It’s our goal to make DREVO a brand that surprises the global community constantly like Huawei, Mi, and Anker.Why crowdfunding?During the past two years, we’ve been sparing no efforts to figure out what kind of keyboard can be thought of as the ultimate one for gaming. The whole R&D process is tough as we have to be ultra-innovative and comprehensive at each task. However, thanks to the countless message exchanges with thousands of hardware enthusiasts and hardcore gamers from different countries, we’ve successfully upgraded our designs over and over again.Therefore, to meet the requests from our early supporters, we’ve decided to keep making everything of BladeMaster clear continually, so that launching a crowdfunding project is a good way that we can keep frequent and direct engagements with our supporters. Plus, as a new brand keen on innovative peripherals, it’s really a great chance to use the platform of Indiegogo to turn more highly related target audience into our real users.Special Thanks BladeMaster is not a just keyboard from DREVO, as it’s more of a contribution from the community. For those of you who’ve helped us a lot during the process, your names will be shown on the loading page of our cloud software. If you are reading this page now, please have a check right here:  Daniel D'Angelo (aka JKaos), Jakub Zaxer Kilinski, Dave Richardson, Brandon Eich, Marc Delrue, Thantap Panmerost , Olivar Cavalcante, Jimmy Raheriarisoa, Mark Lee, Power Gear, depletedvespene, RobOSX, Findecanor, Techno Trousers, Combatical, Sai Krishan Kumar, Brandon BeiselMedia Coverage of DREVOBladeMaster is voted as the Ultimate Gaming Keyboard by gamers themselves -  the most designing ideas are from thousands of gamers and keyboard enthusiasts during our 14-monthlong R&D process, so you’ll find all the latest and most wanted techs have been integrated in BladeMaster keyboard. Nothing can be more appropriate for us to express our greatest thanks to our lovely supporters by bringing out the best gaming keyboard - it’s your greatest support that makes this greatest gaming keyboard come true!Contact us:Facebook:@drevo.net / @drevo.france / @drevo.de / @drevo.it / @DrevoJapan / @DrevoeEspanol Twitter : @DREVO_USInstagram : @drevo_keyboard Email: indiegogo@drevo.net

story:
Our Intention

Design and 3D Print your own mechanical toys. We are LIVE at www.laykanics.com!

3 easy steps:


Why?

It's the passion for Engineering  and Science. We think that with 3D Printing available, this passion can be spread wider and louder. Before this tool, the construction of flying things and moving objects would be so difficult it would discourage many. Now it's a possibility. We want to fuel interest in the modern generations to become awesome Technologists and face the complex challenges of the world.

Your Support Means A Lot

We need LAYKANICS to catch momentum. With your support, we'll be adding new members to the team and put creativity into the works. The more, the merrier! We want your ideas too. It's not only about the funds, your suggestions will be highly valuable. So please give us as much feedback as you can and help spread the word!

In exchange for your involvement, you can opt to receive personalized newsletters, get a trial or full membership to our website and/or receive a BACKERS KIT to undertake your first projects: you decide. Above all, you'll be rewarded with the certainty that you'll be helping to create job opportunities, inspiring new inventors of all ages and help making time travel a possibility... of course


LAYKANICS in the Media:

A Sample of What's Cooking...

To illustrate the essentials of how air speed is measured in airplanes, we came up with the PTUBE project. Otherwise known as a Pitot tube, this device makes use of pressure differential readings to compute air speed. While seeing a real one in operation would involve complex and expensive procedures, today you can own as many as you please. Just throw some STL files into the 3D Printer, combine with a clear hose (provided in the KIT) and use water as an indicator for pressure readings. We take you through the operation, assembly and if you're that interested (...and we hope you are!) the Bernoulli principle governing its function...Wait, did you say you don't have an airplane to test it on? How about installing it in the lateral mirror of the passenger's side of a car (fits, any car)? Check our testing at 34, 50 and 61 miles per hour in the pictures in the gallery. Yeah... we're also working on a bicycle-mounted version.
