story:
The iOS "De-Identifier app" Team

David Grundy, MD, Paul Grundy and Bobby Gayol:

Together we make up The Forge, a group of guys passionate about making the world a better place by creating unique technical and socially valuable products and services. 

Now, we need your help to create a unique new camera app for the iPhone that will help both doctors and their patients in myriad ways!

"De-ID", the De-Identifier app, can prevent you or another medical professional from accidentally transmitting a patient's confidential information in a smart phone picture. Without any effort, avoid all the ethical and legal problems of someone forwarding a photo you sent which had too much identifying information.

The use of smartphone imagery has had a powerfully transformative effect on the practice of medicine, but has also introduced many inevitable new risks:

  • Patient confidentiality 
  • Image Security
  • Policy violation
  • Security of the cloud

Please help us build an iOS camera app that will AUTOMATICALLY find and remove all identifying portions of clinical photos! How will we do it? The De-ID app:

  • Will automatically identify all faces in the frame and blur them out
  • Will automatically find all text in the frame and blur it out
  • Will provide a simple tool to remove tattoos and other identifiers
  • Will not save to the Cloud
  • Will automatically erase all photos from your phone after 12 hours
  • Will provide digital watermarking for added image security and legal protection

With this extremely intuitive and simple to operate app on your phone, it will become simply impossible to take and transmit "unsafe,” privacy compromising clinical photos!


How We Will Invest Your Contribution

Creating a great product will require us to hire some really talented professionals!
  • Design services to create a great user experience
  • A development team to bang out high quality code 
  • Web hosting services
  • On-going top-notch user support

Help Medical Professionals To Help Their Patients

The De-ID app will bring a new level of safety and security to the use of smartphone imagery. Who will benefit immediately?

  • Doctors
  • Nurses
  • Paramedics and EMTs
  • People with privacy concerns

Risks & Challenges

What if we don't meet our funding goal?

Hey, we believe in this app, and one way or the other, we will get this thing launched!  Even if it might take a bit longer, we commit to it.  We commit to keeping all of our contributors informed about our progress. 

We commit to getting De-ID off of the drawing board and working for you!

Other Ways You Can Help

We understand that you may not be able to contribute right now, but you can still help!

Your contribution certainly helps, but your social network and personal expertise is even more important.

  • Help us get the word out on social media
  • Pass the word about our campaign to your friends and colleagues
  • Contribute your talents in marketing, promotion, and app design 

Lets Do This!

story:
We are Reglue. Putting Technology into the Hands  of Tomorrow.

Ken Starks' voice is scarred by cancer treatments, but his message is clear. A child's exposure to technology should never be predicated by the ability to afford it.

Ken recently gave the closing keynote address to a full house at the Ohio Linux Fest this year.  He brings us a unique, touching and sometimes funny look into what it is he does. He puts rebuilt computers into the homes of financially disadvantaged school kids. You can see keynote video below


We come to the Indiegogo community specifically for a good reason. You folks offer us funding opportunities that grants can not.

Ken has been a friend and a productive member of the global Linux Community since 2002.  He is also the founder and Executive Director of Reglue. They are located in Taylor Texas and serve the entire Central Texas area.

Since 2005, the 501(c)(3) organization has placed 1600+ donated then refurbished computers into the homes of financially disadvantaged kids in Central Texas. From their annual summer workshops to the 90 day Girlz-R-Geekz-2 mentoring program and the 9 public learning labs they put together, they take pride in what they do. But Ken's volunteers and directors state their message clearly.

We've watched our "Reglue Kids" grow as they've entered college, with some entering graduate studies. They are all armed with a Reglue desktop and/or laptop. With your help, over the next year, we will place 200 computers into the homes of kids who cannot afford one. We also help our Reglue Kids get online by paying for the first 90 days of internet connection. This gives them time to budget for the expense of having the internet available in their homes. As overused as the term is, the Digital Divide is alive and well in some parts of America. We will bridge that divide where we can.

What We Need & What You Get.

We are aiming for an entire year's funding for our organization. $9000.00 is what it will take to operate for the next year. but $18,000.00 gives us enough money to buy a badly-needed vehicle. Ken's personal vehicle is what we're using now and it turned over 300K this past May. Breakdown isn't the worry point here, it's metal fatigue of the frame and supports. We've suspended transporting our Reglue kids until we can assure their relative safety. She's truly on her last legs.


Free or discretionary spending grants have all but disappeared. These charitable foundations want proof that we spent their grant money on stuff like office space, various equipment and even computers. We have all of that. What good is being granted a vehicle if we can't afford the fuel to do computer installations? Or to buy the parts needed to fix that computer? The majority of grant foundations are simply not offering assistance to help with those things any more. The ones that do offer extremely small amounts of money and that cash wouldn't last us three months. We can't use those small funds but others might so we don't call upon that resource.

We've been an open and transparent organization since the beginning. Our legitimacy and presence is easily accessed online and we've proven to be exactly who and what we say we are. You can always find out more about us by just using your search engine of choice and searching "reglue computers".

We don't possess the ability to adequately describe the moment when a child first turns on her first computer. We have been extremely fortunate to have seen this hundreds of times. We sincerely wish you could see though our eyes what your donations make possible. Your money goes to working toward biomedical engineering graduate degrees. It goes to a kid's first IDE and introduction to python. It goes to help a struggling single parent who has to answer these questions month after month:

*Is it new shoes for the kids this month, or is it a computer?

*Is it money for a class school trip or is it a computer?

*Is it paying the electricity bill this month or is it a computer?


We are offering some great perks this year. This list is not by any means complete...we will be offering more as the campaign builds up some steam.

On the list of perks will be a number of refurbished laptops, anywhere from a Dell Intel i7 XPS L401X quad core with 8 gigs of RAM and a 500GB hard drive to Lenovo Thinkpads, ranging from a Lenovo T420 Intel i5 with 12 gigs of RAM with docking station to a number of Lenovo T60 and 61 dual cores. We also have an Acer 11.2 inch Chromebook with a 320 gig hard drive and 4 gigs of RAM plus a Lenovo S10-3 Netbook for your donation consideration. The Dell E6520 laptops we offer are an extremely nice machine and reasonably priced.

We will offer Ms. Carla Schroder's fantastic all-inclusive how-to book, The Book Of Audacity. This is the definitive work on the music app "Audacity". This actual book is no longer available at No Starch Press. We have only a few of these autographed books so when they are gone...well, they'll be gone. O'Reilly Press has a list of 10 books they've donated for our perks. You can see them in the perks column on the right.

And for you Sci-Fi and fantasy fans, we have a special treat. For a $10 dollar donation you can enjoy the complete Time Weaver Chronicles trilogy by award-winning author Thomas A. Knight in a DRM free eBook format of your choice (mobi, epub or PDF). 

"This Amazon best-selling series follows Seth Alkirk and his adventures in Galadir as he discovers that he's not human, but a Time Weaver who can control time. The fate of his new-found home rests in his hands as he discovers how to control his powers, learns who he really is, finds love, and navigates a world filled with magic, dragons, and other wondrous creatures".

If we don't meet our funding goal, we will judiciously use your donations to do as much good as we can with what we have.

Our Impact

Your donation goes to insure that a kid has a level playing field in school and when competing with other students for grades and SAT Scores.

Our organization is fortunate to have an active pool of over 100 volunteers. Your funding gives us the ability to put fuel into their vehicles to do installations or to run out and get parts, and every now and then...maybe to buy them lunch.


Risks & Challenges?


Not many. The only real challenge we experience is the lack of money to help kids that we see on a daily or weekly basis. These kids come into our shop and do voluntary "community service" to help earn their computers.

It's hard to look these kids in the eye and tell them you don't have enough money to put a computer together for them at the moment. Since we operate on donated funds, we make sure we make as many computers ready as possible while the money is available. The entire cost of producing one machine averages to about $40.00.

One of our available perks offers a sponsorship opportunity for an installed machine. 51 people from last year's fund raiser have their picture and personal/professional profile as the desktop. That way, the Reglue Kid receiving our computer knows exactly who made it possible for them. Of course, you can always decline that option if you choose to remain anonymous. We simply say that someone interested in the child's future made their computer possible.


Other Ways You Can Help

We know it's not everyone that can help financially, but if you would pass along the information about our fundrasiser via your favorite social media, we would greatly appreciate it. There are Indiegogo tools that can be used to spread the word as well. And as always, thank you for helping us do what we do.

All-Righty Then.

story:
A most unusual writing instrument

PenUltimate began as an entry in a design competition that drew more attention than we could've ever expected. Three years and 26 prototypes brought us here. PenUltimate X1 is our premier model.

 

                         

                                                   A thoughtful redesign for an evolving world

 

The goal was to reinvent an everyday object. The pen seemed ideal. Traditional pens are held awkwardly and don't accommodate the anatomy of the hand, wrist or forearm. Writing instruments we use on a daily basis are effective, but primitive. The relatively standard design of the pen emerged 220 years ago and hasn't changed since.

What if we were to throw away the conventional pen and create something new from the ground up? After we asked that question, the inherited design of the traditional pen began to seem unsophisticated. Perhaps we've simply grown accustom to it?

 

 

But why? We live in a world filled with incredibly talented creators and designers. Why has the design of the pen, a crucially important instrument and essentially just a writing nib attached to stick, persisted for so long? Why has the traditional pen never been rethought? Is the pen simply so familiar that we no longer look to innovate it?

Well, we wanted to give it a try, so we started from scratch. PenUltimate's design was inspired simply by what would work best with the human form. Your anatomy dictated the shape, weight, material and contouring of PenUltimate X1. Every other pen starts from an overly simple and inherently flawed design. When designing PenUltimate, we started from you.

 

 

 

 

Strategic use of PenUltimate's weight gives your wrist a greater range of motion. In brief explanation: ballpoint pens dispense ink when downward pressure is applied to push back a small, metal ball creating a vacuum which then sucks ink from the pen's reservoir. When you squeeze your fingers together and press to dispense ink from a traditional ballpoint, it makes it more difficult to turn the wrist freely. This tension is due to small, tensed muscles around the carpals (fragile bones in the wrist). Wrist tension creates fatigue in addition to a myriad of problems that negatively impact even the occasional writer, it's an incredibly susceptible area of our anatomy. (See for yourself! Squeeze your thumb, pointer and middle finger together and rotate your wrist back and forth, that unpleasant constriction you're feeling is avoidable. Now, open your fingers and turn your wrist. You'll notice a big difference. For 220 years, we've been doing it wrong!)

 

 

Revolutionary technology contained within a beautiful and intriguing form.

 

 

PenUltimate’s proprietary asymmetrical design is perfectly balanced in the hand. Hold it once and that statement will make sense. There has never been a better balanced writing instrument. Additionally, PenUltimate X1 secures the pointer finger’s knuckle, allowing for greater stability (particularly when attempting to draw straight lines). Traditional pens must be held on a slant that leans away from the inside of the hand. PenUltimate’s grip allows the pen tip to align straight with the pointer finger, it feels more natural because it is more natural.

This same grip technology prevents PenUltimate from being top heavy. Yes, every pen you've ever used is top heavy. Squeezing a traditional pen at the grip creates a fulcrum at the point where the fingers meet. Over 90% of a traditional pen's weight is unsupported, that weight works to pry your fingers apart, which is not optimal design by any means.

 

                                        

We wanted PenUltimate X1 to be as beautiful as it was effective, which is why it comes paired with it's Quickdraw stand. The Quickdraw stand transforms PenUltimate X1 into a piece of functional artwork for your desktop. It’s minimalist design is a subtle and refreshing change of pace. It's a different way to shape your work space.

PenUltimate X1 is forged from a highly textured, matte bronze steel with cushioning on all contact points. It feels great in the hand and it's rugged enough to take whatever you can throw at it. Plus, PenUltimate is precision contoured to fit your fingers for next-level ergonomic comfort. Equipped with an ultra smooth, 1 mm stainless steel tip and non-corrosive ink, it’s built to the highest of industry standards.

 

 

PenUltimate X1 is a different writing instrument. It’s unusual to be sure, but it’s simply better than the tools we’ve grown accustomed to. Our goal is to change the way you write and to change the way you interact with the written word. PenUltimate X1 will certainly make you write better, our hope is that it inspires you.

 

 

About Us:

Founders of Native Concepts Design Collective

 

Native Concepts is a design collective based in New York City and founded by three first generation Americans. We welcome anyone with a passion for creating to collaborate with us regardless of origin, experience, education or expertise. If you think we can help you with your project or if you want to comment on ours, please email us! We're design junkies!

Dan@nativeconcepts.design

Ivan@nativeconcepts.design

Sam@nativeconcepts.design

 

 

 

 

 

Risks and Challenges:

The biggest priority is making sure our prototype is properly translated into a manufactured product. Our expectations of both quality and speed of fulfillment are high.

We have a capable manufacturer based in the USA that's ready to produce a high quality, first run of PenUltimate X1 once we've hit our funding goal. Our manufactured run of PenUltimate X1 will be extensively tested to make sure it's a product we can be proud of and one you can rely on. We don't take this task lightly, but we're very confident we can accomplish it.

Our backers will be updated regularly throughout the production process. We're looking forward to sharing it with you.

Special thanks to our friends, family and early adopters that encouraged us to take this from a limited run, 3D printed product to something we could bring to the world. Your support has been valuable beyond measure. We hope PenUltimate will continue to change the the way you write.
story_txt: A most unusual writing instrumentPenUltimate began as an entry in a design competition that drew more attention than we could've ever expected. Three years and 26 prototypes brought us here. PenUltimate X1 is our premier model.                                                                              A thoughtful redesign for an evolving world The goal was to reinvent an everyday object. The pen seemed ideal. Traditional pens are held awkwardly and don't accommodate the anatomy of the hand, wrist or forearm. Writing instruments we use on a daily basis are effective, but primitive. The relatively standard design of the pen emerged 220 years ago and hasn't changed since.What if we were to throw away the conventional pen and create something new from the ground up? After we asked that question, the inherited design of the traditional pen began to seem unsophisticated. Perhaps we've simply grown accustom to it?  But why? We live in a world filled with incredibly talented creators and designers. Why has the design of the pen, a crucially important instrument and essentially just a writing nib attached to stick, persisted for so long? Why has the traditional pen never been rethought? Is the pen simply so familiar that we no longer look to innovate it?Well, we wanted to give it a try, so we started from scratch. PenUltimate's design was inspired simply by what would work best with the human form. Your anatomy dictated the shape, weight, material and contouring of PenUltimate X1. Every other pen starts from an overly simple and inherently flawed design. When designing PenUltimate, we started from you.    Strategic use of PenUltimate's weight gives your wrist a greater range of motion. In brief explanation: ballpoint pens dispense ink when downward pressure is applied to push back a small, metal ball creating a vacuum which then sucks ink from the pen's reservoir. When you squeeze your fingers together and press to dispense ink from a traditional ballpoint, it makes it more difficult to turn the wrist freely. This tension is due to small, tensed muscles around the carpals (fragile bones in the wrist). Wrist tension creates fatigue in addition to a myriad of problems that negatively impact even the occasional writer, it's an incredibly susceptible area of our anatomy. (See for yourself! Squeeze your thumb, pointer and middle finger together and rotate your wrist back and forth, that unpleasant constriction you're feeling is avoidable. Now, open your fingers and turn your wrist. You'll notice a big difference. For 220 years, we've been doing it wrong!)  Revolutionary technology contained within a beautiful and intriguing form.  PenUltimate’s proprietary asymmetrical design is perfectly balanced in the hand. Hold it once and that statement will make sense. There has never been a better balanced writing instrument. Additionally, PenUltimate X1 secures the pointer finger’s knuckle, allowing for greater stability (particularly when attempting to draw straight lines). Traditional pens must be held on a slant that leans away from the inside of the hand. PenUltimate’s grip allows the pen tip to align straight with the pointer finger, it feels more natural because it is more natural.This same grip technology prevents PenUltimate from being top heavy. Yes, every pen you've ever used is top heavy. Squeezing a traditional pen at the grip creates a fulcrum at the point where the fingers meet. Over 90% of a traditional pen's weight is unsupported, that weight works to pry your fingers apart, which is not optimal design by any means.                                         We wanted PenUltimate X1 to be as beautiful as it was effective, which is why it comes paired with it's Quickdraw stand. The Quickdraw stand transforms PenUltimate X1 into a piece of functional artwork for your desktop. It’s minimalist design is a subtle and refreshing change of pace. It's a different way to shape your work space.PenUltimate X1 is forged from a highly textured, matte bronze steel with cushioning on all contact points. It feels great in the hand and it's rugged enough to take whatever you can throw at it. Plus, PenUltimate is precision contoured to fit your fingers for next-level ergonomic comfort. Equipped with an ultra smooth, 1 mm stainless steel tip and non-corrosive ink, it’s built to the highest of industry standards.  PenUltimate X1 is a different writing instrument. It’s unusual to be sure, but it’s simply better than the tools we’ve grown accustomed to. Our goal is to change the way you write and to change the way you interact with the written word. PenUltimate X1 will certainly make you write better, our hope is that it inspires you.  About Us:Founders of Native Concepts Design Collective Native Concepts is a design collective based in New York City and founded by three first generation Americans. We welcome anyone with a passion for creating to collaborate with us regardless of origin, experience, education or expertise. If you think we can help you with your project or if you want to comment on ours, please email us! We're design junkies!Dan@nativeconcepts.designIvan@nativeconcepts.designSam@nativeconcepts.design     Risks and Challenges:The biggest priority is making sure our prototype is properly translated into a manufactured product. Our expectations of both quality and speed of fulfillment are high.We have a capable manufacturer based in the USA that's ready to produce a high quality, first run of PenUltimate X1 once we've hit our funding goal. Our manufactured run of PenUltimate X1 will be extensively tested to make sure it's a product we can be proud of and one you can rely on. We don't take this task lightly, but we're very confident we can accomplish it.Our backers will be updated regularly throughout the production process. We're looking forward to sharing it with you.Special thanks to our friends, family and early adopters that encouraged us to take this from a limited run, 3D printed product to something we could bring to the world. Your support has been valuable beyond measure. We hope PenUltimate will continue to change the the way you write.

story:
A Brief

Few decades back, email came into existence. Our communication was changed drastically with this new electronic medium. Since then, many other technological evolutions have happened in field of internet communication. We have instant Messaging, File Sharing, online photo galleries, social networking are some examples.  These all somehow depend on email service (right from registration, verification or notifications). But the core of email is still the same, not much have changed in terms of email. It is still limited to message and max attachments.

A lot of new and advanced email clients have been developed, but none of them actually tried to enhance the email service. With lot of efforts, finally we are able to present you a email client & engine, which is more secure, Flexible and powerful. We named it atom.email.  It is going to give a new great life to our email service. It is email reborn.


Why it is most needed in today’s world?

Privacy and Security

We know very well, that how our communication system was exploited by agencies, governments and our privacy was invaded badly. Atom.email protects us from all such agencies, as it has inbuilt multiple methods for encryption, which keeps all your communication protected and encrypted. Security is just click away, No add-ons, no plug-ins required.

Powered Emailing

Till now email has been used just to send messages or pictures /documents as attachments. Atom.email brings you a powered emailing. We have developed an email engine, which can render your email in many ways. Now, email can be used to collect data,  show photos as gallery,  play music or video files, file sharing, task creation, event management and much more. All this now is possible just via emailing.  Chat, e-books, Notices and much more is integrated into email. Communication and content will be centralized at one place across all devices for the same user.

Spam Protection

Most of email clients provides a good level of spam protection. Atom.email provides you an auto verification of the sender with CAPTCHA form.  As per your settings, Anyone who sends you email first time, needs to verify himself as genuine user. Along with that,  atom.email will maintain a central Anti-SPAM server, to list all bad users.

3rd Party Apps

We all use many different apps to communicate with our friends and family. We use facebook, twitter, instagram  and many more. This gives us one challenge, that content shared or received from these apps, is not useable via others. Now with atom.email you can do it. You can use atom.email apps for these social networks, and keep your data centralized and also backup. e.g. Twitter tweets can be backed up automatically in atom.email, for your reference.


"  We believe that user needs to have confidence in the software, he is using. So, we are sharing full source code with every user who support this project. It will be under commercial license, but source will be open. No hidden agenda or backdoor in system is possible, if source code is provided.  "

Lets understand little about encryption.

When we talk about privacy, we talk about encryption. To encrypt anything, you need encryption software/library to execute in some environment. This can be server, browser or your local device.  We are not discussing hardware embedded encryption.  

Atom-Email supports three types of encryption methods.  All applications will be provided in full source to every user. They can choose what they feel best to their need. User doesn’t need to be programmer to do anything.  It is just click away.  Always keep in mind, Every Encryption is linked to key, and you need to store key at most safe possible place. 


1.  Server based Encryption
( Recommended,  only if you trust your host server)

2.  Browser based Encryption
 ( Least Recommended)

3.  Local Device Apps
( Highly Recommended, You are the Boss, you have full control on local device)

In Server based encryption, there are two important things.

  • Host Server
  • Connection to Server.

Atom.Email support PGP encryption on Linux servers based on public-private keys. You can install atom-email  on your host server and enable encryption. Your connection to your server needs to be secure, to protect your data streams between your server and your device.

If you trust SSL/TLS.
a.  There are speculations that spy agencies have already break the SSL security or at least they know how to bypass it and can read your data stream.  But if you still can trust SSL certificates, then you can use server based encryption program.

b.  If you don’t trust SSL, then you need to do encryption, before you send data via SSL. That means, it can be your browser or your local device.




Browser Based encryption are done using JavaScript. There are many open source projects, in progress to make it successful. Atom-email has enabled its interface with OpenPGP.js and SJCL encryption libraries.  Both are open source projects. We will be releasing the modified source code along with our code to all the users.


But, Browser based encryption has its own risks. But still, it’s better than no encryption. So, in case you cannot use server based or local device based encryption, then you can use Browser Based Encryption.

Remember this, in Browser based encryption, the keys will be either stored on server or in your local cache (HTML5 DB).  Local cache keys will be restricted and limited only to the website, which created that key.  It is not much recommended by us to use browser based encryption.

We are also working on Encryption Extensions for browsers.  Extensions (with known source) are better than the JavaScript fetched from remote server for encryption.

(End to End Encryption)

This is the best possible solution as of now.  As encryption will happen on your local device independent of application and browser and then only encrypted data will be send via atom-email to end point. AS you have full control on your device, and with full source code of encryption library, you can trust your encryption. Keys will also will remain in your local device. It won't be on server neither on browser local cache. Atom-email can work with any 3rd party encryption application also, if they provide any way to communicate and encrypt-decrypt data. 

Another good reason for this encryption is, that you can also use it outside atom.email. You can encrypt any files, documents, media etc. 

Atom-email will be releasing native apps for all devices. We are already working on these apps. 


Centralize Device Content Management

Atom.Email gives you a great feature "DSM" Data Sharing Manager to manage your content on different devices. DSM  is one of the Core Functionality of Atom.Email. DSM allows user to share data between devices from one central control point. DSM gives you ability to control what to share and on what device. You can also set DSM for Auto Sync or Backup to Cloud. From your Atom.email File Manager, you can manage files on any device connected to your account (as per permissions).  It is just easy drag-drop system. It keeps log of edit and access history of any document.  You can even Manage contacts on different devices.

DSM works with Security Manager for Encryption on Files. You Can setup from single file to full folder or multiple folders to be encrypted. Files will be sent on network as encrypted files and will be decrypted at receiving end.


Our First Implementation

Atom.Email's first implementation is on atominbox.com. It will be live in few days. We will be releasing more great domains in coming future.  Lets have a look, how Atom.Email looks like.


About Us

Team Intellect is a group think-tank comprised of individuals from different areas around the world, having different expertise but one vision: to make things better for the digital world around us.

In 2010, we started planning and working on an IT solution to meet our Internet security and privacy concerns, without depending upon any external software or applications. It took a while for us to draft a solution, but our main focus was to develop a safe, effective and intelligent way for businesses and individuals to utilize and share information with each other more easily, while decreasing risks.

Team Intellect has been in process to form an LLC Company in Virginia and in London, UK. We have a small setup in Dubai, where we maintain some of our clients with a small team of 6 people.

What this campaign for?

Software development is always a tedious and costly effort. We spend enough time into this project to draft the best possible solution for communities.  We are already working on this. But we need little financial help to take it further. We need to develop mobile apps, a full portal. We need to manage expenses for servers and our team. Till now, we were investing from our own sources, but now we are looking for support from you. A lot of expense for hosting servers is there. We need funds to meet our expenses and keep the development smoothly going on.  Please support us a little, so we can bring this awesome solution into reality. We will be greatly thankful to every single penny given by support for this project. 

What will you get ?

We are not making any over commitments in this phase of project. We want this project to go live and to build a community, who can support this project for further developments. We are offering a online Web based email as of now with dedicated space for you. We have made very simple perks. Once This phase is successfully funded and launched, we will move for further developments, that includes mobile and desktop applications. All those who will support this project now, will get all future applications free of cost.


Risk & Challenges

Software development is always challenging job. Every application has its own challenges, but with good knowledge and experience team, challenges can be sorted out. Fortunately, Working in IT field for more than 18 years, our team has encountered many IT challenges, which makes us all the more capable to resolve them. But still there are always risks and challenges involved in any project.

For BlackBerry App, We still have some challenges to look into. Rest, all functionality have been well tested on all platforms. We might not be able to get SMS records on iphone and windows, as apple and Microsoft don't provide functionality for that. We want to do it that too, but seems not possible.

We have done most of the development for web based email client and our first implementation of "atom.email" is at "atominbox.com", that will be ready for your demo soon. We sought per-approval on our project from PayPal early this year, as we heard many stories of PayPal blocking funds. We have to add this disclaimer as per PayPal Policy, that we will do our best efforts, but there is no guarantee for the success. Our project is already on very advanced stage, and as soon as we have some support from you, we will start releasing email accounts.

We hope you will support this wonderful project, to change the world of internet communication.

story:
YOMA is an online platform that allows anyone to create their own native and custom mobile apps for iPhone, Android and Windows Phone.

Users will be able to select from a range of dynamic modules that can be managed in real-time, personalize their design having then our experts team receiving the request and delivering your custom app in less than 24 hours! We will also submit them to the App Stores for you!

We want to democratize the access to quality native mobile apps. Small business owners, liberal professionals, actors, artists and overall citizens who have the need to communicate with their clients or with an audience should have access to quality-built native apps at a competitive cost.

Currently there are many offers of suposely mobile apps but these are web-based or branded inside other apps, they are not unique native apps.

What we want to offer is an end-solution that is easy to customize, quick to build and bundled according each user’s own needs and style.

In order to have their own app users have to complete three easy steps.

Our team will receive the request and through the use of automatic scripts build the corresponding native app for each platform in less than 24 hours. We will also customize the artwork according to the scope of the app.

Users will receive a beta test version of the app in order to check if everything is in order or to make any changes and with a simple “OK!” we will submit the app to the several AppStores.

All this for a very competitive price!

The first launch of YOMA will bring several features/modules with all the content being edited online real-time, so your end-users will always have access to updated content without any hassel. 

Here's the current module list (feel free to suggest a new module!):

We’ve developed a base prototype of the apps so we could test the concept and acceptance. We used Portugal as a test-market since this country is struggling with financial problems and economic-crisis but it is also one of world’s countries with the highest technology-adoption rates and smartphones plus broadband is generalized.

The acceptance was pretty good and we even got to welcome aboard some very high-profile portuguese people, such as tv hostess and model Andreia Rodrigues, actress Sofia Ribeiro, economist and journalist Camilo Lourenço or fashion designer Nuno Gama, generating quite a national buzz.

This demonstrates that the concept is solid and that it can reach users with different backgrounds and needs.

You may download these apps below in order to see the concept working.

We need to take this concept and make the final design and development.

The funds will be used to contract skilled software-engineers and designers in order to deliver and deploy the final platform.

Our goals and deliveries are set according to the funds raised and with our experience you know you will be betting in a solid project.

Download the available concept apps:

      

         Nuno Gama                       Sofia Ribeiro                  Camilo Lourenço

You can always follow us on our dedicated Facebook Page!

Thank you!!

Currently there are many offers of suposely mobile apps but these are web-based or branded inside other apps, they are not unique native apps.What we want to offer is an end-solution that is easy to customize, quick to build and bundled according each user’s own needs and style.   In order to have their own app users have to complete three easy steps.  Our team will receive the request and through the use of automatic scripts build the corresponding native app for each platform in less than 24 hours. We will also customize the artwork according to the scope of the app.Users will receive a beta test version of the app in order to check if everything is in order or to make any changes and with a simple “OK!” we will submit the app to the several AppStores.All this for a very competitive price!  The first launch of YOMA will bring several features/modules with all the content being edited online real-time, so your end-users will always have access to updated content without any hassel. Here's the current module list (feel free to suggest a new module!):   We’ve developed a base prototype of the apps so we could test the concept and acceptance. We used Portugal as a test-market since this country is struggling with financial problems and economic-crisis but it is also one of world’s countries with the highest technology-adoption rates and smartphones plus broadband is generalized.The acceptance was pretty good and we even got to welcome aboard some very high-profile portuguese people, such as tv hostess and model Andreia Rodrigues, actress Sofia Ribeiro, economist and journalist Camilo Lourenço or fashion designer Nuno Gama, generating quite a national buzz.This demonstrates that the concept is solid and that it can reach users with different backgrounds and needs.You may download these apps below in order to see the concept working.   We need to take this concept and make the final design and development.The funds will be used to contract skilled software-engineers and designers in order to deliver and deploy the final platform.Our goals and deliveries are set according to the funds raised and with our experience you know you will be betting in a solid project.         Download the available concept apps:                Nuno Gama                       Sofia Ribeiro                  Camilo Lourenço 
You can always follow us on our dedicated Facebook Page!
 

Thank you!!

story:
Why should you donate? –

Your donations would be greatly appreciated because we need your support to make this dream come true in creating one of the most innovative and convenient products to carry with you on the go.  Donations will go towards completing all potential developmental steps; including tooling, molds, engineering, circuitry development, parts, certification, packaging etc., all leading to final production.

Help us create one of the most convenient and portable devices to carry on the go.  When traveling, we always find ourselves carrying various devices, such as wall chargers, wireless routers, external batteries, data cables that cause a tangled mess!  With the HooToo TripMate Elite, say goodbye to untangling!  Other devices that are similar on the market, does not have as many features as the HooToo TripMate Elite.  The HooToo TripMate Elite has 5 features built into one small package and uses a three-layered circulation cooling system, so no need to worry about overheating, regardless of all of the features that are packed into one small package. 

-  Personal Cloud Storage

-  Portable Travel Router

-  Wi-Fi Hotspot

-  6,000mAh External Battery Charger

-  Built-in AC Adapter


Until now, most similar devices on the market do not have all 5 features built-in, and/or are too bulky to carry on the go.  Weighing at only 7.15 oz, the HooToo TripMate Elite can easily fit into a backpack, purse, or any carrying bag on the go!  The HooToo TripMate Elite has amazing features to keep you up and running; whether on the road for a business trip or on a road trip with friends.

Features at a glance:


·  Create your own wireless network to transfer and share media for up to 5+ Wi-Fi enabled devices (iPhone, iPod, Android, etc) simultaneously.

·  Stream movies, music and photos to all your Android, iOS, and Windows devices.

·  Charge your mobile devices on the go! - 6,000mAh rechargeable external battery, operates with high-capacity Samsung Cells, premium lithium-ion battery ensures quality.

·  Functions are a portable travel router – turn any LAN internet connection into wireless.

·  Supports any USB mass storage compliant device, such as external hard drives, memory card readers, memory sticks, etc.

·  Convenient foldable AC/ wall adapter design makes it so you no longer need to carry a power cord.


Personal Cloud Storage / Media Sharing:

Running out of storage space on your smartphone or tablet?  Do you find yourself constantly deleting files on your device just to clear up space?  The Wireless Media Streamer/File Transfer feature works wonders for those who have limited space on their mobile devices, as you can create your very own personal cloud.   The HooToo TripMate Elite is a portable sized adapter that can make any USB storage device in a wireless file server.  USB mass storage devices (flash drives, USB hard drives, card readers, etc) are one of the most commonly used digital storage media.  However, with products such as the iPhone, iPad, and Android devices, it is impossible to connect a USB storage device.  With the HooToo TripMate Elite, cross-platform data sharing is easy to manage. 


Simply transfer media files, such as photos/videos/music/documents between iOS, Android, and Windows devices – or plug in any USB mass storage device (external hard drives, memory sticks, etc.) and access all of your content without using any wires.  All of this can be done with a simple and free application called “HooToo TripMate.”  Just think of it as your very own portable multimedia server – where you can enjoy movies, TV shows, and music anywhere on the go.  With the HooToo TripMate Elite, you can share your media files with up to 5 devices simultaneously. Don’t settle for the limited storage space on your phone – have more freedom with the TripMate Elite and create your very own personal cloud!

Portable Wireless Router (Wi-Fi Hotspot Capable):


Don’t have an unlimited data plan?  Are you a frequent traveler and find yourself at locations (hotel rooms, classrooms, etc.) with only wired internet access?  With the TripMate Elite, it can function as a portable router and turn any wired connection into an instant Wi-Fi Hotspot! Simply plug the Ethernet network cable, start up the TripMate Elite, and you’re ready to connect your mobile devices wirelessly through multiple mobile devices.  This feature also allows multiple devices to access the internet at the same time, which works wonders because wired connections are only limited to one device at a time.  The TripMate Elite is the perfect solution for your network needs when you are away from home. 

6,000mAh Power Bank / External Battery:

Do you find your smartphone or tablet on low battery all of the time, with no wall outlet around to charge your device?  The TripMate Elite runs on 6,000 milliamps per hour (mAh) batteries by Samsung, and can be used as an external battery, where you can charge your mobile devices on to the go.  If you find yourself always low on battery power, this is a handy device to keep in your bag.  It is possible to use your mobile device while it is connected to the TripMate Elite while charging – which means you can watch videos for longer periods of time.  TripMate Elite  has 2 USB (1amp and 2.1amp) ports so you can charge two devices at the same time.  The HooToo TripMate Elite is capable of charging USB-based charged devices, such as smartphones, tablets, digital cameras, MP3 players, and much more.

Not only is the external battery convenient for everyone, but it also provides a peace of mind without having to worry about your battery power. 

Built-in AC Wall Adapter - 

You can charge the TripMate Elite either by a standard USB cable, or use the built-in AC adapter – just simply flip the prongs out and plug it into any wall outlet.  You can charge your mobile devices while the TripMate Elite is charging too! 

Packaging:


For our packaging, we wanted to create something eye-catching, classy, and simple. The package will include the HooToo TripMate Elite, carrying pouch, and extra charging cable.

Manufacturing- 

HooToo already has our manufacturing setup which implements quality standards and processes, such as:

·  AQ, QC and DVT process ensures our product's quality and reliability

·  ISO 9001:2008 certified

·  UL listed manufacturer

·  4 high speed SMT line, more than 10 assembly line.

We have a reliable manufacturing group that has experience in getting products to top-quality standards. 

Our Perks - 


Our Team -

Developmental Timeline - 


If you have any questions or comments, please do not hesitate to contact us through e-mail – marketing@hootoo.com.

To receive more up to date news on the HooToo TripMate Elite during production stages-, please Like us on Facebook! – http://facebook.com/HooTooOfficial

story:
Compelling Innovation to Ignite Positive Change Through Interactive & Mobile Technology

Cause 5's focus is to bring a new breed of technology innovation to market for nonprofit organizations and donors. This IndieGoGo campaign will be used to build a contributor community around creating interactive and engaging software to ignite marketing strategies, boost digital donations, enhance volunteer recruitment, and maximize the digital presence of nonprofit organizations. 

See and feel the impact of beautiful storytelling on your computers, tablets, touchscreens, and mobile devices all. Cause 5 is a new software platform defined by its ability to engage donors and volunteers with nonprofits in a digitally advanced experience. This software is a tool to bridge the gap between nonprofits and technology. Cause 5 is an engaging touch-enabled website optimized for desktops and mobile devices, and an Android and iPhone app customized and designed for each organization. Donor interactions can occur seamlessly on any device.

The core of Cause 5 software is powered by a custom content management system built to save time and money so nonprofits are able to focus on what matters, creating awareness and support for their cause. Nonprofits have the ability to present content in up to 75 different languages. It has the ability to manage events and receive RSVPs via social media. It can also create fundraising campaigns, take advantage of comprehensive donation and donor management, and dozens of other tools built to take marketing to the next level.

This software can be utilized as an additional tool of a marketing display for presentations, webinars, conferences, events, fundraisers or offices. This all-in-one solution offers the opportunity for digital storytelling for nonprofit messages to be seen. A cutting-edge solution to promote causes and fundraisers, image galleries, receive donations, and enable users to interact on touchscreen and non-touchscreen devices.

Donors can experience the power of this technology through interactive engagement with nonprofits through all the digital tools that this software offers. Quick and simple organization and fundraising donations, volunteer and supporter communities, event RSVPs, social media, and many other tools.

The goal of Cause 5 is to create intuitive and digitally advanced experiences. There are tremendous opportunities for nonprofit organizations to use technology to deliver on their missions in a very effective and scalable way. This software platform has been conceptualized to be an essential tool for how nonprofits can engage with supporters and expand the reach of their marketing efforts.

Our focus is how we can apply technology in new innovative ways to enrich organizations and improve lives.

56% of donors that support nonprofits online confirm that compelling storytelling is what motivates them to take action on behalf of nonprofits.


Features Include

  • Cutting-Edge Design with Interactive 3D Elements for Ultimate User Appeal & Engagement 
  • Comprehensive Custom Content Management System for Easy Management of Content
  • Touch Enabled 
  • Marketing Display 
  • Responsive for Mobile Devices 
  • Multilingual 
  • Android an iPhone App 
  • Events 
  • Fundraising 
  • Online Donations & Donor/Volunteer Profiles
  • Ultimate Social Media 
  • eCommerce 
  • Membership 
  • Blog
  • Custom Action Alerts & Marketing Messages 
  • Email Marketing 
  • Custom Newsletters 
  • Subscriber Lists 
  • Search Engine Optimization 
  • Supporter & Volunteer Communities
  • Forums 
  • Reporting

Please visit our website for a complete list of features.

Why Nonprofits Need Our Software

How The Funds Will Be Spent

Additional Goals

We have been long time followers of NTEN: The Nonprofit Technology Network. Anything that surpasses our goal will be used for our dream of debuting this software in March at the 2015 Nonprofit Technology Conference in Austin, Texas. 

Exclusive Contributor Community Forum Website

"Unity is strength ... When there is teamwork and collaboration, wonderful things can be achieved" - Mattie J.T Stepanek

Contributors who grab this chance with $50 or more will receive access to our exclusive community forum website to participate in forums, provide feedback and ideas, receive email and video updates, and be a voice of this project. We want this software to not only revolutionize the digital presence of nonprofits, but to also create a family of the supporters who generously gave it life. 



"Our goal is to change the world through pixels" - Cause 5 Team

story:
Meet PRISM, a platform that enables precision 3D printing with an innovative Stereolithography technology.

With FABtotum PRISM you get the most flexible and advanced multipurpose manufacturing device ever conceived, capable of 3D Printing in SLA with light-curing resins or with FFF on Materials like PLA, PETG, ABS as well as NYLON, HIPS, PC, 3D Milling Foams,Brass,Wood,Aluminum and acquire 3D point clouds and models via multiple 3D scanning methods with the built-in hi-res camera, touch probe and laser.

Design and create small or big components with a huge variety of materials, acquire 3D shapes, modify existing designs and print them in multiple materials and with different technologies as you see fit.

FABtotum PRISM brings design and personal fabrication to a whole new level.
While there can be "better" manufacturing technologies. There is no "better" manufacturing technique.

With the addition of the PRISM Stereolithography manufacturing technology you are now able to reach unprecedented levels of details and complexity on top of the capabilities of the FABtotum Personal Fabricator.

FFF/FDM does not produce fine details and can only work with a limited amount of polymers. Engraving is precise and works with lots of materials but require some fiddling with CAM and CAD. DLP and SLS are precise but can be expensive for big volumes and are limited to certain Light-activated resins.
FABtotum PRISM adresses that.

THE FABTOTUM PRISM PLATFORM

The FABtotum Personal Fabricator was designed to be a flexible and expandable platform from day one. Not Just a 3D printer, not Just a milling machine, Not just a scanner. A new way of prototyping and creating objects.
With expandable heads, swappable platform and up to 5 axis of motion the FABtotum is the most customizable platform for Personal Fabrication ever conceived on the market today.


The FABtotum is capable of printing autonomously (without being connected to a computer), from cabled LAN, Wireless LAN and even remotely from the Internet (Your Network must be properly configured for this), thanks to the FAB UI, the FABtotum User Interface. Also, users and developers have access to a well known development ecosystem, the Raspberry Pi's Raspbian Linux distribution to develop more applications. The FABtotum feature a customized web management app, SSH and VNC server on the local network, so with one authorization code you can access all the functions of the machine: 3D Printing, 3D scanning, Milling, Costumizations and Maintenance.


All these function are accessible not only from anywhere in your local network, but also on any device with web browsing capabilities. print remotely from your smartphone, tablet, your windows Pc, Mac, Linux, Android, IOS. You can use touch screens devices, mouse, keyboard - you name it!

The FABtotum has been used in many fields and by different people, sometimes without any specific knowledge of Machining or 3D printing.


What is PRISM
PRISM is installed inside the FABtotum Personal Fabricator as a standard build platform, without any modification. The FABTOTUM PRISM platform is a 6.5cm thick box composed by a vat mount (where light-curing resin is poured) and the optical assembly. A build platform is also mounted on the FABtotum carriage, and provide the surface on wich the print grows layer by layer.

As with many other upgrades, Prism is compatible with existing FABtotum Personal Fabricators, and it can be purchased separately by all Fabtotum owners.


PRISM is a new manufacturing technology that merges the advantages of Selective Laser Sintering (SLS) with the precision of Digital Light Processing (DLP).
Most DLP printers relies on integrating commercially available DLP home projectors wich are expensive and are not designed for 3D printing.
Only a small amount of energy emitted by a DLP projector actually cures the resin!


PRISM relies on a much simpler and widely available technology that recently reached the level of pixel density required to compete with DLP systems: the LCD matrix.
Resin is cured by shining a light with the right wavelenght throught the liquid crystals matrix. Where the matrix is polarized light is absorbed and radiations are absorbed, creating shapes.
Most similar systems are using a simple UV LED array which is expensive, produces excessive heat on the delicate LCD and is only capable of delivering a few mW/sqmm of light radiation.
In PRISM, instead, a mirror and a set of collimated light emitters are focusing high UV radiation on parts of the LCD matrix.
This reduces the energy used and decreases curing times.

PRISM can deliver more energy per unit of area at a fraction of the cost. and it does so only where light is needed, instead of everywhere, wasting energy and time.

Because of that, PRISM printing speeds depends on the Area cured, like Selective laser synthering systems.
For bigger prints it's in line with other SLA/DLP systems, while for smaller areas it's much faster than conventional DLP systems,SLS and LED-LCD systems.


Since the energy output is much bigger, PRISM can cure very small portions in a small amount of time, where other systems with fixed output such as DLP require much more time to solidify smaller obbjects due to the low energy emitted per area.
While conventional solutions are not scalable, PRISM can virtually reach much higher radiation levels with the same setup by increasing the number of the light emitters.

DETAILS MATTER

FABtotum PRISM is able to produce the smallest detail at around 80 µm in XY, while the smallest step in Z is 0.47 µm (that's 0.00047mm!).
While these specs are in line with what is expected in the final consumer version, keep in mind that small design changes in the optical assembly may improve or lower the quality accordingly as we experienced during the alpha prototyping phase.

Above, a Planar closeup view of the XY matrix, below: what it means.

The precision of the PRISM platform is mostly due to the structure of the FABtotum wich is capable of producing single movements of 0.25 micrometers in XY and 0.47 micrometers in Z natively, with high torque.
This kind of fine control does not only help when playing with very thin layers, but removes resonances in the Z direction, a nasty problem that many not-so-cheap 3D printers have.

MULTIPURPOSE PERSONAL FABRICATION

We developed the FABtotum PRISM to be an extension of the FABtotum Personal Fabricator. FABtotum Personal Fabricator PRISM bundle includes the FABtotum Personal Fabricator and the PRISM addon. PRISM is also available separately as an addon for existing units.

PRISM installs easily, requires minimun calibration and allows to quickly get started with SLA manufacturing.
When not needed, PRISM can be removed and the FABtotum can be used to print mill or scan as usual.


The PRISM head is mounted on top of the FABtotum carriage.
This allows the FABtotum to move the build plate around and moving to the next layer with ease thanks to 3 axis of motion and our unique COREXY variant configuration, one of the strongest XY systems out there!

ADAPTABLE

Why investing in a 3D printer nowadays?
It looks like 3D printingy technologies are changing so fast that committing to a particular one would be an error.
The FABtotum is a flexible platform that has been built with longevity in mind, because instead of the cutting edge last-month techology it's built around the concpt of multifunctionality and adaptability.

As with many other upgrades, PRISM itself is compatible with existing FABtotum Personal Fabricators, and it can be purchased separately by ALL FABtotum owners.


PERSONAL FABRICATION

Personal Fabrication is not the act of manufacturing.
I’ts not about the tecnology or who uses it. it’s not even “the tool”.
it’s in "process and the interactions" it makes possible.

When you puth togheter more than one manufacturing technology strange things happens. you find yourself building complete objects and functional projects, you explore different design choice and fabrication approaches.

A new paradigm was needed, exposed in a device both simple to use, solid, modular, customizable and flexible, and useful if you are a geek, an engineer, a designer, a jewel maker, a 3d modeler, or just interested in 3d printing .

There is more to Personal Fabrication than 3D printing alone.
That’s when we realized we needed a new paradigm: thus the FABtotum was born.


OPEN SOURCE


Being able to manufacture and produce things is a right.
For this reason we don't want to restrict access to hybrid manufacturing technologies and solutions.
All our products designs are open source, you can check them here.


Our commitment to open source is founded on:

  • No Proprietary Spools, Materials, or DRM checks.
  • Documentation and Sources available online
  • User-contributed wiki available online
  • Easily customizable with replicable parts.
  • Powered by a Raspberry Pi Mod B+ and Totumduino, an Arduino ™  Derivate/Compatible Open Source Physical Computing Platform.
  • Uses industry standards where possible and Exchange formats.
  • Standard Milling bits used are 1/8th of an inch (3.75mm)
  • Third party heads or parts can be built and sold freely to fit on FABtotum.

MANUFACTURED IN EUROPE

As consumers we do not accept cheap quality, As manufacturers we do not condone cheap labor. For this reason we have been constantly working on improving the quality of the FABtotum, along with keeping the working standards as high as possible.


It is calculated that up to 80% of the weight of one unit is made up of parts produced in the EU or US. The assembly is carried out in our factory outside Milan.
Starting from October 2015 all Electronics will also be completely rpoduced in Western Europe and assembled in Italy.
You can check this article for a tour of our factory.


SPECS

These are the PRISM alpha prototype specifications.

Build area:    120x90x190mm (XYZ)
Resolution:    80 µm in XY, 0.47µm in Z
Printing Speed: up to 2.5cm/h (0.97 inch / h)
Layer time: (depending on area) 1-12 sec @ 100 µm layer height
Resin curing Wavelenght: 400nm


FABtotum Personal Fabricator Platform Specs:

(for more FABtotum Personal Fabricator informations: visit fabtotum.com/about)

Overview

  • Classification Personal Fabricator
  • Capabilities: Hybrid Manufacturing, Digital Acquisition
  • Movement: 4 axis (5th axis port available)
  • I/O: Usb Host, Wifi B/g/n, LAN
  • Control: Standalone Printer (networked web server)
  • Size: 366x366x366mm
  • Weight: ~12kg
  • Available Colors: Red,Black,White (Matte Finish)
  • Illumination : Ambient light

Additive Mode (3D printing)

  • Printing volume (additive) : 214x236x242mm
  • Z layer size: 50,100 micrometers
  • Auto bed Leveling : Available
  • Z layer increments : 0.47 micrometers
  • Print to size-ratio: ~25%
  • Supported Filaments: 1.75mm PLA,ABS,Nylon,HIPS,PC filaments
  • Max Temperatures: Nozzle:260°C, Bed 100°C
  • Nozzle : Metal Hotend
  • Printing Speeds : up to 300mm/s
  • Speeds (rapids) : up to 400mm/s
  • Heating Speeds : 1 Minute
  • Cooling : Fan/Turbine twin cooling system
  • Heated Bed : Glass Heated Bed (Double-face platform)

Subtractive Mode (milling,engraving)

  • Milling volume : 214x236x[milling bit height] mm
  • Milling Motor : 200W Brushless motor, Automatic RPM correction
  • Fan cooling : Twin fan cooling system
  • Working Plane : Structural Aluminum plate, with Fixtures (Double-face platform)
  • 4th axis : 4 axis chuck: 0.0017 deg/step resolution
  • Illumination : Working area LED,ambient
  • Dust Control : printable vacuum tube holder

Digital Acquisition

  • Modes : Photogrammetry, Laser scanning, Z-Probe Digitizer
  • Scan volume :Up to 3D printing volume depending on object and used mode(s)
  • Camera : 5Mp, 2592x1944 Raspberry Pi Camera

Safety

  • Fabrication Area : Enclosed
  • Safety switches :Front Panel door, side panels doors
  • voltage control : Automatic stepper consumption control
  • Overvoltage protection : 120/240V Fuse
  • Homing Endstops : On all 3 Axis
  • Safety Endstops : On all 3 Axis
  • Safety Config : Costumizable from the FAB UI

Software, Firmware

  • License : Open Source (CC BY-NC-SA 3.0)
  • Interface : FAB UI, open source web panel
  • FAB UI Compatibility :PC,Tablet,Smartphones (Responsive web interface)
  • Mods & Plugins :Built in plug-in installer and updater tool
  • Updates : Automatic with internet connectivity (updates are not mandatory)

Hardware

  • Board : FABtotum control board "Totumduino"
  • Onboard Memory :8GB SDHC (installed OS included)
  • I/O : Usb Host, Wifi B/g/n, Lan
  • Illumination :Custumizable RGB ambient lights


THE TEAM
FABtotum has been officially founded in 2013 and was previously crowdfunded on Indiegogo.
In September 2014, with a 3 months delay, we started delivering the FABtotum Personal Fabricator.
5 months later we finished fullfilling all perks, albeit with some occasional delays occurred mainly for resupply and logistic reasons.
In october we'll release the first revision of the FABtotum, including the Hybrid head V2, and hardare revisions aimed to improve efficiency and reliability.
Our commitment is to continuously and seamlessly support the FABtotum platform with addons and upgrades in the long term.

We are located near Milan and previously at the Business incubator district "POLIHUB" of the University of Politecnico di Milano, one of the most renowned  european universities in Engineering, Architecture, Industrial Design since 1863.

FABtotum was founded by Marco Rizzuto, 30 and Giovanni Grieco, 30 both with a background in Architecture and a passion for design, innovation and personal fabrication. Our Development team is composed by Engineers, Designers, Software Developers and Makers.

FABtotum, as a company, is the result of several years of CNC designing experience for personal use. The FABtotum is our dream-machine as Makers.
We constantly work with the community and engage in active discussions to move the platform to the next step.

DEVELOPMENT TIMELINE
With our previous crowdfunding experience we realized our limits and the challenges we had to face. It was an incredibly awesome, humbling and educational experience for us all.
Our timeline this time is much more strict and precisely calculated to account for supplies delays that we faced the first time.
Reliability will be a big concern as well.



RISKS AND CHALLENGES
FABtotum PRISM is in an early development stage and we think has potential.
As with all crowdfunding projects there is the risk of delays, changes as well as total failure.
Our experience in crowdfunding makes us less likely to face harder challenges than we already faced.
Risks however still exists and may jeopardize our efforts.
By taking part to this crowdfunding campaign you understand the risk connected with this crowdfunding campaign.

REWARDS

Prototyping, sampling and setting up a production is a lenghty and expensive process.For this reason we appreciate every level of contribution.
This Campaign proceedings will be used for R&D and production of the FABtotum Prism Addon Module,

With your help we'll be able to bring PRISM to the masses!

For a donation of $35: you'll receive an awesome FABtotum PRISM t-shirt!
Your name will be listed on the project founders' page on fabtotum.com  
Note: t-shirt design may change, sizes available: XS-S-M-L-XL-XXL

 

For a donation of $100 you'll receive the Locked Campaign Price coupon.
This coupon will grant you the chance to purchase a PRISM Addon or FABtotum Personal Fabricator PRISM Boundle on the FABtotum Store at the same campaign price. Coupons will be valid from the end of the campaign until 02/29/2016.
Shipping costs for the goods are not included. Coupon discount cannot be combined with other discounts/offers. Your name will be listed on the project founders' page on fabtotum.com

For a donation of $649 You'll receive a PRISM Addon Module. (requires the FABtotum Personal Fabricator to work, see FABtotum PRISM bundle)
Your name will be listed on the project founders' page on fabtotum.com
   

For a donation of $1399 You'll receive a FABtotum PRISM bundle.
The bundle includes:
1x FABtotum Personal Fabricator (Available colors: Red, White, Black).
1xFabtotum PRISM addon module
1xHybrid head v2
1xhybrid bulild plane
1x welcome kit
Your name will be listed on the project founders' page on fabtotum.com
   

You'll receive a FABtotum PRISM bundle with a Laser Head, Plus the awesome FABtotum t-shirt! Your name will be listed on top of the project founders' page on fabtotum.com. The hardware included in this reward:

1x FABtotum Personal Fabricator (Available colors: Red, White, Black).
1xFabtotum PRISM Addon Module
1xHybrid head v2
1xLaser head
1xhybrid build plane
1x welcome kit
1x  FABtotum Prism T-Shirt


Frequently Asked Questions:
Q: Do I need a special Resin for PRISM?
A: No, and at this time we have no plans to resell any resin brand, you can use the one you like the most.

Q: Can I purchase the PRISM addon Separately if I already Own a FABtotum?
A: Yes, and it can be installed on any FABtotum out there!

Q: Does the “FAB+PRISM Plus – EARLY BIRDS” come with all the All-in-one features and tools to use in the original FAB? Such as 3D scanning, PCB Etching, Milling
A: Yes, It's a bundle with all you need to get started!

Q: Can I upgrade my perk?
A: Yes, follow this guide: https://support.indiegogo.com/hc/en-us/articles/526756-How-to-Upgrade-Your-Perk
story_txt:
Meet PRISM, a platform that enables precision 3D printing with an innovative Stereolithography technology. With FABtotum PRISM you get the most flexible and advanced multipurpose manufacturing device ever conceived, capable of 3D Printing in SLA with light-curing resins or with FFF on Materials like PLA, PETG, ABS as well as NYLON, HIPS, PC, 3D Milling Foams,Brass,Wood,Aluminum and acquire 3D point clouds and models via multiple 3D scanning methods with the built-in hi-res camera, touch probe and laser.Design and create small or big components with a huge variety of materials, acquire 3D shapes, modify existing designs and print them in multiple materials and with different technologies as you see fit. FABtotum PRISM brings design and personal fabrication to a whole new level.While there can be "better" manufacturing technologies. There is no "better" manufacturing technique.With the addition of the PRISM Stereolithography manufacturing 
technology you are now able to reach unprecedented levels of details and
 complexity on top of the capabilities of the FABtotum Personal 
Fabricator.FFF/FDM does not produce fine details and can only work with a limited amount of polymers. Engraving is precise and works with lots of materials but require some fiddling with CAM and CAD. DLP and SLS are precise but can be expensive for big volumes and are limited to certain Light-activated resins.FABtotum PRISM adresses that.THE FABTOTUM PRISM PLATFORMThe FABtotum Personal Fabricator was designed to be a flexible and expandable platform from day one. Not Just a 3D printer, not Just a milling machine, Not just a scanner. A new way of prototyping and creating objects.With expandable heads, swappable platform and up to 5 axis of motion the FABtotum is the most customizable platform for Personal Fabrication ever conceived on the market today.The FABtotum is capable of printing autonomously (without being connected to a computer), from cabled LAN, Wireless LAN and even remotely from the Internet (Your Network must be properly configured for this), thanks to the FAB UI, the FABtotum User Interface. Also, users and developers have access to a well known development ecosystem, the Raspberry Pi's Raspbian Linux distribution to develop more applications. The FABtotum feature a customized web management app, SSH and VNC server on the local network, so with one authorization code you can access all the functions of the machine: 3D Printing, 3D scanning, Milling, Costumizations and Maintenance.All these function are accessible not only from anywhere in your local network, but also on any device with web browsing capabilities. print remotely from your smartphone, tablet, your windows Pc, Mac, Linux, Android, IOS. You can use touch screens devices, mouse, keyboard - you name it!The FABtotum has been used in many fields and by different people, sometimes without any specific knowledge of Machining or 3D printing. What is PRISMPRISM is installed inside the FABtotum 
Personal Fabricator as a standard build platform, without any 
modification. The FABTOTUM PRISM platform is a 6.5cm thick box composed 
by a vat mount (where light-curing resin is poured) and the optical 
assembly. A build platform is also mounted on the FABtotum carriage, and
 provide the surface on wich the print grows layer by layer.As with many other upgrades, Prism is compatible with existing FABtotum 
Personal Fabricators, and it can be purchased separately by all Fabtotum
 owners.PRISM
 is a new manufacturing technology that merges the advantages of 
Selective Laser Sintering  (SLS) with the precision of Digital Light 
Processing (DLP).Most DLP printers relies on integrating 
commercially available DLP home projectors wich are expensive and are 
not designed for 3D printing.Only a small amount of energy emitted by a DLP projector actually cures the resin!PRISM
 relies on a much simpler and widely available technology that recently 
reached the level of pixel density required to compete with DLP systems:
 the LCD matrix.Resin is cured by shining a light with the right 
wavelenght throught the liquid crystals matrix. Where the matrix is 
polarized light is absorbed and radiations are absorbed, creating 
shapes.Most similar systems are using a simple UV LED array which is
 expensive, produces excessive heat on the delicate LCD and is only 
capable of delivering a few mW/sqmm of light radiation. In PRISM, instead, a mirror and a set of collimated light emitters are focusing high UV radiation on parts of the LCD matrix.This reduces the energy used and decreases curing times. PRISM
 can deliver more energy per unit of area at a fraction of the cost. and
 it does so only where light is needed, instead of everywhere, wasting 
energy and time.Because of that, PRISM printing speeds depends on the Area cured, like Selective laser synthering systems.For
 bigger prints it's in line with other SLA/DLP systems, while for 
smaller areas it's much faster than conventional DLP systems,SLS and 
LED-LCD systems.Since
 the energy output is much bigger, PRISM can cure very small portions in
 a small amount of time, where other systems with fixed output such as 
DLP require much more time to solidify smaller obbjects due to the low 
energy emitted per area. While conventional solutions are not 
scalable, PRISM can virtually reach much higher radiation levels with 
the same setup by increasing the number of the light emitters.DETAILS MATTERFABtotum
 PRISM is able to produce the smallest detail at around 80 µm in XY, 
while the smallest step in Z is 0.47 µm (that's 0.00047mm!).While 
these specs are in line with what is expected in the final consumer 
version, keep in mind that small design changes in the optical assembly 
may improve or lower the quality accordingly as we experienced during 
the alpha prototyping phase.Above, a Planar closeup view of the XY matrix, below: what it means.The
 precision of the PRISM platform is mostly due to the structure of the 
FABtotum wich is capable of producing single movements of 0.25 
micrometers in XY and 0.47 micrometers in Z natively, with high torque.This
 kind of fine control does not only help when playing with very thin 
layers, but removes resonances in the Z direction, a nasty problem that 
many not-so-cheap 3D printers have.MULTIPURPOSE PERSONAL FABRICATIONWe
 developed the FABtotum PRISM to be an extension of the FABtotum 
Personal Fabricator. FABtotum Personal Fabricator PRISM bundle includes 
the FABtotum Personal Fabricator and the PRISM addon. PRISM is also 
available separately as an addon for existing units.PRISM installs easily, requires minimun calibration and allows to quickly get started with SLA manufacturing. When not needed, PRISM can be removed and the FABtotum can be used to print mill or scan as usual.The PRISM head is mounted on top of the FABtotum carriage.This
 allows the FABtotum to move the build plate around and moving to the 
next layer with ease thanks to 3 axis of motion and our unique COREXY 
variant configuration, one of the strongest XY systems out there!ADAPTABLEWhy investing in a 3D printer nowadays? It looks like 3D printingy technologies are changing so fast that committing to a particular one would be an error.The FABtotum is a flexible platform that has been built with longevity in mind, because instead of the cutting edge last-month techology it's built around the concpt of multifunctionality and adaptability.As with many other upgrades, PRISM itself is compatible with existing FABtotum 
Personal Fabricators, and it can be purchased separately by ALL FABtotum
 owners.PERSONAL FABRICATIONPersonal Fabrication is not the act of manufacturing.
I’ts not about the tecnology or who uses it. it’s not even “the tool”.
it’s in "process and the interactions" it makes possible.When you puth togheter more than one manufacturing technology strange things happens. you find yourself building complete objects and functional projects, you explore different design choice and fabrication approaches.A new paradigm was needed, exposed in a device both simple to use, 
solid, modular, customizable and flexible, and useful if you are a geek,
 an engineer, a designer, a jewel maker, a 3d modeler, or just 
interested in 3d printing .
There is more to Personal Fabrication than 3D printing alone.That’s when we realized we needed a new paradigm: thus the FABtotum was born.OPEN SOURCEBeing able to manufacture and produce things is a right.For this reason we don't want to restrict access to hybrid manufacturing technologies and solutions.All our products designs are open source, you can check them here.
Our commitment to open source is founded on:
No Proprietary Spools, Materials, or DRM checks.

Documentation and Sources available online

User-contributed wiki available online
Easily customizable with replicable parts.
Powered by a Raspberry Pi Mod B+ and Totumduino, an Arduino ™  Derivate/Compatible Open Source Physical Computing Platform.
Uses industry standards where possible and Exchange formats.
Standard Milling bits used are 1/8th of an inch (3.75mm)

Third party heads or parts can be built and sold freely to fit on FABtotum.

MANUFACTURED IN EUROPEAs consumers we do not accept cheap quality, As manufacturers we do not condone cheap labor. For this reason we have been constantly working on improving the quality of the FABtotum, along with keeping the working standards as high as possible.It is calculated that up to 80% of the weight of one unit is made up of parts produced in the EU or US. The assembly is carried out in our factory outside Milan.Starting from October 2015 all Electronics will also be completely rpoduced in Western Europe and assembled in Italy.You can check this article for a tour of our factory.SPECSThese are the PRISM alpha prototype specifications. voltage control : Automatic stepper consumption control
