story:
The Stretch Goals:
$600K stretch goal:Upgrade the HiGame's RAM & Storage for Free!

Referral Contest:
Chuwi HiGame Referral Contest






 

Small with great performance.
Two liters compact body mini PC has the same powerful performance as the traditional PC.But almost 15 times smaller than it !
 

Strong configuration beyond your imagination
Intel’s first processor that bundles Intel Core H-series CPU with AMD Radeon graphics in the same SOC.


Fastest and upgradable.
Not only equipped with 8GB/16GB DDR4 Memory & 256 GB SSD Storage,but also gives you free space to expand to meet your needs.


Better gaming experience.
HiGame’s high-performing Intel CPU has already integrated the Radeon RX Vega M graphics and a 4GB HBM2 graphics memory. Enjoy the game without hindrance.


Smooth operation to maximize your creativity.
The latest Intel Core i5-8305G/ i7-8709G CPU with powerful GPU,lets you finish the work smoothly,easily and effectively.
VR, AR and MR ready.
The smallest VR/AR/MR-optimized machine provides you with the most immersive and realistic experience.


Stays cool during an intense game.
The exterior hollow-out design combined with copper heat sinks helps cool the mini PC.


Flexible input and output connectivity
Multiple types of interface bring you have fun with multi-screen, high-definition playback and other functions.


It’s environmentally-friendly.
Equipped with the latest generation of low-power consumption chips.It not only saves electricity and money, but also protects the environment.






 

 


Chuwi HiGame has a space gray finish with a simple aesthetic that would look great on your desk. We have shaved away every unneeded millimetre to create a super space-saving design. At just two liter volume and with a weight of just 1.3Kg, it’s a pro-gaming and creating desktop computer that can actually sit on your desk. Moreover, we have added two specially designed square-shaped metal rings for Chuwi HiGame — meaning it can be placed on your desk in different ways (horizontal or vertical) without affecting the cooling.

Chuwi HiGame comes with the newly announced 8th Gen Intel Core i5-8305G or i7-8709G processor. Featuring a cutting edge design, it can deliver four cores, eight threads and up to 8MB of cache memory. Thanks to Intel Turbo Boost Technology 2.0, you will see a turbo frequency of up to 4.1GHz. In addition, with up to 40% higher performance versus previous-generation processors, you can seamlessly multitask with efficiency on Chuwi HiGame.
What’s more,backed up by cutting-edge Radeon RX Vega M GL/GH graphics (customized from AMD), Chuwi HiGame can easily handle a lot of graphics-hungry applications. It’s directly connected to the CPU via Intel’s high-speed PCIe lanes. This allows the bandwidth needed for the CPU to feed the graphics compute units (up to 24 Compute Units) to run up to 1190MHz boost frequency which delivers super smooth frame rates on your favorite games. 
The final touch is the low power dedicated graphics memory that comes in the form of 4GB of High Bandwidth Memory Gen2 (HBM2) with class leading memory bandwidth up to 205GB/s, to quickly store and retrieve information critical for a great graphics experience.

With pre-installed 8GB DDR4 RAM onboard, the Chuwi HiGame can offer seamless multitasking and lag-free switching between lots of resource hungry software. With the built-in dual-channel DDR4 controller running at 2133/2400MHz, it will support up to 32GB of memory in total and delivers up to 38.4GB/s of memory bandwidth. That’s 50% more bandwidth and 40% more energy efficiency than DDR3 technology. All of these optimized designs let you fly through even the most compute-intensive tasks in no time. 

Chuwi HiGame comes pre-installed with the 128GB/256GB M.2 SATA solid state drive (SSD) -which is up to 5 times faster than most hard disk drives (HDD). This will let you boot up, launch apps, and even open massive files in blazing-fast times. 

And if you are looking for more space to house your movie/music libraries or install more professional software and games, we have designed Chuwi HiGame to support three different types of storage expansions — 2.5-inch hard disk drive (HDD), M.2 SATA solid state drive (SSD) or PCIe x4 NVMe solid state drive (SSD). So whether the larger storage capacities or faster data access speeds, you can mix and match between HDD and SSD to better suit your needs.


Chuwi HiGame packs an unprecedented amount of power in an unthinkable amount of space. We know therefore, that the cooling system is very important. In addition to using multiple copper heat sinks and a 90mm astonishingly quiet fan to cool the processor and graphics card, we have also specially engineered our own unique design of all-around vents to keep the temperature down. 
All-around vents are designed on the left, right and bottom sides to efficiently pull in cool air to help offset heat from the Chuwi HiGame's crucial components. Equipped with this multi-layer thermal system, Chuwi HiGame will undoubtedly ensure the peak performance for even your most demanding gaming battles!


Designed with multiple input/output connectivity ports, the compact Chuwi HiGame can furnish you with all kinds of ports for different types of peripherals.It lets you  easily connect to the internet, displays and many of the USB-A based external devices.There is also one front-mounted Thunderbolt 3 port, this versatile USB-C based port can conveniently support up to 40Gb/s transfer speed, two 4K UHD 60Hz displays or an additional external graphics card (eGPU)
 

Chuwi HiGame gives you superfast wireless connectivity, thanks to its Intel Wi-Fi card. With the 802.11ac 2.4GHz/5GHz dual band Wi-Fi, it will reach up to 433Mb/s wireless transfer rate. This is around 8 times faster than 802.11g and 3 times faster than 802.11n, so you can enjoy faster and more stable Internet connections anywhere, anytime. Plus, built-in Bluetooth 4.2 means that you can pair Chuwi HiGame with all kinds of your Bluetooth-enabled peripherals.

The Chuwi HiGame will come with Microsoft officially licensed Windows 10 Home OS. This is the world’s most powerful and productivity-friendly operating system, with a user interface which is extremely intuitive and easy to use.And of course, being Windows, it is compatible with most professional software, such as: Adobe Creative Cloud and latest Microsoft Office Suite.




*Final specs will depend on which option you select. 



The unprecedented design and extreme performance of the new 8th Gen Intel Core (Kaby Lake-G) inspired us to a create smaller and powerful mini PC -Chuwi HiGame!The unprecedented design and extreme performance of the new 8th Gen Intel Core (Kaby Lake-G) inspired us to a create smaller and powerful mini PC -Chuwi HiGame!


Our technician got together and designed the HiGame model.


After repeated reflection and testing,HiGame was created !



We work with a range of hardware and software partners to optimize our product, so that you get the best performance and experience possible. We have the most passionate engineering team working on Chuwi HiGame. Moreover, as the technology provider, Intel will offer technical support for our development, and Microsoft will provide each machine with an officially licensed Windows 10 Home OS. Beside,you can also see reports of our products in major media.




Established in 2004 and located in Shenzhen of China, Chuwi has built a reputation for creating great tablet / laptop devices in our home country over the past fourteen years. Now our product line has covered tablet PCs, 2-in-1 convertibles, laptops, mini PCs, fast charging accessories and other digital products.With high-quality, competitive prices and excellent customer service, our products has a great reputation all over the world in our self-operated Amazon stores, Aliexpress stores and many other local distributors / retailers. 
The team behind HiGame brings a wealth of skills and relevant experience to the project with deeply rooted experience in hardware, design and other fields, to provide users with more valuable products.




Tell a friend - and help us to help you! You can make a difference in growing the Chuwi HiGame online community. If you like the Chuwi HiGame, please hit one of the buttons below and tag your friends or colleagues who need this!
 






1.  When do you expect to deliver the Chuwi HiGame?

We expect to start the delivery of Chuwi HiGame in August. If we have any changes, our team will keep you updated.

2.  Can I get a tracking number for my parcel after you ship it out?

Of course, we will update you by email with the tracking number of your parcel once it has been shipped out.

3.  Will I need to pay additional taxes, duties or VAT for the Chuwi HiGame?

Chuwi HiGame’s price only includes the international postage. So you may need to pay additional taxes, duties or VAT if your country requires it (different countries/regions have the different tariff policies). Please check your local laws before ordering.

4.  What is your warranty policy and refund policy?
  • WARRANTY PERIOD

HiGame Mini PC: One year
Accessories: Three months
*Counting from the date of receipt of shipment

  • RETURN POLICY

1.If quality problems occur under normal use within 7 days, HiGame can be refunded or exchanged.
2.Within 15 days, if there are quality problems under normal use, you can choose to exchange or repair.

  • SHIPPING

1.Within three months, due to product quality problems that need HiGame to be returned to the factory for repairs, we will bear the two-way freight and tax. 
2.The customer will cover any shipping and handling costs for 1-way shipping. Chuwi will choose the shipping method and carrier, and cover any shipping and handling costs for 1-way shipping back to the customer.

 

  • EXCLUSIONS AND LIMITATIONS

The Limited Warranty does not apply to any
1. Damage caused by accident, abuse, misuse, flood, fire, earthquake or other external causes.  
2. Damage to any returned product caused by improper packaging.
3. Modifications to any part of the Product. 
4. Damage caused by operating the Product outside the permitted or intended uses described by Chuwi or with improper voltage or power supply.
5. Damage caused by service (including upgrades and expansions) performed by anyone who is not a representative of Chuwi.
6. Damage to any product caused in transit or by improper handling on the shipping carrier.

  • Terms and Conditions

The warranty terms only valid for Indiegogo HiGame campaign. 

If you have any question,please feel free to contact us at crowdfunding@chuwi.com

5.  If my question isn’t promptly answered, what should I do?

We are committed to making sure you receive the best product and customer service experience. If you have any questions about Chuwi HiGame or this project, please feel free to contact us at crowdfunding@chuwi.com. Usually our customer service team will respond promptly within 48 business hours (from Monday to Friday).

6.  How do I become one of your distributors or retailers?

We are open to the distributors and retailers worldwide and would love to cooperate with you! If you have a retail store or shopping website where Chuwi HiGame would be a good addition to your range, please feel free to email our sales team at sales1@chuwi.com.

7.  Can you deliver the Chuwi HiGame with US/UK/EU/AU standard plug?

Yes, we can! We will ship you the Chuwi HiGame with suitable power plug based on your country/regionand we’ll confirm which one you need before dispatch.
story_txt:
The Stretch Goals:$600K stretch goal:Upgrade the HiGame's RAM & Storage for Free!Referral Contest:Chuwi HiGame Referral Contest Small with great performance.Two liters compact body mini PC has the same powerful performance as the traditional PC.But almost 15 times smaller than it ! Strong configuration beyond your imaginationIntel’s first processor that bundles Intel Core H-series CPU with AMD Radeon graphics in the same SOC.Fastest and upgradable.Not only equipped with 8GB/16GB DDR4 Memory & 256 GB SSD Storage,but also gives you free space to expand to meet your needs.Better gaming experience.HiGame’s high-performing Intel CPU has already integrated the Radeon RX Vega M graphics and a 4GB HBM2 graphics memory. Enjoy the game without hindrance.Smooth operation to maximize your creativity.The latest Intel Core i5-8305G/ i7-8709G CPU with powerful GPU,lets you finish the work smoothly,easily and effectively.VR, AR and MR ready.The smallest VR/AR/MR-optimized machine provides you with the most immersive and realistic experience.Stays cool during an intense game.The exterior hollow-out design combined with copper heat sinks helps cool the mini PC.Flexible input and output connectivityMultiple types of interface bring you have fun with multi-screen, high-definition playback and other functions.It’s environmentally-friendly.Equipped with the latest generation of low-power consumption chips.It not only saves electricity and money, but also protects the environment.
 
 
Chuwi HiGame has a space gray finish with a simple aesthetic that would look great on your desk. We have shaved away every unneeded millimetre to create a super space-saving design. At just two liter volume and with a weight of just 1.3Kg, it’s a pro-gaming and creating desktop computer that can actually sit on your desk. Moreover, we have added two specially designed square-shaped metal rings for Chuwi HiGame — meaning it can be placed on your desk in different ways (horizontal or vertical) without affecting the cooling.Chuwi HiGame comes with the newly announced 8th Gen Intel Core i5-8305G or i7-8709G processor. Featuring a cutting edge design, it can deliver four cores, eight threads and up to 8MB of cache memory. Thanks to Intel Turbo Boost Technology 2.0, you will see a turbo frequency of up to 4.1GHz. In addition, with up to 40% higher performance versus previous-generation processors, you can seamlessly multitask with efficiency on Chuwi HiGame.What’s more,backed up by cutting-edge Radeon RX Vega M GL/GH graphics (customized from AMD), Chuwi HiGame can easily handle a lot of graphics-hungry applications. It’s directly connected to the CPU via Intel’s high-speed PCIe lanes. This allows the bandwidth needed for the CPU to feed the graphics compute units (up to 24 Compute Units) to run up to 1190MHz boost frequency which delivers super smooth frame rates on your favorite games. The final touch is the low power dedicated graphics memory that comes in the form of 4GB of High Bandwidth Memory Gen2 (HBM2) with class leading memory bandwidth up to 205GB/s, to quickly store and retrieve information critical for a great graphics experience.With pre-installed 8GB DDR4 RAM onboard, the Chuwi HiGame can offer seamless multitasking and lag-free switching between lots of resource hungry software. With the built-in dual-channel DDR4 controller running at 2133/2400MHz, it will support up to 32GB of memory in total and delivers up to 38.4GB/s of memory bandwidth. That’s 50% more bandwidth and 40% more energy efficiency than DDR3 technology. All of these optimized designs let you fly through even the most compute-intensive tasks in no time. Chuwi HiGame comes pre-installed with the 128GB/256GB M.2 SATA solid state drive (SSD) -which is up to 5 times faster than most hard disk drives (HDD). This will let you boot up, launch apps, and even open massive files in blazing-fast times. And if you are looking for more space to house your movie/music libraries or install more professional software and games, we have designed Chuwi HiGame to support three different types of storage expansions — 2.5-inch hard disk drive (HDD), M.2 SATA solid state drive (SSD) or PCIe x4 NVMe solid state drive (SSD). So whether the larger storage capacities or faster data access speeds, you can mix and match between HDD and SSD to better suit your needs.Chuwi HiGame packs an unprecedented amount of power in an unthinkable amount of space. We know therefore, that the cooling system is very important. In addition to using multiple copper heat sinks and a 90mm astonishingly quiet fan to cool the processor and graphics card, we have also specially engineered our own unique design of all-around vents to keep the temperature down. All-around vents are designed on the left, right and bottom sides to efficiently pull in cool air to help offset heat from the Chuwi HiGame's crucial components. Equipped with this multi-layer thermal system, Chuwi HiGame will undoubtedly ensure the peak performance for even your most demanding gaming battles!Designed with multiple input/output connectivity ports, the compact Chuwi HiGame can furnish you with all kinds of ports for different types of peripherals.It lets you  easily connect to the internet, displays and many of the USB-A based external devices.There is also one front-mounted Thunderbolt 3 port, this versatile USB-C based port can conveniently support up to 40Gb/s transfer speed, two 4K UHD 60Hz displays or an additional external graphics card (eGPU) Chuwi HiGame gives you superfast wireless connectivity, thanks to its Intel Wi-Fi card. With the 802.11ac 2.4GHz/5GHz dual band Wi-Fi, it will reach up to 433Mb/s wireless transfer rate. This is around 8 times faster than 802.11g and 3 times faster than 802.11n, so you can enjoy faster and more stable Internet connections anywhere, anytime. Plus, built-in Bluetooth 4.2 means that you can pair Chuwi HiGame with all kinds of your Bluetooth-enabled peripherals.The Chuwi HiGame will come with Microsoft officially licensed Windows 10 Home OS. This is the world’s most powerful and productivity-friendly operating system, with a user interface which is extremely intuitive and easy to use.And of course, being Windows, it is compatible with most professional software, such as: Adobe Creative Cloud and latest Microsoft Office Suite.*Final specs will depend on which option you select. The unprecedented design and extreme performance of the new 8th Gen Intel Core (Kaby Lake-G) inspired us to a create smaller and powerful mini PC -Chuwi HiGame!The unprecedented design and extreme performance of the new 8th Gen Intel Core (Kaby Lake-G) inspired us to a create smaller and powerful mini PC -Chuwi HiGame!Our technician got together and designed the HiGame model.After repeated reflection and testing,HiGame was created !We work with a range of hardware and software partners to optimize our product, so that you get the best performance and experience possible. story:
Innovation from your pocket

 We are working on a software and hardware open-source project for accelerating “Internet Of Things” (IoT) startups and hobbyist prototypes. We would like the startups to be exciting. We think the shape of IoT is a combination of the smartphone and sensors. So we are going to provide a smartphone application library and reference hardware.

We call the project “Physicaloid”.
The PocketDuino is the first piece of hardware for the Physicaloid project.
Let's make things, together!

　私達PhysicaloidプロジェクトチームはAndroidとArduinoを繋ぐためのオープンソース・ソフトウェアおよびハードウェアのプロジェクトを進めてきました。そのリファレンスハードウェアの第一弾としてPocketDuinoを作りました。そしてみなさんの手に届けたいと思っています。

　何かアプリケーションを作るとなると、どうしてもソフトウェアとハードウェアの間にある技術的な溝がネックになります。正直なことを言うと、両者を繋げるのはすごくめんどくさい作業です。そこで私達は、その間の溝を埋めるためのツールを揃えてきました。なるべく敷居を下げるために各センサ毎にArduinoスケッチ、Android Java ライブラリを用意しています。

　このプロジェクトへの支援・参加方法には2つの側面があります。1つは、このプロジェクトをベースに自身のアプリケーションを実現すること。そしてもう１つはこのプロジェクト自体にジョインしてベースを作っていくこと。私は、前者が多く参加し面白いアイデアがたくさん出てくることを期待しています。そして、あまりにこの環境がひどいと思ったら後者としてジョインして下さい。

　私達はどんなことでもアウトプットすれば世界が変わると思っています。そして誰もが違うアウトプットをすることに価値があると思っています。私達は、皆が思い描いた何気ないアイデアが形となって出てくる世界を見たいと思っています。そして、その世界をあなたと一緒に作りたいと思っています。$1からでも私達のプロジェクトにジョインしてくれることを願っています。


Anytime and anywhere, you can develop

The PocketDuino is an Arduino-compatible development board with a micro-b USB connector. It can be attached to an Android device directly. No need for an extra battery.
 Anytime and anywhere, users can develop, test and get feedback.

PocketDuinoはmicro-bUSBコネクタを備えたArduinoピン互換の開発ボードです。Androidに直接差し込んで使うことができます。追加電源は要りません。
いつでもどこでも気軽に開発でき、その場で友人と楽しみ、時にはアプリに対するフィードバックを得ることができます。


The PocketDuino Features

  • Arduino Pro Mini pin-compatible
  • Arduino Pro Mini ピン互換
  • Tiny size (1.2 by 1.2 inches)
  • 小サイズ（3cm x 3cm）
  • No need for an extra battery (all you need is Android)
  • 外部電池の必要なし（AndroidだけでOK）
  • Open-source software and hardware on GitHub
  • ソフトウェア・ハードウェアリソースはGitHub上でオープンソースで公開
  • Android Java library: "Physicaloid Library"
  • Android Java library Physicaloidライブラリ
The PocketDuino doesn't need a desktop PC to upload its firmware.
PocketDuinoのファームウェアをアップロードするのにPCは要りません。


Developers who use the PocketDuino can upload Android applications to Google Play with its firmware.
PocketDuinoを使ったアプリ開発者はそのファームウェアを内包した状態でアプリケーションをGoogle Playにアップロードできます。

  • Android Serial Monitor App (Google Play / GitHub) using Physicaloid Library
  • Androi シリアルモニタアプリ(Google Play / GitHub) Physicaloid Libraryを使用


  • Android Firmware Writer App (Google Play / GitHub) using Physicaloid Library
  • Android ファームウェア書込アプリ(Google Play / GitHub) Physicaloidライブラリを使用


  • Android Oscilloscope App (in development)
  • Androidオシロスコープアプリ（開発中）

Unfortunately, we cannot support iPhone/iPad because they lack micro-b USB connectors.
micro-b USBコネクタの形状の違いがあるため、iPhone/iPadでは残念ながら使用できません。

Hardware Application Examples

We and PocketDuino beta users have made these applications:
以下、私達およびPocketDuinoのβ版使用者の人が作ったアプリケーションです。

  • Alcohol sensor (created by us)
  • アルコールセンサ (Physicaloidチーム製作)


  • LED illumination (created by @kurousagi_tsu. Thank you!)
  • LEDイルミネーション(@kurousagi_tsuさん作成。Thank you!)


  • Infrared-beam receiver/transmitter (created by @tnoho. Thank you!)
  • IR送受信機(@tnohoさん作成。Thank you!)


  • Temperature, Humidity sensor and 3D printed case (created by @cattaka_net. Thank you!)
  • 温度湿度センサと3Dプリンタ出力ケース(@cattaka_netさん作成。Thank you!)


  • PocketDuino + IR LED + iSobot (created by @catsin. Thank you!)
  • PocketDuino + IR LED + iSobot (@catsinさん作成。Thank you!)

Users can develop with devices such as:
他にも以下のようなデバイスを組み合わせることができます。

  • LED(LED)
  • Motor(モーター)
  • Geiger counter(ガイガーカウンタ)
  • Range sensor(距離センサ)
  • Temperature sensor(温度センサ)
  • Humidity sensor(湿度センサ)
  • Gas sensor(ガスセンサ)
  • Flame sensor(火炎センサ)
  • Heart beat monitor(心拍センサ)
  • Fingerprint scanner(指紋センサ)


Software Development Environment

PocketDuino(Arduino)

 The PocketDuino allows developers to develop on Android/Windows/Mac/Linux by using the following tools :

  • Arduino IDE (for development on Win/Mac/Linux)
  • Arduino IDE (Win/Mac/Linux対応)
  • codebender (online Arduino IDE, for development on Android/Win/Mac/Linux)
  • codebender (オンラインArduino IDE Android/Win/Mac/Linux対応)
  • ArduinoDroid (Arduino IDE app, for development on Android)
  • ArduinoDroid (Arduino IDEアプリ、Android対応)
 The codebender(https://codebender.cc/) is an awesome online Arduino IDE. Compiled hex file downloaded from the codebender can be uploaded using PhysicaloidWriter (https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.physicaloid.app.writer). (Thanks to codebender's developer Christos for letting us download hex files!)
codebenderはすばらしいオンラインArduino IDEです。 codebenderからhexファイルをダウンロードしてきて、PhysicaloidWriterでPocketDuinoへ書き込むことができます。(hexファイルをダウンロードできるようにしてくれたcodebender開発者Christosに感謝します)

 The ArduinoDroid is a cool Arduino IDE Android application. It can write and compile sketches and upload a firmware to PocketDuino. (Thanks to ArduinoDroid developer Anton for making the cool app!)
ArduinoDroidはArduino IDEをAndroidアプリにしてしまったすごいアプリです。スケッチを書き、コンパイルし、PocketDuinoへアップロードすることができます。（このようなクールなアプリを作ってくれたAntonに感謝します）


Android

 Users can develop their own applications on Eclipse or Android Studio. There are simple APIs for communicating with Arduino.
開発者はEclipseかAndroid Studio上で開発することができます。PocketDuinoと通信するためのシンプルなAPIが用意されています。

 In the Physicaloid library, there are open, close, read, write and upload APIs. There are some tutorials for learning how to use them.
例えば、Physicaloid Libraryにはopen/close/read/write/uploadのAPIがあります。そしてそれを使うためのチュートリアルを用意しています。

https://github.com/ksksue/PhysicaloidLibrary

 And we are developing sensor libraries. It's easy to develop.
そして今、容易に開発が進められるようセンサライブラリの開発を進めています。


For example :
例:

AlcoholMeter am = new AlcoholMeter(this);
if(am.init()) {
    int alcoholPercent = am.getPercent();
    ...
}


Tech Specs

Microcontroller

ATmega328

Operating Voltage

5V

Input Voltage

5V

Digital I/O Pins

14 (of which 6 provide PWM output)

Analog Input Pins

8

DC Current per I/O Pin

40 mA

Flash Memory

16 KB (of which 2 KB used by bootloader)

SRAM

1 KB

EEPROM

512 bytes

Clock Speed

16 MHz

Extra boards in development

 We are developing some extra boards for PocketDuino. Let me know your idea on the "comments" tab or info@physicaloid.com .
 私達は今PocketDuinoの追加拡張ボードの開発をしています。もし他にもアイデアがあればコメントタブか info@physicaloid.com へメール下さい。

IR receiver/transmitter board
IR 送受信ボード

XBee translator board
XBee変換ボード


The Perks

IR receiver/transmitter and XBee translator board is in development. We will update our progress.
IR送受信、XBee変換ボードは開発中です。開発状況はupdateで報告していきます。

支援方法日本語解説
http://event.physicaloid.com/pduino/


Schedule

  • Apr.-Jun. : Indiegogo campaign
  • 17-18 May : Maker Faire Bay Area (We would like to meet you!)
  • Jun-Jul. : PCB manufacture and assembly
  • Jul. : QC and packaging
  • Aug. : Start to ship

  • 4-6月 : Indiegogoキャンペーン期間
  • 5月17-18 : MakerFaire Bay Areaへ出展（行っている方いればぜひお会いしたいです）
  • ６−７月 : PCB製造・実装
  • 7月 : 品質チェック、パッケージング
  • 8月 : 出荷開始

Shipping

The PocketDuino is shipped worldwide from Japan. We need US$5 to ship them. The parks includes the shipping cost. It takes about 2 weeks on outside of Japan.
PocketDuinoは日本から世界中へ発送します。発送には一律$5必要です。Perksには発送コストは含まれています。日本国内であれば2, 3日で届くと思われます。


The Team

Keisuke Suzuki: Physicaloid project founder, hardware engineer and Android/iOS application developer.
鈴木圭介 : Physicaloidプロジェクト創始者。ハードウェアエンジニア。Android/iOSアプリケーション開発者。

Shun Osafune : Physicaloid project co-founder, FPGA hardware engineer. He is currently developing the second piece of hardware for the Physicaloid project.
長船俊：Physicaloidプロジェクト共同創始者。FPGA、ハードウェアエンジニア。現在Physicaloidプロジェクト第２弾ハードウェアの開発中。

Tomohiro God : Physicaloid project co-founder, web system developer, PHP engineer.
後藤知宏：Physicaloidプロジェクト共同創始者。Webシステム開発者。PHPエンジニア。


FAQ

- Which devices is the PocketDuino supported on?
- PocketDuinoはどのデバイスでサポートされていますか？

 1. Android version 3.1 or higher
 1. Androidバージョン3.1以上

 2. Android with USB Host feature (Some Android tablets or phones don't have the feature. This app allows you to check if you have it or not. https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=org.tauruslabs.usbhostcheck)
 2. USB Host featureがONとなっているAndroid（一部Android端末ではこのfeatureがONとなっていない。このアプリを使えばONかどうかがわかります。 https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=org.tauruslabs.usbhostcheck）

 3. Devices with micro-B, micro-A or host-A USB connector.
 3. 端末にmicro-Bかmicro-Aかhost-A のUSBコネクタがあること


- Can I use the PocketDuino on my desktop PC?
- PC上でPocketDuino開発はできますか？

 Yes, you need a conversion adapter to connect to host-A USB.(Including the connector to PocketDuino set is under consideration)
できます。以下のコネクタを使えばできます。（同梱検討中です）


- Is there PocketDuino available for iPhone/iPad?
- iPhone/iPadには対応していますか？

 Unfortunately, we cannot support iPhone/iPad because they lack micro-b USB connectors.
micro-b USBコネクタの形状の違いがあるため、iPhone/iPadでは残念ながら使用できません。


- 支援方法がわかりません

日本語支援方法の解説ページを作りました

http://event.physicaloid.com/pduino/
story_txt:
Innovation from your pocket We are working on a software and hardware open-source project for accelerating “Internet Of Things” (IoT) startups and hobbyist prototypes. We would like the startups to be exciting. We think the shape of IoT is a combination of the smartphone and sensors. So we are going to provide a smartphone application library and reference hardware.We call the project “Physicaloid”.The PocketDuino is the first piece of hardware for the Physicaloid project.Let's make things, together!　私達PhysicaloidプロジェクトチームはAndroidとArduinoを繋ぐためのオープンソース・ソフトウェアおよびハードウェアのプロジェクトを進めてきました。そのリファレンスハードウェアの第一弾としてPocketDuinoを作りました。そしてみなさんの手に届けたいと思っています。　何かアプリケーションを作るとなると、どうしてもソフトウェアとハードウェアの間にある技術的な溝がネックになります。正直なことを言うと、両者を繋げるのはすごくめんどくさい作業です。そこで私達は、その間の溝を埋めるためのツールを揃えてきました。なるべく敷居を下げるために各センサ毎にArduinoスケッチ、Android Java ライブラリを用意しています。　このプロジェクトへの支援・参加方法には2つの側面があります。1つは、このプロジェクトをベースに自身のアプリケーションを実現すること。そしてもう１つはこのプロジェクト自体にジョインしてベースを作っていくこと。私は、前者が多く参加し面白いアイデアがたくさん出てくることを期待しています。そして、あまりにこの環境がひどいと思ったら後者としてジョインして下さい。　私達はどんなことでもアウトプットすれば世界が変わると思っています。そして誰もが違うアウトプットをすることに価値があると思っています。私達は、皆が思い描いた何気ないアイデアが形となって出てくる世界を見たいと思っています。そして、その世界をあなたと一緒に作りたいと思っています。$1からでも私達のプロジェクトにジョインしてくれることを願っています。Anytime and anywhere, you can develop The PocketDuino is an Arduino-compatible development board with a micro-b USB connector. It can be attached to an Android device directly. No need for an extra battery. Anytime and anywhere, users can develop, test and get feedback.PocketDuinoはmicro-bUSBコネクタを備えたArduinoピン互換の開発ボードです。Androidに直接差し込んで使うことができます。追加電源は要りません。いつでもどこでも気軽に開発でき、その場で友人と楽しみ、時にはアプリに対するフィードバックを得ることができます。The PocketDuino Features

Arduino Pro Mini pin-compatible
Arduino Pro Mini ピン互換


Tiny size (1.2 by 1.2 inches)
小サイズ（3cm x 3cm）


No need for an extra battery (all you need is Android)
外部電池の必要なし（AndroidだけでOK）


Open-source software and hardware on GitHub
ソフトウェア・ハードウェアリソースはGitHub上でオープンソースで公開


Android Java library: "Physicaloid Library"
Android Java library Physicaloidライブラリ

The PocketDuino doesn't need a desktop PC to upload its firmware.PocketDuinoのファームウェアをアップロードするのにPCは要りません。
Developers who use the PocketDuino can upload Android applications to Google Play with its firmware.PocketDuinoを使ったアプリ開発者はそのファームウェアを内包した状態でアプリケーションをGoogle Playにアップロードできます。
Android Serial Monitor App (Google Play / GitHub) using Physicaloid Library
Androi シリアルモニタアプリ(Google Play / GitHub) Physicaloid Libraryを使用

Android Firmware Writer App (Google Play / GitHub) using Physicaloid Library
Android ファームウェア書込アプリ(Google Play / GitHub) Physicaloidライブラリを使用

Android Oscilloscope App (in development)
Androidオシロスコープアプリ（開発中）
Unfortunately, we cannot support iPhone/iPad because they lack micro-b USB connectors.micro-b USBコネクタの形状の違いがあるため、iPhone/iPadでは残念ながら使用できません。
Hardware Application ExamplesWe and PocketDuino beta users have made these applications:以下、私達およびPocketDuinoのβ版使用者の人が作ったアプリケーションです。

Alcohol sensor (created by us)

アルコールセンサ (Physicaloidチーム製作)

LED illumination (created by @kurousagi_tsu. Thank you!)
LEDイルミネーション(@kurousagi_tsuさん作成。Thank you!)

Infrared-beam receiver/transmitter (created by @tnoho. Thank you!)
IR送受信機(@tnohoさん作成。Thank you!)

Temperature, Humidity sensor and 3D printed case (created by @cattaka_net. Thank you!)
温度湿度センサと3Dプリンタ出力ケース(@cattaka_netさん作成。Thank you!)

PocketDuino + IR LED + iSobot (created by @catsin. Thank you!)
PocketDuino + IR LED + iSobot (@catsinさん作成。Thank you!)
Users can develop with devices such as:他にも以下のようなデバイスを組み合わせることができます。
LED(LED)
Motor(モーター)
Geiger counter(ガイガーカウンタ)
Range sensor(距離センサ)
Temperature sensor(温度センサ)
Humidity sensor(湿度センサ)
Gas sensor(ガスセンサ)
Flame sensor(火炎センサ)
Heart beat monitor(心拍センサ)

Fingerprint scanner(指紋センサ)

Software Development EnvironmentPocketDuino(Arduino)
 The PocketDuino allows developers to develop on Android/Windows/Mac/Linux by using the following tools :
Arduino IDE (for development on Win/Mac/Linux)
Arduino IDE (Win/Mac/Linux対応)


codebender (online Arduino IDE, for development on Android/Win/Mac/Linux)
codebender (オンラインArduino IDE Android/Win/Mac/Linux対応)


ArduinoDroid (Arduino IDE app, for development on Android)
ArduinoDroid (Arduino IDEアプリ、Android対応)

 The codebender(https://codebender.cc/) is an awesome online Arduino IDE. Compiled hex file downloaded from the codebender can be uploaded using PhysicaloidWriter (https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.physicaloid.app.writer). (Thanks to codebender's developer Christos for letting us download hex files!)codebenderはすばらしいオンラインArduino IDEです。 codebenderからhexファイルをダウンロードしてきて、PhysicaloidWriterでPocketDuinoへ書き込むことができます。(hexファイルをダウンロードできるようにしてくれたcodebender開発者Christosに感謝します) The ArduinoDroid is a cool Arduino IDE Android application. It can write and compile sketches and upload a firmware to PocketDuino. (Thanks to ArduinoDroid developer Anton for making the cool app!)ArduinoDroidはArduino IDEをAndroidアプリにしてしまったすごいアプリです。スケッチを書き、コンパイルし、PocketDuinoへアップロードすることができます。（このようなクールなアプリを作ってくれたAntonに感謝します）
Android Users can develop their own applications on Eclipse or Android Studio. There are simple APIs for communicating with Arduino.開発者はEclipseかAndroid Studio上で開発することができます。PocketDuinoと通信するためのシンプルなAPIが用意されています。 In the Physicaloid library, there are open, close, read, write and upload APIs. There are some tutorials for learning how to use them.例えば、Physicaloid Libraryにはopen/close/read/write/uploadのAPIがあります。そしてそれを使うためのチュートリアルを用意しています。https://github.com/ksksue/PhysicaloidLibrary And we are developing sensor libraries. It's easy to develop.そして今、容易に開発が進められるようセンサライブラリの開発を進めています。For example :例:AlcoholMeter am = new AlcoholMeter(this);if(am.init()) {    int alcoholPercent = am.getPercent();    ...}Tech Specs

Microcontroller
ATmega328


Operating Voltage
5V


Input Voltage
5V


Digital I/O Pins
14 (of which 6 provide PWM output)


Analog Input Pins
8


DC Current per I/O Pin
40 mA


Flash Memory
16 KB (of which 2 KB used by bootloader)


SRAM
1 KB


EEPROM
512 bytes


Clock Speed
16 MHz

Extra boards in development We are developing some extra boards for PocketDuino. Let me know your idea on the "comments" tab or info@physicaloid.com . 私達は今PocketDuinoの追加拡張ボードの開発をしています。もし他にもアイデアがあればコメントタブか info@physicaloid.com へメール下さい。IR receiver/transmitter boardIR 送受信ボードXBee translator boardXBee変換ボードThe PerksIR receiver/transmitter and XBee translator board is in development. We will update our progress.IR送受信、XBee変換ボードは開発中です。開発状況はupdateで報告していきます。支援方法日本語解説http://event.physicaloid.com/pduino/Schedule
Apr.-Jun. : Indiegogo campaign
17-18 May : Maker Faire Bay Area (We would like to meet you!)
Jun-Jul. : PCB manufacture and assembly
Jul. : QC and packaging
Aug. : Start to ship


4-6月 : Indiegogoキャンペーン期間
5月17-18 : MakerFaire Bay Areaへ出展（行っている方いればぜひお会いしたいです）
６−７月 : PCB製造・実装
7月 : 品質チェック、パッケージング
8月 : 出荷開始
Shipping The PocketDuino is shipped worldwide from Japan. We need US$5 to ship them. The parks includes the shipping cost. It takes about 2 weeks on outside of Japan.PocketDuinoは日本から世界中へ発送します。発送には一律$5必要です。Perksには発送コストは含まれています。日本国内であれば2, 3日で届くと思われます。The Team Keisuke Suzuki: Physicaloid project founder, hardware engineer and Android/iOS application developer.鈴木圭介 : Physicaloidプロジェクト創始者。ハードウェアエンジニア。Android/iOSアプリケーション開発者。Shun Osafune : Physicaloid project co-founder, FPGA hardware engineer. He is currently developing the second piece of hardware for the Physicaloid project.長船俊：Physicaloidプロジェクト共同創始者。FPGA、ハードウェアエンジニア。現在Physicaloidプロジェクト第２弾ハードウェアの開発中。Tomohiro God : Physicaloid project co-founder, web system developer, PHP engineer.後藤知宏：Physicaloidプロジェクト共同創始者。Webシステム開発者。PHPエンジニア。FAQ- Which devices is the PocketDuino supported on?- PocketDuinoはどのデバイスでサポートされていますか？ 1. Android version 3.1 or higher 1. Androidバージョン3.1以上 2. Android with USB Host feature (Some Android tablets or phones don't have the feature. This app allows you to check if you have it or not. https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=org.tauruslabs.usbhostcheck) 2. USB Host featureがONとなっているAndroid（一部Android端末ではこのfeatureがONとなっていない。このアプリを使えばONかどうかがわかります。 https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=org.tauruslabs.usbhostcheck） 3. Devices with micro-B, micro-A or host-A USB connector. 3. 端末にmicro-Bかmicro-Aかhost-A のUSBコネクタがあること- Can I use the PocketDuino on my desktop PC?- PC上でPocketDuino開発はできますか？ Yes, you need a conversion adapter to connect to host-A USB.(Including the connector to PocketDuino set is under consideration)できます。以下のコネクタを使えばできます。（同梱検討中です）- Is there PocketDuino available for iPhone/iPad?- iPhone/iPadには対応していますか？ Unfortunately, we cannot support iPhone/iPad because they lack micro-b USB connectors.micro-b USBコネクタの形状の違いがあるため、iPhone/iPadでは残念ながら使用できません。- 支援方法がわかりません日本語支援方法の解説ページを作りましたhttp://event.physicaloid.com/pduino/

story:
The DrinkSnap Story

Fact - Friends and Family move; get married, graduate college, finish the military 
Fact - We enjoy buying our friends and family members drinks
Fact - Now you don't have to be sitting next to them to do it.

DrinkSnap is a user friendly Mobile App and combination social website designed to do what has been going on for generations in Pubs, Bars and Restaurants and that is people buying each other drinks.  Now, with DrinkSnap, you don’t have to be sitting next to them to do it.  With the free  App and Website people can now send a friend or friends a drink anytime, from anywhere at participating locations.

Moving 1800 miles away from one of my best friends was tough.  We loved hanging out and it was always "I got this one".  After the move that feeling never left me.  I missed a lot.  His kids, my adopted nephews and niece, were getting married and he was becoming a grandpa and I was on the other side of the country.


So to celebrate the monumental occasions, of course, a toast was required but I wasn't there.  When they want out to celebrate, I tried to give my credit card number over the phone to a bartender/bar manager to purchase a beverage in celebration.  But, noooo - It was against their regulations was what I was told, and I respected that, but it was a Big bummer.  So I thought "there has to be a better way" and that's how DrinkSnap was evolved.  

The website is www.drinksnap.com.  You can go to the Google Play Store and search drinksnap (No spaces) to download.  Working on the Apple store App, and partially why we need a boost from the Indiegogo community - more below. 
 

Connect with friends, family and business associates across the city, state, country and hopefully real soon...across the pond as well.  When you can't be there or you are out of town, you can still buy a round.  Lose a bet with your bud - pay up by sending him a drink.  Holidays, birthdays, celebrations or if you just feel like it are all perfect ways to show you care.  


Everyone said this was an awesome idea, so we went for it and built the website and Android  App and now we are working on the App for the I phones and Windows phones as well and also working out a few bugs we found after the soft launch.   Then this happened ....   




Our money started running away from us.  DrinkSnap kept getting bigger and the platform kept taking longer and longer to build.  We have invested $30,000 cash into the project so far including thousands of man hours paid over the last 14 months in development to get us to this point. The platform works right now, but it needs to be better.  The Google App works right now, but it needs to be better and we need to build one for the Apple store.  You could buy someone a drink right now in Tucson by registering @ DrinkSnap.com and search for Putney's Sports Bar. Know anyone in Tucson?  Buy them a beverage today.

What We Need
  1. We need to raise capital to bring DrinkSnap to the masses and be made available to every bar, restaurant and neighborhood pub that wants more people in their seats.  
  2. We need help from family, friends and the entire Indiegogo community and their family and friends to spread the word about DrinkSnap. 
  3. We need anyone that knows an investor that may want to take a look at DrinkSnap and see the potential we see.

Our Goal is $50,000.  If we do not reach that goal, all perks will still be fulfilled.  We do not have to hit the goal in order for your donation to be excepted.  But we know sometimes things get bigger than expected so if we do go higher and it would help, here is what to expect. 

  • $50,000 - At this level, which is what we requested, will make us full App compatible for all phones, upgrades to the platform that need to be done, which includes applying credits to user accounts, further development as we grow into your city.  This has been 6 years in the works and we have a lot planned, but we had to put some on hold.  This will also provide us with enough marketing material for hundreds of new locations.

  • $75,000 - the extra money, already allowing for the items above, would allow us to start our advertising and marketing plan to get us into more locations in more cities across the country sooner. The generosity would be overwhelming. More staff would be hired to start the National Campaign which means more computers and phones and bigger office space.
  • $100,000  - If it happens and everyone wants to be a part of this   incredible launch, then we are ready to come see you - Our van, wrapped with DrinkSnap colors and our teams will be able to start our National Marketing Tour to football cities throughout the country, handing out tickets as we go and ending up at the biggest game of all, the Superbowl where we will have a DrinkSnap party.   

As far as the perks, we had to think out of the box.  The beginning levels have hats, t-shirts and mugs.  When you get into the higher levels, you will start to see advertising opportunities, golf outings, launch parties, one week vacations and Barter Bucks.  The vacation stays are at dozens of locations and many choices of weeks throughout the year.  Choose from Hawaii, California, New York, Florida, Cape Cod, Utah, Tennessee and more.   There are a few international destinations as well.


We are also part of a barter group called Value Card Alliance which allows us to accumulate Barter Bucks that can be used on anything from sports tickets, automotive care, salon, spa, furniture, vacations,  hunting trips, canoe trips etc etc. There is a whole bunch to choose from and more and more everyday  - check out ValueCardAlliance.com and over 36,000 businesses. The barter bucks are dollar for dollar.  If you are at a perk level that offers Barter Bucks, we will work together to get you exactly what you want.



The Impact - ATTN: MERCHANTS

DrinkSnap is not just for consumers because we know that it can be very useful in promoting the bars and restaurants who are in the DrinkSnap family.  Merchants can us it to put people in their seats on slow nights.  Bartenders and servers can use it to get more guests and build their tips.  Grand Openings can be packed with DrinkSnap consumers and help launch the new location. It's a win, win, win, win!

We need your help to spread the word.  DrinkSnap is fun and in the now and we need to bring it to the masses.  If you can't participate in the perks, please tell your friends and pass the word along to your local neighborhood bars, restaurants and clubs and let them know you want DrinkSnap so your friends and family can buy you a drink.


LET'S GET THIS PARTY STARTED!

story:
Hi, I am Paul Fisher and I have spent over 20 years discovering and creating some of the worlds most famous models. I am creating a mobile application that will supply all future models and supermodels and their parents with the right tools needed no matter what market they are in at any given time along with important information that will assist you in navigating through the modeling world.

Models and parents, you will be able to find Modeling agencies, testing photographers, hair and make up people and stylists in your local market and in each major market around the world. You will also be able to send your photos directly to me and my team for review. You might have what we are looking for! You can also request to have your photos sent to top modeling agencies in every major market. Not all new faces are approved to be sent to our worldwide modeling agency list.

The app will have a section on health and wellness for Models - This section of the APP  will cover topics such as, nutritional programs for models, physical training programs that work, Skin specialists, Modeling and Spirituality (translation, giving back programs for models), Body image, important foundations that models are a part of, Giving back programs, Knowledge is power....

We will have contests that you can participate in through the app. Some of the prizes will include walk-on roles on my hit TV series & photo shoots with top photographers. There will be push notifications sent to you through the app with all kinds of fashion updates and events. We will include a calendar of events that tells you where we will be so that you can come down and audition as well as any fashion events. When you contribute to the financing of this app you can receive perks based on the amount you contribute. Some of the amazing perks are one-on-one Skype sessions with me, walk on rolls on my television show "I Can Make You a Supermodel", photo-shoots with a top photographer and much much more. Be a part of the star creating process!

Take advantage of this while you can and maybe you will be discovered and become the next star of my TV series! The app will also include photo galleries of our past winners, our present prospects, and future hopefuls which could be you!  Stars will be discovered on the International Modeling Resource Guide App - It's what i do! I create stars! Be a part of the star creation process! Be a part the International Modeling Resource Guide App!

events. When you contribute to the financing of this app you can receive

 one-on-one Skype sessions with me, walk on rolls on my television show "I Can Make You a Supermodel", photo-shoots with a top photographer and much much more. Be a part of the star creating process! 
Take advantage of this while you can and maybe you will be 
discovered and become the next star of my TV series! The app will also 
include photo galleries of our past winners, our present prospects, and 
future hopefuls which could be you!  Stars will be discovered on the International Modeling Resource Guide App
 - It's what i do! I create stars! Be a part of the star creation 
process! Be a part the International Modeling Resource Guide App!

story:
Greetings, Fellow Robot Futurists!

Currently I am working on some interesting robot ideas, and would like to develop them further.

The two ideas are the Automatic Food Slicer Robot (AFSR) and a moonshot-in-progress project that is all about motors. You can read more details, below.

This campaign is to raise the funds for parts and fabrication costs so we can build an improved version of AFSR, and also experiment with our moonshot-in-progress idea.

AFSR was accepted to be shown in the Innovation Showcase at Maker Con (before Maker Faire NY), so funds from the campaign will also be going towards some travel costs.


Automatic Food Slicer Robot

The Automatic Food Slicer is an accessibility robot, bringing confidence and safety to those who have difficulties cutting food.

Overview video:


See it in action:


Right now AFSR uses a rack & pinion & gear set to move up and down (Z-axis). Two drive motors to push/pull the entire robot (X-axis). The end effector is easily removable for cleaning. There is a servo that can tilt the knife.



It’s controlled with an Arduino Mega. There’s a nRF8001 breakout board for connecting via BLE to the iPad app I developed. The gesture controller is a breakout board called Hover. You can read about the development of the robot here.



Although the motors are quite weak and the structure not very rigid, AFSR was able to slice through playdoh.



Goal

We were thinking that it would be great to have the goal of the robot being used to slice food for people. What better timing than the holidays... so the deadline is set for improving the robot!


Moonshot-in-Progress

What if we could make all of the inanimate objects around us come to life by applying “motor tape” and making them actuate?

Overview video:


We were inspired by the moonshot thinking from the Solve For X program.


Huge problem

The aging population and their decrease in motor abilities.


Radical solution

Adding actuators to everything, all the objects around us could be manipulated. They would even be able to sense and automatically move based on previous patterns.


Breakthrough technology

We want to make something like an LED but for motors. Something that can be added to a circuit board easily. When they are placed in a certain pattern, then some type of movement will occur. Adding these components to flexible material like Pyralux could make the motor tape idea happen.

Currently, we have three ideas for the tech. Piezo speakers, inductors, and the magnetic micro-robots. For an overview, see the above video.

This is the aspect that we are working on now. We want to experiment with the little piezo components, but just need some help with the parts cost and board fabrication. It should be a lot of fun.


Outreach

To get people interested in these robot ideas, or just robots in general, there will be themed hangouts. Everyone will be able to watch the hangouts, but only those with a ticket will be invited to join. Don’t worry, we will still be doing the Robot Party hangout too! 


Build-a-thon
I will be working on one of the robots, and you can be working on your robots too! Feel free to ask questions. We can discuss what is and is not working. This would be like a virtual hackerspace type of hangout.

Tele-op
We will attach a Google+ Hangout extension that will allow anyone in the hangout to control the robots. You can be one of the first people ever to slice food remotely!

Future Robots Discussion
Recently on the Robot Party we had the discussion of whether the future would be one main robot per household that could do many tasks, or a distributed network of robots that could only do one task. We will be discussing this during the hangout and possibly other subjects as well.


The number of the hangouts will depend on the number of tickets sold, since 10 people can be in one hangout at a time.


Rewards


Hangout Ticket

See the above ‘outreach’ section for all the details. We will send out a survey that will allow you to input what hangout you pick and what your Google+ is so we can add you to our circles.


Robot Signature

Some ink on paper, perhaps artistic, as drawn by AFSR. We will also add inspirational words to it, just in case the signature isn’t exciting enough. It will be sent in an envelope.


Robot Friends

Tokens picturing robots we have created! This one is special, because we are friends with robots and they will be friends with us. It will be sent in a small envelope package.


“ART”

Sometimes our 3D printer does not print a piece properly- it warps, the extruder stops running, and more. Alternatively, sometimes we just messed up and designed a piece wrong. We will send you some of our 3D print fails. It will either be sent in an envelope package or a tiny box. Own a piece of EPIC FAIL history and put it on your wall! xD



Rack & Pinion Kit

This is a general version of the Z-axis in AFSR. This is great if you want to add some sort of linear movement to your robot. The size is ~ 10cm wide x 10cm tall x 4cm deep. It will come with all of the 3D printed pieces, mechanical screws, rivets, nuts, 4 end-stop buttons, and the motor. 

We will be looking in to the best motor driver for the motor as well, and include a breakout board with it. You will have to bring your own Arduino, and we will have example code ready for you to get started with. Also, make sure you have some wire (22 AWG, solid or stranded) for attaching to the motors and buttons.

Please note: Shipping for this kit is separate- you will have to pay for it via Paypal when we will be ready to ship them out. This is because we will have a more accurate pricing understanding when the box is packed. It will probably range between $10-$25 CAD -- thanks for understanding!


Dream Sponsor and Moonshot Sponsor

This is a real boost to help us. Each video that we make, there will be a slide at the end that will say thanks to the backers, and your name will be there too (unless you do not want it to be). We will also add your initials to one of the pieces on the updated AFSR robot. Thanks for supporting crazy robots in progress!


Parts

Some of the parts we are looking for are stepper motors, steel rods, surface mount piezo speakers (really tiny ones), surface mount inductors, and the list continues on. We’re experimenting.

If you happen to have any of these parts, or if you have any parts that you think might be interesting for learning more (like solenoids, that would be cool) -- and they are looking for a new home, leave a comment and we can correspond if they would be useful! Stuff like this helps! :D


About & History

Hi there, my nickname online is RobotGrrl, and I have a passion for creating robots. Working on programming, electronics, and the mechanical design can be quite challenging at times. But it is extremely fun, as well as sharing the knowledge and enthusiasm with others! Check out my website for other robots that I’ve built.



I’m excited for a future where more things that surround us will be robots. They will be able to sense and actuate, and detect our patterns for determining when and where they will move.


If you are getting started in robotics, you might be interested in my RoboBrrd kit -- which was funded successfully here on Indiegogo a few years ago.


---


Now that you have reached the end of this page, maybe you think we are crazy, but your support is much appreciated and will help us experiment with our robot ideas!

Thanks for checking out our Indiegogo campaign!

story:
SHOP ON WWW.LINEDOCK.CO



We stand for USB-C. Amazed by its power of integration, we spent the last 12 months pushing it to the limits. We brought our expertise and passion for design to create a unique device offering power, space and unity. 

 

The line-u cable is the world's first dual USB Type-C connector designed for maximum speed data transfer. Made out of flexible rigid polymer, its unique and U-shaped design allows for easy and stable connection between your linedock and laptop. Light indicators located on both sides of the cable indicate the level of charge of the connected USB-C device, displaying an orange light when charging is in process or a green light once the device is fully charged. A game changing accessory for all USB Type-C laptops.

 

The linedock stands for a new generation of hardware. Leveraging on the unprecedented benefits of USB Type-C technology, it is the very first 100W power device able to charge at full speed any next generation laptop. linedock also packs storage, connectivity and the very first engineered active cooling system. We developed several cutting-edge technologies to bring you the most powerful device in a 9 mm shell.

​

Each laptop requires a certain amount of power in order to be charged adequately.

Yet most USB-C power banks do not provide sufficient output, leading to incompatibility issues (no charging/slow charging) which in turn can significantly damage your laptop battery.

linedock is the only power bank on the market capable of charging any USB-C powered laptop at the fastest speed.  

linedock is endowed with the very first engineered adaptive power management system able to supply up to 100W of charge. Our intelligent detection device adapts linedock power supply according to your device need. As such, it is the first USB-C device able to charge a laptop as fast as a wall socket.

With up to 1TB of internal storage, the embedded Flash SSD is 5X faster than a regular hard drive. linedock comes in 3 storage combinations: 0GB, 256GB and 1TB. 

Built-in SSD meets SATA III 6Gb/s specifications, providing exceptional transfer speeds of up to 245MB/s read and 230MB/s write. Ideal for everyday computing tasks as well as intensive multimedia applications.

       
linedock SSD now allows you to boot Windows & Linux from your Mac OS system. Install the system on your linedock to save storage on your laptop and the Ultra fast SSD ensures a fast operating environment for multi-task requirements.


linedock lets your effortlessly connect all your legacy devices through one of the many ports it integrates. Reach out to the outside world anytime, anywhere.

 

linedock comes with the following ports:

The SD card reader allows for fast download/upload.
Ideal for photographer, videographer and drone enthusiasts. 

 

linedock's smart battery management system will charge your laptop whether it is On, Off, or in Sleep mode.  With at least a 20,000 mAh battery, linedock provides up to 15 additional hours of autonomy to any USB-C laptop. 

Leave your charger at home and forget about power outlets for two days.

 

 

The use of high speed processors in modern laptops and other electronic devices leads to higher rates of heat generation that need to be dissipated efficiently. Our patented technology actively detects, monitors and reduces laptops temperature during intensive tasks for increased CPU performance. Rather than simply blowing air at the laptop like traditional external cooling pads, linedock's patented technology generates real cold: down to 10°C on the top surface. The cooling mechanism actively sucks heat from the bottom of the laptop, allowing it to perform better, when it matters. *This feature is only available on the linedock 15".* 

 

Used as a dock, linedock is meant to be placed under your USB-C laptop.
4 neodymium magnets embedded inside linedock helps you easily positioning your laptop on top of it. Start enjoying a clean and tidy workspace now.

 

linedock is endowed with USB 3.0 ports that can switch automatically to Qualcomm Quick Charge 3.0 when connected to a device that is Quick Charge compatible. Built for mobility, linedock's massive battery will let you charge your daily devices safely with no fear of running out of battery. 

In just 9mm, Line Dock replaces about 8+ of your daily devices.

 

 

 

linedock is available in 2 sizes: 13 and 15 inches; Those sizes were designed after the MacBook and MacBook Pro's dimensions but are also compatible with regular USB-C laptops.

linedock was thought from the ground up with one philosophy: combining fineness, portability and durability.

linedock is made out of 7075 aluminum alloy, the most solid and durable aluminum. Each case is carefully CNCed, shotpeened and anodized to provide a beautiful, tough and scratch-free finish identical to Apple products.  9 mm of aluminum greatness. 


linesleeve is a premium sleeve to carry and protect both your laptop and linedock. Designed by AK Studio, it comes in 13” and 15” to fit a laptop/tablet + linedock and include a full cushioned protection with neoprene.

Alexandra Kengen is an independent Belgian designer crafting day-to-day top-notch accessories. She founded AK Studio after working as stylist for fashion designer Alexander McQueen and Jean-Paul Knott.

Number of ports: 8 + SD Card reader
Storage: Up to 1TB M.2 SSD
Maximum Cooling power: Down to 51.4°F/10.7°C in room at 69.8°F/21°C
Measurements:
linedock is available in 3 sizes: 12, 13 and 15 inches. Sizes are as follow:
12 inch: 7.74 inches (19.65 cm) x 11.04 inches (28.05 cm) x 0.35 inches (0.9 cm)
13 inch: 8.36 inches (21.24 cm) x 11.97 inches (30.41 cm) x 0.35 inches (0.9 cm)
15 inch: 9.48 inches (24.07 cm) x 13.75 inches (34.93 cm) x 0.35 inches (0.9 cm)

Material: 7075 aluminum alloy
Weight: 900g/1.9lbs
Battery nominal capacity: 20,000mAh / 71.61Wh 
Number of Battery Cells: 4 (+1 for the battery upgrade)
Total Output Power: 100W pass-through charging

Power Delivery: Full Power Delivery 2.0
Charging Capabilities: 5V, 9V, 15V and 20V
Output Voltage: 5V 3A / 9V 3A / 15V 3A / 20V 3A (5A Pass-Through Charging)
Input Power: 10W to 100W via USB Type-C

Charging Time via USB Type-C: 2h or USB 3.0 Qualcomm QC3: 15h

 

Based on the feedback we've received from our dear backers community, we decided to implement 4K resolution for an optimal display experience. Together with the 100W upgrade, we updated the shipping schedule accordingly: May-June 2018.

 

linedock is already shipping to backers at the moment. However, we admit that we have been experiencing significant delays on the initial shipping schedule due to tougher certification processes for our custom battery cells and connector adjustments for easier assembly and dismantling.

Since May 2018, we've been shipping the linedock 13" to our backers. We are now transitioning over to the production of the linedock 12" and 15". More updates will be published in the updates section once exact shipping schedule has been confirmed. Thank you for your understanding.

What is the Warranty? 
linedock offers standard one year international warranty. We guarantee you receive your Line Dock free of manufacturing defects. We will try to cover part of shipping where appropriate, but there will likely be a shipping cost from your end as well.

Does linedock ship to my country? How much will shipping cost?
We are currently shipping to the following countries at the following shipping cost: USA (Free), Canada ($25), UK ($33), EU ($33), Australia ($33), Singapore ($25), Japan ($25), Taiwan ($25), Hong Kong ($25), Malaysia ($25), South Korea ($25), Thailand ($25), Rest of World ($53).

To view the availability and shipping cost, please select your perk and enter your country. If you do not find your country in the selection, please contact us at hi@linedock.co and we’ll be happy to assist you.

How will my order be shipped?
We will be shipping with FedEx International courier and equivalent solutions depending on the countries. Each shipment will receive a tracking number which will be emailed to you once the delivery has been shipped from our warehouses.

Are there any taxes associated to my order?
Orders shipped outside of the USA may be subject to import taxes, customs duties and fees according to the country of destination. Such import taxes, customs duties and fees can vary from one country to another. Additional charges for customs clearance must be fulfilled by the recipient upon reception. linedock team has no control nor responsibility over these charges.

What is your refund policy?
linedock team complies with Indiegogo refund policy. For refunds that are not eligible and according to on Indiegogo policy guidelines, they are processed based on the team's internal guidelines and off platform. Please bear in mind that all refunds will be locked at some point in order to go into production and shipment. We will not be able to refund any order once they've shipped.

When is linedock expected to ship?
linedock is expected to start shipping in May-June 2018. You will receive a tracking number to tell you exactly when you should expect your linedock to be delivered at your place 7 days prior to delivery.
 

Why should I wait longer than usual?
Indiegogo is not a pre-ordering platform. Instead, you're helping building a device and bringing it to life, which may take more time than products already available on the market :-)


Which linedock should I get?
linedock comes in 3 models. Each model offers the same battery capacity (except for the 15" that can be upgraded to a 25,000mAh battery) and ports. Internal storage options are broken down as follows:

- Basic (no internal storage)
- Standard (256 GB)
- Executive (1TB).

The model you choose will vary depending on your storage needs. If you are a professional and/or used to store large amounts of data, you might opt for the Standard or Executive version. 

Does linedock exist in different sizes?
Yes, here are the sizes we currently offer:
13inch: 8.36 inches (21.24 cm) x 11.97 inches (30.41 cm) x 0.35 inches (0.9 cm)
15inch: 9.48 inches (24.07 cm) x 13.75 inches (34.93 cm) x 0.35 inches (0.9 cm)

Can I use linedock on a regular USB-C laptop?
Yes. linedock has USB-C ports located on each side. We offer two sizes benchmarked on MacBooks 13" and 15". 

Can I use linedock on a regular laptop?
For non USB-C laptops, linedock offers USB 3.0 Qualcomm QuickCharge 3 giving access to all features except laptop charging as a regular laptop cannot be charged over USB-C.

What do I get when connecting a regular laptop through USB 3.0?
When connected via USB 3.0 Qualcomm QC 3, you get access to the SSD, the cooling system and all the ports except for the Mini DisplayPort.

Does linedock exist in different colors?
Yes. We currently offer 3 colors: Black 99% (Matte Black), Space Gray, and Silver. 

Why would I buy linedock over any other USB-C dongle?
linedock is the first device integrating any of your electronic accessory to fully enjoy your USB-C laptops and mobile devices. Instead of purchasing solutions limited to few functionalities and often chunky and expensive, linedock integrates all of what you need and is designed to be compact and to fit inside your everyday bag.

Am I required to use the provided USB Type-C cable or can I use a third-party cable?
For safety purposes, we recommend that you use the USB Type-C cable that was provided with your linedock. Third-party cables should work, but you may expect variances in power output which can lead to power-related issues and degrade both your laptop and Line Dock device. If you would like to purchase another cable, we invite you to visit http://www.usb.org/kcompliance/viewto see if your USB cable received a USB-IF certification.

How does Qualcomm Quick Charge 3.0 work?
With Qualcomm Quick Charge 3.0 via USB 3.0, your device battery can charge from 0% to 50% in 30 minutes or less (may vary depending on charging equipment and power source). After surpassing 50% charge, the charging speed slows down slightly to prevent over-stressing the battery.

Can I charge my device even if my device is not Quick Charge 3.0 enabled?
Yes. It will charge at regular USB 3.0 speed.

Will the cooling system damage my laptop battery? Or linedock battery?
We have designed our own patented cooling system enabling linedock not to overheat beyond normal operating parameters. linedock also comes with a safety auto shut-off feature to protect both your devices and linedock from overheating. linedock cooling technology will not damage the computer as it will only get down to minimum 10°C/50°F. linedock, as well as the any laptop, smartphone and tablet use Lithium-Ion Polymer batteries. The minimum temperature of use is 0°C/32°F. Hence our cooling will not do any damage. 

How can I know if my Line Dock is charged?
The LED indicators on the side will indicate you how full the battery is. When charging linedock, charging will automatically stop once the battery is full.

How do I switch on/off the cooling pad?
linedock is endowed with a single button to turn Cooling pad Off, On or on Auto mode. On and Auto mode will only work when the Line Dock is connected to a power outlet.

What is the battery life of the linedock?
linedock comes with a battery management system that actively manages the health and life cycle of the Lithium-ion polymer (lipo) 6065100 cells. Under ideal circumstances, if used every day the battery will last about two years. We are currently developing a power user loyalty program that allow backers to send us their units once their battery life cycle is depleted in exchange for new linedock versions at discounted prices. Please signup on our website for latest updates.

Can I take the plane with linedock?
Yes. FAA limits battery capacity to 27,000mAh. As Line Dock capacity is 20,000mAh/ 74 Wh Max (Output 60W), you can keep it in your carry-on luggage. The battery upgrade available for the 15" version get the capacity of Line Dock up to 25,000mAh/ 92,500 Wh, which is still under the FAA limitations. linedock is safe for flying.

Can I connect more than one computer at once?
No. You can only connect one computer at a time. If a second USB-C laptop is connected to linedock, it will benefit from the battery (e.g. charging) but will not have access to the Hub, the SSD or any other port. 

Can I connect one external screen via Mini DisplayPort and another one via HDMI at the same time?
No. You can only extend one screen at a time, either through Mini DisplayPort, HDMI or USB-C.

Can I connect an external screen via USB-C? 
Yes, and it’ll be powered via that USB-C port.

How many devices can I charge at once?
You can charge at least 4 devices at once. You might connect more devices they will then most likely charge slower. This will not damage the battery but take longer to charge and drain linedock battery faster.

How can I charge linedock battery?
You can charge it either via USB-C using any USB-C certified charger. Note that laptop chargers are the best for that matter as they deliver more power. You can also charge linedock with any USB charger via the USB 3.0 Qualcomm QC 3 port.

Does linedock supports Thunderbolt 3?
linedock is fully compatible with Thunderbolt 3 but currently supports USB3.1 Gen 1.

Do magnets have an effect on linedock components or on my laptop?
No. linedock is equipped with 4 neodymium magnets that have been perfectly calibrated and shielded to avoid any electronic damage or trouble on both linedock and the laptop.

Do magnets affect the internal storage?
No, SSDs (Solid State Drives) are not sensitive to magnets.

Is linedock compatible with Windows/Linux/Chrome OS?
Yes, linedock is compatible with any USB-C laptop, regardless of the operating system. 

Is my laptop compatible with linedock?
Any laptop offering at least one USB-C port and that can be charged through this port is fully compatible with linedock. If your laptop cannot be charged through USB-C or does not offer such a port, you can connect it through USB 3.0 and still benefit from the internal storage, ports and active cooling. 

Can I connect a linedock to another linedock and then to my laptop?
Yes, you can connect up to two linedock together with no data speed loss. You then get access to twice the battery and twice the storage of one regular linedock.

How does linedock stick to my computer?
linedock is designed to be placed under a USB-C laptop. 4 neodymium magnets embedded inside linedock helps easily positioning the laptop on top of it and avoiding it to slide down. Those magnets are oriented towards magnetic points of USB-C MacBooks. Each linedock box will also include additional magnetic stickers, should you want to keep your linedock and laptop attached firmly e.g. when using a laptop stand. This also in order to adapt and make it stick to regular laptops.

Questions? Do not hesitate to contact the team at hi@linedock.co or shoot us a message via the "Contact the team" at the top of the page :)
