We brought our expertise and passion for design to create a unique device offering power, space and unity.  The line-u cable is the world's first dual USB Type-C connector designed for maximum speed data transfer. Made out of flexible rigid polymer, its unique and U-shaped design allows for easy and stable connection between your linedock and laptop. Light indicators located on both sides of the cable indicate the level of charge of the connected USB-C device, displaying an orange light when charging is in process or a green light once the device is fully charged. A game changing accessory for all USB Type-C laptops.

 
The linedock stands for a new generation of hardware. Leveraging on the unprecedented benefits of USB Type-C technology, it is the very first 100W power device able to charge at full speed any next generation laptop. linedock also packs storage, connectivity and the very first engineered active cooling system. We developed several cutting-edge technologies to bring you the most powerful device in a 9 mm shell.

 ​
Each laptop requires a certain amount of power in order to be charged adequately.

Yet most USB-C power banks do not provide sufficient output, leading to incompatibility issues (no charging/slow charging) which in turn can significantly damage your laptop battery.

linedock is the only power bank on the market capable of charging any USB-C powered laptop at the fastest speed.  




linedock is endowed with the very first engineered adaptive power management system able to supply up to 100W of charge. Our intelligent detection device adapts linedock power supply according to your device need. As such, it is the first USB-C device able to charge a laptop as fast as a wall socket.


With up to 1TB of internal storage, the embedded Flash SSD is 5X faster than a regular hard drive. linedock comes in 3 storage combinations: 0GB, 256GB and 1TB. 

Built-in SSD meets SATA III 6Gb/s specifications, providing exceptional transfer speeds of up to 245MB/s read and 230MB/s write. Ideal for everyday computing tasks as well as intensive multimedia applications.


       

linedock SSD now allows you to boot Windows & Linux from your Mac OS system. Install the system on your linedock to save storage on your laptop and the Ultra fast SSD ensures a fast operating environment for multi-task requirements.
linedock lets your effortlessly connect all your legacy devices through one of the many ports it integrates. Reach out to the outside world anytime, anywhere.


 
linedock comes with the following ports:

The SD card reader allows for fast download/upload.Ideal for photographer, videographer and drone enthusiasts. 







 

linedock's smart battery management system will charge your laptop whether it is On, Off, or in Sleep mode.  With at least a 20,000 mAh battery, linedock provides up to 15 additional hours of autonomy to any USB-C laptop. 
Leave your charger at home and forget about power outlets for two days.

 
 


The use of high speed processors in modern laptops and other electronic devices leads to higher rates of heat generation that need to be dissipated efficiently. Our patented technology actively detects, monitors and reduces laptops temperature during intensive tasks for increased CPU performance. Rather than simply blowing air at the laptop like traditional external cooling pads, linedock's patented technology generates real cold: down to 10°C on the top surface. The cooling mechanism actively sucks heat from the bottom of the laptop, allowing it to perform better, when it matters. *This feature is only available on the linedock 15".* 

 

Used as a dock, linedock is meant to be placed under your USB-C laptop.4 neodymium magnets embedded inside linedock helps you easily positioning your laptop on top of it. Start enjoying a clean and tidy workspace now.

 


linedock is endowed with USB 3.0 ports that can switch automatically to Qualcomm Quick Charge 3.0 when connected to a device that is Quick Charge compatible. Built for mobility, linedock's massive battery will let you charge your daily devices safely with no fear of running out of battery. 



In just 9mm, Line Dock replaces about 8+ of your daily devices.   linedock is available in 2 sizes: 13 and 15 inches; Those sizes were designed after the MacBook and MacBook Pro's dimensions but are also compatible with regular USB-C laptops.linedock was thought from the ground up with one philosophy: combining fineness, portability and durability.linedock is made out of 7075 aluminum alloy, the most solid and durable aluminum. Each case is carefully CNCed, shotpeened and anodized to provide a beautiful, tough and scratch-free finish identical to Apple products.  9 mm of aluminum greatness. linesleeve is a premium sleeve to carry and protect both your laptop and linedock. Designed by AK Studio, it comes in 13” and 15” to fit a laptop/tablet + linedock and include a full cushioned protection with neoprene.Alexandra Kengen is an independent Belgian designer crafting day-to-day top-notch accessories. She founded AK Studio after working as stylist for fashion designer Alexander McQueen and Jean-Paul Knott.Number of ports: 8 + SD Card readerStorage: Up to 1TB M.2 SSDMaximum Cooling power: Down to 51.4°F/10.7°C in room at 69.8°F/21°CMeasurements:linedock is available in 3 sizes: 12, 13 and 15 inches. Sizes are as follow:12 inch: 7.74 inches (19.65 cm) x 11.04 inches (28.05 cm) x 0.35 inches (0.9 cm)13 inch: 8.36 inches (21.24 cm) x 11.97 inches (30.41 cm) x 0.35 inches (0.9 cm)15 inch: 9.48 inches (24.07 cm) x 13.75 inches (34.93 cm) x 0.35 inches (0.9 cm)Material: 7075 aluminum alloyWeight: 900g/1.9lbsBattery nominal capacity: 20,000mAh / 71.61Wh Number of Battery Cells: 4 (+1 for the battery upgrade)Total Output Power: 100W pass-through chargingPower Delivery: Full Power Delivery 2.0Charging Capabilities: 5V, 9V, 15V and 20VOutput Voltage: 5V 3A / 9V 3A / 15V 3A / 20V 3A (5A Pass-Through Charging)Input Power: 10W to 100W via USB Type-CCharging Time via USB Type-C: 2h or USB 3.0 Qualcomm QC3: 15h Based on the feedback we've received from our dear backers community, we decided to implement 4K resolution for an optimal display experience. Together with the 100W upgrade, we updated the shipping schedule accordingly: May-June 2018. linedock is already shipping to backers at the moment. However, we admit that we have been experiencing significant delays on the initial shipping schedule due to tougher certification processes for our custom battery cells and connector adjustments for easier assembly and dismantling.Since May 2018, we've been shipping the linedock 13" to our backers. We are now transitioning over to the production of the linedock 12" and 15". More updates will be published in the updates section once exact shipping schedule has been confirmed. Thank you for your understanding.What is the Warranty? linedock offers standard one year international warranty. We guarantee you receive your Line Dock free of manufacturing defects. We will try to cover part of shipping where appropriate, but there will likely be a shipping cost from your end as well.Does linedock ship to my country? How much will shipping cost?We are currently shipping to the following countries at the following shipping cost: USA (Free), Canada ($25), UK ($33), EU ($33), Australia ($33), Singapore ($25), Japan ($25), Taiwan ($25), Hong Kong ($25), Malaysia ($25), South Korea ($25), Thailand ($25), Rest of World ($53).To view the availability and shipping cost, please select your perk and enter your country. If you do not find your country in the selection, please contact us at hi@linedock.co and we’ll be happy to assist you.How will my order be shipped?We will be shipping with FedEx International courier and equivalent solutions depending on the countries. Each shipment will receive a tracking number which will be emailed to you once the delivery has been shipped from our warehouses.Are there any taxes associated to my order?Orders shipped outside of the USA may be subject to import taxes, customs duties and fees according to the country of destination. Such import taxes, customs duties and fees can vary from one country to another. Additional charges for customs clearance must be fulfilled by the recipient upon reception. linedock team has no control nor responsibility over these charges.What is your refund policy?linedock team complies with Indiegogo refund policy. For refunds that are not eligible and according to on Indiegogo policy guidelines, they are processed based on the team's internal guidelines and off platform. Please bear in mind that all refunds will be locked at some point in order to go into production and shipment. We will not be able to refund any order once they've shipped.When is linedock expected to ship?linedock is expected to start shipping in May-June 2018. You will receive a tracking number to tell you exactly when you should expect your linedock to be delivered at your place 7 days prior to delivery. Why should I wait longer than usual?Indiegogo is not a pre-ordering platform. Instead, you're helping building a device and bringing it to life, which may take more time than products already available on the market :-)Which linedock should I get?linedock comes in 3 models. Each model offers the same battery capacity (except for the 15" that can be upgraded to a 25,000mAh battery) and ports. Internal storage options are broken down as follows:- Basic (no internal storage)- Standard (256 GB)- Executive (1TB).The model you choose will vary depending on your storage needs. If you are a professional and/or used to store large amounts of data, you might opt for the Standard or Executive version. Does linedock exist in different sizes?Yes, here are the sizes we currently offer:13inch: 8.36 inches (21.24 cm) x 11.97 inches (30.41 cm) x 0.35 inches (0.9 cm)15inch: 9.48 inches (24.07 cm) x 13.75 inches (34.93 cm) x 0.35 inches (0.9 cm)Can I use linedock on a regular USB-C laptop?Yes. linedock has USB-C ports located on each side. We offer two sizes benchmarked on MacBooks 13" and 15". Can I use linedock on a regular laptop?For non USB-C laptops, linedock offers USB 3.0 Qualcomm QuickCharge 3 giving access to all features except laptop charging as a regular laptop cannot be charged over USB-C.What do I get when connecting a regular laptop through USB 3.0?When connected via USB 3.0 Qualcomm QC 3, you get access to the SSD, the cooling system and all the ports except for the Mini DisplayPort.Does linedock exist in different colors?Yes. We currently offer 3 colors: Black 99% (Matte Black), Space Gray, and Silver. Why would I buy linedock over any other USB-C dongle?linedock is the first device integrating any of your electronic accessory to fully enjoy your USB-C laptops and mobile devices. Instead of purchasing solutions limited to few functionalities and often chunky and expensive, linedock integrates all of what you need and is designed to be compact and to fit inside your everyday bag.Am I required to use the provided USB Type-C cable or can I use a third-party cable?For safety purposes, we recommend that you use the USB Type-C cable that was provided with your linedock. Third-party cables should work, but you may expect variances in power output which can lead to power-related issues and degrade both your laptop and Line Dock device. If you would like to purchase another cable, we invite you to visit http://www.usb.org/kcompliance/viewto see if your USB cable received a USB-IF certification.How does Qualcomm Quick Charge 3.0 work?With Qualcomm Quick Charge 3.0 via USB 3.0, your device battery can charge from 0% to 50% in 30 minutes or less (may vary depending on charging equipment and power source). After surpassing 50% charge, the charging speed slows down slightly to prevent over-stressing the battery.Can I charge my device even if my device is not Quick Charge 3.0 enabled?Yes. It will charge at regular USB 3.0 speed.Will the cooling system damage my laptop battery? Or linedock battery?We have designed our own patented cooling system enabling linedock not to overheat beyond normal operating parameters. linedock also comes with a safety auto shut-off feature to protect both your devices and linedock from overheating. linedock cooling technology will not damage the computer as it will only get down to minimum 10°C/50°F. linedock, as well as the any laptop, smartphone and tablet use Lithium-Ion Polymer batteries. The minimum temperature of use is 0°C/32°F. Hence our cooling will not do any damage. How can I know if my Line Dock is charged?The LED indicators on the side will indicate you how full the battery is. When charging linedock, charging will automatically stop once the battery is full.How do I switch on/off the cooling pad?linedock is endowed with a single button to turn Cooling pad Off, On or on Auto mode. On and Auto mode will only work when the Line Dock is connected to a power outlet.What is the battery life of the linedock?linedock comes with a battery management system that actively manages the health and life cycle of the Lithium-ion polymer (lipo) 6065100 cells. Under ideal circumstances, if used every day the battery will last about two years. We are currently developing a power user loyalty program that allow backers to send us their units once their battery life cycle is depleted in exchange for new linedock versions at discounted prices. Please signup on our website for latest updates.Can I take the plane with linedock?Yes. FAA limits battery capacity to 27,000mAh. As Line Dock capacity is 20,000mAh/ 74 Wh Max (Output 60W), you can keep it in your carry-on luggage. The battery upgrade available for the 15" version get the capacity of Line Dock up to 25,000mAh/ 92,500 Wh, which is still under the FAA limitations. linedock is safe for flying.Can I connect more than one computer at once?No. You can only connect one computer at a time. If a second USB-C laptop is connected to linedock, it will benefit from the battery (e.g. charging) but will not have access to the Hub, the SSD or any other port. Can I connect one external screen via Mini DisplayPort and another one via HDMI at the same time?No. You can only extend one screen at a time, either through Mini DisplayPort, HDMI or USB-C.Can I connect an external screen via USB-C? Yes, and it’ll be powered via that USB-C port.How many devices can I charge at once?You can charge at least 4 devices at once. You might connect more devices they will then most likely charge slower. This will not damage the battery but take longer to charge and drain linedock battery faster.How can I charge linedock battery?You can charge it either via USB-C using any USB-C certified charger. Note that laptop chargers are the best for that matter as they deliver more power. You can also charge linedock with any USB charger via the USB 3.0 Qualcomm QC 3 port.Does linedock supports Thunderbolt 3?linedock is fully compatible with Thunderbolt 3 but currently supports USB3.1 Gen 1.Do magnets have an effect on linedock components or on my laptop?No. linedock is equipped with 4 neodymium magnets that have been perfectly calibrated and shielded to avoid any electronic damage or trouble on both linedock and the laptop.Do magnets affect the internal storage?No, SSDs (Solid State Drives) are not sensitive to magnets.Is linedock compatible with Windows/Linux/Chrome OS?Yes, linedock is compatible with any USB-C laptop, regardless of the operating system. Is my laptop compatible with linedock?Any laptop offering at least one USB-C port and that can be charged through this port is fully compatible with linedock. If your laptop cannot be charged through USB-C or does not offer such a port, you can connect it through USB 3.0 and still benefit from the internal storage, ports and active cooling. Can I connect a linedock to another linedock and then to my laptop?Yes, you can connect up to two linedock together with no data speed loss. You then get access to twice the battery and twice the storage of one regular linedock.How does linedock stick to my computer?linedock is designed to be placed under a USB-C laptop. 4 neodymium magnets embedded inside linedock helps easily positioning the laptop on top of it and avoiding it to slide down. Those magnets are oriented towards magnetic points of USB-C MacBooks. Each linedock box will also include additional magnetic stickers, should you want to keep your linedock and laptop attached firmly e.g. when using a laptop stand. This also in order to adapt and make it stick to regular laptops.Questions? Do not hesitate to contact the team at hi@linedock.co or shoot us a message via the "Contact the team" at the top of the page :)

story:
Fluffy - small, light, sublime.

Thanks to fluffy you will always be able to easily store your photos, videos,  music and other files directly from your phone, tablet, notebook or desktop  pc. Storage space on your devices is not an issue anymore. Fluffy is equiped with  an outstanding fast hard drive up to 512 GB with enhanced wireless transfer tecnology. Its speed and compact dimensions outmatch all market available external HDD's. Fluffy is not just smaller, lighter, faster and more attractive than  its competitors, it allows you to store your files in a brand  new  way.

Up to 1.5 million photos in one small fluffy

Fluffy outperforms almost all other available external HDD's in terms of speed  and dimensions. Working with files has never been as easy and fast. As a result  of an upgraded software installed on your phone you can easily transfer files  from your device to fluffy and the other way arround. Hence, even the largest  video files are processed extremely fast. More over, thanks to the automatic  sync function all you need to do is connect to your home network and fluffy will  do everything for you.

More experience each day

Fluffy mobile app - is the most impeccable, intuitive and safe app for file management. Its capabilities fully engage fluffy without diverting you from         your other tasks. This app is designed exactly for this purpose.


Music and videos are always handy and don’t occupy much space

Fluffy helps you store up to 180000 songs or 365 video hours. You can now  store and share your music with your family without using your phone's or  tablet's storage space. Your family travel videos will always be safe and sound.  You can also download music and other files from the internet straight to fluffy. Theese are everlasting memories.

Design

Despite its incredible performance, fluffy is unbelievably small and lightweight.  It fits any interior, whether it is a bedroom, your guestroom or office. Due to its design it can be installed on your desk, shelf or any vertical surface.  Considering fluffy’s high performance it naturaly complements your life style.  No more wires, only wireless transfer. Additionaly, it is made of fine, tactile  pleasant materials and works soundlessly.

Private account and safety

Fluffy will amaze you with its absolutely new approach to file storage.  Watching videos or listening to music from an external home cloud has never     been so exciting and safe. As a result of the multiple user system mobile app,  you can keep your photos away from other users. Just create your private  account and get unlimited access to your files. No one will ever be able to see  your pictures unless you allow them to. Additionaly, you can make your photos public if you want at any time.

Completely free and no subscriptions at all!

Use fluffy and fluffy mobile app absolutely free of charge. It does not require additional subscriptions or expenses. The mobile app is also free of charge! Connect it to your home wifi network and start storing anything you please.

Home and office use

Use fluffy as a home cloud storage for family videos and photos, or use it as a collaborative office device for document transfer or presentations for your colleagues right from your working environment.

Features

  • Multiple connections (more than 2 connections to one device at the same   time)

  • Connection notification (if any third party person will attempt to access   device the owner will receive a notification)

  • IP restriction (owner may allow access to Fluffy only from restricted IP addresses)
  • Editable files
  • Erase all files with no recovery option


Perks

Team

There are 2 things in common to all individuals bellow:  They are all exceptional in what they do.  They joined, because they believe it and really like it.

A big thank you to all those who invested their time and skills to making it a  reality.


Time line and where funds go



FAQ

If you have any additional question please contact us anytime, we will be glad to answer them

story:
When cutting edge infrared wireless technology and cats come together, the outcome is The Ultimate Kat Toy. We've designed a pioneering toy that can lead the industry like no other.

Here are some of the benefits.

  • Promotes good health through exercise
  • Creates a better bonding between owners and cats
  • Encourages positive behavior and reduces or eliminates negative behavior
  • Stimulates cat's natural predatory instincts
  • Improves cat's motor skills
  • Indoor and outdoor use

    The Ultimate Kat Toy:  Absolutely The Best Interactive Cat Toy Available Today

    Simply said, The Ultimate Kat Toy is the premiere interactive Cat toy available today. Created to encourage a healthy, happy pet and discourage destructive behavior, our team has come up with a must-have for cat owners worldwide. As the only zip-line remote control operated cat toy on the market, The Ultimate Kat Toy  will captivate your cat's attention and keep you and your furry friend engaged with endless entertainment. Utilizing a uniquely designed zip- line technology, this innovative approach to utilizing interactive play by partnering pet with owner not only creates important bonding but, strengthens the cat's overall health by encouraging positive physical, mental and emotional well being.

     Please note: This product is trademarked and is currently patent-pending. Therefore, copycats (pun intended) are warned not to infringe by posting replicas on Amazon or any other platform.

    Watch Tipp's cute little body move as she chases the lure.

    The Ultimate Kat Toy is an interactive cat toy engineered to make your cat healthy and happy by focusing on the importance of both physical and mental stimulation. Designed by cat lovers for cat lovers, this toy will help satisfy your pet's natural instincts while also providing important bonding time between you and your precious feline friend.

    Rudy has some pretty fancy moves for a polydactyl cat.

    This little kitten Stormy is having some Kat Toy fun.

    Pucky loves to play outside with his Ultimate Kat Toy.

    Cats love using the pouncing technique.

    The Ultimate Kat Toy stimulates your cat’s natural predatory instincts, stimulating muscles and senses. Our specially designed retractable line let you add an endless amount of lures to engage any cat for hours on end.  The Ultimate Kat Toy will leave them calmer, relaxed and stress free!  The end result is a happier and healthier cat!

    Pirouette kitty is doing Fifth position en Haut ballet stance.

    In this video we show how simple it is to set up and start playing with your four legged friends.

    • Over the past 2 years our Design and Engineering team have evolved The Ultimate Kat Toy through over a dozen incarnations and have now arrived at a prototype that pushes technology to its limits and positions us for tremendous growth and success in the marketplace.
    • Our expertly-designed Kat Toy allows your cats to play with a variety of lures that stimulate their minds and gets them really moving!
    • Your pets will become engaged and their minds stimulated, keeping them physically fit and minimizing occurrences of anxiety or depression.
    • The Kat Toy offer something new, exciting and intriguing for  you and your furry friend each and every time you both play together

     

     

    This is our functional prototype, ready to go into production. Here are the basic component of The Ultimate Kat Toy.

    The goal of this campaign is to help bring The Ultimate Kat Toy  to market by funding a  U.S. Based Start Up that is so close to emerging as a leader in the pet toy industry. Your participation will help bring The Ultimate Kat Toy to cat lovers all over the world. Please join us NOW and we will keep you posted on every update as this dream and journey become reality through the generous contributions and encouragement from a global community.

      

                               

    Thank you for showing your support and letting everyone know you're a cat-lover.

    (Be sure to grab these items as you check out.)

     

     In order to keep the unit pricing low, we request your support to help offset the costs necessary  to afford a large-scale order entering production. Placing a larger order will allow us to keep the price of parts down and will result in the lowest per unit cost which will allow us to pass the savings on to our supporters and Cat Lovers worldwide.

    We are confident that as soon as this campaign ends, we will be able to manufacture, ship and distribute The Ultimate Kat Toy without delay.

    By supporting us now, you’ll get to own one of the very first-edition products off of the line, plus access to exclusive updates on our company's growth and direction, while also providing us with valuable feedback that will shape future generations of the product.

    UKT Products is fully committed to providing excellence in product performance and functionality. Drawing on our experience in product development, engineering, design and production. We aim to provide our customers with the highest quality and most innovative cat toy in the marketplace and to push the limits of progress in the pet toy industry.

    The Ultimate Kat Toy combines a uniquely designed retractable zip line with an endless amount of lure options to constantly create new challenges as often as you so desire. In addition to all of the positive benefits this toy brings to your home, it can also help eliminate (or prevent from occurring) destructive behaviors that often plague the homes of bored cats. Responsible cat owners can say goodbye to aggressive and destructive behavior, anxiety and/or compulsive cat behavior by including The Ultimate Kat Toy  in their cat's life. The Ultimate Kat Toy will leave your cat relaxed, stress free and satisfied and more closely bonded and thankful to call you his or her owner.

                                     

                                                                                                                                                                                                      

       The Ultimate Kat Toy makes sure your furry friend never gets bored and is engaging for you as well as your pet.

     

    A portion of our profits will be  donated to "Australia Zoo Wildlife Warriors" to help support the legacy of Steve Irwin and his family who have already saved over 90,000 animals during the Bushfire Emergency that is ongoing. Additionally, here at home we will also support spay and neuter programs to assist local shelters nationwide.

     

     

    If you believe in what we’re doing here, please lend a hand to turn The Ultimate Kat Toy  into reality and help keep us moving forward – THANK YOU for your contribution.

    Assembly and Quality Control checks will be done in

    San Pedro, Ca. USA.

     

    BELIEVE IN US

    We're fully confident in our ability to deliver and understand that backing a crowdfunding campaign requires placing your trust in the creator's expertise and track-record to deliver. We know you'll be pleasantly surprised. If this is your first time supporting a crowdfunding campaign we give you a  heartfelt THANK YOU for joining us on our journey toward success.

The Kat Toy offer something new, exciting and intriguing for  you and your furry friend each and every time you both play together

 



  
This is our functional prototype, ready to go into production. Here are the basic component of The Ultimate Kat Toy.



The goal of this campaign is to help bring The Ultimate Kat Toy  to market by funding a  U.S. Based Start Up that is so close to emerging as a leader in the pet toy industry. Your participation will help bring The Ultimate Kat Toy to cat lovers all over the world. Please join us NOW and we will keep you posted on every update as this dream and journey become reality through the generous contributions and encouragement from a global community.


   


                           
Thank you for showing your support and letting everyone know you're a cat-lover.
(Be sure to grab these items as you check out.)
 
 In order to keep the unit pricing low, we request your support to help offset the costs necessary  to afford a large-scale order entering production. Placing a larger order will allow us to keep the price of parts down and will result in the lowest per unit cost which will allow us to pass the savings on to our supporters and Cat Lovers worldwide.
We are confident that as soon as this campaign ends, we will be able to manufacture, ship and distribute The Ultimate Kat Toy without delay.
By supporting us now, you’ll get to own one of the very first-edition products off of the line, plus access to exclusive updates on our company's growth and direction, while also providing us with valuable feedback that will shape future generations of the product.

UKT Products is fully committed to providing excellence in product performance and functionality. Drawing on our experience in product development, engineering, design and production. We aim to provide our customers with the highest quality and most innovative cat toy in the marketplace and to push the limits of progress in the pet toy industry.
The Ultimate Kat Toy combines a uniquely designed retractable zip line with an endless amount of lure options to constantly create new challenges as often as you so desire. In addition to all of the positive benefits this toy brings to your home, it can also help eliminate (or prevent from occurring) destructive behaviors that often plague the homes of bored cats. Responsible cat owners can say goodbye to aggressive and destructive behavior, anxiety and/or compulsive cat behavior by including The Ultimate Kat Toy  in their cat's life. The Ultimate Kat Toy will leave your cat relaxed, stress free and satisfied and more closely bonded and thankful to call you his or her owner.

                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                  
   The Ultimate Kat Toy makes sure your furry friend never gets bored and is engaging for you as well as your pet.


 
A portion of our profits will be  donated to "Australia Zoo Wildlife Warriors" to help support the legacy of Steve Irwin and his family who have already saved over 90,000 animals during the Bushfire Emergency that is ongoing. Additionally, here at home we will also support spay and neuter programs to assist local shelters nationwide.
 

 
If you believe in what we’re doing here, please lend a hand to turn The Ultimate Kat Toy  into reality and help keep us moving forward – THANK YOU for your contribution.

Assembly and Quality Control checks will be done in
San Pedro, Ca. USA.
 
BELIEVE IN US
We're fully confident in our ability to deliver and understand that backing a crowdfunding campaign requires placing your trust in the creator's expertise and track-record to deliver. We know you'll be pleasantly surprised. If this is your first time supporting a crowdfunding campaign we give you a  heartfelt THANK YOU for joining us on our journey toward success.

story:
My name is Letty Cabrera-Calvo, the creator of Color Switch. This product idea came to me while I was doing my make-up and realized there is a need for a product that will remove color from make-up brushes. 

I believe success comes from following our dreams and this is my first step. 

My goal is to raise $3,000 through this awesome campaign, which will allow me to put together the first batch of Color Switch products. 


Please help me make this business idea a reality!

Thank You

Letty Cabrera-Calvo

story:
Curiology 

Curiology has been established since March 2012. We are now looking to raise money to purchase a laser cutting machine and supplies of acrylic and wood, to greatly expand our range of laser cut jewellery and accessories, and will also be able to offer custom designs for personal purchases and businesses, and wholesale orders. We now have a graphic designer on board, so the design capabilities are almost infinite! We have a whole host of ideas for designs, and having our own laser cutter would mean we can have a faster turnaround on items, less costs to us which we can then pass on to you, and the satisfaction that our laser cut items are 100% designed and created by us!


What We Need & What You Get

We need to raise £1250. This will get us a top of the range laser cutting machine, and plenty of stuff to cut with it, along with strong packaging to post orders, and rubber stamps to trademark the boxes. 

We are offering some great perks, starting from as little as £5, right up to £50, you can be sure there's something that takes your fancy! Check out our list of perks to see what you want to choose!

If we don't reach our goal, whatever money we have raised will be put aside safely while we raise the remaining funds ourselves, until we can purchase the necessary equipment. All perks would obviously still be honored, it would just take a while longer to get them made.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't donate, we understand, after all, if we were well off, we would be able to purchase this by ourselves! But you can still help us in other ways if you want. Any shares on social media sites of our campaign would be fantastic!

story:
→→→ CF015E Nintendo Switch connection - From Youtube  (CF011 & CF011T as well)

→→→ CF015C review via Mickeyworks - From Youtube

↓↓↓ CF015C review via TechTablets - From Youtube

 

C-FORCE is proud to announce the first product in its C-view GO modular screen suite series: C-FORCE CF015Cv2. CF015Cv2 provides a stylish, compact portable business display that combines sophisticated design aesthetics with functional features to deliver a refined modular screen.

The C-FORCE CF015Cv2 has been specifically designed to meet the needs of contemporary business professionals who rely on laptops and portable devices to perform work-based tasks.  

 

 

The C-FORCE CF015Cv2 is ideal for creative professionals who will benefit from the 4K 100% AdobeRGB and 178° wide viewing angle; ideal for painting-level billboards or image editing. 

 

 

With a full-featured USB-C cable, the screen can be quickly and easily connected to a laptop and provide the user with multi-screen interactive efficiency.

This minimalist design, which is just 6 mm thick and weighs only 700 grams, features 15.6-inch 4K screen housed within a high-quality aluminum alloy case. 

 

 

Watch the video: CF015C unboxing with USB-C Laptop

Watch the video: Multiple CF015Cs connection

Watch the video: CF015C with USB-C iPad Pro 2018

Watch the video: CF015C with Huawei mirror mode

The compact screen of the CF015Cv2 is protected and held in place with hidden magnetic poles that allow users to adjust the angle of the screen according to their work needs.

The elegant CF015Cv2 is ideal for use in combination with the compact Mac mini to create a multi-functional, highly sophisticated "Office PC suite."

 

 

 

 

If you are a gamer, C-FORCE also prepares an affordable product called CF011 and touch version CF011T. You will have a nice 15.6 inches 3K portable display for only $129 or $199. For you, everyone of you to connect Nintendo Switch or your laptop through USB-C. 

 

 

C-FORCE also plans to release a highly portable modular game set named the C-view GO. The CF015Cv2 in combination with a component of this set, the C-hub GO, offers users a 4K near-line video gaming experience to rival that of Switch's retina-level, the PlayStation, or Xbox game console. The C-hub GO is the Central-hub of the modular screen suite.

story:
Our smartphones are powerful enough to keep us connected, entertained and ready to get work done on the go, but the small screen size tremendously limits working efficiency. It’s annoying to constantly switch between different tabs and windows or cram multiple apps and files onto one little screen.  We all know a secondary monitor helps a lot, it makes everything easier to manage and more efficient but they are typically bulky, heavy, and inconvenient. 

 

Introducing AirTab, your best productivity-boosting partner. A 15.6” portable monitor that weighs a mere 1.1 pounds, is just 0.19 inches slim and makes the perfect secondary display for your devices. It's super affordable, easy to use, and instantly expands your screen real estate for dual-monitor presentations, processing documents, coding, multimedia and more. Its versatility helps you get things done more efficiently when you’re on the go. 

 

                                        Find the NotebookCheck review here. 

 

With AirTab, your productivity and efficiency gets a boost wherever you are, transforming your smartphone into an expansive high definition display that lets you get more done. 

 

Unlike other bulky monitors, AirTab is the lightest 15.6” touchscreen portable monitor ever created, weighing only 1.1 lb and measuring just 0.19 inch thick. That means it’s thin enough to easily slip into your backpack or laptop sleeve, next to your laptop, without you even noticing. 

 

The AirTab package comes with a smart magnetic cover that protects it from dust and scratches. More importantly, the cover can be folded into a kickstand to prop the monitor up in either landscape, portrait, or creation mode.

 

  • Landscape Mode

Extending the monitor when multi-tasking is quick and efficient using horizontal orientation. 

 

  • Portrait Mode

Portrait mode gives you a perfect extended view of items such as documents, books, mobile websites or when you are coding. 

 

  • Creation Mode

Turn it around, lay it down, and here comes the creation mode. AirTab makes movies more enjoyable and is excellent for design, photography and other creative work. 

 

Leave the mouse at home and enjoy unparalleled control using the AirTab 10-point touchscreen. The intuitive and super responsive touch capabilities enhance accuracy and multitasking efficiency. 

 

The dual USB-C ports allow you to connect AirTab with many different devices, including laptops, smartphones*, Nintendo Switch, cameras, and more. 

 

AirTab was specifically designed for compatibility with your most essential mobile devices. It’s ultimately portable, delivering a laptop-like experience when using your phone without the added weight. With AirTab, your productivity doesn’t decrease just because you are on the go. Use it anywhere with freedom.

 

But AirTab is not all work and no play! It is the best companion for playing Nintendo Switch on a bigger screen. It connects to NTD Switch directly through a USB Type-C to USB Type-C cable, which completely replaces the NTD Switch dock for convenience and weight savings. 

 

  • Charge Your Devices via USB-C

Your host device only requires a single USB-C connection for both power and video transmission when connected with AirTab. The reversible (any-way-up) USB-C design facilitates quick and hassle-free link to support devices.

 

  • Plug & Play

AirTab is made with simplicity in mind. It doesn’t require extra drivers, lengthy setup, or proprietary software and is 100% plug and play. Just plug it in and start to enjoy it.

story:
The Crowdfunding is now closed - thank you to everyone that backed the project! The Circle Planner's are now available over on our website: www.paperdesign.co

 

 

The Circle Planner is a powerful tool in helping you define your goals and plan your time with intention. It has been designed for people to focus on long term goals whilst simultaneously organising your present moment. Your dreams, goals, to-do lists, shopping, positive habit tracking (and there is even colouring in!)...all in one stunning planner. 

The Circle Planner features:

  • Habit Trackers to keep you motivated
  • Monthly Overviews to see your schedule at a glance
  • The Master List to brain dump, prioritise and execute your tasks
  • Empty Lists for shopping or to-do's
  • Blank Pages for projects and notes
  • 2 Ribbons to keep your place on your current day and monthly overview
  • Motivational Quotes to keep you inspired
  • Colouring In Pages to increase productivity, stimulate creativity and reduce stress

List your goals broken down in 6 key areas: Career, Bucket List, Finances, Relationships, Personal Health and Travel. What do you want to achieve in your life? In the next 5 years? In 2019?

Break down your goals into a monthly plan and set your intentions for the coming weeks:  

The Monthly view allows you to see your upcoming days at a glance with space to note important dates along with a monthly to-do list:

Each week is spread over 2 pages and there is space to set your top priorities and 30 minute time slots to plan your days in detail. There are daily reminders, a weekly to do list and a tracker to keep you focused on your healthy habits:

At the end of the month you review your progress. What did you learn? What could you do better? What were the highlights of the month? Take the time to celebrate your achievements before setting the goals for next month:

 

THE PLANNER

4 gorgeous colours: Yellow, Teal, Rose and Navy

B5 size (176 x 250 mm)

Luxury cloth hard cover

Thick sustainable paper

2 ribbons to keep your place

Elastic cover band

DELIVERY TIMES

We go to print on 2nd November and the planners will be shipped to you for an early December delivery. We have a packing team on standby to get them to you as quickly as possible. 

THE CAMPAIGN

We are 100% self funded and have offered some great savings to the supporters of the crowdfund and all funds raised are going entirely towards printing and shipping.

As an independent project we need your help to spread the word so we would be so grateful if you could share this campaign with your friends and family. Pick up one for yourself or a loved one for Christmas, or maybe buy in bulk for retail.

OTHER WAYS YOU CAN HELP

If you love the Planner but don't want to purchase one yet, we would still greatly appreciate you sharing this with anyone who may be interested. We are also on Instagram and Facebook.

We would LOVE your support and  thank you from the bottom of our hearts!

story:
Owning a portable handheld game console capable of running AAA games such as GTA5, has always been the dream of many gamers. But even the best handheld consoles on the market like the PSP and PSV struggle to run these games. Better game console performance normally requires a device that’s sizable enough to have sufficient processing power and is able to withstand long battery use and overheating.

Our GPD WIN 2 comes in compact form but doesn’t sacrifice game play experience. GPD WIN 2’s lightweight design and heavyweight hardware processing power allows it to achieve ultimate compactness with minimum heat output and long battery life.

Last year, we successfully launched the GPD WIN, the first 5.5-inch Windows handheld game console in the industry. The significance of this machine lies in the fact that many games that could only be played in front of a television or a computer in the past. Now, for the first time, these games are able to run on a portable handheld device. However, we understand that the first generation GPD WIN had some deficiencies, especially in the area of performance and heat dissipation.

At GPD, we are committed to develope a handheld game console that can run AAA games smoothly. At the same time, the heat-dissipation, power consumption, device weight, portability, battery-life and other factors will also be taken into account. Thus, we have gone through a long product development time to introduce to you a new generation of our product: The GPD WIN 2.

The gaming improvement of the WIN 2 is very obvious. The following is a performance comparison between the WIN 2 and previous generation WIN. It shows game frame rate results for the WIN 2 and WIN:

* Testing resolution: 1280×720. Unless otherwise stated, the game uses low special effects.

  • “Grand Theft Auto 5” maximum settings at 38fps;
  • “Heroes of the Storm” 60fps, team battle at 38fps, with an average of 49fps;
  • For “Overwatch”, its framerate on menu screen is 120fps, 80fps when walking in the map, and a stable value of 50-70fps when in during matches, with an average of 83fps;
  • “League of Legends”, even on maximum settings, 60fps can be achieved, heavy action sections at 48fps, an average of 54fps;
  • “DOTA2” maximum settings at 70fps;
  • “The Elder Scrolls 5: Skyrim” with average of 53fps;
  • “World of Warcraft” with an average of 30fps.

  • The most powerful handheld ever, the appearance design was developed by a German Red Dot Award winning team.
  • The product supports more than 1,000,000 internet games. Enjoy gaming the second you open the box.
  • The WIN 2 is equipped with a 6-inch touch screen from Sharp Corporation with a viewing angle up to 178°. The screens area has been increased by 9% compared to the previous generation WIN. It also utilizes In-Cell full lamination technology and fourth generation Corning Gorilla Glass. With a screen resolution of 1280×720, it has a ppi 2.53 times greater than that of a typical 24-Inch desktop monitor. The WIN 2 also has a capacitive touch screen.
  • Featuring a seventh generation Intel® Kaby Lake Core™ m3-7Y30 processor, with performance close to that of the Intel® Core™ i7-3770K. With its CPU-Z single-core performance score of 1244 points, there is no stutter running the latest AAA-class games when using low game effects.
  • Complimenting the m3-7y30 CPU cores, the m3-7y30 also features 9th generation Intel® HD Graphics 615 with 24 EU execution units and a maximum dynamic frequency of 900MHz. Game frame rates have increased by a factor of 2.2 times compared to the previous generation GPD WIN. Games are smoother and looks more realistic.
  • The device features a M.2 2242 port, with extremely high read/write speed capability. Game loading is 4 times faster compared to a mechanical hard disk or eMMC.
  • Equipped with 2×4900mAh large-capacity and high-density polymer lithium batteries. The GPD WIN 2 has a maximum game play battery-life of over 6 hours. Our product is also the first game handheld to support PD 2.0 fast charge, allowing the battery to be charged to half full within 45 minutes.
  • Brand new gamepad design with two 3D joysticks from ALPS Japan, featuring built-in dual-vibration motors to ensure that you get immersed in the game. You can sense even the slightest vibration with unparalleled comfort during gameplay.
  • Designed with an innovative PC-class cooling solution, It features a high-power turbofan which can adjust rpm dynamically from 2000 to 8800rpm. When the temperature of the CPU core is between 20 ℃~80 ℃, the 60-speed dynamic temperature control will kick in to best balance efficiency
  • WIN 2 can be charged through mobile power based on PD 2.0 or PD 3.0. At the same time, WIN 2 can also provide the power for your mobile device, such as mobile phone.

For a long time, we have thought about how to best design our handhelds in an ergonomic, aesthetic and commercially valued way.

We are pleased to announce that the design of the GPD WIN 2 has been done in cooperation between GPD and the Red Dot Award winning design team. We feel the design of the WIN 2 has achieved the best balance of aesthetics, engineering and ergonomics.

The frame of the lid is made of light, strong magnesium alloy material to prevent the screen bending. The rounded edge design shows more affinity. The black removable ABS cover can be replaced with other zinc alloy cover. Alternatively, you can also decorate it with your own metal or adhesive stickers. Enjoy personalizing the style of your GPD WIN 2 to your taste.

To keep the WIN 2 lightweight, the main body of the WIN 2 uses ABS material. The sunken design of the joysticks allows seamless access to the other game controls. Unique arc metallic film keys, which make it more suitable for blind operation. The 360 style ABXY buttons, still use screen print double-character for their labels. The machine body, keyboard and gamepad use colors which bring out the best of the design. With an elegant matt UV finish, it provides the user with a delicate feel. The machine has been artistically designed with a fine balance of colors and material application.

The trigger keys: L1/L2/L3, R1/R2/R3 are situated at the back of the WIN 2 near both corners. The interface ports are also on the back and comprise of: Type C USB, 3.5mm headphone, USB 3.0, Micro SD card slot, Micro HDMI. The hot air outlet is also situated at the rear. The quite compact layout, brings out the best of the design.

The bottom surface of the WIN 2 has been designed with a covered slot to enable easy user replacement of the M.2 SSD card. The M.2 SSD card is fixed in place using screws, which effectively guarantees that the SSD is connected with the M.2 interface, even when the WIN 2 is shaken or in the extreme drop state.

The design of the air inlet on the side of previous WIN model makes it easier for them to be blocked by hands when holding the machine, which has been widely criticized. This time around, the air inlet of the WIN 2 has been designed in the bottom surface. The fan then forces hot air out the back of the machine. Hot air only travels a short distance before it exits via the back vent, extracting heat from the machine in nearly no time. In limited tests, the temperature of the machine can be controlled at about 39 degrees.

Equipped with a 6-inch Super-Shine screen from Sharp Corporation, the viewing area has increased by 9% compared to the previous generation. Using In-Cell full lamination technology, the screen is thinner due to the reduction of a piece of glass. By applying the fourth generation of Corning Gorilla Glass, the intact rate of a 1-meter drop test is as high as 80%, and damage reduction shows a 45% improvement compared to Gorilla Glass 3. Protective design with no prominent frame, allows you to focus on your gaming. Side and upper screen borders have been kept to a minimum, with an upper border of only 5mm and a lower border of only 3mm. The screen resolution is 1280×720, it has a PPI 2.53 times greater than that of a typical 24-Inch desktop monitor. The viewing angle is up to 178°. The WIN 2 also has a capacitive touch screen.

Equipped with the seventh generation ultra-low voltage Intel® Kaby Lake Core™ m3-7Y30 Processor, fabricated using advanced 14nm technology. Under the same power consumption, it can deliver about 12% performance improvement compared to the previous generation Skylake technology. The bus speed of Intel® Core™ m3-7Y30 can reach 99.76MHz, with OPI bus speeds up to 4GT/s and peak data transfer of 4×10^9 times. Together with 4MB L3 cache, it greatly reduces the time to retrieve data from memory.

Due to the increased number of transistors and architecture optimizations, the m3-7Y30 is significantly better than the x7-Z8750 used in the previous generation GPD WIN. The improvement in the measured performance of the m3-7y30 is quite obvious. The CPU-Z single-core performance reaches 1244 points, almost 4 times that of the x7-Z8750. Multi-core performance reaches 2688 points, 2 times that of the Z8750. The overall performance is close to the third generation Intel i7-3770K.

The emergency response speed of the m3-7y30 has increased significantly thanks to Speed Shift technology which can instantly boost CPU Turbo. Compared to the 0.1 second response time of the m3-6y30, the response time of the m3-7y30 is only 0.005 seconds, killing nearly all the stutters in team battles.

Utilizing 9th generation Intel® HD Graphics 615 with 24 execution units (EUs) and a maximum dynamic frequency of 900MHz, the WIN 2 graphics performance surpasses that of its predecessor which uses Intel’s 8th generation HD Graphics 405, with only 16 EUs and a maximum dynamic frequency of only 600MHz.

When parallel processing graphics data in a high throughput situation, the HD Graphics 615 performance is up to 220% better than the discrete graphics NVIDIA GeForce GT240. Coupled with the fact that the system resolution is not that high, the WIN 2 can easily cope with the latest AAA games when using low game effects.

* AIDA64 scores denote the sum of the Read, Write, Copy score. Only PCmark Vantage represents the score of the memory.

The m3-7y30 only supports LPDDR3 which has a maximum operating frequency of 1866MHz. Compared to the previous generation of Z8750, the memory frequency has increased by 1.17 times. With dual-channel design, bandwidth up to 128bits, the effective wait time is reduced by 50%, enabling games to run more smoothly. RAM increases to 8GB which is twice as that of previous generation WIN.

* The tested SSD is Transcend / Transcend TS512GMTS400 512GB. Continuous read/write testing is based on CrystalDiskMark for performance evaluation, and the random read and write testing uses CrystalDiskMark QD32 for performance evaluation.

The WIN 2 features an M.2 2242 socket interface. It comes standard with a 128GB M.2 SSD. The SSD adopts SATA 3.0 based on the AHCI protocol, which has a theoretical bandwidth of up to 6Gb/s, and a theoretical transfer speed of up to 600MB/s.

The M.2 SSD can be easily replaced. Players can buy 256GB, 512GB or higher capacity SSD to replace the original one. There is no capacity limit, which means it can store more games, videos and applications.

As an example of SSDs speed, we tested the read speed of the Transcend TS512GMTS400 512GB SSD (which is not the standard SSD in the WIN 2). Read speeds for this card reach 560MB/s, and write speeds reach 460MB/s. This hardware configuration design enables the machine to reach the optimal overall performance of the system, there is no system configuration bottleneck.

At the player’s request, the WIN 2 retains the Micro SD card slot. The m3-7y30 supports UHS 104 ultra-high-speed SD interface, and the bus bandwidth is up to 104MB/s, which perfectly supports Micro SDXC cards.

* The Micro SD card used in the test is SAMSUNG 128GB (model number: MB-MC128D); test software: ATTO Disk Benchmarks V2.47.

We performed a speed test using the SAMSUNG 128GB (Model: MB-MC128D) USD card on the WIN 2. The tests showed read speeds up to 86MB/s, and write speeds up to 55MB/s. These results are 2.04 times better than achieved on the previous generation WIN console, taking full advantage of its bandwidth. 

The price advantage of Micro SD is quite obvious compared to SSD, and the read/write speed is not lower than that of eMMC. The Micro SD is therefore a powerful complement to the WIN 2 storage options.

The following table is based on the current situation of the maximum capacity of storage devices on the market, from which we can calculate that the maximum scalable storage capacity of GPD WIN 2 is 2.912TB:

* The above products are the maximum capacity that can be obtained in mainland China, but it does not mean that there is not larger capacity options in other regions. As long as it complies with the interface specification, our GPD WIN 2 can also support the storage.

Set the mode switch to X to enter the Xbox 360 gamepad mode. The gamepad still remains the style of WIN, using Japanese ALPS double-3D joystick, with the sunk-style design, which is improved to reduce operational errors.

On the left side is a classic cross style D-Pad, which enables fast and accurate directional movement. On the right is the Xbox 360 style action buttons, labeled using a screen print double-character, faster and more accurate with finger touch.

L3/R3 trigger buttons are located on the back of the WIN 2 together with L1/R1 and L2/R2. The newly designed trigger buttons make it easy for players to reach the buttons quickly, making the overall gaming experience better.

WIN 2 is also equipped with two vibration motors. It’s insane level of vibration effect will help you get more immersed in the game. The two vibrating motors are extremely powerful, providing you with an unsurpassed experience in both racing and shooting games. Each game has a unique and appropriate vibration mode. When playing shooting games, you can feel the recoil of the gun pushing you backward; when starting a car engine, you can feel the vibration of the engine as if you were really sitting in the car. Even the slightest vibration can be sensed, making you more immersed in the game than ever before.

The WIN 2 keyboard has been designed to cope with more than 1 million key presses. Key travel has been set to avoid fatigue from long typing sessions. The keyboard has an excellent feel. THE WASD, left, right, up and down keys are designed in a protruding style, which makes PC keyboard gaming easier. The concave power button has been designed to avoid inadvertent presses. In the upper right corner of the keyboard, there is the Xbox key, which can serve as “home button”, “screenshot button” etc.

When the mode switch is set to the mouse mode, WIN 2 will simulate a mouse using the joystick.

Mouse control is important for PC games, as such, the WIN 2 joystick can be used to simulate a mouse. Also, in order to meet the needs of different players, the mouse speed can be increased by pressing the L2 button. If you need faster mouse movement speed, you can press the L2 button to increase the mouse speed by a factor of 2.

In order to extend the battery-life, WIN 2 uses 2×4900mAh large-capacity and high-density polymer lithium batteries, with 7.6V output, 37.24Wh of power and 600Wh/L energy density. Its battery capacity is increased by 49% compared to the previous generation WIN, the battery’s power delivery efficiency has been increased from 82% to 95%. The large batteries enable the WIN 2 to deliver an outstanding gaming battery life of over 6 hours. At the same time, our product is also the first game handheld to support PD 2.0 fast charge which can charge the battery to half full within 45 minutes.

In addition, the charging logic of the WIN 2 has been changed. When in charging mode, the motherboard is directly powered by the source supply rather than through the battery. The WIN 2 can support a maximum power supply of 12V/2A. When the power supplied by the charger is not enough to fully power the WIN 2, the battery will supply the power needed in order to ensure better performance and longer runtime of the WIN 2.

To enhance the cooling effect, the WIN 2 is designed with a PC-class cooling solution utilizing a high-power turbofan. The fan has a dynamic speed ranging from 2000 to 8800rpm. With large-volume side-blown thermal outlet design and ultra-short outlet distance, the hot air exhaust performance is 8 times greater than that of the previous generation WIN.

At the same time, the WIN 2 increases the TDP of 4.5W to 15W. When the temperature of the CPU is between 20 ℃~80 ℃, the 60-speed dynamic temperature control will be started by BIOS to optimally balance the energy/performance ratio.

As for the design of the internal structure, it has benefited from changing the L-type motherboard, to a dual motherboard superposition design. The saved room is used to store the double battery stack, which effectively prevents the conduction of heat between the battery and motherboard.

WIN 2 can be charged through mobile power based on PD 2.0 or PD 3.0. At the same time, WIN 2 can also provide the power for your mobile device, such as mobile phone. In theory, it can charge 6.8 times to iPhone 5, 5 times to iPhone 7, 3.6 times to iPhone X and 1.5 times to iPad Mini.

We were committed to build a portable device that can run a large number of retro games using emulators, and thus we launched the GPD XD. The XD was very successful and has been widely loved by PSP, NDS and arcade gamers.

Later, we found that there were many games on the Windows platform, but there was no handheld console that could support these games. So we launched the GPD WIN. The introduction of this PC gaming handheld was a sensation both locally and abroad, though it is not perfect.

The introduction of the WIN has laid the foundation for us to launch the WIN 2. The WIN 2 makes up for many deficiencies of our first product and has made a major breakthrough in terms of performance, heat dissipation, appearance, ergonomics and other aspects of the system.

The reason why this crowdfunding was launched on Indiegogo, was mainly due to the high cost of: R&D, molds and materials. All the money we raise will go into volume production of this product. We believe that this product will thrill all players who love handheld gaming and it will be handheld PC gamer’s first choice for years to come. We sincerely hope that you can support this project. Let’s work together to make the GPD WIN 2 a reality.

We are a company focused on handheld gaming products and office equipment based in Shenzhen, China. GPD is our brand, our full name is Gamepad Digital. GPD is committed to providing users with personalized products and services.

To begin with, we thank all gamers who join in this crowdfunding campaign. It is your continuous support that makes our products better. Without your trust and support, there would be no mass production or market launch of this product.

1. GPD WIN 2 game test video

https://www.youtube.com/user/ThePhawx/videos

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCpnDsmgMnCn0XZvGIM9yrXg/videos

2. Does the price includes tax tariffs for international buyer?

The price includes international courier freight and surcharges to remote areas, but it does not include the import tax tariff generated when for the destination country. Generally, the tariff generated when reaching EU countries is 21% and about 10% to Japan. Parcels entering the United States with a value over $800, may also incur a tariff. The tariffs may be even higher to other countries.

3. What after-sales service are crowdfunding participants entitled to?

Crowdfunding participants have the same warranty rights as the product users who purchase the product after launch. If you are dissatisfied with the product, you can return it within one week of receipt of the goods, but the refund will deduct the shipping costs you initialy paid for the product.

Please note that the postage and packaging charges incurred during the return of product will be your own responsibility. When mailing the product, the local postal delivery is preferred because other international logistics will generate tariff which is equal to 20% to 30% of the product value when entering China, GPD will not bear this the cost.

4. What if the crowdfunding does not reach the target amount?

If crowdfunding does not reach the target amount, Indiegogo shall refund all backers. At the same time, we will look for other financing channels to ensure the smooth development of R&D and production. We sincerely hope that all players who love this handheld can continue to follow the latest progress of the project.

5. Dear Japanese backers, please note:

Please write down your address in Japanese in order to avoid translation mistake causing failure delivery. Thank you.  

お客様の住所は日本語で記入していただけませんか？ご協力ありがとうございます。

6. If my question is not promptly answered, what should I do?

If your question is not promptly answered, please refer to the following contact information:

  • During crowdfunding process, for technical questions, please send your email to: kendyzhu777@softwincn.com
  • After the crowdfunding, for product delivery progress, please send your email to: sales01@gpd.hk
  • After receiving the product, for quality problems or return, please send your email to: kendyz@gpd.hk
  • For distribution or agency issues, please send your email to: kendyzhu77@softwincn.com
  • When sending emails to us, please make sure to use the email address that you used for your purchase on Indiegogo, our staff will then reply to you as soon as possible.

  • Indiegogo supporters will be rewarded first.
  • Product specifications may change during the crowdfunding process to ensure the product is made as best as possible. If any specifications are changed, we will notify everyone in the “Update” section of the crowdfunding page.
  • The product will provide CE-RoHS, FCC, CCC, JATE, MIC and other international certification.
  • We will try our best to meet our targeted release timing. However, due to supply chain, quality control or other issues may arise which can cause delays to the delivery of the product. We hope to have your understanding in those circumstances.
story_txt:
Owning a portable handheld game console capable of running AAA games such as GTA5, has always been the dream of many gamers. But even the best handheld consoles on the market like the PSP and PSV struggle to run these games. Better game console performance normally requires a device that’s sizable enough to have sufficient processing power and is able to withstand long battery use and overheating.

Our GPD WIN 2 comes in compact form but doesn’t sacrifice game play experience. GPD WIN 2’s lightweight design and heavyweight hardware processing power allows it to achieve ultimate compactness with minimum heat output and long battery life.

Last year, we successfully launched the GPD WIN, the first 5.5-inch Windows handheld game console in the industry. The significance of this machine lies in the fact that many games that could only be played in front of a television or a computer in the past. Now, for the first time, these games are able to run on a portable handheld device. However, we understand that the first generation GPD WIN had some deficiencies, especially in the area of performance and heat dissipation.

At GPD, we are committed to develope a handheld game console that can run AAA games smoothly. At the same time, the heat-dissipation, power consumption, device weight, portability, battery-life and other factors will also be taken into account. Thus, we have gone through a long product development time to introduce to you a new generation of our product: The GPD WIN 2.







The gaming improvement of the WIN 2 is very obvious. The following is a performance comparison between the WIN 2 and previous generation WIN. It shows game frame rate results for the WIN 2 and WIN:

* Testing resolution: 1280×720. Unless otherwise stated, the game uses low special effects.

“Grand Theft Auto 5” maximum settings at 38fps;
“Heroes of the Storm” 60fps, team battle at 38fps, with an average of 49fps;
For “Overwatch”, its framerate on menu screen is 120fps, 80fps when walking in the map, and a stable value of 50-70fps when in during matches, with an average of 83fps;
“League of Legends”, even on maximum settings, 60fps can be achieved, heavy action sections at 48fps, an average of 54fps;
“DOTA2” maximum settings at 70fps;
“The Elder Scrolls 5: Skyrim” with average of 53fps;
“World of Warcraft” with an average of 30fps.
