Chargeur mural (prise EU)
Avec ce chargeur mural, il est plus pratique et rapide de recharger votre Thymio! La prise est de type européenne (type C).
	












Carte SD & lecteur de carte USB
Une super addition à votre expérience d'apprentissage avec Thymio! 
	Vous recevrez une carte micro SD ainsi qu'un lecteur de carte USB pour votre ordinateur. Grâce à ces accessoires, vous pourrez utiliser plus de sons pour Thymio ou enregistrer des données !
	


Piste découverte & Télécommande
Maintenant que votre Thymio peut se promener librement, vous n'allez pas lui courir après pour appuyer sur ses boutons! 
	Avec cette télécommande accompagnée d'une piste découverte (incluant un poster et une fiche d'instructions), votre terrain de jeu s'élargit!
	












Valise Wireless Thymio
Cette valise contient 6 Wireless Thymio et un chargeur USB multiple - spécialement pratique pour les écoles ou les clubs!
	


Pack VIP
Ouaouh! Nous sommes émerveillés de votre générosité ! 
	Vous recevrez tout ce qu'il y a dans le Pack expert, plus un cadeau très spécial de la part de Thymio: un light-painting représentant votre prénom ! Une vidéo du light-painting sera téléchargée sur youtube, et vous recevrez le code source et la piste correspondante pour le refaire chez vous !
	





Témoignages
Which low-cost robots would you recommend? 
“My favourite is the brilliant EPFL designed Thymio”
Alan Winfield 
Professor of Electronic Engineering, UWE Bristol
Director of the UWE Science Communication Unit
University of the West of England, Bristol
Via Twitter

Le Thymio II, conçu par l’École polytechnique fédéral de Lausanne, est un excellent choix pour mener des activités robotiques avec des élèves, particulièrement de primaire. Facile à utiliser, disposant de deux modes de programmation (visuel et textuel), il est très complet. Nous le conseillons avec beaucoup d’enthousiasme !
Flowers Lab, INRIA, Bordeaux
For two years I have been developing learning materials and carrying out pedagogical research on the Thymio robot in collaboration with people from Mobsya. In my opinion, the Thymio robot and its Aseba software environment are the best systems for educational robotics. The robot is robust and inexpensive, yet equipped with more sensors than other, more expensive, educational robots. The software is based upon an advanced computer-science concept, yet the visual programming language is simple for young students to understand. I fully support this spin-fund request.
Mordechai (Moti) Ben-Ari, Ph.D.
Full Professor
Department of Science Teaching
Weizmann Institute of Science
Rehovot, Israel
Thymio is a great first robot for kids: designed by roboticists and educators at EPFL in Switzerland, it’s mobile, colorful, easy to program, has tons of online support and continual development
Evan Ackerman
Blogger on IEEE Spectrum

Spécifications techniques


Thymio possède de nombreux capteurs, plusieurs actuateurs et différentes interfaces homme-robot. Le Wireless Thymio possédera les mêmes capacités de base, les mêmes capteurs et les mêmes actuateurs. La différence vient de son nouveau module radio permettant de le programmer sans fil.

Langage de programmation et environnement
Thymio et Wireless Thymio peuvent être programmés grâce à Aseba. Aseba est un set d'outils conçus pour permettre l'accès à la programmation au grand public. C'est un logiciel open-source composé de VPL et d'Aseba Studio.




VPL (pour Visual Programming Language) a été conçu spécifiquement pour programmer Thymio d'une façon simple grâce à des blocs événement et action. Pas de texte, juste des images.



 

Aseba Studio a été conçu pour programmer des robots comme le Thymio avec du texte. Cela permet un niveau de contrôle et de complexité plus grand que VPL.




Informations supplémentaires

Dimensions: 11cm x 11cm x 5.5cm
Poids: 250 grammes
Batterie lithium polymer (3.6V, 1'500mAh). Rechargeable par USB. Temps d'utilisation moyen: 2 heures. Temps de charge: 2 heures.
Vitesse max: 15 cm/s
Communication inter-Thymio par les capteurs de proximité
Module radio: IEEE 802.15.4, 2.4GHz


Qui sommes-nous ?

Mobsya est une association à but non-lucratif. Elle gère la production et la distribution des robots Thymio. Elle est l’entité qui gère ce crowdfunding. La vocation de Mobsya est de promouvoir l’éducation à la technologie grâce à la robotique. Afin de remplir sa mission, Mobsya coordonne les différents projets autour de Thymio et souhaite fédérer les nombreux efforts des partenaires dans le but de créér le meilleur concept  pour l’éducation à la technologie. 





Christophe Barraud 
CEO 
	A obtenu un Master en robotique de l'EPFL en février 2013. Il a commencé à Mobsya pour développer des composents mécatroniques pour un robot de recherche et est devenu président en Août 2014. Il travaille dans divers projets de robotique éducative
	




Prof. Dr. Francesco Mondada 
Coordinateur académique 
	Professeur de robotique à l'École Polytechnique Fédérale de Lauranne, initiateur du projet Thymio. Son but est à d'amener les meilleurs projets de recherche en robotique au publique en les transformant en produits éducatifs.
	




Mariza Freire 
Responsable communication 
	A obtenu un Master en Lettres en 2009. Co-fondatrice et membre de Mobsya, elle a une grande expérience dans la promotion des sciences pour les non-initiés. Elle travaille au développement de la communication autour de robots éducatifs.
	




Dr. Stéphane Magnenat 
Recherche en éducation aux sciences numériques 
	Postdoc chez Disney Research Zürich, co-fondateur et membre du comité de Mobsya. Il a obtenu un doctorat de l'EPFL en 2010 et a travaillé à l'ETH Zürich. Créateur d'Aseba et co-créateur de VPL. Il travaille dans la recherche en robotique mobile et en éducation aux sciences numériques.
	




Dr. Fanny Riedo 
Responsalbe industrialisation 
	Co-créatrice de Thymio. Elle s'est spécialisée dans la robotique mobile pour l'éducation et a obtenu un doctorat en robotique de l'EPFL en 2015 pour ses recherches sur Thymio. Elle travaille principalement à la mise en production de robots et de documentation pour en faire profiter le grand public.
	




Dr. Michael Bonani 
CTO 
	A obtenu un doctorat en robotique à l'EPFL en 2010. Co-createur de Thymio et membre du comité de Mobsya, il travaille sur le projet Thymio depuis ses débuts et y amène son expertise en design méca-tronique de robots mobiles.
	




FAQ
À quel âge peut-on utiliser Thymio ?
Thymio peut être utilisé à tout âge ! Des enfants de 5 ans peuvent découvrir les robots en jouant avec ses modes de base ou en utilisant un poster découverte avec l'aide d'un adulte. La programmation visuelle est un excellent outil pour découvrir la programmation dès 6 ans, bien qu'avant 10 ans, certains enfants peuvent avoir besoin de l'aide d'un adulte pour utiliser l'ordinateur ou la souris. La programmation texte est accessible pour les jeunes, adolescents et adultes.
Wireless Thymio est-il compatible avec le Wi-fi ou le Bluetooth ?
Non, Wireless Thymio n'est ni compatible avec le Wi-fi, ni avec le Bluetooth. La communication sans fil entre un ordinateur et Wireless Thymio est établie grâce à un module radio dans le robot et à un dongle USB connecté à un ordinateur.
Ai-je besoin d'un dongle USB pour programmer Wireless Thymio ?
Oui, c'est absolument obligatoire si vous voulez profiter de la programmation sans fil. Si vous n'avez pas de dongle USB, votre ordinateur ne pourra pas se connecter à un Wireless Thymio. Malgré tout, vous pourrez toujours programmer un Wireless Thymio avec un câble USB. 
Ai-je besoin d'un Thymio classique pour avoir un Wireless Thymio ?
Non, vous pouvez directement acheter un Wireless Thymio, il s'agit de la contrepartie à 150 EUR. Vous recevrez alors un nouveau Wireless Thymio (déjà équipé d'un module) et un dongle USB à brancher à votre ordinateur.
J'ai un Thymio; peut-il être transformé en Wireless Thymio ?
Si vous avez acheté votre robot après avril 2012, oui. Vous pouvez acheter la contrepartie à 70 EUR, nous envoyer votre robot et nous le transformerons pour vous ! Si vous avez une bonne expérience avec un fer à souder et si vous voudriez le faire vous-même, vous pouvez acheter la contrepartie à 60 EUR, vous recevrez un kit pour le transformer vous-même.
Un moyen simple de savoir si votre robot peut être transformer est de regarder dessous, entre les roues. S'il y a une inscription "design by epfl / écal", alors c'est qu'il n'est PAS transformable.












Thymio avant 2012 : PAS transformable
"design epfl / écal / mobsya" écris entre les roues


Thymio après 2012 : transformable
Pas d'inscription entre les roues




Puis-je transformer mon Thymio moi-même ?
C'est possible mais ce n'est pas simple. Cette procédure ne doit être faite que si vous êtes familier avec l'électronique et si vous avez de l'expérience avec un fer à souder. Vous devrez ouvrir Thymio et souder les quatre pins du module radio à l'intérieur. Attention, cette procédure, si elle est mal réalisée, peut endommager votre robot.
Quand mes contreparties seront-elles livrées ?
Soyez assurés que vos contreparties seront envoyées dès que possible, au plus tard en novembre. Le développement est bien avancé, cette campagne de crowdfunding vise premièrement à financer la première production et la certification des robots. Nous avons déjà de l'expérience en production de robot à grande échelle et vous tiendrons au courant de l'évolution de la production. Vous n'aurez pas de mauvaises surprises !
Comment la transformation de mon robot s'effectuera ?
Vous nous envoyez votre Thymio, nous lui ajoutons le module et mettons un dongle USB dans sa boîte et vous le recevez en retour ! Vous devrez envoyer votre robot avant la fin du mois d'août 2015 pour être sûr de le recevoir en novembre ! Si vous rater cette échéance, pas de problème, votre robot sera transformé au plus vite ! Nous ne pourrons par contre pas vous garantir qu'il sera de retour pour novembre dans ce cas.
J'ai oublié d'ajouter des frais d'envois / J'ai fait une erreur dans le prix. Comment puis-je arranger ça ?
Cela peut arriver, pas de panique ! Avant de livrer vos contreparties, nous contacterons chaque contributeur par mail pour vérifier votre adresse et vous donner des instructions sur comment payer les frais d'envoi si ce n'est pas déjà fait!
Mon adresse de livraison n'est pas correcte, puis-je la changer ?
Oui, bien sûr ! Avant de livrer vos contreparties, nous vous contacterons tous individuellement pour vérifier votre adresse.
Retourner en haut de la partie française 
Retourner tout en haut de la page

story:
About The BulletSafe Backpack Panel

Making bulletproof vests is a very rewarding job. The products we create keep people safe at their jobs. Security guards, cops, and people who work in dangerous jobs can worry less because the vests we make protect them. I love my work.

I also love being a dad.  I have three kids. They are my favorite kids in the history of the universe. I love them more than this sentence could ever express. Watch them do their best in this video. I'm so very proud of them. 

I don't fear for my kids' safety every day, but I also cannot imagine what it would be like to lose them.  Thinking about such things is what drove me to make them some bulletproof backpack inserts. I made the panels from the same materials we use in our bulletproof vests.   

I can make the same bulletproof backpack panels for you too. It isn't too hard for me to do: I own BulletSafe, a bulletproof vest company. So we have all of the equipment and expertise. The panels are reasonably priced and high quality as well. I think you will like them.

When you contribute to the project I'll order the raw materials and have everything stitched up.  It takes a bit of labor, but I hope it will bring you the same peace of mind that protecting my children brings me.


What You Get & What You Give

Here is how this campaign works:

  • Your contribution of $89 funds the materials, costs and labor of making a backpack panel for you.
  • The price includes shipping to you anywhere in the US as well.
  • The panel is made from the same thickness and style of ballistic material as our BulletSafe Bulletproof Vest.
  • These panels protect really well.  They offer NIJ level IIIA Protection, which is the highest level of protection that soft armor offers. 
  • It will stop all handgun rounds up to and including a .44 Magnum which is an extremely powerful handgun. 
  • The panel is 10" by 12" in size, about the size of a magazine.  It weights 1 1/4 pounds.
  • It includes a tough, washable exterior cover, so it will survive one of the harshest environments in the world: a kid's backpack. 
  • This panel is perfect for protecting the world's most important people.
  • If you own a store, you can sign up too.  You'll receive a wholesale batch of panels as well as some materials to help you display them and sell them in your store.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you don't have a need for a bulletproof backpack panel, but you like our project, perhaps you could tell someone about it?  We would be very grateful if you shared.

Here is a Transcript of the Video

Not everyone understands kid-speak, so here is a transcript of video.

Kid #1: My Dad owns a bulletproof vest company and he made me this.  It keeps me safe.  It's made from the same stuff as the bulletproof vest, BulletSafe.

Kid #2: It isn't heavy and it is also strong so that I can put this and other stuff in my backpack.

Kid #3: The outside is washable in case I spill something on it.

Gorgeous Woman: In our family, we protect what is most valuable.

Guy: That's right, I'm Tom and I run BulletSafe a bulletproof vest company.  I made these panels for my kids to keep them safe too. I can do the same for you.  If you fund this campaign, my company will send you this panel.  It is 10" by 12", reliable, washable and durable. umm. If you want to protect what is most precious to you, I think it is a great choice.  

Thank You

Sincerely, 

Tom  Nardone, President - BulletSafe Bulletproof Vests.

____________________________________________________________________

Some Fine Print:  This item can only be shipped to addresses within the USA.  It is not available outside the US.  There are regulations related to exporting body armor and bulletproof materials that are way beyond the scope of this project, so we cannot export this product.  Also, if you have been convicted of a felony, you could get in trouble for owning this item, so don't buy it.  Thank you.

story:
Effortlessly save and share your great ideas, careful notes, epic prose, and artistic doodles.

How it works

Designed to work seamlessly with the included Boogie Board Blackboard paperless writing tablet so everything is instantly saved to the smart pen and streamed via Bluetooth to your smartphone and our handy Blackboard app. Organize your strokes of genius into folders, highlight important parts, edit unimportant ones and share them with anyone or any other app with ease. 

4 simple steps

Write: The Carbon Copy Pen is exceptionally smart and is always saving what you write, storing it in the pen. Simply start to write and you're good to go... 

Save: Ready to "Turn the Page?" - Tap the Carbon Copy Icon near the bottom right hand corner to let the pen know you are done with that page of notes and that you are ready to start a new page. If connected to the app, tapping the icon will also instantly stream the page of notes from your pen to the app.

Erase: Like all Boogie Board products, simply click the button to "erase" the screen and start another page. 

Organize: Keep organized with the many save, edit and share features included in the app. 

 

Get Smart

Here at Boogie Board we make a variety of paperless writing tablets. But the one that works with the Carbon Copy Pen is called Blackboard. The tablet is “always ON”. There is nothing to plug-in or charge. Our Blackboard tablets come in 2 sizes, the Blackboard Letter (8.5" X 11"), and the Blackboard Note (5.5" X 7.25"). 

We’ve created a smart, Carbon Copy template which allows the Carbon Copy Pen to save what you write. The template is simply tucked behind the semi-transparent Blackboard screen. As you write, you see your writing and the Pen saves every stroke discretely in the pen.

The Pen is lightweight, easy to use and consumes very little power. Charges last for weeks before needing a recharge (via the included micro USB cable). 

We’ve created a simple and intuitive app that works with both Apple® and Android® smartphones. When you write on your Blackboard using the Carbon Copy Pen, everything you write is instantly saved to your pen. When your pen is near your phone, you simply sync it with the App to transfer your notes via Bluetooth. You can re-organize them into other folders, highlight them, mark them up, or erase unwanted bits digitally via the app. And, best of all, you can share them as an image or PDF file with other apps or anyone you like.

 

Carbon Copy Pen Details

 

Blackboard by Boogie Board Details

Blackboard Letter & Note are simple & versatile. Always on and ready to write. Nothing to plug in or charge.

Natural Writing Experience

 

Easy Clear/Erase and Lock 

Durable Construction

Due to our unique paperless, inkless system, you never have to buy more notebooks or ink cartridges again! A complete solution that will last years without needing to invest more.

 

Why we made the Carbon Copy Pen

story:
So why Globus Browser? At the moment Globus VPN+TOR is totally free! For All devices!  Now the beta version of the new browser is available! See details about operation of the new browser in one of the videos below.

Globus Browser – First Ever VPN+TOR Privacy Browser. Full anonymity and security at the highest level. 

Globus has created a Virtual Private Network (VPN) browser built on the Chromium base. The browser is specifically designed to escape from service providers' restrictions.  As technology progresses, privacy and security become an escalating issues, Globus Browser is the solution to these concerns.

Globus is the answer for the growing international demand for secure applications.  Our product is far easier, more reliable and convenient to use than any other solution available today. Globus Browser is an “Out of the Box” product with no limitations by default, which is simple and secure unlike most of the other available VPN solutions.

How does it work?

With the help of the VPN agent, all traffic is automatically redirected through Globus owned servers in England, Germany, US, Russia and other countries. Every user can choose the preferred location of the server through which the traffic will be redirected at any time with a click of a mouse.… It’s just that simple!


                              



Globus uses the encryption key of 1028-bit to 2048-bit, meaning even the most sophisticated machine will require more than one million years to hack the key. By following available protocols as IPSEC VPN (universal and very fast) and OpenVPN (steady and extremely secure) it guarantees that this encryption type will indisputably protect your private information with ease.

Further more Globus has managed to embrace the VPN and Tor together for even higher level of privacy and security. Globus Servers+TOR allows you to visit the sites closed for the usual Internet browsing.

                                   


For those unaware or unfamiliar with VPN or Tor, we will explain what these are and how they enable the highest level of privacy and security.

Brief Introduction of VPN…  

Every Internet user will realize that all his or her actions on the Internet are written by his Internet Service Provider (ISP) or may be intercepted by third parties and that his personal IP address can be equated to his passport number.

This is how an ordinary Internet connection looks like. All Internet traffic is not encrypted. The destination node sees your real IP address.


And this is how a VPN Internet connection looks like. All Internet traffic is encrypted. The destination node sees VPN server's IP address.



Have you ever thought about the fact that absolutely all of your actions on the Internet can be tracked and used against your will? After all, ISP's usually collect all this data as they are bound to store it for quite a long time.

Globus VPN technology creates a secure tunnel between your PC and one of the VPN servers. The tunnel encrypts all user's’ Internet traffic (including all applications' traffic) and hides user’s IP address by replacing it with the IP address of the VPN server. VPN service will become a supporting tool for those who care about safety and anonymity and those who don't want to share their personal data with their ISP's and those websites they visit.


Benefits of Globus VPN Secure Privacy Browser and TOR

  • Unblock websites - Unblock YouTube, unblock Facebook, unblock Twitter, sites at school, the library, gaming sites or your office with Globus Secure Privacy Browser from anywhere. You can bypass filters and firewalls set by your network administrator to gain access to your favorite content.
  • Anonymous surfing - Because of privacy and security concerns, you may want to browse the Web anonymously. Globus Secure Privacy Browser creates an encrypted tunnel between your computer and our servers to let you conduct your online activities (visit the websites you want, make online transactions, download files) anonymously, without being tracked and spied upon.
  • Hide your IP address - The Internet is infested with spammers, snoopers, and hackers. They silently monitor your online activities and steal your sensitive data like credit card information and passwords when you least expect it. If you connect with Globus Secure Privacy Browser VPN enabled, you get a new US IP address to mask your actual IP address and surf the Internet anonymously.
  • Private & secure browsing - VPN offers an enhanced level of security online. Whenever you connect to the Internet through Globus Secure Privacy Browser and VPN, your data, including passwords, financial transactions and instant messages, is secured and encrypted. Additionally, your personal information is hidden from web spies.
  • Wi-Fi security - If you browse the Internet at a public Wi-Fi hotspot like the Starbucks in your town, anyone on that network can monitor and spy on your web activities. Irrespective of where you connect from, a personal VPN secures your web browsing session and keeps your private data considerably more private.
  • Malware protection - Globus Secure Privacy Browser VPN and TOR will alert you if you visit sites that are known to contain malware, and then block the site. It detects and blocks more than 3.5 million malicious, phishing and spam sites from infecting your device.
  • Having made a server choice from TOR You will have an opportunity to visit all available TOR networks so that your provider will never find out about using TOR networks by You. (these networks will not be available unless you have chosen the server from TOR)


    Brief Introduction of Tor…

    Tor is a network of virtual tunnels that allows people and groups to improve their privacy and security on the Internet. It also enables software developers to create new communication tools with built-in privacy features. Tor provides the foundation for a range of applications that allow organizations and individuals to share information over public networks without compromising their privacy.

    Using Tor protects you against a common form of Internet surveillance known as "traffic analysis." Traffic analysis can be used to infer who is talking to whom over a public network. Knowing the source and destination of your Internet traffic allows others to track your behavior and interests.

    How does traffic analysis work? Internet data packets have two parts: a data payload and a header used for routing. The data payload is whatever is being sent, whether that's an email message, a web page, or an audio file.

    A basic problem for the privacy minded is that the recipient of your communications can see that you sent it by looking at headers. So can authorized intermediaries like Internet service providers, and sometimes unauthorized intermediaries as well. A very simple form of traffic analysis might involve sitting somewhere between sender and recipient on the network, looking at headers.


    Once a circuit has been established, many kinds of data can be exchanged and several different sorts of software applications can be deployed over the Tor network. Because each relay sees no more than one hop in the circuit, neither an eavesdropper nor a compromised relay can use traffic analysis to link the connection's source and destination. Tor only works for TCP streams and can be used by any application with SOCKS support.

    For efficiency, the Tor software uses the same circuit for connections that happen within the same ten minutes or so. Later requests are given a new circuit, to keep people from linking your earlier actions to the new ones.



    Globus VPN + TOR…

    This is a perfect security solution when users can route Tor through VPN services which will prevent your ISP from seeing that you're using Tor. On one hand, VPNs are more popular than Tor, so you won't stand out as much, but on the other hand, in some countries replacing an encrypted Tor connection with an encrypted VPN connection, would be suspicious as well but not with Globus VPN where one can select a specific server in a specific country of your choice. This is a win, win!

    Once the VPN client has connected, the VPN tunnel will be the machine's default Internet connection, and TBB (Tor Browser Bundle) (or Tor client) will route through it.

    Another advantage here is that this prevents Tor from seeing who you are behind the Globus VPN. So if somebody somehow does manage to break Tor and learn the IP address your traffic is coming from, but your VPN was actually following through on their premises (they won't watch, they won't remember, and they will somehow magically make it so nobody else is watching either), then you'll be better off. But this will not happen. 


    Mobile Friendly !

    Globus Browser also comes as a Mobile Application which supports all browsers for Android, Apple and other smartphones and tablets devices. Also with the help of our users and supporters we are planning to develop a full version of Globus Browser for smartphones and Tablets.  

                


    Do You know that visiting the top 50 websites will install over 3,000 tracking files on your computer!?

    Over 80% of websites use one or more tracking tools but with your help we can provide a solution. This fact prompted us to dig deeper for a solution to keep our computers safe and private!

    What will be done with the funds?

    Please see our short video where we explain what we plan to do with the funds we raise.



    PRIVACY LEAKAGES THAT GLOBUS PREVENTS

    Block Ads

    Globus Secure Privacy Browser blocks all annoying ads on the web by default: video ads for example on YouTube, Facebook ads, flashy banners, pop-ups, pop-unders and much more. It does this based on the filter lists you've chosen.

    Acceptable Ads

    Many websites rely on advertising revenues, so instead of blocking all ads, we decided to try and encourage websites to use non-intrusive advertising instead of annoying ads people are most like to ignore and want to block.

    Disable Tracking

    With every browsing session, there are multiple firms tracking your online activity and browsing history. There are hundreds of ad agencies tracking your every move, but with Globus Secure Privacy Browser you can easily disable most tracking, and browse the web more anonymously.

    Disable Malware Domains

    Slow startup, popups, advertisers hijacking our browser: Those are all signs of your computer being infected by malware. Even worse, computers infected by malware open the doors to all kinds of cyber criminality threats. These infected computers can then be used to sending out spam emails or attacking other computers or servers, stealing passwords, social security numbers, personal documents and credit card information.

    Globus Secure Privacy Browser can be configured to block domains known to spread malware, protecting your computer against viruses, Trojan horses, worms, spy- and adware.

    Disable Social Media Buttons

    Buttons to share content on social media platforms such as Facebook, Twitter, Google Plus and many others are placed on almost every website you visit. Even if you are not clicking them, every website containing these buttons is sending a request to the servers of the social network which can use that information to create a profile based on your browsing habits.

    You can use Globus Privacy Browser to remove social media buttons from every website, making sure that social networks can’t create a profile about you based on the websites you visit.

    And also:

    COMPREHENSIVE AD & TRACKER BLOCKING

    Globus includes a built-in protection against thousands of Tracking Scripts, Tracking Cookies & Other Tracking Agents, Ad Networks and Third-Party Widgets.

    Services such as address bar autofill are done locally in your system so your browsing never goes through our servers.

    NO Data Collection. Unlike other tracker blockers & privacy tools, Globus NEVER collects, shares or sells any data from our users!


    SEARCH PROTECTION

    All your searches are private in Globus. 
    When you visit any of the world’s leading search engines in Globus, your searches are automatically directed via  vpn to prevent search engines from saving your searches by your IP address.


    REFERER HEADER DATA NOT SENT

    Unlike other browsers, Globus does not send data about search terms you’ve entered to other 
    websites when you click on links from a search engine.


    DO NOT TRACK SIGNAL ALWAYS - ON

    We demand every website you go to not to track you. 
    And don’t worry, we also vigorously block them from tracking you!


    LOCAL ADDRESS BAR AUTO-COMPLETE

    Globus auto-completes URL’s as you type them in its address bar via a database stored locally on your computer. Other browsers send what you type in the address bar to their servers to get suggestions which means that they know every search you make and site you visit which can violate your privacy


    New Browser extensions 

    All settings shown in the video below have been tested and are fully functional.  Beta version browser is available for downloading from our new site: https://privacybrowser.org


    New Version of the Browser Includes:
    1. New site (screenshot below)

    2. Status display of the VPN connection

    3. Selected Server display (flag)

    4. Control of the status of the VPN connection

    5. Manage security settings + block tracking

    6. Selection of VPN servers

    New VPN controls will be presented in the form of 2 advanced controls and 2 extensions for display. Management of security settings and track blocking will be done from a separate extension. In order to display the current status of the VPN two indicator settings are provided: the current status of the VPN connection and an indicator of the selected server.


    All security settings will always remain free of charge!!!

    This version of the browser will provide the user with enhanced security features. The user will be able to control these features, most of which will be concentrated in the settings menu.

    •Acceptable Ads

    •Disable Tracking

    •Disable Malware Domains

    •Disable Social Media Buttons

    • Disable preloading pages

    • Disabling alternative pages with error messages

    • Turning off auto-complete options

    • Disabling the password saving features

    • Disable the transmission of information about the visited websites

    • Disable spell check

    • Disabling of Google Translate

    • Ban on usage of third-party cookies

    • Blocking elements on pages that request user data as well as advertising banners

    • Prohibition of "most visited websites"

    • Transmitting the signal "Do not track"

    • Removing user data on browser closure

    To control the security settings the user will be able to utilize a separate extension. Two optional settings will be available for the user: manual and automatic. When using the manual settings the user, by the means of checkboxes sets the required security options. The automatic version is presented as a slider with several provisions. Each status is a set of pre-configured settings corresponding to a certain level of security

    The message in the bottom right corner is showing how many tracks (bugs) has been blocked on every calling to the different websites!


    All settings can be set manually to fit user requirements!
    The browser won’t accept third-party cookies and blocks trackers as well as ads, which often include trackers. The average Web page contains six trackers with some having up to 40. A side benefit of blocking them is faster download speeds from some sites because without ads and trackers less information is downloaded to build pages, 

    Globus Secure Privacy Browser blocks referer data sent to search engines to prevent those engines from gathering and selling the data to advertisers.

    Globus Browser has all Google tracking and Web services are removed. Those services include auto-translate, address bar suggest, spell-check, URL check, malware check and home sync.

    None of a users’ browsing traffic passes through Hidden Reflex servers so it has no record of where users have browsed to. Services such as address bar auto-fill are handled locally.

    Why Privacy is Important:

    From the perspective of hundreds of ad & data collection companies, you are the product, waiting to be sold to advertisers.

    “You know that dream where you suddenly realize you’re stark naked? You’re living it whenever you open your browser.”

    The New York Times

    Online Advertising is a $50 billion business.

    Your age, race, sex, weight, height, marital status, education level, politics, buying habits, household wealth, health issues, vacation dreams, search queries and other personal details are collected and sold by data aggregators millions of times every second on ad exchanges.

    “Data collected through your browsing can determine 
    whether you can obtain a job, credit or insurance.”

    The New York Times

    “Your information can be stored, analyzed, indexed and sold as a commodity to data brokers who in turn might sell it to advertisers, employers, health insurers or credit rating agencies .”The New York Times

    There are dozens of data collection firms. The industry leader alone processes 50 trillion data “transactions” a year yielding revenues of over $1 billion. All from selling Your Data.

    Online Data is Merged with Offline Data and Sold.

    "Personally identifiable data from the online world is merged with personally identifiable information from the offline world, everyday," says the head of global privacy and public policy at Acxiom, a leading data collection firm to The New York Times.

    These companies have big plans for your data. The world's leading search engine's former CEO:

    “We know where you are. We know where you’ve been. We can more or less know what you’re thinking about.”

    "Websites Vary Prices, Deals Based on Users' Information...A Wall Street Journal investigation identified several companies including Staples...and Home Depot, that were consistently adjusting prices.”

    You would never let anyone stalk you in real life.

    Imagine hundred s of people following you around your work, your home, at stores with a notebook, writing down everything you do!! That’s what happens every time you browse the internet in an ordinary browser.


    FAQ

    Whether the result of the company on Indiegogo on a release of the updated version of the browser depends?

    Doesn't depend at all as we work on the browser already long time and already we test the updated version which it is visible on the screenshots. After the termination of the company on Indiegogo VPN and TOR service will become paid. We simply in fact offer our service for the most reasonable prices in all the Internet if at us it turns out we we will direct all money for further development of the project. All security settings will be always free!!!

    ·  How does your VPN browser work?

    Once you go online using our browser the internet connection is established between your internet service provider and our internet service provider. Everything you do online is 'encrypted' and essentially anonymous; anyone trying to break into your internet connection to steal your data (e.g. on public Wifi networks) will not be able to because your web traffic is securely hidden. Websites you visit, usernames and passwords used to login to websites, people you talk to online, and files you download and share will be out of sight by third-parties trying to monitor your online usage and potentially steal sensitive information from you.

    ·  Will my traffic be securely hidden?

    Not only is your online traffic anonymized, your online identity in the form of an 'IP address' is also hidden. Your IP address is essentially your 'online fingerprint' and identification to the rest of the online world. Your IP address can tell people and websites your physical location and which internet service provider you are using. You wouldn't show your identity to a random person in the street, so why would you reveal your online identity and location to potentially millions of online strangers?

    Our VPN browser is very easy to use, while VPN encryption may sound complicated to some people, you do not need technical knowledge to anonymize your online traffic and protect your online identity. All you need to do is install our browser and use it same as you would use Internet Explorer or Chrome.

    ·  What is the difference between a web proxy and a VPN browser?

    A VPN browser will automatically anonymously encrypt your entire internet connection and as such all applications on your computer will be secured, whereas with a web proxy you will need to configure certain applications manually (such as your web browser). Globus Browser uses much stronger encryption methods and is therefore considered extremely secure comparing to web proxies.

    ·  Will a VPN browser be slower than any other browser?

    There are a number of factors that will determine the speed you get with a VPN browser. The most obvious factor is your internet speed to begin with, and the distance between your physical location and the location of our VPN server nodes. The closer you are to our VPN server locations, there is less chance you'll experience speed loss.

    ·  Can it be used on Mac as well as Windows?

    Globus Browser can be used on any of the operating systems – Windows, Mac, Linux. There are no restrictions to the operating systems you want to run it on.

    ·  What will my ISP see when I'm connected to your VPN?

    Your ISP will only see a secured encrypted connection to one of our remote VPN servers. They won't be able to recognise your online activities and make sense of your internet traffic.

    ·  Will I need to register once Globus Browser is installed?

    No, absolutely not. We will not ask any of your personal details at any stage. Once the VPN Browser is installed you will be able to use it instantly without any registration whatsoever.

    ·  Can it be used on Mac as well as Windows?

    Globus Browser can be used on any of the operating systems – Windows, Mac, Linux. There are no restrictions to the operating systems you want to run it on.

    ·  Are mobile applications available as well?

    Yes, Globus Browser is currently available as a free application for Android and for Iphone.

    ·  How can I contact your support team at Globus?

    You can contact us on info@vpnbrowser.org or drop us a line on Facebook or Twitter and we will get back to you as soon as possible. Also please see our detail on our Website.

    ·  What will happen if you don’t raise the required funds, will this mean you will not be able to develop the Browser further?

    No, absolutely not, if we do not raise required funds we will still continue working on the Browser, however it will take a lot longer than required and possibly we will not be able to bring into life few of the ideas with expansion and variety of VPN options etc.

    ·  Are you going to charge subscription fee for Globus users after a while?

    Providing we will collect the required funds, we will endeavour not to make any chargeable changes.

    ·  When can I receive my Perk?

    Depending on the perk we will endeavor to deliver soonest after the Campaign is over. We guarantee that everyone who contributed will receive their perk. 

    ·  Do you have a BitCoin (BTC) address I can donate to?

    Yes, you can get our BTC details here. If you want a perk, email us your details at info@vpnbrowser.org

    ·  Is that possible to donate via PayPal?

    Yes sure, you can make a donation through Indiego system.

    ·  Other than contributing, how can I help?

    You can spread the word about Globus to your friends.

    Security is most effective if everybody uses it so the more people begin using Globus, the better!

So why Globus Browser? At the moment Globus VPN+TOR is totally free! For All devices!  Now the beta version of the new browser is available! See details about operation of the new browser in one of the videos below.
 



Globus Browser – First Ever VPN+TOR Privacy Browser. Full anonymity and
security at the highest level. 


Globus has created a Virtual Private Network (VPN) browser built on the Chromium base. The browser is specifically designed to escape
from service providers' restrictions.  As technology
progresses, privacy and security become an escalating
issues, Globus Browser is the solution to these concerns.
Globus
is
the answer for the growing international demand for secure applications.  Our product is far easier, more
reliable and convenient to use than any other
solution available today. Globus Browser is an “Out of the Box” product with no
limitations by default, which
is simple and secure unlike most of the other available VPN solutions.
How does it work?
With
the help of the VPN agent, all traffic
is automatically redirected through Globus owned
servers in England, Germany, US, Russia and other countries. Every user can
choose the preferred location of the server through which the traffic will be
redirected at any time with a click of a mouse.…
It’s just that simple!





                              

Globus uses the encryption key of 1028-bit to 2048-bit,
meaning even the most sophisticated machine will require more than one million years to hack the key. By following
available protocols as IPSEC VPN (universal and very fast) and OpenVPN (steady
and extremely secure) it guarantees
that this encryption type
will indisputably protect your private information with ease.
Further more Globus has managed to embrace the VPN and Tor together for
even higher
level of privacy and security. Globus Servers+TOR allows you to visit the sites closed for the usual Internet browsing.
 

                                   


For those unaware
or unfamiliar with
VPN or Tor, we will explain what these are and how they
enable the
highest level of privacy and security.
Brief Introduction of
VPN…  
Every Internet
user will realize that
all his or her actions on the Internet are
written by his Internet Service Provider (ISP) or may be intercepted by third
parties and that his personal IP address can be equated to his passport number.
This is how an ordinary Internet connection looks like. All Internet
traffic is not encrypted. The destination node sees your real IP address.







And this is how a VPN Internet connection looks like. All Internet
traffic is encrypted. The destination node sees VPN server's IP address.







Have you ever thought about the fact that absolutely all of your actions
on the Internet can be tracked and used against your will? After all, ISP's
usually collect all this data as they are bound to store it for quite a long
time.
Globus VPN technology creates a secure tunnel between your PC and one of
the VPN servers. The tunnel encrypts all user's’
Internet traffic (including all applications' traffic) and hides user’s
IP address by replacing it with the IP address of the VPN server. VPN service
will become a supporting tool for those who care about safety
and anonymity and those who don't want to share their personal data with their
ISP's and those websites they visit.


Benefits of Globus VPN Secure Privacy Browser and TOR



Unblock websites - Unblock YouTube, unblock Facebook, unblock Twitter, sites at school, the library, gaming sites or your office with Globus Secure Privacy Browser from anywhere. You can bypass filters and firewalls set by your network administrator to gain access to your favorite content.
Anonymous surfing - Because of privacy and security concerns, you may want to browse the Web anonymously. Globus Secure Privacy Browser creates an encrypted tunnel between your computer and our servers to let you conduct your online activities (visit the websites you want, make online transactions, download files) anonymously, without being tracked and spied upon.
Hide your IP address - The Internet is infested with spammers, snoopers, and hackers. They silently monitor your online activities and steal your sensitive data like credit card information and passwords when you least expect it. If you connect with Globus Secure Privacy Browser VPN enabled, you get a new US IP address to mask your actual IP address and surf the Internet anonymously.
Private & secure browsing - VPN offers an enhanced level of security online. Whenever you connect to the Internet through Globus Secure Privacy Browser and VPN, your data, including passwords, financial transactions and instant messages, is secured and encrypted. Additionally, your personal information is hidden from web spies.
Wi-Fi security - If you browse the Internet at a public Wi-Fi hotspot like the Starbucks in your town, anyone on that network can monitor and spy on your web activities. Irrespective of where you connect from, a personal VPN secures your web browsing session and keeps your private data considerably more private.
Malware protection - Globus Secure Privacy Browser VPN and TOR will alert you if you visit sites that are known to contain malware, and then block the site. It detects and blocks more than 3.5 million malicious, phishing and spam sites from infecting your device.

Having made a server choice from TOR You will have an opportunity to visit all available TOR networks so that your provider will never find out about using TOR networks by You. (these networks will not be available unless you have chosen the server from TOR)





Brief Introduction of Tor…
Tor is a network of virtual tunnels that allows people and groups to
improve their privacy and security on the Internet. It also enables software
developers to create new communication tools with built-in privacy features.
Tor provides the foundation for a range of applications that allow
organizations and individuals to share information over public networks without
compromising their privacy.
Using Tor protects you against a common form of Internet surveillance
known as "traffic analysis." Traffic analysis can be used to infer
who is talking to whom over a public network. Knowing the source and
destination of your Internet traffic allows others to track your behavior and
interests.
How does traffic analysis work? Internet data packets have two parts: a
data payload and a header used for routing. The data payload is whatever is
being sent, whether that's an email message, a web page, or an audio file.
A basic problem for the privacy minded is that the recipient of your
communications can see that you sent it by looking at headers. So can
authorized intermediaries like Internet service providers, and sometimes
unauthorized intermediaries as well. A very simple form of traffic analysis
might involve sitting somewhere between sender and recipient on the network,
looking at headers.






Once a circuit has been established, many kinds of data can be exchanged
and several different sorts of software applications can be deployed over the
Tor network. Because each relay sees no more than one hop in the circuit,
neither an eavesdropper nor a compromised relay can use traffic analysis to
link the connection's source and destination. Tor only works for TCP streams
and can be used by any application with SOCKS support.
For efficiency, the Tor software uses the same circuit for connections that
happen within the same ten minutes or so. Later requests are given a new
circuit, to keep people from linking your earlier actions to the new ones.








Globus VPN + TOR…
This is a perfect security solution when users can route Tor through VPN
services which will prevent your ISP from seeing that you're using Tor. On one
hand, VPNs are more popular than Tor, so you won't stand out as much,
but on the other hand, in some countries replacing an encrypted Tor connection
with an encrypted VPN connection, would be suspicious as well but not with
Globus VPN where one can select a specific server in a specific country of your
choice. This is a win, win!

Once the VPN client has connected, the VPN tunnel will be the machine's
default Internet connection, and TBB (Tor Browser Bundle) (or Tor client) will
route through it.
Another advantage here is that this prevents Tor from seeing who you are
behind the Globus VPN. So if somebody somehow does manage to break Tor and
learn the IP address your traffic is coming from, but your VPN was actually
following through on their premises (they won't watch, they won't remember, and
they will somehow magically make it so nobody else is watching either), then
you'll be better off. But this will not happen. 

Mobile Friendly !
Globus Browser also comes as a Mobile Application which supports all browsers for Android, Apple and other smartphones and tablets devices. Also with the help of our users and supporters we are planning to develop a full version of Globus Browser for smartphones and Tablets.

• Disable preloading pages

• Turning off auto-complete options
• Disabling the password saving features
• Disable the transmission of information about the
visited websites
• Disable spell check
• Disabling of Google Translate
• Ban on usage of third-party cookies
• Blocking elements on pages that request user data as
well as advertising banners
• Prohibition of "most visited websites"
• Transmitting the signal "Do not track"
• Removing user data on browser closure


To control the security settings the user will be able to
utilize a separate extension. Two optional settings will be available for the
user: manual and automatic. When using the manual settings the user, by the
means of checkboxes sets the required security options. The automatic version
is presented as a slider with several provisions. Each status is a set of pre-configured
settings corresponding to a certain level of security


The message in the bottom right corner is showing how many tracks (bugs) has been blocked on every calling to the different websites!

All settings can be set manually to fit user requirements!

The browser won’t accept third-party cookies and blocks trackers as well as ads, which often include trackers. The average Web page contains six trackers with some having up to 40. A side benefit of blocking them is faster download speeds from some sites because without ads and trackers less information is downloaded to build pages, 

Globus Secure Privacy Browser blocks referer data sent to search engines to prevent those engines from gathering and selling the data to advertisers.
Globus Browser has all Google tracking and Web services are removed. Those services include auto-translate, address bar suggest, spell-check, URL check, malware check and home sync.
None of a users’ browsing traffic passes through Hidden Reflex servers so it has no record of where users have browsed to. Services such as address bar auto-fill are handled locally.

Why Privacy is Important:
From the perspective of hundreds of ad & data collection companies, you are the product, waiting to be sold to advertisers.


“You know that dream where you suddenly realize you’re stark naked? You’re living it whenever you open your browser.”The New York Times

Online Advertising is a $50 billion business.
Your age, race, sex, weight, height, marital status, education level, politics, buying habits, household wealth, health issues, vacation dreams, search queries and other personal details are collected and sold by data aggregators millions of times every second on ad exchanges.


“Data collected through your browsing can determine whether you can obtain a job, credit or insurance.”
The New York Times


“Your information can be stored, analyzed, indexed and sold as a commodity to data brokers who in turn might sell it to advertisers, employers, health insurers or credit rating agencies .”The New York Times
There are dozens of data collection firms. The industry leader alone processes 50 trillion data “transactions” a year yielding revenues of over $1 billion. All from selling Your Data.



Online Data is Merged with Offline Data and Sold.
"Personally identifiable data from the online world is merged with personally identifiable information from the offline world, everyday," says the head of global privacy and public policy at Acxiom, a leading data collection firm to The New York Times.

These companies have big plans for your data. The world's leading search engine's former CEO:
“We know where you are. We know where you’ve been. We can more or less know what you’re thinking about.”

"Websites Vary Prices, Deals Based on Users' Information...A Wall Street Journal investigation identified several companies including Staples...and Home Depot, that were consistently adjusting prices.”

You would never let anyone stalk you in real life.
Imagine hundred s of people following you around your work, your home, at stores with a notebook, writing down everything you do!! That’s what happens every time you browse the internet in an ordinary browser.





FAQ

Whether the result of the company on Indiegogo on a release of the updated version of the browser depends?
Doesn't depend at all as we work on the browser already long time and already we test the updated version which it is visible on the screenshots. After the termination of the company on Indiegogo VPN and TOR service will become paid. We simply in fact offer our service for the most reasonable prices in all the Internet if at us it turns out we we will direct all money for further development of the project. All security settings will be always free!!!

· 
How does your VPN browser work?
Once
you go online using our browser the internet connection is established between
your internet service provider and our internet service provider. Everything
you do online is 'encrypted' and essentially anonymous; anyone trying to break
into your internet connection to steal your data (e.g. on public Wifi networks)
will not be able to because your web traffic is securely hidden. Websites you
visit, usernames and passwords used to login to websites, people you talk to
online, and files you download and share will be out of sight by third-parties
trying to monitor your online usage and potentially steal sensitive information
from you.

· 
Will
my traffic be securely hidden?
Not
only is your online traffic anonymized, your online identity in the form of an
'IP address' is also hidden. Your IP address is essentially your 'online
fingerprint' and identification to the rest of the online world. Your IP
address can tell people and websites your physical location and which internet
service provider you are using. You wouldn't show your identity to a random
person in the street, so why would you reveal your online identity and location
to potentially millions of online strangers?
Our VPN browser is very easy to use, while VPN encryption may sound complicated
to some people, you do not need technical knowledge to anonymize your online
traffic and protect your online identity. All you need to do is install our browser
and use it same as you would use Internet Explorer or Chrome. 
· 
What is the difference between a web proxy and a
VPN browser?
A
VPN browser will automatically anonymously encrypt your entire internet
connection and as such all applications on your computer will be secured,
whereas with a web proxy you will need to configure certain applications
manually (such as your web browser). Globus Browser uses much stronger
encryption methods and is therefore considered extremely secure comparing to
web proxies.
· 
Will a VPN browser be slower than any other
browser?
There
are a number of factors that will determine the speed you get with a VPN browser.
The most obvious factor is your internet speed to begin with, and the distance
between your physical location and the location of our VPN server nodes. The
closer you are to our VPN server locations, there is less chance you'll
experience speed loss. 
·  Can it be used on Mac as well as Windows?
Globus Browser can be used on any of the operating systems – Windows, Mac, Linux. There are no restrictions to the operating systems you want to run it on.

· 
What will my ISP see when I'm connected to your
VPN?
Your
ISP will only see a secured encrypted connection to one of our remote VPN
servers. They won't be able to recognise your online activities and make sense
of your internet traffic.
· 
Will
I need to register once Globus Browser is installed?
No, absolutely
not. We will not ask any of your personal details at any stage. Once the VPN
Browser is installed you will be able to use it instantly without any
registration whatsoever. 
· 
Can
it be used on Mac as well as Windows?
Globus Browser
can be used on any of the operating systems – Windows, Mac, Linux. There are no
restrictions to the operating systems you want to run it on. 
· 
Are
mobile applications available as well? 
Yes, Globus Browser is currently available as a free application for Android and for Iphone. 
· 
How
can I contact your support team at Globus? 
You can contact us on info@vpnbrowser.org or drop us a line on Facebook or Twitter and we will get back to you as soon as possible. Also please see our detail on our Website.
· 
What
will happen if you don’t raise the required funds, will this mean you will not
be able to develop the Browser further? 
No, absolutely
not, if we do not raise required funds we will still continue working on the
Browser, however it will take a lot longer than required and possibly we will
not be able to bring into life few of the ideas with expansion and variety of
VPN options etc.
· 
Are
you going to charge subscription fee for Globus users after a while? 
Providing we will collect the required funds, we
will endeavour not to make any chargeable changes. 
· 
When
can I receive my Perk? 
Depending on the
perk we will endeavor to deliver soonest after the Campaign is over. We
guarantee that everyone who contributed will receive their perk.  
· 
Do you have a BitCoin
(BTC) address I can donate to?
Yes, you can get our
BTC details here. If you want a perk, email us your details at info@vpnbrowser.org
· 
Is that possible to donate via PayPal?
Yes sure, you can make a donation through Indiego system. 
· 
Other than contributing, how can I help?

You can spread the word about Globus to your friends.
Security is most effective if everybody uses it so
the more people begin using Globus, the better!

story:
MOBICASE is a patent-pending, 2-in-1 laptop bag & stand that allows you to work smarter, not harder...

 

 

Stylish, thoughtfully designed and packed with 20+ features, MOBICASE is the ultimate workstation for travelers, digital nomads, mobile workers and road warriors!

As featured on...

 

"the ultimate laptop bag" - Review by Chris Jennings, Creative Live

Note: Grey/Tan colour currently unavailable

 

 

  

 

 

 

What people are saying...

 

 

Not only does the MOBICASE help you carry better... it's designed to help you work better!

Designed for efficiency

We love escaping the office to work somewhere that inspires us, but getting set up and organised can be a hassle. So we created a bag that actually helps move quicker, rather than slowing you down.

With the MOBICASE you can arrive anywhere, set up and start working ergonomically in under 20 seconds...!

 

No more slouching, slumping or hunching

How is your back feeling?

Did you just straighten up in your chair a little?

The feather-lite laptop stand built into the MOBICASE can be set up in seconds, helping you to improve posture and avoid back pain wherever you work, whether at the office, airport, café, hotel or home.

 

Unhindered access!

What's more annoying than unpacking your whole bag trying to find one thing...? Not much!

Easy access to your gear is essential for our mobile lifestyles. That’s why we’ve designed the MOBICASE to give you unhindered access to everything you need, whenever you need it.

Access while you work...

  Access while you move...

 

Keeps gear organised

The interior layout has been carefully designed to keep your gear neat, organised and visible so you don't have to waste time hunting for that thing you need.

 

Work like a pro wherever life takes you...

Video Conferencing With Laptop

Video Conferencing With MOBICASE

 

Efficiency On The Go

 

Instant Dual Screen Setup

Adaptability

MOBICASE adapts to suit your gear and your lifestyle.

 

 

 

MOBICASE is packed with the features you need and nothing else, making it the perfect lightweight laptop bag for road warriors.

 

 

Available in 2 sizes...

MOBICASE / 13

  • Designed to fit Apple MacBook / Air and other laptops with up to 13.3" screens. See Device Compatibility Guide below.
    - May fit some 14" laptops.

MOBICASE / 15

  • Designed to fit Apple MacBook Pro and other laptops with up to 15.4" screens. See Device Compatibility Guide below.

To ensure you select the correct size please refer to the laptop size guide below.

Size & Weight

 

Device Compatibility

MOBICASE is compatible with 2-in-1 & traditional style laptops with a self-supporting screen. The Laptop Retention Clip can be easily adjusted to fit a range of laptop sizes, limiting movement of your laptop within the bag and adding extra protection against drops and bumps.

PLEASE NOTE:
Tablet + Keyboard style devices such as Microsoft Surface Pro & Ipad Pro will not be supported by the laptop stand feature of MOBICASE.
 

 

 

Most people spend over 4 hours per day hunched over their laptops and other digital devices. That’s over 1400hrs per year of excess pressure on your neck and back!

The long-term effects of poor posture can cause a change in the spinal curve, poor digestion, back pain, and an increased risk of cardiovascular complications. Investing in a tool that combats these issues is incredibly important.

 

 

You’ve made it to the best part!

Learn how you can support this campaign and receive some awesome perks in return.

1. Choose a size

Check our Compatibility Guide above to see which MOBICASE is right for you and your devices.

2. Select a reward level

Choose one (and only one) reward level to become a backer.

You can always add to your pledge later on if you decide you want more but get in quick to make sure you don't miss out on early-bird discounts!

3. Relax, you’re done for now.

All details like shipping information and add-on specifics will be collected via survey after the campaign has ended.

Tooling and Production is already complete

This is not our first rodeo...  

We've been manufacturing bags for over 4 years so we are well aware of the challenges ahead and know what to expect. We have an established supply chain and between us a wealth of experience in product development, project management, logistics and after sales service. We have confidence in our timelines and we will do everything in our power to make sure we get your rewards on time.
 

 

How It All Started  

We’ve seen a massive shift in recent years with more and more people working remotely and spending less time in a conventional office setting. This growing trend is showing no signs of slowing down, so we decided to hop on board and create a product that can help people work more efficiently and effectively on the go. Four years worth of research and designing later, and we’ve created something we’re really excited about - the world’s first truly ergonomic laptop bag for everyday carry.

 

 

 

 

 

 

Manufacturer's Warranty

All Rovingwork products come with a full manufacturer’s warranty that covers manufacturing defects or faults for a period of 12 months from the date of original purchase, when the product is purchased from Rovingwork or through an authorised reseller.

Warranty does not cover wear and tear and does not apply to damage caused by accident, abuse, misuse, or modification of the Product.

If a problem occurs with your product within its warranty period, please send an email to support@rovingwork.com.au with a description and photo of the fault along with a copy of your proof of purchase. Please allow 3-5 business days for us to respond to your enquiry.

Your item will be assessed and if covered by warranty, the fault will be repaired and the item returned to you free of charge. In the case that no repair is possible, the item will be replaced or refunded.

If we determine that your return is not covered by warranty then any costs associated with returning your item to you will be your responsibility.

 

Return Policy

While all of our products are covered by a 12 month Manufacturer's Warranty, it is not our policy to offer refunds or returns on items received as Indiegogo rewards.

The support we get from our Indiegogo backers is what enables us to run and grow our business, gather customer feedback, design new products and improve existing ones. In the crowdfunding community, the items that you receive after making a pledge are referred to as “rewards” because they are not purchases in the traditional sense. They are gifts – in our case, work bags – that are sent to our supporters as a token of appreciation for their support of our business. In the same way that public television funds their service through the pledges of their supporters, who in turn receive gifts and continued programming, we have chosen to run and grow our business on a crowdfunded business model.

We appreciate your understanding of our policy and the support you have given us. If your reward truly offers no value to you, here are a few things that you could do in the spirit of crowdfunding… 

1. Give your reward to a friend. Our products might not work for you, but there are many folks out there who might find them very valuable. We’d love for you to share our gear with a friend of yours who is into photography.
2. Sell your reward to somebody. Many Kickstarter rewards were purchased below the retail value – if you want to recuperate that value and possibly even more, throw your reward up on eBay.
3. Give your reward another chance. Some of our products can take some getting used to. All of our gear is designed for use in a variety of scenarios. Maybe it doesn’t work for you right now, but perhaps you’ll find the right time and place in the future.

 

While everyone else is making bags that simply carry your stuff, we design bags you’ll never need to unpack! Working out of your bag is a game-changer for mobile workers who are constantly setting up to work in different locations. The ability to arrive, set up and start work in seconds and still have access to essential gear, when you need it means less time wasted, and more time for play. 

We've spent the past 4 years designing and delivering our range of work bags & accessories to some of Australia's leading innovative workplaces. Along the way we've worked in just about every environment possible, from co-working spaces, to libraries, hotels, airport lounges, factories and in the back of taxis.

MOBICASE is the bag we designed to suit our 'work anywhere' lifestyle and now we are excited to bring it to life on Kickstarter to help people everywhere do their best work, wherever life takes them.

 

Connect With Us

Facebook @rovingwork

Twitter @rovingwork
