story:
When Apple incorporated the type C port on MacBook Pro, many abstained from the system for its lack of standard ports. Featuring only USB-C ports, in a world still dominated by standard USB, buyers of the new MacBook Pro would be limited by the I/O. One solution would be to dongle everything, but that could make for an inconvenient carry.

While USB-C ports may be standard in the coming few years, now that most new laptops (including Windows) have dropped legacy ports, many people still rely on external hubs, adapters, and cables to get their older gear working with newer devices. Most Type-C hubs or docks in the market are missing crucial ports or fail to work.

 

We hoped to help improve this plight with a versatile and resilient multiport solution that could satisfy everyone’s USB-C needs.

VISTAR solves the primary issue that comes with buying a USB-C laptop – Ports. Encased in a compact aluminium block, VISTAR delivers incredible versatility providing ten ports of connectivity and power to your workflow in a surprisingly small package. The full-featured connectivity companion you've been waiting for - Uncluttering your workflow, your desktop and your life.

Featuring 10 ports, VISTAR delivers more connectivity and power by enabling you to add a plethora of devices of all ages to your USB-C equipped laptop, just by using one Type-C port.

Lightweight and portable, VISTAR features 4 display ports that support crystal clear 1080p and 4K UHD video outputs, an SD and micro-SD card slot to transfer photos / videos and multiple ports for USB-3.1 and USB-C for data transfer and power delivery – the possibilities are endless. Vistar is the quintessential companion for any USB-C laptop.

VISTAR delivers more connectivity, more power, and charging capability than ever before all at superspeed so that all your connected devices perform at their maximum.

With two SuperSpeed USB 3.1 Type-A ports, this multiport Hub has plenty of room for your additional peripherals. Simultaneously connect up to 2 USB-A peripherals (eg. Keboards, mice, speakers, hard drives or thumb drives) to a USB-C enabled laptop and quickly transfer documents, video and music files at up to 5 Gb/s.

You can also charge your devices through any of the two USB-A ports. Backward compatible with USB 2.0 and USB 1.1.

Utilizing the latest USB Type-C chips, VISTAR offers two USB Type-C ports:   

1. USB Type-C Power Delivery port - allows you to charge your MacBook or USB-C equipped PC (using the original laptop power adapter) while using VISTAR, ensuring your laptop remains fully charged while you’re using all the other functions of the hub. Delivering up to 87W of power to your connected devices, VISTAR supports fast laptop charging for both 13” (61W) and 15” (87W) MacBook Pro models. This port cannot be used for data transmission.

2. USB Type-C 3.0 port - supports only data transfer rates up to 5Gbps providing ultra convenience for users to add their iPhones, iPads, USB-C storage and more to their laptop.

VISTAR delivers the ultimate monitor experience providing every port you need for every USB-C situation you might encounter. Connecting an HDTV, 4K LED Monitor, 1080p projector or a legacy monitor to your MacBook or PC has never been easier.

Featuring 4 Display ports, VISTAR enables you to mirror or extend the display of your laptop in up to 4k UHD @30Hz resolution through the HDMI port, DisplayPort and miniDisplay port and 1080p @60Hz resolution through the VGA port.

VISTAR enables you to easily access photos either from your camera’s SD card or data from your mobile’s microSD card on your USB-C laptop at data transfer speeds of up to 104 MB/s.

VISTAR has been designed to deliver the ultimate connectivity companion in both form and function. It’s sleek and slim, solid, stylish and extremely versatile in order to fit into any demanding workflow without compromising on quality or performance.

Precision milled premium aluminum enclosure, polished chamfered edges and built-in 120mm/4.7in flexible USB-C connector cable all come together to make a beautiful seamless design.

Available in the same colors: Space Gray and Silver as MacBook & MacBook Pro, VISTAR is a great looking complement to your laptop. It’s tough enough to make for a great travel companion and compact enough to fit into any workspace without fuss – simply slide it into your pocket, bag or suitcase.

Since the initial conceptual design in June 2016, the VISTAR team has spent more than a year to prepare the VISTAR project.

Through initial rounds of improvements based on trial productions, we not only ensured full-functionality of VISTAR, but also managed to make it user friendly and up to the requirements of premium accessories for MacBook Pro users.

 

The above video demonstrates a fully functional pre-production VISTAR with all ports working - HDMI display, USB-C Power delivery, USB-C data, SD, microSD, USB flash drive and USB hard drive.

VISTAR is designed and built from the ground up to the highest standards of quality, reliability and performance. It's rigorously tested and backed by our 1-year Warranty. For more details, see the warranty section of our website.

     

We are a team of friends, Apple fans and users, engineers, designers, problem solvers, and explorers. We are bound together with one sole purpose in mind: create stuff to simplify and enhance everyday living!    

Our product offerings are results of solutions that we seek while experiencing the problems with the existing systems around us. We constantly strive to make human experiences better and more fulfilling.

We have designed many products/ solutions in the past which have been great success stories globally.

Here is another offering form us!

Risks and challenges

We expect to deliver VISTAR with uncompromising quality to backers according to our timeline. The prototypes are almost ready to go, but there are still many challenges that could pop up at any time.

With an experienced team of engineers and manufacturing specialists, we can minimize risks and challenges to meet the estimated delivery time. However, if there are unintended delays during the manufacturing process we will always be transparent and inform our backers, then plan an appropriate course of action.

Please note that International backers will be responsible for paying any duties or taxes levied in their home country.

Thank you for your support!
story_txt:
When Apple incorporated the type C port on MacBook Pro, many abstained from the system for its lack of standard ports. Featuring only USB-C ports, in a world still dominated by standard USB, buyers of the new MacBook Pro would be limited by the I/O. One solution would be to dongle everything, but that could make for an inconvenient carry.While USB-C ports may be standard in the coming few years, now that most new laptops (including Windows) have dropped legacy ports, many people still rely on external hubs, adapters, and cables to get their older gear working with newer devices. Most Type-C hubs or docks in the market are missing crucial ports or fail to work. We hoped to help improve this plight with a versatile and resilient multiport solution that could satisfy everyone’s USB-C needs.VISTAR solves the primary issue that comes with buying a USB-C laptop – Ports. Encased in a compact aluminium block, VISTAR delivers incredible versatility providing ten ports of connectivity and power to your workflow in a surprisingly small package. The full-featured connectivity companion you've been waiting for - Uncluttering your workflow, your desktop and your life.Featuring 10 ports, VISTAR delivers more connectivity and power by enabling you to add a plethora of devices of all ages to your USB-C equipped laptop, just by using one Type-C port.Lightweight and portable, VISTAR features 4 display ports that support crystal clear 1080p and 4K UHD video outputs, an SD and micro-SD card slot to transfer photos / videos and multiple ports for USB-3.1 and USB-C for data transfer and power delivery – the possibilities are endless. Vistar is the quintessential companion for any USB-C laptop.VISTAR delivers more connectivity, more power, and charging capability than ever before all at superspeed so that all your connected devices perform at their maximum.With two SuperSpeed USB 3.1 Type-A ports, this multiport Hub has plenty of room for your additional peripherals. Simultaneously connect up to 2 USB-A peripherals (eg. Keboards, mice, speakers, hard drives or thumb drives) to a USB-C enabled laptop and quickly transfer documents, video and music files at up to 5 Gb/s.You can also charge your devices through any of the two USB-A ports. Backward compatible with USB 2.0 and USB 1.1.Utilizing the latest USB Type-C chips, VISTAR offers two USB Type-C ports:   1. USB Type-C Power Delivery port - allows you to charge your MacBook or USB-C equipped PC (using the original laptop power adapter) while using VISTAR, ensuring your laptop remains fully charged while you’re using all the other functions of the hub. Delivering up to 87W of power to your connected devices, VISTAR supports fast laptop charging for both 13” (61W) and 15” (87W) MacBook Pro models. This port cannot be used for data transmission.2. USB Type-C 3.0 port - supports only data transfer rates up to 5Gbps providing ultra convenience for users to add their iPhones, iPads, USB-C storage and more to their laptop.VISTAR delivers the ultimate monitor experience providing every port you need for every USB-C situation you might encounter. Connecting an HDTV, 4K LED Monitor, 1080p projector or a legacy monitor to your MacBook or PC has never been easier.Featuring 4 Display ports, VISTAR enables you to mirror or extend the display of your laptop in up to 4k UHD @30Hz resolution through the HDMI port, DisplayPort and miniDisplay port and 1080p @60Hz resolution through the VGA port.VISTAR enables you to easily access photos either from your camera’s SD card or data from your mobile’s microSD card on your USB-C laptop at data transfer speeds of up to 104 MB/s.VISTAR has been designed to deliver the ultimate connectivity companion in both form and function. It’s sleek and slim, solid, stylish and extremely versatile in order to fit into any demanding workflow without compromising on quality or performance.Precision milled premium aluminum enclosure, polished chamfered edges and built-in 120mm/4.7in flexible USB-C connector cable all come together to make a beautiful seamless design.Available in the same colors: Space Gray and Silver as MacBook & MacBook Pro, VISTAR is a great looking complement to your laptop. It’s tough enough to make for a great travel companion and compact enough to fit into any workspace without fuss – simply slide it into your pocket, bag or suitcase.Since the initial conceptual design in June 2016, the VISTAR team has spent more than a year to prepare the VISTAR project.Through initial rounds of improvements based on trial productions, we not only ensured full-functionality of VISTAR, but also managed to make it user friendly and up to the requirements of premium accessories for MacBook Pro users.

 
The above video demonstrates a fully functional pre-production VISTAR with all ports working - HDMI display, USB-C Power delivery, USB-C data, SD, microSD, USB flash drive and USB hard drive.
VISTAR is designed and built from the ground up to the highest standards of quality, reliability and performance. It's rigorously tested and backed by our 1-year Warranty. For more details, see the warranty section of our website.     We are a team of friends, Apple fans and users, engineers, designers, problem solvers, and explorers. We are bound together with one sole purpose in mind: create stuff to simplify and enhance everyday living!    Our product offerings are results of solutions that we seek while experiencing the problems with the existing systems around us. We constantly strive to make human experiences better and more fulfilling.We have designed many products/ solutions in the past which have been great success stories globally.Here is another offering form us!Risks and challengesWe expect to deliver VISTAR with uncompromising quality to backers according to our timeline. The prototypes are almost ready to go, but there are still many challenges that could pop up at any time.With an experienced team of engineers and manufacturing specialists, we can minimize risks and challenges to meet the estimated delivery time. However, if there are unintended delays during the manufacturing process we will always be transparent and inform our backers, then plan an appropriate course of action.Please note that International backers will be responsible for paying any duties or taxes levied in their home country.Thank you for your support!

story:
Think Ink isn’t just a stress ball that you picked up at a career fair or the Rubik's Cube you wish you could be playing with during your meeting. Think Ink is a focus tool with a writing utensil embedded inside to help you jot down your best ideas and get $#!+ done! 

Think Ink pen is the first titanium, steel pen that bends, spins and transforms into various creative, fidgety features. For the constant fidgeters in life, we’ve created a super fun device that’s perfect for all situations, so you can discreetly fidget, whenever, wherever!

Think Ink is incredibly easy to use for fidgeting and, of course, writing. You’ll finally have something to tinker with in the office or classroom without bothering those around you.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Think Ink can do more than just satisfy the restless worker, it’s perfect for students of all ages! For the teachers who struggle with unfocused students who are in need of some extra motivation, Think Ink serves as the perfect focus tool. We even tested this product out in the classroom and found that after a few minutes of fidgeting with their Think Ink pen, students finished their work in half the time it was taking them with no focus tools at all.

Meetings, brainstorms and office vibes won’t be the same with Think Ink - and we mean that in the best way possible! Think Ink pens are great for freeing up your imagination when you’ve been crammed in the office all day. Have the team tinker with them to release inspiration while relieving any stress and anxiety that’s been brought on by an overloaded inbox.

So whether you’re a knee bouncer, hair twirler or pen clicker, everyone can stand to have some fun with Think Ink. Not only is there a good chance that you won’t be able to put it down, but you might just make your co-workers, colleagues or fellow classmates a little jealous.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Lifelong business owner and entrepreneur, Jym Daniel has always had a passion for product development. He spent years jotting down idea after idea, sitting idly by as others eventually developed similar products. Determined to turn his ideas into reality, Jym joined forces with long-time friend, Kent, in 2011 to introduce Think Ink pens to the world. 

 

Co-founder and number-cruncher, Kent Lyon, decided to help create Think Ink pens when he first tried to shop online for something to help his daughter with her fidgeting. When he found that nothing but desk toys and stress balls were available, he decided to take matters into his own hands and create something that people can use anywhere in any setting.

 

Think Ink’s design is one of a kind. The way we pieced the entire pen together will provide you with the most discreet fidgeting tools to increase your focus and let you have a little fun. Here’s what we went through to perfect our model:

 

We can’t thank you enough for checking out our project and helping us make Think Ink pens a success.

We know not everyone will be able to support us with a pledge, so even if you can’t give a dollar or purchase a Think Ink pen, if you’re a supporter behind fidgeting for focus, you can help us spread the word on Twitter, Facebook, Reddit, Instagram and anywhere else you can think of!

 

 

 

 What if my Think Ink pen runs out of ink?

No problem! We’re not here to sell you refills for life, so we’ve made it easy to replace and refill your Think Ink pen with any number of easy-to-find generic refills. As long as it’s a standard ballpoint pen refill with a plastic ink stem, you’ll have no problems at all!

What color ink does Think Ink come with?

Think Ink comes with a beautiful, smooth black ink.

story:
Without Smart Class Kit, it can easily take 30 minutes to an hour just get ready to start recording. While it only takes a minute with a Smart Class Kit. All you need is a Smart Class Pen, Smart Class Note, and your smart device.

 

Don’t waste your valuable time waiting for rendering. Once you are done with the recording, you are done.

 

Traditionally to make a lecture video, you need at least a PC, Keyboard, Mouse, Screen-recording Software, Video Editing Software. Some software even asks for a monthly/annual subscription fee. With Smart Class Kit, you can have all the functionality with a one-time purchase. 

컴팩트  

In case you need to leave your office, just grab and go. 

Interview with DR. Daniel (Macquary University)

 

 

Showcase your story with our "PaperTube" App. Record yourself along with your writing.

                                           

                                  

Deliver your thoughts with a pen and paper in a smarter way to help your students visualize the concepts better. 

Besides PaperController on the PlatePaper/Smart Class Note, you can control the app by touching the screen.

 

The Smart Class Kit is an effective video making tool that comprises of the following components 

 Shipping & VAT Charge

 International buyers are responsible for all duties and taxes. Duties and VAT are calculated as a percentage of the customs value of the goods. Any duties and taxes on your international shipment will be billed directly to you by the global carrier.

story:
This campaign is has been revised as of 2/18/13. 

The goal amount necorrectly correct. The message below will mention the correct amount needed. 

Hi my names Rob. I am a first year college my local community college.  I am one of three kids that are currently in school.  So money is tight in my family.  My parents a currently divorced and my dad doesnt pitch in that much money for me and my siblings.  And my mom is at a job where she doesnt make that much money to support all of us all the time.  My dad pays her money for child support but that is over in a few months when my younger sister turns 18.

My campain is currently to raise money so i can go buy a laptop for my mom.  She uses the computer alot for her job but isnt able to bring it home because she uses the company's computer on site.  So my goal is to buy her one so she is able to bring that to her job and use that so she is able to bring it home and work at home.  

Contributing anything to my campaign will mean alot to not only to me but to my mom.  And anyone who does contribute will recieve a personal thank you from the two of us.  She will be able to get more done at work and make her job that much easier.

As of right now i need $200 to buy her the 13" macbook air which is $1199 without tax.  I have been putting whatever money i have gotten in the past few months into this fund for my mom. I didnt ask alot for christmas and my birthday was a few weeks ago and the money i recieved from relatives has been put into this.  indiegogo wperp let me set minimum of $200 and I do not need $750.  If in the time I have set for this campain that i dont recive the $200 i will use that money to buy her a different laptop that i can afford to buy her.  And if my goal is reached in this time and more is made i will give whatever amount that is to my mom.

Having this campain goal realized will mean that my mom will be abe to get more done at her job.  She is limited to what she can do while she is working in the office without having a computer of her own. Getting more work done at her job will show her bosses that she is worth having around and could some day get a raise.

If you read this and know you cant contribute to my campain thats okay.  But if you know anyone that is able to let them know of my campain.  Every penny will be appreciated.

story:
Reaching destinations - fast, easy and secure

It's holiday season! What's better than spending your holidays in a nice place where you like to be? If there just wouldn't be all the problems that come along with traveling.
The trains are delayed, filled to overflowing or too expensive. Flights may get cancelled or delayed and the roads are jammed. How do you now get to your vacation place without spending too much time and money on the trip?

Maybe you already have this trouble behind you and now you have to work again. You're driving to your workplace everyday with three free seats in your car. Why not offer these places to people who even pay you for taking them to their workplace as well? Wouldn't it make sense to do so?

We, the people behind 8700gramm, developing TravelPool, want to solve these and other problems regarding traveling. For many things we already got to have smart solutions - so why not for traveling?


- make traveling easy.

  • You have a group ticket for the train and want to use it together with other people? Just organize your ride using TravelPool.
  • You're driving to another city or even country with your own car and want to take other people with you? Offer your seats on TravelPool!
  • You want to get more people to their workplace and not just yourself? Organize a carpool with TravelPool - fast and easy.


- make traveling smarter.

As long as the drivers want to, every potential fellow passenger can see where you are. This way you will have no problem finding drivers who are willing to take you with them. Also, drivers can just drive their everyday routes and maybe someone wants to join.
You can simply leave a message (push-to-talk or text) for the driver and he will see it instantly, being able to react on it. As a driver you don't even have to type in a single word - just talk to your potential passengers!

Are you planning your vacation beforehand? Just enter your start location and destination and you'll be shown every driver who goes there - or near your destination. Using our favorite tracks feature, you will be notified as soon as a driver offers a ride to there.
We also offer an exclusive tramp planner with which you can plan your own tramping routes. Drivers using our app can take you with them and drop you off at a location from where you can continue your trip using the app, simple and secure.
TravelPool even searches for suitable switching possibilities, so you can continue your journey as soon as possible.

If you want to continue your trip using public transport, you can find all your local stations and schedules using TravelPool. We even plan on cooperating with public transport companies so we can offer you tickets directly using TravelPool - no need to buy tickets using cash anymore! This makes traveling using public transport much easier.

This way we can reduce the traffic density which is good for the environment. Also, you'll do something good for your wallet - sharing costs makes it cheaper for everyone. Maybe you'll even make new friends during your journeys!


- make traveling secure.

Additionally, we offer an optional insurance for drivers and passengers with which you can insure yourself for a small amount. This way, you can travel safer than usually. Sadly, platforms like these are also interesting for criminals. To prevent criminals of taking advantages from our platform, we offer a panic button which directly sends out an emergency call including your exact position, name and additional information which could be useful for emergency services.


- make traveling more social.

Another exclusive feature of our app are badges which you can give to other users of TravelPool. Using these badges, you can quickly see what your travel partner likes and what he doesn't like.

You are a metal fan and would like your driver to be one as well? Just look at his profile, maybe he already has a badge indicating this, so you can be sure that you can listen to your favorite music during the trip. Attributes like being communicative  can also be defined, so you can easily build up your first impressions on the first sight.

We want to offer you a well-made combination of social network and car sharing agency. For you we want to make sure there's nothing you'll miss in our app.



Our goals and what you expect

To get over our first big hurdles, financial support is very important for us.
With your support, we can afford our needed equipment, licenses and costs for our business formation. We also have to afford traveling costs as we plan on starting in other countries as well. That's only possible with your support!

Our app concept is already worked out for most of the parts and we will publish videos and pictures explaining our app in the near future.

Every supporter will be able to take part of our beta tests, so you can try out TravelPool before anybody else gets to do so - as long as you own an Android- or iOS powered smartphone. If you want to, you can also change your username to a blue color which shows everyone that you supported us in our most important phase!



Why exactly do you need financial support?

Without the appropriate equipment, the development of such an app is not an easy task to accomplish. With your support, we will reach our goals faster, better and more secure.

We want to act as transparent as possible about this campaign, so you can always ask us for what exactly we've spent the money you've supported us with.

The money we collect using this campaign will at first be spent on new equipment.
Remaining money will be spent on business expenses like travels for expanding and our business formation.



Risks and challenges

The mobile app market is going through ups and downs, with situations changing fast. To persist in this strong market, we have to get known by a wide audience of different people. This is also a point where you can help us grow. Spread the word, let others know about TravelPool, invite your friends to support us.

Our biggest challenges are the details which will make our app unique, but our biggest challenge right now is the funding of the development. You can also support us actively with this challenge by funding us here on indiegogo. To develop state-of-the-art apps we need suitable equipment and we might also have to pay additional licensing fees for specialized software solutions needed to develop TravelPool.

Sadly, such a small team is almost unable to fund itself - so we're calling out for help. In the past many projects have shown the power of the community, funding projects from small to big. We want take this step as well using this campaign.


The team

Six apprentices, undergraduates and experienced computer scientists - six smart people developing smart apps, making your life easier. 8700 Gramm. That's the weight of six brains and that's the name of our start-up.

We are a small team which found together to revolutionize traveling over car sharing agencies. Starting in the beginning of the year 2014, we've been working out a huge concept which we want to realize. We want to realize our dream, a dream of easy and secure traveling with everybody being able to join.


Be a part of our project - support us!
Every kind of support is appreciated. Spread the word, tell your friends, support us by funding us. Whatever you do to support us, you help us getting one step closer to our big dream!

With your support, we will reach our goals faster, better and more secure.We want to act as transparent as possible about this campaign, so you can always ask us for what exactly we've spent the money you've supported us with.The money we collect using this campaign will at first be spent on new equipment. Remaining money will be spent on business expenses like travels for expanding and our business formation.Risks and challenges

The mobile app market is going through ups and downs, with situations changing fast. To persist in this strong market, we have to get known by a wide audience of different people. This is also a point where you can help us grow. Spread the word, let others know about TravelPool, invite your friends to support us.
Our biggest challenges are the details which will make our app unique, but our biggest challenge right now is the funding of the development. You can also support us actively with this challenge by funding us here on indiegogo. To develop state-of-the-art apps we need suitable equipment and we might also have to pay additional licensing fees for specialized software solutions needed to develop TravelPool. 
Sadly, such a small team is almost unable to fund itself - so we're calling out for help. In the past many projects have shown the power of the community, funding projects from small to big. We want take this step as well using this campaign.
The team

Six apprentices, undergraduates and experienced computer scientists - six smart people developing smart apps, making your life easier. 8700 Gramm. That's the weight of six brains and that's the name of our start-up.
We are a small team which found together to revolutionize traveling over car sharing agencies. Starting in the beginning of the year 2014, we've been working out a huge concept which we want to realize. We want to realize our dream, a dream of easy and secure traveling with everybody being able to join.
Be a part of our project - support us!Every kind of support is appreciated. Spread the word, tell your friends, support us by funding us. Whatever you do to support us, you help us getting one step closer to our big dream!

story:
Learn more at fluidstance.com

 

HYDRATION IS A SPONTANEOUS ACTIVITY. IF WATER IS AT YOUR FINGERTIPS, YOU DRINK.

An always-there hydration system to help you drink small, consistent amounts of water all day long.

Simply “Fillup” once per day & stay in your flow.

 

PERFECT FOR WATER ON YOUR DESK, OR FOR YOUR FAVORITE DRINK JUST ABOUT ANYWHERE.

 

 

DESIGNED TO STAY COOL FOR HOURS

 

 

 

CREATING FILLUP 

 

Water regulates your body temperature and helps transport nutrients to give you energy and keep you healthy. It keeps our brain from having to struggle against the effects of dehydration, allowing us to think more clearly than if we let ourselves get dehydrated.

 

 

WHAT WE WANT TO SOLVE

We were shocked to realize that a majority of office workers, our team included, are dehydrated at work… despite having easy access to clean drinking water.

Essentially, we are choosing to stay heads-down in our work, ignoring our thirst, rather than keeping our bodies fluid for optimal performance.

 

 

 

WITH FILLUP, YOU CAN:

 

 

HOW IT WORKS

 

SELECT YOUR PERK

 

WHAT'S IN THE BOX

 

 

"I CAN'T WAIT TO MEET FILLUP"

 

PART ART. ALL UTILITY.

Beautiful design meets premium materials, allowing Fillup to hydrate all day at the perfect temperature.

 

THE FILLUP STORY 

In 2015, FluidStance launched the first-ever balance boards for standing desks. We pioneered the active work environment by integrating a modern aesthetic form with elegant function to create active movement.

Now, we've taken what we've learned and created Fillup to move you, internally, by keeping you hydrated.

We believe there is no better way to keep your body in motion and in good health than to stay hydrated. And to stay hydrated in our busy lives, we know that fingertip accessibility to water is essential.

By placing more than a day’s worth of water next to you, your body will have the essential resources it needs to keep moving.

 

THE MAKING OF FILLUP

FluidStance’s mission is to help set the world in motion. We worked without compromise to bring Fillup to you, so you can stay fluid, both inside and out.

 

THE FLUIDSTANCE TEAM

 

At FluidStance, we aim to create a balance in the way people work, from the office to the living room, classroom, or the gym. We believe in a  balanced lifestyle and a focus on health and wellness and work hard every day to bring products to market that represent these beliefs.

Our lifestyle hardware blurs the lines between work and play, making work a more fluid and natural part of our whole lives. With that in mind, we are pleased to be able to bring you Fillup, our latest effort.

Visit Us @ fluidstance.com
#keepmoving 

 

 

WE ARE ON TRACK TO DELIVER

 

SHIPPING

We are able to ship worldwide. VAT and GST not included. Please see the reward for details on the shipping cost that applies to you.

We plan to ship starting in 12/2019. We will keep you up to date on our progress and the expected delivery date of your order.

*Actual ship dates may vary. We will keep you notified of your product ship date.

By backing now, you’ll get to own one of the very first products off of the line, plus exclusive access to provide valuable feedback that will shape future generations of the product.

 

Rainfactory is a multiple-award-winning crowdfunding marketing agency that operates as a marketing department for growing brands. Rainfactory's experienced team & data-driven, battle-tested approach ensure long-term market dominance for entrepreneurs & enterprises.

story:
Automatic Analogue and Digital Perpetual Calendar Wall Clocks 

1. Are you looking for most precise timekeeping device with multi functions features?

2. Would it be smart and innovative with fun?

3. Should it be reliable with simplification and user friendly to use?

4. Are you looking for green technology of low power device?

Four Patent Technologies Registration:

  1. PCT/CN2011/075112

  2. PCT/CN2012/078473

  3. PCT/CN2013/071583

  4. 201310203868.7

Technology Breakthrough : 

Provide our unique patent technology of Capture-Sync for Analogue and Digital Perpetual Wall Clock by capturing the current date/time from your smart phone (Android / iOS). Just simply focus camera from your smart phone to the clock.

By combining of both digital imaging recognition and point-to-point communication technology, captured current date/time information will be transmitted to Microprocessor Control Unit (MCU) which will adjust analogue hands to corrected position and LCD to display exact date/time.

There is no setting of time and calendar, low power, more display contents, high quality finishing of metal frame, nice dial designs mounting on wall for contemporary decoration at living rooms, bedrooms, kitchen rooms or etc. The battery life is up to 3 years at normal operation. 

Actual Products: 

 

 

 

Products Summary

Product Features:

Challenges:

  • Synchronize current time for both analogue and digital clock
  • Capturing date/time information from smartphone
  • Correct the hand position corrsponding to the calendar
  • Operating low power

Product Features :

  • Automatic Digital and Analogue Perpetual Clock via "Capture-Sync"
  • Include Radio-control function in USA, UK, Europe, Germany and Japan
  • Displaying date, time, perpetual calendar, temperature, humidity
  • Automatic adjustment for DST and Leap Year
  • 28 Cities selection
  • Aluminium frame with transparent polycarbonate (PC) 3D dial
  • 3 years battery life by 3xAA batteries (Not included)

Setting The Time Zone:

Setting the smart phone to synchronize with all clocks displaying the calendar at different time zones 

Daily/Monthly Report of Temperature and Humidity:

Focus camera from your smart phone to the clock, you may get the daily/monthly report of indoor temprature and humidity. Remind you to open air-conditioner, dehumidifier, humidifier, heater.....  

 

 

 

Buying Procedures:

Please see the product details at Gallery shown on top menu bar, select your item you like and record the model no. Find the price corresponded to the model no. then click. You will go to payment method page, the credit cards are avaliable to Visa, Master, Paypal.... 

We would offer 100% refund and 1 year product warranty.

Conceptual Weather Station:

The new idea of weather station is shown by very large graphical weather forecast with moon phase, digital displays of IN/OUT temperature and indoor humidity. Focus the clock dial again, the statistic chart of weather information can be displayed on your smart phone.

  

Your contributions will be one of the main sources to support us for making the tooling of products, purchasing of the materials, research on more advanced technologies, and finally, the manufacturing of the products. Your order to our products is very important to the sustainable development of our new technologies and business.

Existing Funding Grants: This technology had been granted with the patent fund from Hong Kong Government in Nov 2011 and Jun 2013 respectively.  It is also awarded by Hong Kong Innovation and Communication Technology Awards 2012: Best Innovation and Research (Postgraduates & Open) Award of Special Mention (Small Project). Now we are under incubation program (Incu-tech) at Hong Kong Science Park, Hong Kong.    

Our CEO, Mr. Torin Fung

Academic Background: He is studying Engineering Doctorate Degree at The Hong Kong Polytechnic University. The major research areas are electro-mechanism and image recognition by computer vision.

Past Graduates: Master of Science in Information Engineering at The Chinese University of HK. Bachelor (Hons) Degree of Engineering in Computer Engineering at City University of HK. Published 1st IEEE paper conference of Chinese Speech Recognition. Higher Certificate in Manufacturing Engineering at The HK Polytechnic University. Diploma in Electronic Engineering at IVE, Hong Kong. Certificate in Mechanical Engineering at IVE, Hong Kong

Awards: Champion in University Group of IEEHK Young Member Section Paper Contest in 1998, Certificate of Merit in University Group of IEEHK Young Member Section Project Competition in 1997 and CMA & Donors Scholarship in 1993

story:
Skip the Traffic and Park Cheaply.

A mobile app designed to mitigate your parking struggles and help you contribute to building a safer, easier and more environmentally friendly community.

  • We are Parq, the AirBnB of parking. We offer our users (hosts) the ability to rent out their parking space and make passive income. On the other hand, our renters can book their spot in advance and skip the the time it takes to search for a parking spot.

Your backing will help us create and market the most user-friendly parking app on the market. Our goal is to make your parking process easy and fun!

Most current parking apps only provide service to the driver; however, our app builds a unique relationship between the owner of the space and the driver and saves time and money on both sides of the equation.

Save Money When You Need It, Make it When You Don't.

Not only does our app benefit the driver, but you can turn your driveway into passive income.

While your away at work or if you want to make a little more spending money, just rent out your space to fellow parquers!

On Average, People Waste 1 Whole Year of Their Life Looking for Parking.

Our primary goal is to help you. Your contributions will not only contribute to innovating our current parking infrastructure, but using our app will eliminate the numerous externalities from searching for parking.  Let's save time while simultaneously helping the planet!

  • 30% of city traffic is caused by searching for parking
  • 2.5 million tons of CO2 are dumped into our air
  • 260 million gallons of gas are wasted
    • Information provided by IBM
      • https://www-03.ibm.com/press/us/en/pressrelease...
      • https://www.usatoday.com/story/money/2017/07/12...

It's Already There, We're Just Going To Publicize It.

This idea stems from sporting events where we witnessed homeowners renting out their driveways or lawns for people attending the game.

  • With a publicized platform for these people to use, Parq will have a dramatic impact on the way we perceive weekend gamedays.
  • At the University of Southern California about 67,000 people attend games on a weekly basis and only 3,400 parking spots are available. 
  • Homeowners around the nation are following this concept on game day. Join us in making this an everyday experience. 

Your contributions will help our goals of launching a pilot this fall.

 

Challenges

One of our challenges to running a successful app is raising capital and having backers that will support us in achieving early milestones. Your contribution and participation will help us build the most user-friendly parking app on the market while also creating a  more environmentally friendly community.

Every Little Bit Helps.

  • Your help extends beyond financial support.
  • Simply share the link below with your friends and family and witness your contributions help us grow!
  • https://igg.me/at/parq-indiegogo-fund
  • We would love to hear from you as well! Leave any comments or questions.

story:
At our heart, we believe that the catalyst of a better world is through effective and good education. In our first attempt to bring this social cause to reality, we are joining the HEC Montreal Social Business Competition. 1 dollar = 1 vote. Please support us!

 

Education 2017

Today, we have seen frequent arrangements to provide basic education to those who could not afford it. This is indeed a fundamental step in empowering humanity.

However, it is unfortunate that there are less focus on QUALITY. Often, we carry the notion that improving quality in education is too expensive and not urgent. However, the 21st century brings the exact opposite. It is URGENT and it could be CHEAP. But, this is achievable only if people like you who are reading this are willing to verb the action.

In the education field, our business solutions will focus on the development of integrated learning platforms to engage students in learning contents. The following are the two key “relief” we want to provide to our consumer.

1. Better Education & Lifelong Learning

“Why do I have to learn these stuff?” is a question which is familiar to many students. In an annual survey of 81,000 high school students conducted by Indiana University’s HSSSE program, 73% said they don’t like school and 60% doesn’t find value in the work they are doing. Another poll that was asked to 500,000 high school student reveals that 4 of 10 students in feels not engaged in their learning (bored). This figure speaks as a representative that there are serious issues regarding student’s learning motivation. Students will become our civilization’s future and in a world where they were not motivated to learn new things, we will witness a scene of unprecedented danger & pitfall. 

2.Scientific Literacy & Insightful Lifestyle

 Living in the age of information, we are pressed with issues concerning critical decision making. For instance, should we encourage Genetically Modified Food development? Scientific literacy is a nessary tool to have today! It helps decide what to do with our life, family, etc (for instance, being literate regarding sugar consumption will help us decide a good diet that increase lifespan). 

Education 2020

We envision a future where both 1. Better Education and Lifelong Learning & Scientific Literacy and Insightful lifestyle are qualities & experience that learner can receive. Here is an example of what we would like to do to achieve that.

CURRENT : In the RPG gaming category, there is a game called “Don’t Starve” where the mainprotagonist is a young boy living in the wilderness, constantly getting resources to survive and craft weapons like “Dark Swords” with the aim of defeating the ultimate evil dark lord.

OUR GAME : We would change the main protagonist as an engineered controllable cell living in a body of a person. Just like other organism, the cell has to gather nutrients & resource (exploring different chemical names, etc), craft weapon such as antibody (get to know medicine) to defeat ultimately, the Ebola Virus (great story line to keep people engage). Gamers ranging from students to even adults can subconsciously explore how the body works, extent their scientific literacy and even be motivated to learn about the topic.

WHO ARE WE TARGETING? We believe our product best suit young students who are in their primary - secondary education. However everyone can benefit from the video gamification of school subjects. By using Jason's Galapagos product, we hope students can effortlessly explore the game subject in a visible manner. We will ensure that the information conveyed by the game is always reviewed by expert in the field - whether it is physics, math, phycology, etc.

WHEN ARE WE LAUNCHING THIS? We are launching different category of game subject at different times. Our first game will be a mobile game which will explore the briefly science of codes and convention in the media called : Left in the sky and is expected to be launched by September/October. Our biology based game that you see in the picture will be launch on a later date!

YOUR PERKS

Purchasing our perks will bring you benefits related to the first game we are going to launch in mobile: Left in the sky.

Left in the sky brings you to journey with a little girl  who comes from a remote village to the city which is not exposed to our modern world. Player are be able to interact with the girl and through the interaction, player can explore the science of codes and convention in our media! Since this is a social project, the perk will generate reward for the whole community. The game is currently under construction and there will be many major improvement to be made over the next few months!

Here are some screen shot of the game:

 

HEC Montreal Social Business Competition

As we mentioned before, we are currently participating in the HEC Montreal Social Business Creation Competition as our first step to make this social business a reality . We have succeeded to pass the second round of the competition and we need you to help us get to next round of the competition. If we are able to go to the third round, we would be able to have the opportunity to pith the business to investors! Please support us in this campaign by buying the perks for our project. (buying our perks means that you are voting to make this a reality!!)

http://socialbusinesscreation.hec.ca

About Us

Jason in Greek is a word which means healer & the Galapagos is a renowned volcanic archipelago noted for it’s entirely unique animal and plants as the result of being separated from the rest of the world. As a social startup, Jason’s Galapagos aims to cure social issues with new approaches, daring to be literally different just like Galapagos is from the rest of the world.

We are consisted of a talented team of a students from Ritsumeikan Asia Pacific University who shares the same vision!

jasonsgalapagos@gmail.com

https://www.facebook.com/updatetheoutdated/

https://jasonsgalapagos.wixsite.com/campaign

https://twitter.com/Jasonsgalapagos

Our biology based game that you see in the picture will be launch on a later date!YOUR PERKSPurchasing our perks will bring you benefits related to the first game we are going to launch in mobile: Left in the sky.Left in the sky brings you to journey with a little girl  who comes from a remote village to the city which is not exposed to our modern world. Player are be able to interact with the girl and through the interaction, player can explore the science of codes and convention in our media! Since this is a social project, the perk will generate reward for the whole community. The game is currently under construction and there will be many major improvement to be made over the next few months!Here are some screen shot of the game: HEC Montreal Social Business CompetitionAs we mentioned before, we are currently participating in the HEC Montreal Social Business Creation Competition as our first step to make this social business a reality . We have succeeded to pass the second round of the competition and we need you to help us get to next round of the competition. If we are able to go to the third round, we would be able to have the opportunity to pith the business to investors! Please support us in this campaign by buying the perks for our project. (buying our perks means that you are voting to make this a reality!!)http://socialbusinesscreation.hec.caAbout UsJason in Greek is a word which means healer & the Galapagos is a renowned volcanic archipelago noted for it’s entirely unique animal and plants as the result of being separated from the rest of the world. As a social startup, Jason’s Galapagos aims to cure social issues with new approaches, daring to be literally different just like Galapagos is from the rest of the world.We are consisted of a talented team of a students from Ritsumeikan Asia Pacific University who shares the same vision!jasonsgalapagos@gmail.comhttps://www.facebook.com/updatetheoutdated/https://jasonsgalapagos.wixsite.com/campaignhttps://twitter.com/Jasonsgalapagos

story:
ink 2 is our newest invention, crafted to facilitate your daily handwriting tasks, and refined based on customers’ feedback. The ink 2  boasts many unique advantages:

  • Ergonomic design with lighter body weight
  • New power switch
  • Longer battery life with AAA battery or Rechargeable battery
  • 2X strength pen tip - No clicking noise & no distraction.
  • Compatible with all iPad Apps
  • Compatible with iPad 1/2/3/4/Air/mini/mini with Retina Display; iPhone 4/4S/5/5S


Don’t chisel away at your iPad like a cave man with a thick-headed stylus. Let’s fast forward to the space age, and the dawn of a new generation of handwriting tool with a new level of comfort and smoothness. Give ink a try, your productivity will thank you.


Expected Technical Details

Length: 140 mm
Weight: 30 g
Diameter of pen: 12 mm
Diameter of pen tip: 2.4 mm
Battery Life: up to 19 hours of continuous writing
Replaceable pen tip: up to 4 kilometers of writing distance


FAQ

  1. Is ink 2 compatible with Paper 53, Sketchbook and Procreate?                  Yes, ink 2 is compatible with all of your iPad apps.
  2. Is ink 2 compatible with iPad Air or iPad mini Retina display?                      Yes, ink 2 is compatible with iPad 1/2/3/4/Air, iPad mini & iPad mini Retina display.
  3. Where can I buy the battery for ink 2?                                                                     ink 2 uses AAA battery which is easily to buy from your local store.
  4. Does ink 2 have palm rejection?                                                                                ink 2 does not directly support palm rejection, but most of iPad apps already incorporate palm rejection that works well with ink.
  5. I use ink 1 on iPad Air, and the performance is not good. How about ink 2? ink 1 was built before the release of iPad Air. During that time, we were unable to configure ink 1 to meet iPad Air's best performance. As of today, ink 1 is already compatible with iPad Air and iPad mini with Retina Display. This goes the same as ink 2.
  6. Does ink 2 use Bluetooth technology?                                                                   No! ink 2 is very easy to use without any additional connectivity to your iPad.
  7. I notice ink 2 uses AAA battery. Can I use rechargeable battery?            Yes, you can use rechargeable battery to extend battery life.

story:
About

Fluid organization, modular components, and effortless access keep creative tools organized, camera gear at hand, and a space for anything and everything. It’s minimal and sleek design seamlessly transitions to suit the commuter, photographer, and adventurer.

Check out the short 1:00 video below for an in-depth look at the Tactical Tote.

Materials

  • Military Grade Waterproof Tarpaulin
  • Fully Lined w/High-Viz Waterproof Nylon
  • SuperFabric Ceramic Armor Plates = Maximum Durability
  • Volume: 1300 cu in. / 21L

Features

  • Tonal Night Reflective Logo
  • Exterior Stash Pocket w/ Waterproof Zipper
  • Large Outside Zippered Cargo Pocket
  • 2 Embroidered Edge Velcro Patches w/Laser Cut Molle
  • 15" Padded Laptop Compartment
  • Large Zippered Interior Pocket For Tablet, Books, etc.
  • 2 Side Mesh Pockets
  • Detachable Shoulder Carry Strap
  • D Ring Attachment Point
  • Magnetic Top Opening Closure

Check out the short 1:30 video below for an in-depth look at the Urban Responder Rucksack (UR-2).

Materials

  • Military Grade Waterproof Tarpaulin
  • Fully Lined w/High-Viz Waterproof Nylon
  • SuperFabric Ceramic Armor Plates = Maximum Durability

Features (Exterior)

  • Quick Access Lockable 15" Padded Laptop Compartment w/Waterproof Zippers
  • Water Bottle/Stash Zippered Pocket
  • Cellphone/Wallet Zippered Stash Pocket
  • 2 Embroidered Edge Velcro Patches w/Laser Cut Molle
  • Contoured Shoulder Straps
  • Sternum Strap
  • Air Channel Back Padding
  • Lumbar Pad Concealed Secret Zippered Pocket
  • Neoprene Port for Cables or Hydration Tube
  • Reflective Logo on Front & Shoulder Strap (Visibility in Both Directions)
  • Iconic Military Top Closure
  • Dual Zipper Main Compartment Access: Panel Loader Fashion

Features (Interior)

  • Zippered Tablet/Stash Pocket •
  • Large Pocket Sleeve for Hydration Bladder, Folio, Wet Jacket, etc.
  • Dry Bag Style Waterproof Collar Closure

MODULAR ATTACHMENT BOARD

Each UR-2 comes standard with the removable modular organizer board and grey velcro backed commuter pockets.

We are thrilled to be bringing you these awesome everyday carry products, but be rest assured, it's not our first Kickstarter. We have a proven track record of exceeding backer expectations on all fronts and have learned so much from our previous two campaigns. We are an established brand with thousands of customers in more than 30 countries enjoying our products!

Kickstarter Customer Quotes

"Thank you so much. You team is really the best l've ever met on Kickstarter!"

- Ronnie

"By the way, thank you for your active communication throughout the campaign. I backed quite a few projects and you had the best communication of all of them! That's something very important and you did great! Thanks again."

- Lorenzo

"Brian, thanks for being so attentive, honestly the best customer service I’ve had with a company!"

- Carlos

"Out of the many Kickstarters I have backed, yours was the smoothest! Kudos to the whole team."

- Chris J

"I’m loving the gear I’ve bought from you so far!! The Responder Jacket and Dave Jr Duffel have been far and away the best campaigns I’ve backed through Kickstarter!"

- Kenneth

 

---

 

Risks and challenges

If the bag successfully funded, we will immediately place a purchase order with our manufacturing partner, a well-established vendor of many premium brands around the world. Our manufacturer, as well as others in the supply chain are all set and ready to begin performing once they receive our green light to proceed. The funding will be used for material acquisition, production and fulfillment.

Although we are experienced in the process of bringing products to market on time, there is always the chance for unplanned circumstances that arise during the production period. Our past experience will help in recognizing problems and resolving the issues quickly and efficiently. We are a premium brand hyper-focused on delivering the highest quality product we can and providing our valued customers with a top-notch shopping experience from beginning to end.

Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

Questions about this project? Check out the FAQ

story:
At Makers Cabinet, we believe that drawing and writing tools should guide the path towards creativity rather than limit its potential. Instead of being a burdening generic tool the Iris is intuitive and unique. 

We aim to inspire everybody that uses the Iris with a sense of satisfaction. Its mesmerising mechanism sparks delight in everyone that sees it open and close. We believe that Iris helps rejuvenate the flow of creativity at moments of mental block. 

 

The concept of the Iris came from conversations with our community. Our supporters said that circle drawing tools lacked innovation and were difficult to use. These tools were unreliable and short-lived. So, we set out to completely redesign the circle drawing tool.

As amateur photographers, we noticed that camera apertures were reliable mechanisms and were surprised that they had not yet been developed for other purposes. In response to this observation, we designed an instrument that brings the quality of the camera aperture to your desk.

The mechanism of the camera aperture has endured 200 years of photographic history. Owing to this resilience, the Iris is the perfect replacement to the inadequate rotary drawing compass. 

 

Rotary compasses are:

  • Difficult to hold
  • Useless without a ruler
  • Restricted to certain mark-making tools
  • Immortalised by the holes in our pages

 

Iris is:

  • Easy to use
  • Compatible with any mark-making tool
  • An accurate measuring instrument
  • Seamless on your page

At Makers Cabinet, we strive to create objects with a guarantee of longevity and durability. Iris is the product of this ethos. 

 

Iris is engineered using the most durable and effective materials. Its rings are machined from solid brass that patinas, improving with time and use. The leaves are resistant to ink and graphite as they are stamped from carefully selected stainless spring steel that retains its shape. The Iris houses twenty intricately designed leaves that enable you to create accurate circles with every stroke of your pencil.

 

 

The Iris is a reliable measuring instrument. In conversations with our users, we were inspired to add a scale along the side of the circle aperture. This allows you to effortlessly draw circles and measure diameters. The scale is marked with a high fidelity laser etching that denotes accuracy down to a millimetre. 

Reminiscent of a camera’s aperture enclosure, its scale is marked with a red dot. This allows you to read the diameter of your circle without the impediment of any other tool. Below the Iris’ leaves sits a natural rubber footprint that seamlessly grips to your page. This means that all your focus can be on the circles you are drawing and not the instrument that you are using.

Every Iris purchased in the Indiegogo comes with a wooden base. 

Our first wooden base prototype was intended to simply support the Iris on your desk. However, at Makers Cabinet, we design every tool with the intention to be both beautiful and functional.  

Accordingly, our updated base locates the centre-point of a circle. To achieve this, simply lay the Iris flat on your surface and place the base against the inside of the aperture. The flat edges point to the centre of the circle, taking your drawings to the next level.

 

 

In 2017 we launched our first Kickstarter for the Høvel pencil plane. Høvel is a completely redesigned pencil sharpener which planes your pencil to a perfectly crafted point reminiscent of woodblock planes.

Since we launched our first crowdfunding campaign, the Høvel has won a Stationery Award, has been stocked in 20 stores worldwide and galvanised our business. Get a Høvel at a reduced rate on our website by clicking the button below! (your dicount will be automatically added at checkout)

story:
The right of the people to be secure in their persons, houses, papers, and effects, against unreasonable searches and seizures, shall not be violated, and no Warrants shall issue, but upon probable cause, supported by Oath or affirmation, and particularly describing the place to be searched, and the persons or things to be seized.

- The Fourth Amendment to the United States Constitution

Restore the Fourth is a grassroots, non-partisan, non-violent movement that organized and assembled nationwide protests on July 4th, 2013. On Independence Day, tens of thousands of Americans of different political positions in over 50 cities protested in defense of the 4th amendment, particularly from the unconstitutional surveillance methods employed by the U.S. government, e.g. by the National Security Agency's PRISM program.

These demonstrations demanded an end to these unconstitutional surveillance methods and to ensure that all future government surveillance is constitutional, limited, and clearly defined.

But we always knew one day's protests wouldn't be enough. We've completed a very necessary Step One, and now it's on to Step Two.

How you will be helping us restore the fourth

We managed (miraculously in our opinion) to launch these protests entirely with volunteer help and with no financial assistance of any kind on the national level, aside from a few hundred dollars for social media ads that ran the day before and day of the protest. But we received so many unsolicited requests for information on how to donate that we were forced to think of how we could use these resources to help protect the 4th amendment, and we determined that was by taking this movement to the next level.

We seek to raise $10 000 with which to purchase the tools to create a long-term Restore the Fourth national organization to keep the fight going well passed the 4th of July. Where we have focused on advocacy this past week, we will turn much of our focus on taking the fight to the nation's courthouses and legislatures and other channels of lawful influence, with the intention of keeing it going until the 4th amendment is once again being respected by the US government.

We will convene this upcoming week (July 8th - 12th) with the leaders of our most successful and active local organizations to lay out a structure for a permanent organization dedicated to defending the 4th Amendment against unwarranted search of all kinds.

Some of the projects on our radar...

- Maintaining the significant media attention we brought towards the issue of unconstitutional surveillance by continuing to engage with the press and with users on social media about our ongoing and future projects.

- Planning, coordinating, and promoting future nationwide protests.

- Planning, coordinating, and promoting a massive one-city protest in Washington D.C.

- Phone call, petitioning, and letter-writing campaigns directed towards both Congress and state governments.

- Exploring more local spheres of influence such as town hall meetings.

- Political lobbying in defense of the 4th Amendment.

- Legal action in defense of the 4th Amendment.

Some examples of expenses we will incur...

- Paying for various basic tools required to operate, such as a P.O. box and dedicated press phone number.

- Website hosting and maintenence fees. On peak days our website traffic has reached levels worth $27 in server bandwidth fees, or a rate of $800 per month.

- Fees for legally registering our organization. Options we are considering include becoming a 501c3 or 501c4 non-profit.

- Accounting and legal help. While we do this with free tools or seek pro bono assistance to the extent that it's possible, we may need a modest level of paid help in these areas.

- Strategic, geographically-targeted online advertisements that increase attendance at protests and bring attention to the issue of unconstitutional surveillance.

- Local organizers of protests incur various fees including for permits and flyers/signs. While they currently do their own fundraising or pay out of pocket, we would like to provide assistance in the future when necessary and worthwhile.

"That sounds nice but there's a lot of good things to donate to. Why Restore the Fourth?"

- Restore the Fourth is run entirely by volunteers, and we expect to keep it that way for a long time, if not forever. None of your money will be going towards salaries, let alone six or seven figure salaries.

- Because we successfully ran an essentially-unfunded campaign, we know how to operate inexpensively, including how to find free or heavily discounted versions of many tools. That's why we only need $10 000 to launch. None of your money is going towards unnecessary extravagance. All of it is going towards the most useful things we could buy per dollar.

- Protest movements are known for being "co-opted" by partisans and special interest groups, especially when those partisans and special interest groups are the ones providing the cash. Successful community-centric fundraising like this will allow Restore the Fourth to remain independent and non-partisan while also enjoying the benefits of a legally registered organization with some cashflow.

"Who are you?"

Restore the Fourth's national organization is currently run by a board of six individuals from across North America that assist, coordinate, and promote our various local chapters. We are currently working on an "About Us" page and on expanding the board to include more of our most active and well-run local organizers on an official basis.

Currently our finances have been entrused with Andrea O'Neill, our representitive from the Washington chapter, while we wait to open a merchant account and to incorporate. You can contact Andrea O'Neill by emailing restorethe4thdc@gmail.com or by calling 540-993-8407.

Learn more about Restore the Fourth

www.restorethefourth.net

www.facebook.com/restorethefourth

www.twitter.com/restore_the4th #restorethe4th

Please feel free to contact socialmedia@restorethefourth.net with any questions or concerns you have about this campaign or suggestions for how we may improve it.

Restore the Fourth's national organization is currently run by a board of six individuals from across North America that assist, coordinate, and promote our various local chapters. We are currently working on an "About Us" page and on expanding the board to include more of our most active and well-run local organizers on an official basis.
Currently our finances have been entrused with Andrea O'Neill, our representitive from the Washington chapter, while we wait to open a merchant account and to incorporate. You can contact Andrea O'Neill by emailing restorethe4thdc@gmail.com or by calling 540-993-8407.
Learn more about Restore the Fourth
www.restorethefourth.net
www.facebook.com/restorethefourth
www.twitter.com/restore_the4th #restorethe4th
Please feel free to contact socialmedia@restorethefourth.net with any questions or concerns you have about this campaign or suggestions for how we may improve it.

story:
The time has come to change the way people currently make used item deals within classic “peer-to-peer” online market places. There is a real need to break some barriers that are associated with the usual practice in this sector: lack of trust, usability frustration, various hidden costs between buyers and sellers. Nowadays the popular online tools available for buying or selling used items are websites like Craigslist or Ebay. Both are efficient, but they don’t adequately support mobility requirements. The mobile applications of those websites are just reflections of their desktop versions; there is no difference in the usability; a certain casualness, and the “on the go” aspect is still missing. Almost everybody has a smartphone and uses the support of localization services. Wouldn’t it be better to have a mobile tool that allows you to buy and sell used stuff efficiently and at an optimum price – enabling you to do business with someone located in your neighbourhood? Wouldn’t it also be better to be able to meet your transaction partner in person, check the quality of the item in real time before making a deal and without shipping costs, anonymity, abstract pay-pal accounts, or having to pay money to all those third parties for each transaction? And sometimes people just want to give things away, while others just want to hire something. They need more flexibility, a platform that takes their specific wishes into account.

Geoly is a community mobile application that brings together people who wish to buy, sell, rent, exchange, or give away used items based on their proximity and their category of interest. A customized map allows Geoly users to view their current position and localize other users (in real time) every time when there is a match (proximity and category of interest). They can use the app messaging system to communicate their requirements (buy, sell, rent, exchange or give away) using photos and text. Furthermore they can specify subcategories for items in question, and define the maximum distance for a transaction. Geoly users always meet in person to conclude a deal. It is another way for people to socialize whilst creating a win-win transaction for the parties involved.

The Geoly principle: no need to always check the app and browse through a jumble of items that you might not be interested in. Just register, set your preferred range and categories, give a short description of the item of interest and wait for an alert.


The interface of the application is very simple and straightforward. Once you register or log in you have access to your home menu. Your current location is automatically listed under your profile picture. You can see some icons that will help you navigate through the application and act upon items that you are interested in.



  Propose:

This is the most important feature of Geoly. It takes about a minute to present the item a user wants to sell, rent, exchange or give away for free. He can add a picture from his library, or take one with his phone, describe the item, select a category and post it.

  Request:

The user requests an item from the Geoly community. Again, it takes about one minute. "Request" contains the same functions as "Propose.

  Alerts:

Here the user receives notifications of item-matches, based on the criteria he has set. An alert means: there is something on offer that may be of interest for him. He can get a detailed information on an item, discard it if not suitable or chat with the initiator of the post for more information and maybe setting up a meeting.

  Messages:

This is the communication centre for the users. They can exchange messages with potential transaction partners, get more information about the item and set a meeting to conclude the deal.

Map:

The map shows each user the real-time position of other users posting items of interest in his vicinity, together with information on whether they wish to buy, sell, exchange or give away the item in question. All the important information is contained on this dynamic map, which also contains the option of contacting someone directly.

  My items

This enables the user to keep tabs on current transactions or on items he has sold, bought, rented, exchanged, or given away.

  Reviews:

When a transaction has been completed Geoly sends a quick and simple feedback survey to the parties involved, enabling them to rate each other. This establishes the trustworthiness of transaction partners, helps other community members and enhances the user experience.

  Settings:

This is where you set the Geoly app to your optimal requirements: determine categories and sub-categories of interest; set the radius within which you want to present an item, or be informed about an offer. For example, if you are only interested in an exchange, or wish to view free items, you can set this preference here.

To develop such a powerful application, where everybody with a phone is a potential customer, we face a number of challenges, the first being to ensure the service will never stop. We need to make sure that there won’t be any down time when the service is launched. At the same time we need to tell as many people as possible about Geoly. To do this, our team developed strategic approaches for using social media to help spread the app. Also, users can sign in via Facebook and Twitter, the major social networks out there, and by doing so they automatically invite all their friends to try the app.

You might say that’s standard, but in fact this lies at the very core of what we’re about, because Geoly is only efficient when there are as many people as possible partaking in transactions in your local area. It will feel natural for each of our users to convince their friends to join in.That’s why we anticipate an exponential growth. That is why we need support to handle the infrastructure of our project.

“Handling” means high speed, state of the art dedicated servers ready to process any amount of traffic.

The other issue is, we are developing for android right now, and we need to develop for iPhone and Windows phone as well. Therefore, we need to buy tools and we need to enlarge our team to have at least two more developers for things to move ahead faster.

We need 60.000 Euros to be able to run the development on the three platforms, secure servers, support our marketing strategies, have an expert team to meet challenges and professionally respond to and implement user feed-back.

If we exceed our goal and raise even more money that would be fantastic for the project because we will have more capacity to develop efficiently. We will secure the best servers out there and guarantee a really robust system. And our marketing will be more effective. If, on the other hand, we raise less than we asked for, the project will still run, but the challenges we face will be greater. Aside from money, we need you to help us spread Geoly in your surroundings when it launches. Thus, please like us on Facebook and follow us on Twitter.

Geoly is a community app. The larger the Geoly community, the more fun it will be to use. And trust us, you will even make new friends, just based on quick deals you can make. Don't forget to use the Indiegogo share tools to help boost our Indiegogo gogofactor.

Our primary goal is to fund an additional two-man team working full time on Geoly, with our first milestone in February 2014. By that time we expect our beta product to have the following features:

  • Support for Android mobile phones
  • Enable users to set their categories of interest while registering
  • Enable users to post items (sell or give away) while setting their appropriate categories so that they will be linked to other users for that category
  • Enable users to work with the map at a basic level to see and interact with the prospective transaction partners and get information on items. 
  • Enable users to engage in casual business chats via the app.
  • Implementation for six languages: English, French, German, Spanish, Italian, Swedish (to have a broad community right from the beginning).

 If we succeed to raising even more money, we will have more possibilities and will be able to offer:

  • Support for many more languages
  • Enable the maps to propose routes to users of Geoly who are willing to meet for a deal
  • Extensive marketing, awareness building

and much more...

Following our beta release, we are anticipating a 6-9 month user-feedback phase to fix bugs and develop Apple and Windows phone programmes. Then we want to have our alpha release by winter 2014.

Our contributors will be able to follow our day-to-day progress, install our hot-fix and releases versions of the app and test with us behind the scene before the major release goes public. 

A BIG thanks in advance to the backer for their contribution and assistance in making the realization of our project possible! Share our concept of Geoly among friends and relatives on Facebook and Twitter and together we’ll bring Geoly to life!

If you have any questions or you just want to say hello, be sure to contact us at info@geoly.com

If you have any problems or questions about payment transactions please contact payments@geoly.com

For Press Inquiries contact press@geoly.com.
