story:
Today’s digital lifestyles are filled with convenient computing devices, but switching from home, to office, to on-the-go can be a hassle when working across devices and operating systems. Mobile devices are difficult to type on and office workstations rarely provide comfortable and efficient keyboards.

That's why we made Woo-dy, a sleek 67 keys wireless keyboard that saves space, increases productivity and adds a little zen to your day. It connects to virtually any device wirelessly or with a USB Type-C cable connection, and has premium features that elevate efficiency. With Woo-dy, your perfect typing experience goes with you everywhere.   

Woo-dy is the perfect combination of form and function. It has a modern style along with a natural walnut or cherry wood base that adds beauty, harmony and a touch of relaxation to any work area. It’s evocative of vintage artwork, but packs the power of modern tech to deliver an incredible typing experience on any device.
 

 

  •  Wooden Base


At once minimalist and stylish, Woo-dy brings a natural calm and relaxation to your working space. The natural wood base made from real walnut or cherry reduces weight, feels great and adds subtle, natural style to any room. 


 

  • RGB Backlighting

Woo-dy has 16.8 million available colors of RGB LED backlighting powered by the included customization software. You have the freedom to create and display stunning colors and cool light effects such as strobe, pulse or static that suit your mood and working environment. Go ahead…light up your life!


 

 

  •  Gateron's First Ergonomic Keycap Design 

Woo-dy uses Gateron's first keycap with high quality. It's spherical keycap with OEM profile provide good touch feedback and reduce accidental hits for more efficient typing. 

The keycaps are never-fade ABS double-shot keycaps for a sleek look and smooth control and the ergonomic design and keypad layout provide a more relaxed typing position for fingers and wrists.  

  • Compact 67 Keys Metal Body 

Woo-dy is compact enough to take anywhere yet large enough to accommodate 67 keys and provide a more comfortable and enjoyable typing experience, especially on mobile devices and laptops. At 341mm x 103.8mm x 36.5mm, Woo-dy is a space saver and weighing in at only 500g, it is the most portable and effective choice for business travel and productive holidays. 

With N-key rollover, you can register as many keys as you need at once without missing out any characters.
 




 

  •  Hot Swappable Clicky & Tactile Switch Options 

Woo-dy is hot swappable and comes with three Gateron switch options to satisfy your particular typing style. Gateron switches are world-renown for their quality, feel and feedback and have an estimated lifetime of 50 million clicks - the highest on the market.

Choose from three different switches - Blue switches for a tactile feel and audible click, Brown switches for quiet tactile, or Red switches for a more gentle and linear keystroke. Set up the perfect keyboard for you! Choose Blue switches if you like the clicky touch of high performance mechanical feedback; choose Brown if you like the tactile touch with less typing effort, and choose Red switches for smooth, quiet typing. 

Woo-dy uses a hot-swappable switch configuration making it simple and quick to swap the Gateron switches for your favorite or customize for other users. Woo-dy changes with you to suit any need or function. It eliminates the need for multiple keyboards. 

  •  Programmable Software
     

Woo-dy includes customization software for lighting effects and more… You can choose our pre-set light effect, or customize your unique light effect!  

Users can program macro expansions, key mapping and shortcuts. For instance, you can set up shortcut keys for media keys, or key map a number pad. Further macro expansion includes programing one key to serve the function of a key combination. The software also allows the keyboard to be set up with a Macbook layout, or any personal preference you may have. With Woo-dy, the possibilities are endless. 

Woo-dy has it own memory chip to save the settings/keyboard profile in the keyboard. Therefore, users won't need to running the software on computer.

​

  • USB Type C & Bluetooth

Designed for versatility, Woo-dy connects to devices via Bluetooth or with a USB Type-C cable. It can connect with your phone, laptop, iPad or other devices. Bluetooth connection with up to three devices at once and switch between screens for efficient multi-tasking and increased productivity. You can also use the Type-C cable to connect the keyboard to your devices for a better connection speed. 

 

  • Works for Windows/Mac/iOS/Linux

Woo-dy is perfectly compatible with all operating systems (OS) including Mac/iOS, Linux, Windows and Android. Move seamlessly across different devices and enjoy a better typing experience no matter what your task is.

story:
Would you like to read this in your language? We've created translations in 简体中文

Livestream Photos
 

  

3D Printing is the future! But when we looked at the available 3D printer models on the market, we could not find a single one that delivers high quality printings at a reasonable price.

That`s why we made SparkMaker, an LCD based SLA 3D printer that prints in high-resolution yet has a price that makes it affordable for everyone.    

   
SparkMaker is compact, beautiful, and user-friendly. At 10 x 6.7 x 6.7 inches (27.5 x 17 x 17 cm) and a weight of only 6.6 pounds (3Kg), the SparkMaker fits perfectly in any office, studio or workshop.

it is small in size but has room where it matters. The SparkMaker 3D printer has a uniform maximum build areas of 4 x 2.2 inches (10.2 x 5.6 cm) and a build height of 5 inches (12.5 cm). 

 

 

Printing at 100 micrometer XY resolution and up to 20 micrometer Z layer thickness, SparkMaker has an amazing ability to print in higher resolution compared to DLP 3D printers. 

However, an affordable price doesn't mean we compromised on the quality. The 102 x 56 x 125 print area means that SparkMaker is ideal for scale prototyping as well as general 3D printing. 

 

 

 

   
With SparkMaker, we wanted to make 3D printing as easy and user-friendly as possible. Unlike other SLA 3D printers that require a computer connection, SparkMaker supports offline printing. 

You can forget about connection problems. Simply insert an SD card with a pre-loaded design, press the print button and your creation begins to take shape.

 


Monitoring your print projects is easier too with SparkMaker. It has a jumbo LED light with three different colors to indicate the printing progress.
   

 

    
Of course, quality is what we strive for when it comes to our 3D printing endeavors. While the majority of today’s FDM printers will produce a decent model, compare an FDM print to one produced by any SLA 3D printer and you’ll quickly see that SLA takes the lead when it comes to the overall quality of finish.
  

 

   
1. Download a 3D print model file from your computer to an SD card.

   
2. Insert SD card into SparkMaker & fill printer with the desired resin.
    

      
3. Press the button and your design begins to print. That`s it!
  

 

SparkMaker focuses on improving the printing experience for every printer. We offer basic essential tools for 3D printing including trowel and resin tank. The trowel makes it easy for the printer to slide between the printed object and the build platform. And no worries about how hard to clean the resin tank for next use with an alternative one. 

 

    
We want to make 3D printing accessible for everyone, so we use affordable resin too. SparkMaker comes with 5 types of resins, each suitable for different objects you wish to create. Combined with the 5 types of color paste included, you can print 3D object in virtually any color you want.
   

 

 

 

   

   
When we designed SparkMaker, we aimed to strip away the clutter and keep things as simple as possible. As a result, SparkMaker has no moving parts that aren’t essential to the printing process. This simplicity allows the SparkMaker to keep running smoothly over time. 

 

  

  

 

Note: Each backer can only add on a maximum of 2 x 500g resins, due to the limits on shipping. You will be able to order from our website later. 
  

    

    

 

     

Contact us: hello@wow-innovation.cn


Why can we make SparkMaker in such a great price?  

SparkMaker goes with the mature technology and inexpensive LCD display with UV backlight to curing photosensitive resin layer by layer. The structures of SparkMaker will be made by injection mold. SparkMaker uses our own developed control board but not the expensive Raspberry Pi or other open source control boards.

SparkMaker uses the high precision linear guides instead of plain shaft guides, and high quality stainless steel T2 screw.

These are the key reasons why it can be cost effective but still has a precise dimensional accuracy.

That`s why we made SparkMaker, an LCD based SLA 3D printer that prints in high-resolution yet has a price that makes it affordable for everyone.    


SparkMaker with UV-protective translucent cover
   SparkMaker is compact, beautiful, and user-friendly. At 10 x 6.7 x 6.7 inches (27.5 x 17 x 17 cm) and a weight of only 6.6 pounds (3Kg), the SparkMaker fits perfectly in any office, studio or workshop.
it is small in size but has room where it matters. The SparkMaker 3D printer has a uniform maximum build areas of 4 x 2.2 inches (10.2 x 5.6 cm) and a build height of 5 inches (12.5 cm). 


Building area of 4 x 2.2 inches and a height of 5 inches
 

 
 

 
Printing at 100 micrometer XY resolution and up to 20 micrometer Z layer thickness, SparkMaker has an amazing ability to print in higher resolution compared to DLP 3D printers. 
However, an affordable price doesn't mean we compromised on the quality. The 102 x 56 x 125 print area means that SparkMaker is ideal for scale prototyping as well as general 3D printing. 


 

 

 

   With SparkMaker, we wanted to make 3D printing as easy and user-friendly as possible. Unlike other SLA 3D printers that require a computer connection, SparkMaker supports offline printing. 
You can forget about connection problems. Simply insert an SD card with a pre-loaded design, press the print button and your creation begins to take shape.
One button to start printing
 


Monitoring your print projects is easier too with SparkMaker. It has a jumbo LED light with three different colors to indicate the printing progress.
   
Red, Green, and Blue light for different status
 
 

    Of course, quality is what we strive for when it comes to our 3D printing endeavors. While the majority of today’s FDM printers will produce a decent model, compare an FDM print to one produced by any SLA 3D printer and you’ll quickly see that SLA takes the lead when it comes to the overall quality of finish.  

SparkMaker makes SLA 3D printing truly affordable!
 

   1. Download a 3D print model file from your computer to an SD card.

   2. Insert SD card into SparkMaker & fill printer with the desired resin.    

      3. Press the button and your design begins to print. That`s it!  

 

SparkMaker focuses on improving the printing experience for every printer. We offer basic essential tools for 3D printing including trowel and resin tank. The trowel makes it easy for the printer to slide between the printed object and the build platform. And no worries about how hard to clean the resin tank for next use with an alternative one. 

 

    We want to make 3D printing accessible for everyone, so we use affordable resin too. SparkMaker comes with 5 types of resins, each suitable for different objects you wish to create. Combined with the 5 types of color paste included, you can print 3D object in virtually any color you want.   

 

 
Color Paste in 5 colors
 

   
   

   When we designed SparkMaker, we aimed to strip away the clutter and keep things as simple as possible. As a result, SparkMaker has no moving parts that aren’t essential to the printing process. This simplicity allows the SparkMaker to keep running smoothly over time. 

 

  

​

​
 
  

 
Note: Each backer can only add on a maximum of 2 x 500g resins, due to the limits on shipping. You will be able to order from our website later.   
 

    

    

 

     
Contact us: hello@wow-innovation.cn
Why can we make SparkMaker in such a great price?  
SparkMaker goes with the mature technology and inexpensive LCD display with UV backlight to curing photosensitive resin layer by layer. The structures of SparkMaker will be made by injection mold. SparkMaker uses our own developed control board but not the expensive Raspberry Pi or other open source control boards.
SparkMaker uses the high precision linear guides instead of plain shaft guides, and high quality stainless steel T2 screw.
These are the key reasons why it can be cost effective but still has a precise dimensional accuracy.

story:
The Future of Smart Controllers

There’s nothing like the ProLab Mouse. Without question, we’ve designed the smallest and most advanced control hub in the world. Weighing just 8g (.3 oz), the ProLab Mouse puts full control of your smart devices right at your fingertips. This valuable tool for work and play is a combination of an air mouse, a keyboard and a remote PPT/camera /media controller. Using Bluetooth technology, the ProLab Mouse instantly connects to most laptops, tablets, and smartphones. This allows you to control music, videos, web navigation, and more. Change settings at the touch of a button, and enjoy digital control with no limits.

The ProLab Mouse is ultra-compact, weighing only 8g and is no larger than a Bluetooth earphone. It is also easy to hold and even easier to use. With its 360-degree rotated trackball and four clicker buttons, it only takes one hand to control dozens of different functions. Once you hold the ProLab Mouse, you'll wonder how you ever managed without it.

 

 

The ProLab Mouse features three different easy-to-use modes: Air Mouse Mode, Media Mode, and Keyboard Mode. A single touch of the Side Button allows you to easily switch from one mode to the next. 

 

The ProLab Mouse has all functions of an ordinary mouse, and puts an end to the search for mousepads and flat services. With its pioneering Air Mouse mode, conventional controls become a problem of the past. Enjoy full movement via the 360-degree trackball. You can also right-click, left-click, scroll, highlight text, and more. Control your laptop, tablet, or smartphone from up to 10 meters away – no cords required.

 

Media Mode is designed to control your media player, giving you instant access to the best features of your favorite devices. Effortlessly play music and video or take hands-free photos. Leave that bulky selfie stick at home! Now you can take picture-perfect photos from any distance. Love to play music while you exercise? You can change songs and alter volume without having to touch your device.

 

The exclusive Keyboard Mode functions like arrow and "Enter" keys of your laptop. This gives you single-finger control over presentations, videos, documents, and more. Browse files with zero effort or navigate movies from across the room. It couldn't be easier.

 

The three modes of the ProLab Mouse combine to make it the most intuitive digital controller on the planet. Small enough to fit on your finger, it gives you instant power to control all your smart devices. From meetings and presentations to photography and entertainment, everything you need is just a click away. 

 

The Perfect Presentation Tool

Looking to give a more dynamic performance? The ProLab Mouse puts your entire presentation in the palm of your hand. Turn pages, scroll, and switch documents in seconds! Then access media to play videos, adjust volume, and more. Your PPT presentation will be a guaranteed show stopper, but you’ll never have to stop and click your laptop.

 

 

 

A Coin-Sized Selfie Stick

Sick of those bulky selfie sticks that still don't capture the moment? The ProLab Mouse has you covered. Now you can get the perfect selfie without all the effort. Simply move the mouse to adjust the focus or lighten the image. Then set up your phone and click away for discreet, hands-free wide shots. Your photos will never feel limited again.

 

 

 

Entertainment Without Boundaries

The ProLab Mouse is a full-service digital controller for music, movies, and more. Simply connect to your device via Bluetooth to gain total control over your entertainment experience. Stop, start, and pause movies and music. Change songs, adjust the volume, and more. Perfect for jogging, exercising, or just lounging around. You'll never need to bother with a remote again.

 

 

 

One Device, Multiple Tasks

Thanks to ProLab Mouse's one-touch functionality, you can switch between multiple modes to handle multiple tasks simultaneously. Move effortlessly from browsing the web to playing a movie or answering a phone call – all without having to get up or switch devices.

 

Reward

Groundbreaking Design

Our initial idea was to design an intuitive air mouse for laptops, tablets, and smartphones. The goal was to combine the best things about the Blackberry trackball and the ThinkPad TrackPoint, then simplify and scale down the result. However, after testing our new device, we were convinced that we could do better. That’s why we added the Keyboard and Media Modes to create a very powerful and versatile all-in-one device controller.

Now you can use the ProLab Mouse for business presentations, taking photos, listening to music, browsing the web, and more. No matter the occasion, full control of your smart devices now fits in the palm of your hand. 

 

User Experience

To obtain the most authentic experience from audience, we sent out some prototypes  for testing and review previously. Here's how people use the ProLab Mouse prototypes and what they think about it. Have a check! If you have more questions, you're always welcome to make a comment or send a message to us.

 

This mouse is a new favorite for tech everyday carry (EDC). 

You get a lot of function with a minimal amount of bulk, which is absolutely fantastic for anyone who appreciates being able to do more with less. It’s comfortable to handle and quite useful once you adjust to the trackball. If you’re a fan or follower of EDC (particularly tech) gear, this mouse fits the bill and delivers as promised. 

--- The-goodnerd.com, by Stanley Goodner

 

The ProLab Mouse is a handy little gadget that can be used with different devices for different purposes. I have enjoyed using it with an iPad and my iPhone while walking on a treadmill as it is easier to control various apps without having to tap the screen as I am walking. I also think this tiny device would be great for PowerPoint presentations, and I like that it recharges via USB-C. 

--- The-gadgeteer.com, by Julie Strietelmeier

 

Personally, I find the ProLab Mouse best used as a wireless presenter. First, the ProLab Mouse is really small and compact, so when you’re presenting, you can look it you’re not holding any presenter stick at all. Second, the different modes offered on the ProLab Mouse provide a versatile suite of features to handle many kinds of presentation. If you have a video link midway through and need to click on it, simply switch to Mouse mode to click. Volume of video too soft? Simply switch to the Media mode to increase volume.

--- Techjioblog.com, by Tech Jio

 

The media controls are also great. You can leave your phone down charging for example and still control playback. I have recently been taking Spanish lessons which often require you to pause the playback so you can figure out a sentence yourself before it gives it to you. It can be quite cumbersome waking the phone and hitting pause in time to using the ProLab Finger Wireless Mouse makes it really simple.

--- irishtechnews, by John

 

 

Light Indication

 

User Instructions

Note: If you want to connect your ProLab Mouse to a new device, you must first disconnect it from the old device. 

 

Specifications

Battery Life: 15 Hours

Bluetooth Version: Bluetooth 4.2

Bluetooth connection distance: 10m

Input Voltage: DC-5V 500mA

Weight: 8g / 0.3 oz

Dimensions: 29*29*13.5mm / 1.14*1.14*0.53in

Compatibility: iOS, iPad OS, Android, Windows, MacOS, ChromeOS, Linux and more

 

Shipment 

Once the campaign ends, you will receive an email to submit your final order. We will send follow-ups if needed. Once you make your final selection, you will be prompted to pay any additional shipping costs that might apply. 

Below, we've estimated the cost of standard shipping. Please note, each order can only be shipped to one location. Additionally, this amount may change if you add any more products during the survey process, or due to normal fluctuations in the cost of shipping. We will be sure to notify you of any additional charges. 

 

What's in the Box

 

 

About ProLab

At ProLab, we strive to provide technology solutions that improve our customers’ productivity and efficiency. Here, we feel that great design should be compact, simple, and smart. With years of experience producing high-quality consumer electronics, our team of engineers, project managers, and designers will never stop improving our products or processes.

story:
TheButterflyEffect planner is a Powerful Productivity system and Personal Guide with the sole purpose of setting the wheels in motion for Positive Transformation. It's a two-piece Life Planner that serves to help you reevaluate your current motives, and start acting on your highest values. 

Break down a Full-Year guide of Growth and Enlightenment into 13-Phases of Topics, each thoroughly encompassed by weekly insights and daily inspirational quotes.

Set your intentions for the months, days, and weeks ahead with our planning tool, designed to assist you in outlining your goals and helping you turn them into ideas, plans, and actions. 

 

 

What's our 'Why?'

Our sole Purpose is to help people realize that despite anyone's current circumstances, habits, and/or beliefs - you can always give yourself a new start.

TheButterflyEffect's main mission is to break down the skepticism and doubt that imposes limits on your beliefs and desires for a better life. In that, we are simply offering a guide to help you determine the goals and actions it will take to bind the links between you and the life that you dream of.

It's important to realize that even the smallest of choices, put into consistent action, can ultimately lead to the biggest transformations of your life. That by being positive, working for your dreams, and being patient with the effect of time; you can create the life you've always wanted to live.

TheButterflyEffect serves to help you re-evaluate what you've accepted for yourself for so long, and help you let go of the mindsets and beliefs that no longer serve (or align themselves with) your highest values/desires.

 

 

MONTHLY LAYOUT:

  • Define three major goals and break them down with a brief Brainstorm/Plan-of-Action. 
  • Plan your monthly tasks & events, and track when they are Due & Completed. 
  • 13 Phases (52 weeks) that incorporate new themes/practices and shed light on new topics of interest, that are insightful helpful in the pursuit of personal happiness.

 WEEKLY LAYOUT:

  • 52 Week Planner that breaks down each week into a fully customizable seven-day preview. 
  • Track/evaluate your efforts and progress at the end of each week. 
  • Learn about new topics every week, that can influence positivity into your daily life. 
  • Set and Attain weekly prioritized goals, and Reward yourself when you accomplish them. 
  • Build new habits, and track the days in which you have incorporated them successfully. 
  • Income & Savings goal section, for those who like to stay on top of their financial game.

DAILY LAYOUT:

  • Start every day off with an inspiring and motivating quote - mainly related to the monthly/weekly theme. 
  • Determine your daily goals, break them down with ideas that support your objectives, then Set your time-oriented schedule for the day. 
  • Write out what you ate for Breakfast, Lunch, Snack, and Dinner and count the amount of water you drank each day. 
  • Keep a brief workout log, and track the time you exercise. 
  • Rate your overall mood on a scale of 1-5. 
  • Practice Gratitude. Find a couple things every day that you are grateful to have in Life. 
  • Focus on Growth - Always seek improvement. Three things daily that you will work to improve. 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

After this campaign, the journey has really just begun.

Once all the orders have been shipped, I plan on launching my own (corresponding) Positive Lifestyle blog, where I am inputting all the research and documents I have accumulated over the last couple years, and transforming them into written and visual contents.

In 2018, I set to launch a new project, of bigger magnitude - in which I have as a goal, to create a mobile-friendly version of TheButterflyEffect planner. The purpose is to diversify and find new means of reinventing our lives, and developing new positive mindsets and habits.

This campaign is but the first flutter of this butterfly's wings... and we can only work to determine it's final effects.

 

To anyone who has made it this far,

I would like to take a moment to express my sincerest gratitude for your attention and support. It is an absolute honor to connect with you, as we embark on this journey towards transformation.

My greatest message to extend to you is the kind reminder to never give up on your goals, passions, and dreams.

TheButterflyEffect planner knows the challenges and hardships that come with facing life. It understands the human desire for a happy and beautiful existence. Its mission is to restore the collective truth that you have always been worthy of attaining the life you want to live.

I’ve built the ultimate tool for productivity and enlightenment - to assist you in Building and Achieving the story that you dream of. With TheButterflyEffect, you will develop the plan, the structure, and the motivation it’s going to take for you to become your most free, fulfilled, and happy self.

So take back control of your power, and embrace the full experience of your life, the way you want to live it.

Find what fulfills you, and chase it.

Do more of what makes you happy.

Master yourself, and live the life of your dreams.

Build and Accomplish the goals you set for yourself.

Love yourself, and Love your Life.

Enjoy every step of your Journey.

I just hope that this project can help you get One Flutter Closer – To Reconnecting with Your True Self.

Sarah Elle,

Creator, TheButterflyEffect Planner

story:
Help me build a world changing iPhone App

The best way to learn more about this project is to watch the 5 minute YouTube video I’ve created.  You can click on the link above to learn more.

But for those of you who like to read, here is my vision:

I want to give people a simple iPhone app that they can use for just a few minutes per day to do something good.

People spend billions of hours per year using Facebook, exploring YouTube videos, watching TV, SnapChatting, and more.  A lot of that time is wasted.

Yet everything I know about people is that they want to make the world a better place, they want to be part of a movement, and to do something good.  There are so many people who want to spread goodness – Young Generations and Old.  My vision is to make it easy for them to get involved.

Can you imagine how much good can be done by millions of people spending just a few minutes per day doing something fun, easy, and meaningful?

That is the goal of The Good App.  I hope you join us!


What I Need

I need your help to get it off the ground.

I’m testing this concept out as a CrowdFunding effort.  I’m looking to raise a mere $2,500.  That’s not nearly enough to normally go out and design and build version 1 of an app.  But I want to engage people in this journey with me.  

Assuming that I can find interested people and raise at least $2,500 then my wife and I will kick in at least another $2,500; plus a bunch of time and energy to make this a success.  Also, as the owner of a technology company, I’ll twist the arms of a few really talented people to help get things off the ground.  With $5,000 plus some hard work, we can create version 1 of the app.

If we raise more than $2,500 we will use the extra funds to improve the app, and we can better market the app and gain exposure so that we can leap out of the gates.

Not a dime from this project goes into my pocket.  If we’re successful with this campaign, we’ll register as the appropriate business entity, apply for non-profit status as needed, and will be fully transparent about the entire organization and its funds.

What You Get

Everyone who participates by making a contribution or spreading the word is helping us to launch a world-changing app.  If everyone does a little good, we will achieve something great.

We have put together some “good” perks that we think our early contributors will enjoy.  However, because this is an effort based on creating a not-for-profit app rather than a commercial enterprise, we aren’t going to spend a bunch of money on shirts and other gifts.  Instead, we are going to put the money towards building a global community of good. 

If we don’t get to $2,500 worth of contributions then we will give up on this idea and nobody will be charged any money.  But let’s not let that happen!


The Impact

We want to help empower people to change the world by doing something good for just a few minutes per day.

What can someone do in just a few minutes per day?

Here are just a few examples:

1.  Inspire someone by sending a positive note or message to a lonely elderly person, or a sick child in a hospital.  Or, watch some content that inspires the user to be a better person.

2.  Make money in order to respond to a crisis.  Say there is a massive earthquake and a city needs our help.  Our community could all watch a 2 minute video from a sponsor who would turn that into a generous life-changing donation.

3.  Look for a great cause or bring awareness to a cause.  There are plenty of great causes in the world that aren’t getting the attention they deserve.  I want to make it easier for people to share causes, links, and videos, in a way that would make a giant difference to a small charity or organization. 

4.  Guided meditation or prayer.  Positive thought inspires positive change.  So we make it easier for you to practice moments of mindfulness or prayer in an effort to spread good.

5.  Crowd Sourcing.  Do actual work by coming together and spending a few minutes helping to cure cancer, catch a criminal, or solve a scientific problem that is better done by humans than computers.  Sound crazy?  It isn’t.  This type of work is being done today and together we can make a huge difference.

 6.  Share The Good App with others.  Of course, the more people who get involved, the bigger the impact will be.  We want to make it fun and rewarding for people to share The Good App with others, and get people into the habit of spending a few minutes per day doing something positive.



There are many other examples, and many we haven’t thought of yet.  In fact, we want to encourage our growing community to help develop new ideas for micro-volunteering that would take just minutes of action per day.  It’s also our goal to let people’s preferences steer their experience with the app.  You’ll be able to customize the app so that it works for you, inspires you, and keeps you doing good.  Over time, we’ll find category curators and we’ll offer different styles of doing “good” to match the individual interests of our members.

Our Experience

Over the past 13 years I’ve built 4 different internet technology companies that focus on helping sales professionals to be more successful.  We have a team of roughly 30 people serving 100s of thousands of customers.  One of our apps, FaxBurner, has been downloaded more than 500,000 times.  

So I understand technology and have a great team of people that knows how to get stuff done.  With this project, many of them will be kind enough to volunteer to help.  But they have jobs and families, like myself, so we need some outside funding and help in order to get this going.


Risks & Challenges

I think the main risk with this project is that our community won’t be passionate enough to spread the word to others.  To make a real impact, we are going to need 10’s of thousands of users who are actively engaged.  But without a marketing budget, we are relying on our community of friends and users to continue to spread the word. 

I believe we are up to the challenge and the viral nature of the internet will help us achieve our goals.  Part of the reason for this IndieGogo campaign is to see whether the community will grow over the next month before we invest any further time and money.

So please do your part and help share the word.

Other Ways You Can Help

We need to get the word out about this campaign and about the app.  We don’t have a big marketing budget so we are counting on all of you to spread the word. 

We’d love it if you’d make a small contribution but even if you can’t, you can be a HUGE help to join our team by doing any of the following things.

  1. Tell me what you think of the idea.  Shoot me an email at JohnRydell@me.com.  I promise to respond to everyone personally.
  2. Share this idea with others.  Spread the word.  There are easy to use links on the left side of this page to share via Facebook, Twitter, etc.

  3. Get involved.  Contact me at JohnRydell@me.com and let me know how you’d like to help.

the 5 minute YouTube video I’ve created. 
You can click on the link above to learn more.

iPhone app that they can use for just a few minutes per day to do something good.
People spend billions of hours per
year using Facebook, exploring YouTube videos, watching TV, SnapChatting, and
more.  A lot of that time is wasted.
Yet everything I know about people
is that they want to make the world a better place, they want to be part of a
movement, and to do something good.  There
are so many people who want to spread goodness – Young Generations and
Old.  My vision is to make it easy for
them to get involved.

story:
Short Summary

On 22 May, 2018, the source code to Qualcomm Eudora, an almost ineffably influential e-Mail client, was released into the public domain under the BSD Licence, clearing the way for its development to continue as a faithful, community-based, Open Source continuation.  Unfortunately, as originally released, it depends on several strictly commercial libraries, and we at Team HERMES, the organisation formed to develop it, were for several months at a total loss on how to proceed.  For a time, we attempted to create a fully non-commercial version, following the GNU ethos, but this was doomed to failure, largely because Eudora is an application of mind-bending complexity, and writing a new user-interface for it would take an enormous team of developers many hours.  We had neither.

By late 2019, however, we'd taken a pragmatic approach and had a version that compiled properly, though it still refused to link.  This month, we are proud to announce that HERMES Mail---the new name for Eudora, as that is still protected by trademark law---compiles, links, and launches (though it crashes soon thereafter).  We now have a different sort of job on our hands: fixing the bugs that make HERMES Mail unusable, and turning it into a viable, fully-featured e-Mail client.

What We Need & What You Get

HERMES Mail is currently at a critical, make-or-break point in the development lifecycle.  For the time being, our issues in regards to the RogueWave Stingray libraries have been resolved, but we still face significant expenses; in particular, payroll has become a significant bottleneck, as we do wish to get this product to you as soon as possible and it has become abundantly clear that doing so with purely volunteer resources is close to impossible.

We know that this is likely a difficult time to ask for contributions or investments, but even five or ten dollars can make a big difference in whether we can afford to bring in that extra developer, or whether we can advertise to reach as broad an audience as possible, or pay hosting fees---because that isn't free, either. We've therefore set the goal at an entirely reasonable $800 Cdn., which would help defray some of the manpower costs (the standard rate is between $30 and $50 Cdn. per hour).  That said, this is a floor, not a ceiling; we are happy to receive contributions exceeding this amount, and we promise you value proportional to the contributions we do get.

Thanks to our generous contributors, the eventual release of HERMES Mail 8.0 is a near-certainty.  Your investment has guaranteed the ongoing development of a best-in-class, enterprise grade e-Mail client built for power users on Windows and Linux (with the assistance of WINE).  As we promised in our initial Kickstarter campaign, HERMES Mail 8.0 will bring "language support" front and centre.  It will come with as many as 80 foreign-language dictionaries, along with UTF-8 support, so international messages won't get mangled.  It will also feature a new HTML viewer, so "testimonial" messages using styled text and fancy invisible-table layouts won't get mangled, either.

Equally, any funds you give us now are not donations, in sensu stricto, but rather investments in our future as a software company: do ut des is the order of the day.  "I give, so that you give," and what we give you is our genuine promise that HERMES Mail will not be a "one-shot deal".   We plan to continue its development as a faithful continuation of Qualcomm Eudora, had the project been allowed to continue on its original trajectory.  In our view, this means preserving as much of the Eudora user experience as practical, while enhancing those features already present and introducing innovative new ones.  We aim to be the premier solution for power users and institutions seeking a professional-grade electronic mail solution.

The Impact

At this moment in time, there is no e-Mail client in active development that

  1. is free to download, let alone Open Source;
  2. runs on your computer, as opposed to being a cloud service used as a software substitute; and
  3. has a broad range of advanced features, especially those that help combat spam and bulk "testimonial" mail. 

There are, for example, services that are feature-packed and free to use, but don't run on your computer (and therefore require trust, something that is rightfully in short supply), and there is software that is free-to-download and runs on your computer, but is the most rudimentary imaginable e-Mail client.  Our software fills this lacuna. 

We have been successful in creating two software projects already: a file-transfer application in the early 2010's, as well as a new Transport Layer Security library for Eudora 7.  We hope that our prior successes help assure you of the genuineness of our future endeavours.

Risks & Challenges

At this moment in time, there is one enormous (and tiny) risk.  Most people will have heard of it:  its name begins with the word corona.  This infection seriously threatens cash flow: there is now the prospect of having the application finished, but insufficient funds to keep the lights on and the servers humming.

This is not something that lends itself easily to mitigation; the only thing we can do is to maintain adequate cash flow as best as we are able.

story:
Short Summary

Hi!!  I am Jen and I have devoted my life to helping animals.  I have been a volunteer at a no-kill cat rescue for over two years, and recently decided to take what I've learned to try to bring some extra income into my home by doing mobile pet grooming.  I LOVE it.  I can't imagine doing anything else.  But I can provide even better service with a mobile grooming van.  This would open up my client base and allow me to do more for my customers!


What We Need & What You Get

I need a minimum of $50,000 to get a converted van.  It comes with all the bells and whistles, lights, heat, bathtub, running water, grooming table, and storage for my tools.

I am probably one of the only female pet groomers with a mohawk.  I am laid back and fun.  Pets adore me because I adore them and they know it.

If I don't reach my goal, the funds that I do get will help to get my current vehicle in tip-top shape so I can continue helping my wonderful clients.  Any amount is helpful!

    The Impact


      I chose to do mobile grooming because some of my clients are homebound.  Some of their pets become extremely stressed when having to go for a ride in the car.  Most of them require sedation to be groomed..but not when I come to them!  It makes a huge difference when an animal can be on its home turf.  Many of my clients with shy pets have noticed a huge difference in their pet's behavior for the better!

    Risks & Challenges

    Starting any business is a risk.  I already have a lot of money into my equipment.  I am very persistent and I don't intend to give up!

    Other Ways You Can Help

    If you can't give money, don't fret!  I can't, either.  But you can help me by sharing this campaign to get the word out there for me!  Thank you!!!

story:
What is it?

We provide enterprise-grade business software via our server app store. Additionally we offer services to fully cover all aspects of your business, giving you full power and control, while reducing cost, increasing security, giving full privacy and making IT and AI finally work for you.

 

 

In just 5-10 minutes you can stop worrying about Office 365, Dynamics 365, Google Suite and all other services scattered around the internet. Getting on board takes just a few clicks, and our fully automated system will set you up with your own private cloud where you can install all the software you and your team need to run your business.

No limitations per inbox, account, user, megabyte or email.

No complex installations, setups, calling your IT wizard, failures and errors.

No privacy or security concerns for you or your clients.

Imagine a world where your emails, appointments, documents, reports, invoices, orders, clients, projects, tasks, chats, to do lists, forms, web sites, holidays, recruitment, and all other crucial, time consuming efforts in your business, live together in perfect harmony.

Imagine a world where you have powerful AI on your side, helping you run your business, collaborate efficiently, and work smarter.

Welcome to the world of AppsForce.

 

How does it work?

Usually you need to buy a domain, set up DNS records to point to the server. Ah, yes - you need to buy a server. And install Linux, SSH, log in via command prompt and use text commands to install and setup MYSQL, Apache, PHP, and hundreds of other software products and patches, and then configure it all. What could go wrong? Furthermore, you have to get every software setup and install plugins to make them work together (with all limitations). Then create all user accounts in each app, pass invitations around, create passwords, deal with everybody who cannot login, does not know how to use it, and so on.

 

 

Well, enough. We build AppsForce. The three step wizard asks you for your domain name, server size and whether you want our support (all optional). Then, the magic happens! Our installer sets everything up for you.

In 5 minutes you can simply go to your new domain and login. Click on myStore, just like on your mobile and click 'install' on any app you want. Takes a minute or two for everything to get set up and ready to use. That's it. 

 

Privacy and Security

As you know - big corporations collect as much data from you as they can. That data is what makes them worth billions. Your data - and you get nothing for it. Have you ever sat down to read the Terms & Conditions from likes of Google or Facebook? It's scary. We decided not to collect a single bit of information from you - ever. Sound good?
 
 
Big cloud services face hundreds of hacking attempts every second! Very often they do get hacked. Nobody will openly admit this, much less inform you about it when you sign up. That is why we think having a private cloud for every single user is a much better solution. If one gets hacked, all other are still safe. And the unlucky user can run a smart-recovery, which gets them back up and running in 15 minutes! On top of that, we have all the latest security features, from encryption to VPN. Also, the central management, where you have full control of who has access to what, protects you from deliberate or accidental damaging actions of your employees.
 
 

What else?

Well, you do not need to get domain. You can use an IP, Intranet, or even Dark-Net Onion URLs.

You do not need to use our server. Any computer will do. That old one in your garage or even a Raspberry Pi.

 

 

You can use the whole lot, for free - forever.

You can even earn money by selling your own plugins, software and services to other users.

Or make money by reselling all our services to your clients.

 

What Apps do I get?

We will offer the 25 most common business apps at the launch. As the product and eco-system grows there will be many more. Just check out our perks for examples. All of those are apps ready for you.

Now, you might ask if our apps are any good. Well - all of them have been around for years, and regularly have user bases that run into the millions. They are good.

Feel free to browse our store, and see what is there for you.

All apps are easier to install than your mobile apps. It takes one click, and it is even faster.

Where's the AI in this story?

You have your complete business data in one system.

You have all of your employees doing their jobs in this system.

You have all your financial information, client information, social media data, every message and email with every attachment. Every single document. Every single task and project.

You have the complete big-data of your business at your fingertips. No other service offers this.

 

 

Imagine engaging the full potential and satisfaction of every employee, with software that learns about the way they work, and provides insight into their needs and preferences.

Imagine capturing deep insights of your business-progress through AI, analyzing all KPIs you can think of and giving you tailored suggestions and advice.

Imagine optimizing all processes, employees and departments as the AI learns your business, and figures out ways to improve it.

Imagine an AI-enhanced Google-like search centered around your business.

Imagine a dynamic dashboard, generated in real time for each employee, with clear focus on what they need to do to maximize their performance.

Well - STOP imagining. Just get AppsForce.

 

How does it look and feel?

Great. Every app looks and feels the same, so it is very easy to understand the menus and tools. You can learn it in a few minutes! Furthermore, it uses a responsive design, which means it will work on ANY internet connected device. On top of that, we support themes. You can customize the look of your system to your heart's content!

 

 

We have also translated it in many languages so it will make perfect sense to you, wherever you or your team are from!

 

How much is it?

You can even have it for free, forever. As software, AppsForce is free. You do not need to pay for a domain, and you can use any existing computer to install it.

As for apps, all of them come with unlimited free versions for small teams. So you get all the features. The only limitation is the number of users of each app. Some have 2, 5 or even 10 free users. When you try to add more you can choose monthly or annual subscription, and just pay us a few dollars or euros. Alternatively you can buy an unlimited permanent license, if you want to save even more in the longer run.

 

 

We are pricing each app to be very competitive. Top-CRM, for example, app can cost you $100.000, while the same featured unlimited version of our app goes for around $1,000.

Google Drive can be used for free, but even slightly more advanced versions cost $25 per user, per month. It is easy to see that team of 10 people spend $3000 per year, while 50 people spend $15,000 per year. Every year. Our version is better and for unlimited users costs $1,000. Once.

We wanted to make AppsForce irresistible.

 

Who are you guys?

Silly people currently dedicated to AppsForce:

 

 

What are you doing with my money?

AppsForce is market ready. However, we want to polish it, get more apps for it, and launch it globally. We want to create an ecosystem of users. There is a lot of work in front of us. Will £30K be enough? Well it will to keep us going for a while.

 

Want it?

AppsForce is available at our web site appsforce.co.uk where you can find more information, as well as start using it.
story_txt:
What is it?
We provide enterprise-grade business software via our server app store. Additionally we offer services to fully cover all aspects of your business, giving you full power and control, while reducing cost, increasing security, giving full privacy and making IT and AI finally work for you.
 

 
In just 5-10 minutes you can stop worrying about Office 365, Dynamics 365, Google Suite and all other services scattered around the internet. Getting on board takes just a few clicks, and our fully automated system will set you up with your own private cloud where you can install all the software you and your team need to run your business.
No limitations per inbox, account, user, megabyte or email.
No complex installations, setups, calling your IT wizard, failures and errors.
No privacy or security concerns for you or your clients.
Imagine a world where your emails, appointments, documents, reports, invoices, orders, clients, projects, tasks, chats, to do lists, forms, web sites, holidays, recruitment, and all other crucial, time consuming efforts in your business, live together in perfect harmony.
Imagine a world where you have powerful AI on your side, helping you run your business, collaborate efficiently, and work smarter.
Welcome to the world of AppsForce.
 
How does it work?
Usually you need to buy a domain, set up DNS records to point to the server. Ah, yes - you need to buy a server. And install Linux, SSH, log in via command prompt and use text commands to install and setup MYSQL, Apache, PHP, and hundreds of other software products and patches, and then configure it all. What could go wrong? Furthermore, you have to get every software setup and install plugins to make them work together (with all limitations). Then create all user accounts in each app, pass invitations around, create passwords, deal with everybody who cannot login, does not know how to use it, and so on.
 

 
Well, enough. We build AppsForce. The three step wizard asks you for your domain name, server size and whether you want our support (all optional). Then, the magic happens! Our installer sets everything up for you.
In 5 minutes you can simply go to your new domain and login. Click on myStore, just like on your mobile and click 'install' on any app you want. Takes a minute or two for everything to get set up and ready to use. That's it. 
 
Privacy and Security
As you know - big corporations collect as much data from you as they can. That data is what makes them worth billions. Your data - and you get nothing for it. Have you ever sat down to read the Terms & Conditions from likes of Google or Facebook? It's scary. We decided not to collect a single bit of information from you - ever. Sound good?  Big cloud services face hundreds of hacking attempts every second! Very often they do get hacked. Nobody will openly admit this, much less inform you about it when you sign up. That is why we think having a private cloud for every single user is a much better solution. If one gets hacked, all other are still safe. And the unlucky user can run a smart-recovery, which gets them back up and running in 15 minutes! On top of that, we have all the latest security features, from encryption to VPN. Also, the central management, where you have full control of who has access to what, protects you from deliberate or accidental damaging actions of your employees.  
What else?
Well, you do not need to get domain. You can use an IP, Intranet, or even Dark-Net Onion URLs.
You do not need to use our server. Any computer will do. That old one in your garage or even a Raspberry Pi.
 

 
You can use the whole lot, for free - forever.
You can even earn money by selling your own plugins, software and services to other users.
Or make money by reselling all our services to your clients.
 

What Apps do I get?
We will offer the 25 most common business apps at the launch. As the product and eco-system grows there will be many more. Just check out our perks for examples. All of those are apps ready for you.

Now, you might ask if our apps are any good. Well - all of them have been around for years, and regularly have user bases that run into the millions. They are good.

Feel free to browse our store, and see what is there for you.

All apps are easier to install than your mobile apps. It takes one click, and it is even faster.


Where's the AI in this story?
You have your complete business data in one system.
You have all of your employees doing their jobs in this system.
You have all your financial information, client information, social media data, every message and email with every attachment. Every single document. Every single task and project.
You have the complete big-data of your business at your fingertips. No other service offers this.
 

 
Imagine engaging the full potential and satisfaction of every employee, with software that learns about the way they work, and provides insight into their needs and preferences.
Imagine capturing deep insights of your business-progress through AI, analyzing all KPIs you can think of and giving you tailored suggestions and advice.
Imagine optimizing all processes, employees and departments as the AI learns your business, and figures out ways to improve it.
Imagine an AI-enhanced Google-like search centered around your business.
Imagine a dynamic dashboard, generated in real time for each employee, with clear focus on what they need to do to maximize their performance.
Well - STOP imagining. Just get AppsForce.
 
How does it look and feel?
Great. Every app looks and feels the same, so it is very easy to understand the menus and tools. You can learn it in a few minutes! Furthermore, it uses a responsive design, which means it will work on ANY internet connected device. On top of that, we support themes. You can customize the look of your system to your heart's content!
 

 
We have also translated it in many languages so it will make perfect sense to you, wherever you or your team are from!
 
How much is it?
You can even have it for free, forever. As software, AppsForce is free. You do not need to pay for a domain, and you can use any existing computer to install it.
As for apps, all of them come with unlimited free versions for small teams. So you get all the features. The only limitation is the number of users of each app. Some have 2, 5 or even 10 free users. When you try to add more you can choose monthly or annual subscription, and just pay us a few dollars or euros. Alternatively you can buy an unlimited permanent license, if you want to save even more in the longer run.
 

 
We are pricing each app to be very competitive. Top-CRM, for example, app can cost you $100.000, while the same featured unlimited version of our app goes for around $1,000.
Google Drive can be used for free, but even slightly more advanced versions cost $25 per user, per month. It is easy to see that team of 10 people spend $3000 per year, while 50 people spend $15,000 per year. Every year. Our version is better and for unlimited users costs $1,000. Once.
We wanted to make AppsForce irresistible.
 
Who are you guys?
Silly people currently dedicated to AppsForce:
 

 
What are you doing with my money?
AppsForce is market ready. However, we want to polish it, get more apps for it, and launch it globally. We want to create an ecosystem of users. There is a lot of work in front of us. Will £30K be enough? Well it will to keep us going for a while.
 
Want it?
AppsForce is available at our web site appsforce.co.uk where you can find more information, as well as start using it.

story:
What is Kowalo? And How Does it Work?

Kowalo gives all stock traders a score based on their performance in the market-place. The better you do, the higher your score is. Kowalo lets users find higher scoring members and follow them for 30 days (you can't change who you follow for 30 days unless you surpass their score and Pro Members can follow higher scoring members than Free Members.) You get a push notification whenever the person you follow buys or sells a stock and you have the option to match that stock and buy/sell as many shares as you want.  The better you do, the higher your score. In addition to that, Pro Members get paid commission for every Pro Follower and Referral they get every single month. Kowalo rewards its members by giving back 50% of Pro Memberships back to the users. The better you do, the more followers you get, the more followers you get, the more money you make to put back in stocks or save up and buy that dream car boat house statue you always wanted.

About Kowalo

Kowalo started as a text group with about 10 people wanting to follow our founder's trades and know when he bought/sold stocks. In the first week, his text group averaged about 20% gains, word of the group spread and soon there were requests from over 120 people that wanted in the text group. Unfortunately, keeping up with the text group was pretty difficult and the idea of creating mentor/follower relationship with automated push-notifications within an app was created.

Austin James is the founder of Kowalo and is a passionate trader. He started in the workforce at age 15 and his ability to innovate and lead drove his career to leading large teams of dozens of nationally syndicated reality tv shows and feature films by the age of 25. His focus on quality and making a positive impact through charity will drive the company's culture and make the app consistently better with every update.

Mike James is our lead software developer with a lead development background at multiple multi-billion dollar companies as well as developing his own multi-million dollar software.
 

What We Need

Here are where the funds we need will be going:

  • $20k for Marketing
  • $8k for API, app submissions, and stock data
  • $55k for Programming/Development on iOS and Android
  • $7k for Hardware and Server space
  • $10k for perks and fees

    In the event that we don't raise the full amount, we will be using the funds we have gathered to start app development. We are in talks with some investors currently, and if crowdfunding is unsuccessful, we aim to still be funded via an angel investor. Our hope is that we can be fully funded and supported by YOU the crowd-funding investor. So please help us get the word out and share this page!

What do you get?

Our company realizes that 'word of mouth' is the best form of marketing, so we are giving away  lots of free and exclusive 'Pro Memberships' and 'Founder Memberships' to those who contribute to cause. Pro Members get to follow higher scoring mentors and they can collect on commission for Pro Followers and referrals!

Ways You Can Help

Post it, share it, tweet it, snap it, and tell people! We need your help to make this app a reality. We understand that not everyone can help financially, and that is OK! The greatest thing you can do is to spread the word and let us become known to the world! The majority of our marketing is based on word-of-mouth, so if you have a social media account or know anyone with a pulse, tell them!

story:
Home exterior maintenance can be tedious at times with weekly lawn mowing, fall clean up, and plowing the snow during the heart of winter. Tedious was created to make homeownership less tedious. So whether you're on vacation, busy with the family, or just don't feel like doing it. We've got you covered! Think of us as the Uber of home maintenance. Order a task, and free up time in these 3 steps:
 

 

The ultimate side-hustle for local youth

Your backing goes towards allowing us to start providing equipment & opportunity for the local youth to start making money on the side! Not only does Tedious benefit homeowners, but we're also going to allow local youth the ability to rent out equipment in order to start creating a viable income for themselves.

Teens & young adults are now able to work when and where they want. Being their own boss!
 

Servicing the entire Twin Cities

We're currently available on iPhone (IOS), which limits the customers that can request task,  but with your contribution, we'll be able to ramp up development and expand to both web and Android phones.  Allowing everyone the opportunity to check a tedious task off their to-do list!

Roadmap


 

Challenges 

The summer was about proving the viability and concept of the company. This winter is all about growth! The biggest challenges we will face is having the funding to equip enough providers with the tools to clear all task from our to-do list.
​

    Spread The Word, Please!

    Financial support is huge for the growth of Tedious, but awareness is even bigger! Let your neighbors and friends know about the amazing company we're building by simply sharing the following links:

    https://igg.me/at/Tedious

story:
Short Summary

The Guardian Angel App turns a phone into an emergency beacon. If a loved one is ever in a situation, for example an accident or medical situation, and they require immediate help, they can push a button that alerts a list of predetermined contacts where they are and that they need help. If they need an emergency response, those contacts can know exactly what the issue is and what they need. Guardian Angel will call one main person and send a text message to up to 5 additional contacts.

What We Need & What You Get

  • We have already invested 300,000$ of our own funds in this, to make the world a better, safer place for everyone. We need additional funds to develop the next versions and infrastructure.
  • We want to launch an iOS version (for iPhone users) and also a next generation version with social networking capabilities, connecting into other Apps such as Waze and building an emergency community.

The Impact

  • This is a valuable to the world - it saves lives! It helps children, the sick, the elderly, and reduces crime!
  • We already have a version up (FREE) in Google Play and Amazon AppStore - see http://www.e-paz.com.
  •  Feel free to also checkout https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.epaz.GuardianAngelApp

Other Ways You Can Help

We know some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean these folks can't help: You can:

  • Get the word out and make some noise about our campaign.
  • Use the Indiegogo share tools!

story:
InspiredKids as a secret tool for parents

The role of a parent in general and father, in particular, has rapidly evolved and any working parent is expected to spend quality time with their children. However, they don’t have time to come up with new activities for their young ones, they also don’t have time to browse through every website for informative and inspirational parent’s blogs, all they need is to make their children happy and make them feel good about themselves. InspiredKids app comes in handy to help parents out there to be the most creative. 

Our team of co-founders have been working in management consulting firm when we faced the challenge of managing busy schedule and parenthood joys, soon discovering, we were not alone. We also realized there was a simple solution, and this is how an idea to tackle a daily challenge turned into this smart product.

We believe that by enabling parents to be their best while inspiring their children daily we do contribute to the co-creation of a happier and healthier future. 

Highlights

  • Inspire your child daily - a few people have time to browse dozens of resources and websites with recommendations, while “fighting” commercials and pop up ads. InspiredKids app gives you enough choice but it is not overwhelming - offering three easy-to-do, engaging in real life, joyful activities - daily
  • Learn something new together - there is a curated video playlist for you and your child - there are no "nonsense" cartoons, we select videos that are useful, practical and beautiful
  • Every day counts - every time you create memories by playing an activity with your child you can see it in the app Calendar. Check sweet memories, repeat the favourite ones.

While there is a larger number of websites with kids-related activities, mobile apps to occupy child while you are busy with your routine, we believe there is nothing more powerful than playing with your child daily, in real life - with simple and easily accessible via mobile “cheat sheet” - InspiredKids app.

Thank You Indigogo
We greatly appreciate your support and are excited to get our InspiredKids app with new features available for our backers!

Have a question or a suggestion? We would love to hear from you. You can email us at hello@thebiggerthings.com.

 

 

What does an awesome day with your inspired kid consist of?

 

  1. You have a choice to play any of 3 activities offered - you select the one which is most enjoyable (and doable) on this particular day
  2. You easily list and count all required materials and supplies to get the most out of the activity - with easy tracking of those you already have on hand
  3. It is seamless and fun for you two to follow a step-by-step guide - it has never been that easy to play a game but following the easy steps with images
  4. You can get a little bit more inspiration by watching a playlist of carefully curated videos  - to inspire you two, while also giving an opportunity to learn something new
  5. You enjoy creating and sharing memories - capturing a photo of the result of your play using your phone camera - to be able to come back to the sweet moments, share with beloved ones via messenger
  6. Well done! You can compliment yourself by checking calendar with a track of all the good things you’ve done with your child this month - a discipline and consistency are important factors to support happiness. Track progress of your plays and games via Calendar

What’s in the InspiredKids app?

 

   

  

 

 

  • Daily Wins: accomplishment of doing something meaningful with and for your child daily
  • Sweet Memories: an ability to always go back to special moments via calendar
  • Repeat Favorite Activity: you liked that awesome play you did earlier this month - step by step guide is still there and available for you
  • That Smile of Your Child..: getting the most precious reward of learning each other more and more every day, while developing useful skills

What InspiredKids app doesn't do

Privacy and safety are crucial for any product, but especially when we are talking about our children. InspiredKids is a tool for a parent. The prime user of the app is an adult. The only interaction with the app a child can have when a parent would like to watch suggested video playlist together. We do not collect or store data on user's child. We recommend the activities for children 3-5-year-old, yet it is to the full discretion of a parent to decide if e.g. he would like to use recommended activities for his child who is younger or older the recommended age. On top of this, InspiredKids app doesn't have an advertisement inside the app. 

What we need & what you get

Our team of talented developers and designers are working on bringing the full version of InspiredKids app to you. 

  • 60% of raised funds will go to the development (enhanced UX, new features including customization, upgrade of the video player) 
  • 40% of raised funds will go to content development 

* Note: If we are located in one city we will have our meet-up in person. In case our backer is based in a different location, then we order sweet treats online for them and have a chat all together over Skype. From our side, we will have a co-founder, technical and design team. 

 

    Project Timeline

    Today's campaign is the result of the test-and-adjust pilot launch of InspiredKids app we did in late 2017. That exciting, challenging and sometimes painful experience is invaluable - we listened to customers while experimenting with features and content, and now we are ready to make a leap for a full edition. 

    • September 2017 - InspiredKids conceptualized and validated with prospective customers

    • December 2017 - InspiredKids pilot launch, the app available on AppStore

    • May 2018 - the Full team of creators and developers joined InspiredKids

    • August 2018 - InspiredKids full edition launch (customized user journey, content extension, upgrade of video player)

    • October 2018 - InspiredKids new features & Android

    • December 2018 - InspiredKids new features, multi-language

     

     

    Thank you so much for checking out our project and your support. We hope the InspiredKids app can help you to be the best version of parent you want to be - while spending precious time with your children, inspiring them daily!

     

    Risks & Challenges

    During our initial launch of InspredKids app earlier this year we learnt a lot, we have experienced ups and downs. The critical aspect of building a useful and beautiful tool for customers - team communication, tech skills and quality of content - engaging, educational and appropriate for children age 3-5 year old.

    We have hired a strong creative team of developers, we have formalized partnerships with content creators specializing in early child development.

    That said, we are aware, unexpected challenges come up. We do all precautious measures to complete crash tests before the official launch, however, as in any app, the first iteration can have some minor bugs that we will promptly address within a number of days, if happens. During our pilot launch, we experienced one crash - all users who were affected by it during those 4 days were offered 3 months free of charge app subscription.

    Our goal is to help the busy parents to be the best version of themselves, while raising their children, creating future. Feel free to reach out to us at hello@thebiggerthings.com anytime you have a thought, idea, or question.

     

    Other ways you can help

    We want as many parents as possible to feel happy about themselves while inspiring their children - you can be part of the movement. Please share Our Indigogo Campaign with your spouse and friends! 

     

    Questions about the Project?

    Please check FAQ section below:

    Q1. How is the InspiredKids app different than other available products?

    While a list of simple and complex educational and entertainment apps for kids exist, the InspiredKids app is designed to be not a mobile distraction or time-filler, rather a quick tool to help a parent to reconnect with and engage his child in real life

    Q2. How is InspiredKids app is different than some kids-focused blog or Pinterest board?  

    We are active users of parent blogs, however, in most of the cases, the experience is overwhelming - too many options of activities, hard to track progress what you’ve actually already accomplished, not to mention ads and other distractions.

    InspiredKids app keeps it quick and easy - based on your indication of how much time for a play you have today you receive a selection of 3 activities. If you need a little bit more inspiration - you can access a curated video playlist.

    Q3. When should I watch video playlist - before or after playing activity?

    It does really depend on your and your child mood, and time available to you. Just a quick hint - when it comes to craft activities we sometimes incorporate video tutorial as well.

    Q4. When should I use the InspiredKids app?

    Daily, there is nothing more powerful than creating special moments be it only a 15 min play with your child. We understand that all professionals have different time schedules, cities - have different weather conditions, therefore daily we offer a selection of 3 activities to give you flexibility and comfort of selecting the one most appropriate for the time of the day you decide to spend together with your child.

    Q5. What if I do not want to watch videos?

    We understand that some of the parents actually prefer to limit the time that child spends with a mobile device - therefore video playlist is optional and is only 20-min long. You can watch it together, you can watch even by yourself - many customers (adults) enjoy our curation because they learn something new from the videos that they can narrate, share with a child in person after.

    Q6. How long does activity take to complete?

    In this new launch, we introduce customization: every day you launch the app and you are asked about the time available for a play today. Based on your selection (<15 min, 15-30 min, 50-60 min) three activities are offered for you.
