Our team of co-founders have been working in management consulting firm when we faced the challenge of managing busy schedule and parenthood joys, soon discovering, we were not alone. We also realized there was a simple solution, and this is how an idea to tackle a daily challenge turned into this smart product.
We believe that by enabling parents to be their best while inspiring their children daily we do contribute to the co-creation of a happier and healthier future. 
Highlights


Inspire your child daily - a few people have time to browse dozens of resources and websites with recommendations, while “fighting” commercials and pop up ads. InspiredKids app gives you enough choice but it is not overwhelming - offering three easy-to-do, engaging in real life, joyful activities - daily

Learn something new together - there is a curated video playlist for you and your child - there are no "nonsense" cartoons, we select videos that are useful, practical and beautiful

Every day counts - every time you create memories by playing an activity with your child you can see it in the app Calendar. Check sweet memories, repeat the favourite ones.

While there is a larger number of websites with kids-related activities, mobile apps to occupy child while you are busy with your routine, we believe there is nothing more powerful than playing with your child daily, in real life - with simple and easily accessible via mobile “cheat sheet” - InspiredKids app.
Thank You IndigogoWe greatly appreciate your support and are excited to get our InspiredKids app with new features available for our backers!Have a question or a suggestion? We would love to hear from you. You can email us at hello@thebiggerthings.com.
 


 
What does an awesome day with your inspired kid consist of?
 


You have a choice to play any of 3 activities offered - you select the one which is most enjoyable (and doable) on this particular day

You easily list and count all required materials and supplies to get the most out of the activity - with easy tracking of those you already have on hand

It is seamless and fun for you two to follow a step-by-step guide - it has never been that easy to play a game but following the easy steps with images

You can get a little bit more inspiration by watching a playlist of carefully curated videos  - to inspire you two, while also giving an opportunity to learn something new

You enjoy creating and sharing memories - capturing a photo of the result of your play using your phone camera - to be able to come back to the sweet moments, share with beloved ones via messenger

Well done! You can compliment yourself by checking calendar with a track of all the good things you’ve done with your child this month - a discipline and consistency are important factors to support happiness. Track progress of your plays and games via Calendar

What’s in the InspiredKids app?
 
   
   

  

 


Daily Wins: accomplishment of doing something meaningful with and for your child daily

Sweet Memories: an ability to always go back to special moments via calendar

Repeat Favorite Activity: you liked that awesome play you did earlier this month - step by step guide is still there and available for you

That Smile of Your Child..: getting the most precious reward of learning each other more and more every day, while developing useful skills

What InspiredKids app doesn't do
Privacy and safety are crucial for any product, but especially when we are talking about our children. InspiredKids is a tool for a parent. The prime user of the app is an adult. The only interaction with the app a child can have when a parent would like to watch suggested video playlist together. We do not collect or store data on user's child. We recommend the activities for children 3-5-year-old, yet it is to the full discretion of a parent to decide if e.g. he would like to use recommended activities for his child who is younger or older the recommended age. On top of this, InspiredKids app doesn't have an advertisement inside the app. 
What we need & what you get
Our team of talented developers and designers are working on bringing the full version of InspiredKids app to you. 

60% of raised funds will go to the development (enhanced UX, new features including customization, upgrade of the video player) 
40% of raised funds will go to content development 


* Note: If we are located in one city we will have our meet-up in person. In case our backer is based in a different location, then we order sweet treats online for them and have a chat all together over Skype. From our side, we will have a co-founder, technical and design team. 
 


Project Timeline
Today's campaign is the result of the test-and-adjust pilot launch of InspiredKids app we did in late 2017. That exciting, challenging and sometimes painful experience is invaluable - we listened to customers while experimenting with features and content, and now we are ready to make a leap for a full edition. 

September 2017 - InspiredKids conceptualized and validated with prospective customers
December 2017 - InspiredKids pilot launch, the app available on AppStore
May 2018 - the Full team of creators and developers joined InspiredKids
August 2018 - InspiredKids full edition launch (customized user journey, content extension, upgrade of video player)
October 2018 - InspiredKids new features & Android
December 2018 - InspiredKids new features, multi-language


 

 
Thank you so much for checking out our project and your support. We hope the InspiredKids app can help you to be the best version of parent you want to be - while spending precious time with your children, inspiring them daily!
 
Risks & Challenges
During our initial launch of InspredKids app earlier this year we learnt a lot, we have experienced ups and downs. The critical aspect of building a useful and beautiful tool for customers - team communication, tech skills and quality of content - engaging, educational and appropriate for children age 3-5 year old.
We have hired a strong creative team of developers, we have formalized partnerships with content creators specializing in early child development.
That said, we are aware, unexpected challenges come up. We do all precautious measures to complete crash tests before the official launch, however, as in any app, the first iteration can have some minor bugs that we will promptly address within a number of days, if happens. During our pilot launch, we experienced one crash - all users who were affected by it during those 4 days were offered 3 months free of charge app subscription.
Our goal is to help the busy parents to be the best version of themselves, while raising their children, creating future. Feel free to reach out to us at hello@thebiggerthings.com anytime you have a thought, idea, or question.

 
Other ways you can help
We want as many parents as possible to feel happy about themselves while inspiring their children - you can be part of the movement. Please share Our Indigogo Campaign with your spouse and friends! 
 Questions about the Project?Please check FAQ section below:Q1. How is the InspiredKids app different than other available products?While a list of simple and complex educational and entertainment apps for kids exist, the InspiredKids app is designed to be not a mobile distraction or time-filler, rather a quick tool to help a parent to reconnect with and engage his child in real lifeQ2. How is InspiredKids app is different than some kids-focused blog or Pinterest board?  We are active users of parent blogs, however, in most of the cases, the experience is overwhelming - too many options of activities, hard to track progress what you’ve actually already accomplished, not to mention ads and other distractions.InspiredKids app keeps it quick and easy - based on your indication of how much time for a play you have today you receive a selection of 3 activities. If you need a little bit more inspiration - you can access a curated video playlist.Q3. When should I watch video playlist - before or after playing activity?It does really depend on your and your child mood, and time available to you. Just a quick hint - when it comes to craft activities we sometimes incorporate video tutorial as well.Q4. When should I use the InspiredKids app?Daily, there is nothing more powerful than creating special moments be it only a 15 min play with your child. We understand that all professionals have different time schedules, cities - have different weather conditions, therefore daily we offer a selection of 3 activities to give you flexibility and comfort of selecting the one most appropriate for the time of the day you decide to spend together with your child.Q5. What if I do not want to watch videos?We understand that some of the parents actually prefer to limit the time that child spends with a mobile device - therefore video playlist is optional and is only 20-min long. You can watch it together, you can watch even by yourself - many customers (adults) enjoy our curation because they learn something new from the videos that they can narrate, share with a child in person after.Q6. How long does activity take to complete?In this new launch, we introduce customization: every day you launch the app and you are asked about the time available for a play today. Based on your selection (<15 min, 15-30 min, 50-60 min) three activities are offered for you.

story:
Our Story

It’s said that necessity is the mother of invention. And in this case, it was in fact my mother who inspired FotoJelly. I saw how frustrating it was for her as well as other family & friends to easily share photos of birthdays, outings and other events captured with their smartphones – I call it “Foto Rodeo”, trying to rustle up photos from everyone.

Sure, they could learn to use hashtags, how to "stream" their photos, email everyone links to a photo archive, etc. But they aren't intuitive solutions for the 80%. I wanted to develop an application that integrated with the social networks, calendars, and event services they already use, to create and share albums easily, and do it in real time.

The FotoJelly Vision

Our vision is simple: the best suite of photo sharing apps and services available first for Windows Phone 8, Windows 8 App Store, other smartphones, and beyond.

We'll start with a mobile app that doesn’t require you to be a techie or social media expert. You simply create or join a “Jelly” that’s been associated with a particular activity or event you are part of. You, along with everyone else,  begin capturing and sharing fotos.

  • The album automatically adapts to the time, date and [optionally] venue/location of the event, assuring everyone that all the fotos captured and shared are relevant (e.g., no more Christmas fotos showing up in your Spring Break album!)
  • By default, these fotos are only shared with those you invite. They can be made public to allow others to view and comment on. You can also cross-post your fotos to Facebook and twitter, customize them with filters & stickers, etc.

For event hosts, businesses and marketers, you’re no longer held hostage by hashtags, the technical equivalents to cats, where you never really own them and have no idea whether they will eventually cause your event or brand trouble later on. Instead, you create the album and invite event guests, customers or the general public to participate. Should you want to cross-post to social networks or attach a hashtag, you are free to do so. The key is this: you always own the experience and can define the context of the content.

The app will be free - you don't have to be a paid member of the FotoJelly site to use the app or share fotos via social networks. Supporters of our project at the $25 level or above will get access to special versions of the app with premium capabilities unlocked.  

The Plan

We have gone from concept and prototype to testing with users, iterating on our initial ideas and improving the product along the way. Our Founder graduated from a tech incubator, using the opportunity to refine the vision and develop an alpha project.

During that time we were recognized by Microsoft and our developer community peers for our beta effort and the uniqueness of our app.

 

Now we need your help to complete the refined version of the app, migrate it to Windows Phone 8, and add features that we feel will fulfill the FotoJelly vision.

The funds will apportioned to contracting a designer and additional developer, acquiring testing hardware, and project management. 

The Perks

We have a lot of great rewards lined up for our supporters, everything from beta access to FotoJelly-branded swag and  invites to our launch parties in Chicago or Seattle. And, every pledge of $8 or more will receive a limited-edition badge displayed in their User Profile within the app.

   

FAQ

What platforms will FotoJelly be available on?
We are super fans of Windows Phone, and will continue to prioritize development to that device. But, we do understand that we have to support additional platforms to generate the scale of users we need to make FotoJelly an unqualified success.

How much does the FotoJelly app cost?
The app will be free and feature-rich as described. We do believe there is an audience for premium and professional features and capabilities that would further enhance the FotoJelly experience to a select segment of our customer base, and will offer early access as reward for significant pledges.

How does FotoJelly deal with privacy issues?
By default, all Jellies are private to the Host and the individuals who are invited. Fotos uploaded to or taken within the FotoJelly app can be deleted by the user who submitted them, even after the Jelly has been closed. We do not own your photos. And while we may use advertisement to support our products, there will never be a direct or implied associatio made to our users or their photos.

Risks and challenges

The primary risk to any software project's success would be the ability of the team to develop the app and release it to the public. We’ve proven our ability to execute and have been recognized by Microsoft and our developer peers for our ability to do so well. As experienced developers, product managers, and business leaders you can be assured we will communicate our progress regularly, regularly assess our performance and address challenges head on, ultimately reaching our goal and delivering a great product.
